Dam Dam Dam Ta Ta Ta Ta
Sautin k'arar bindigun dake tashi a hanyar shi yayi sanadiyar,tsayawar zirga-zirgar saman titin,lokacin karfe sha d'aya na dare,saidai y'an fashin sun samu tarar motoci zasu kai biyar a hanyar
Matasa ne zasukai kimanin shekara 40 wasu kuma 35 a duniya,su bakwai ne a hanyar,saidai bindigogin hannun su zasu iya saka ka rud'e,take suka kwantar da mutanan dake motar saman titi,lokacin suka fara ansar kud'ade dakuma abubuwa a hannunsu
Wata mata dake gefe tana kuka,Zaid ya matsa wajan ta,bindigar hannunshi ya aza saman kanta,ba shiri ta mik'a mashi jakar hannunta
Bud'ewa yayi saidai kudin ciki basuda yawa,tsawa yadaka mata yana tambayarta ba iya kudin taba kenan,cikin rud'ewa tayi mashi bayanin babu saura,saidai dan hannu,sark'a da d'an kunnan da take sanye
Hannu ya mik'a mata,ta ciro jiki na karma ta mik'a mashi,ta d'aga k'afarta ta ciro sarkar k'afa ta mik'a mashi,dai-dai lokacin Sauran abokan aikin suka gama ansar kud'ad'e daga hannun mutanan da suka tsare
Lokacin Gun ya k'ara dafe wata bindiga wadda ita a ajiye take shi yake operating dinta,saboda iya saiti da kuma iya harba bindiga hakan yasa suke kiranshi Gun,gaba daya suka fara shiga motarsu dake, ajiye,Run ne ya tada motar kasan cewarshi babban matuk'insu,saboda yadda ya iya driving dakuma iya shiga da fita hakan yasa abokan aikinshi suke ce mashi Run wato Gudu
Sun jima suna harbe-harbe har suka shiga wani mugun daji dake gefen hanyar,saida sukasan sun b'acene suka daina Harbin
Tafiya takai tsawan ta awa Ukku suka isa wani makeken gidan dake cikin wani daji,yadda aka gina gidan kanshi zakasha mamaki,saboda yadda kyan gidan ya tsaru,dai-dai gate din gidan suka fara saukowa,kafin mai gadi ya bude Run ya shiga da hancin motar shi
A harabar gidan suka taddashi,zaune saman wani resting chair dake cikin wata farfajiya da aka k'awatar da fulawoyi,shekarunshi zasukai 55,Babban mutunne,d'an gayu daka ganshi kasan dukiya ta zauna mashi,koda suka iso gaban shi lokacin suka fara Saramashi alamar ban girma
Alhaji Kabir kenan,shahararran d'an shiyasa,saidai kuma ba asalin d'an siyasar bane,asalin tsohon d'an fashine da yayi fice,saidai babu Wanda yasan da hakan,ya shiga saboda yayi kusanci da manya,sannan kuma mutane bazasu rink'a neman sana'ar shiba
Zama sukayi saman kujerun dake gefe,lokacin wasu ma'aikata suka fara kawo masu drinks da kuma abinci,take suka fara ba Oga labarin yadda aikin su na yau ya kasance
Shikanshi yana jinjina masu,take ya cigaba da basu wani darasi akan salon tsere,saboda a k'aida duk lokacin da suka dawo tofa sai ya k'ara masu logic na harkarsu,sun jima,anan ya mik'e tare fad'in"Zaid ku shiga da komi ciki zan koma gida ne"
Zaid yace"OK Oga sai gobe"
Alhaji Kabir ya mike ya ajiye jaridar hannunshi,wata tsadddar mota ya nufa,driver ya taho da sauri ya bude mashi suka bar gidan
*MALAYSIA*

Islam tad'an saki fuska,tana mashi sannu,dai-dai lokacin ta bud'e gidan suka shiga,hanyar falon suka nufa,gidane mai d'auke da 2bed room with toilet,babban falo da kitchen sai dinning table a gefe

Gaba d'aya Mufeeda tasan abinda guy d'in yayi bai Kyauta ba,saidai dole zataba k'awarta hakuri,Islam ta kalleta "wayana fa?"
Mufeeda tace"sorry dear"tana maganar tana komawa b'angaran mai zaman banza ta bude ta shiga ta zauna,Islam tayiwa Mota key suka nufi gida
Tun a falo ta cire jallabiyar jikinta,yarage daga ita sai riga da wando,ta kalli Mufeeda"Mufee banji ciwan wayar nan ba,irin wulakancin dayaman,abu yana hannuna ya fizge,hate him"
"No kimanta da komi,it could be bazaku k'ara had'uwa ba"
Islam ta anshi wayar Mufeeda tak'ara kiran mahaifin nata,bajimawa ya d'auka,"how comes muna waya kin kashe?"
Islam ta fara magana cikin sagwab'a tabashi labari"kiyi hakuri maybe baiji kin bashi hakuri ba"
"Allah duk in mun had'u saiya biyani phone d'ina" nida Zanzo,zan taho maki da new one"
Islam ta fara buga k'afa"Dad ni bazan iya zama ba wayaba har kusan 2weeks"
"OK,OK don't cry,I will now make transper to your accnt,than saiki sayi wata"
Islam sai lokacin ta dai-dai ta"no problem zamuyi karatu cox exams is approaching"
"OK bey red well"
Sukayi bankwana,Mufeeda ta kalleta "shikenan Dad ya raba rigima"
Islam tayi dariya ta mik'e ta shiga room d'inta tadawo hannunta da wata waya,ta fidda Sims d'inta ta maida a ciki,ta kunna wayai,tana kunnawa massge yana shigowa kud'in sun shigo accnt d'inta 300k
Ta aje wayar suka cigaba da fiira,Islam da Mufeeda k'awaye ne sosai,su nason junansu,dukansu y'an Nigeria ne,Islam mahaifinta yanada kud'i sosai,sannan kuma yanaji da ita saboda itace y'a d'aya tallo da Allah yabashi,yawancin karatunta,tunda tagama primary skul,duk a waje take karatunta,lokacin datayi secondary skul a India tayishi,ko lokacin gida guda Yakama mata itada mai aikinta wadda a tare suka tafi
Saidai duk bayan wata Ukku sai yakaimata ziyara,kuma yakan d'auki lokaci wajn yarinyarshi,Bayan tagama scondry skull ta dawo gida Nigeria dazama,saidai batafi wata shidda ba,Dad ya nema mata University of Malaysian,hakan yasa batada wasu Frnds a Nigeria,haka Dad yakan nisanta ta da yawan abokai,yace gudun lallacewar tarbiya
Islam tanada halin kirki sosai,batada wata matsala a rayuwarta,lokacin da tana India malamin Islama ya tura mata, yana koyar da ita karatun addini sosai, dan saida tayi haddar wasu daga cikin surori
Lokacin data je Malaysia shekara Hudu kenan,tana karatun tane a b'angaran Law yanzu haka tagama digree d'inta ne sun fara Masters saidai semester suce ta farko
Islam akwai kwalwa,tana gane karatu sosai kuma sensory memory gareta,bata mance karatun da aka koya mata yawanci ita take rolling faculty d'insu na Law,shiyasa kowa yasanta a skul d'in,saidai batada yawan magana sai idan takama,tofa zakuji surutu,gaya bata kula samari hakan yasa jininsu yazo d'aya da Mufeeda
Daka ganta da Saurayi tofa maganar karatuce,wani lokaci kam tana tutorials gaba d'aya harda maza take koya mawa abinda basu ganeba kan lectures din da akayi weekly
Farko Dad ya nuna k'in abincewarshi kan karatun Law saidai ita tadage akan lawyer takeson zama,dan dole yabarta dan bayason abinda zai b'ata ranta
Mufeeda ma iyayata sunada kud'i saidai ita mahaifinta ba irin abinda mahaifin Islam yake mataba,kaman yawan tura kud'i,asali a hostel tafara zama bayan sun zama k'awaye da Mufeeda hakan yasa Islam ta jawota gidan ta,suka cigaba da zama a tare
****Zaune suke a d'aya daga cikin love garding chairs da aka tanada domin zaman yan makranta,gaba d'aya hankalinta yanakan ice cream d'in da takesha,ta kalli Mufeeda"Frnd yaufa zamuje DAMAN PARK nagaji da zakan gidan"
Mufeeda tace "ok muje gidan yanzu damun huta sai mutafi naga marece yafara yi"
Islam ta d'auki takardunta ta rik'e jakkar hannunta,parking space d'in ta dufa,suka shiga motar suka bar skul d'in
Karfe biyar na marece suka shiga Daman park,yawo suka farayi sosai dan sun kwana biyu basuje park d'inba saboda yanayin karatun su,Islam ta shiga daidai cikin wasu itatuwa suna gewayawa,ta kalli Mufeeda"friend snap me,zan turawa Dad anjima"
Nan tad'auketa pics sosai,b'angaran joint suka shiga sunna zama Islam tace"kai bari inkira My wajan zaifi dad'in zama with him"
Islam tayi dariya tana d'an tab'e baki"kin dai fad'a kawai bab"

Ko 20mint ba'ayiba saurayin ya iso wajan,a skul d'insu yake,tunda suka had'u da mufeeda ya lik'e mata,gaya yanzu tafara kulashi
Islam ta mik'e tana fad'in"sannu da zuwa Imam"
Cikin sakin fuska ya ansa tana fad'in "INA zuwa"
Tana dariya tace"zan dawo kujirani"
Cikin takonta,ta matsa wajan kujerun tana danna wayarta,dai-dai lokacin ya zauna saman d'aya daga cikin kujerun yana ajiye bottle din lemo da wani cake a hannunshi
Baiganta ba sai ji yayi anja kujerar dake kallon tashi ana shiri zama,fuskarta yakoma yana kallo,lokacin ta zauna tana janye fuskarta kan wayar,ganinshi yasata ware ido,dan bata ganshi ba
Moh'd ya bita da wata harara dan yagane itace yarinyar da sukayi fad'a,Islam ta kauda fuskarta,saidai gaba d'aya batasn zama wajan ba,har tayi niyar tashi,tayi tunanin kada yace tsoron shi taji
Duk'ar dakanta tayi kan wayar,tana latsawa,Moh'd ya bud'e ledar cake d'in ya fidda ya tura ledar gabanta,ta fad'a saman jikinta
D'agowa tay takalleshi,lokacin ya kauda fuskarshi,kamar bai saniba,yadda yayi ya k'ara bata haushi ta aza wayar kan table din tace"ni Refuse bin ce, dazakaci abu ka turoman?"
Juyowa yayi ya kalleta,ta had'e rai"banyi tunanin akwai wani a wajanba,naga kamar refuse bin shiyasa"
Kallon dressing d'inta tayi,tsadddun kayane jikinta lace ne doguwar riga,black colour ne with red kanta babu d'ankwali saidai mayafin data d'ora harkai ta gefen mayafinta d'an kunnanta guda yafito hakan yak'ara mata kyau
Ta kaleshi"nice nayi kama da refuse bin?waikai wane kalar mutunne,ina ruwanka dani"ta mik'e tsaye tana huci"wallahi bakada kirki banason mutun irinka,last week fa nayi maka laifi na baka hak'uri saboda bakajiba kaman wurgi da phone and my best friend change another one for me,yau kuma kazo ina zaune ka jefamin leda,nayi magana kace ni refuse bin CE,kaine resuse bin d'in,jibeka fa,harka isa ka Kalleni kace nayi kama da wajan aje Shara"tana maganar tana mashi kallon raini
Tunda Moh'd yake babu macan da tatab'ayi mashi irin haka asalima babu Fuskar yin hakan balle,saidai yadda take maganar yagane bata iya masifa ba,mik'ewa yayi tsaye ya aje bottle d'in hannunshi yace"Refuse bin,ga wannan in SEPA tazo ta kwashe"
Yana maganar yana juyawa,Islam ta gangaro ta rik'e bayan rigarshi"wallhi baka isaba,baka isa ka wulak'an taniba,kai d'in waye,waye kai?"
Tana maganar tana jijjigashi,juyowa yayi yasa hannu ya kama hannunta da yatsa biyu alamar k'ama"ki daina tab'ani zakiman dirty a kaya"
Islam ta zaro ido,sai lokacin taji dariya,dan tasan shi kanshi bai isa yace akwai alamar dirty atare da itaba,ta girgiza kai"Ashe mad Man nake tare dashi"
Ta juya zata koma wajan da suka baro Moh'd ya tsaya yana kallon jikinshi,so yake yagane inda dressing d'inshi yayi kamada na mahaukata,White jeans ne jikinshi t
shirt din jikinshi kanta abin kalloce,ta kalmin k'afarashi ya kalla,wani haushi yakamashi,mamaki yake wannan wace yarinyace har zata mashi irin haka batare da yad'auki matakiba,juyawa yayi yabita saidai lokacin har tabar wajan
Motar shi yanufa,sai lokacin na kula da wata d'ayar mota dake bayan tashi saidai ma'aikatan Nigeria ne da kayan sojoji,Moh'd fuska d'aure ya isa wajan lokacin suka fara saluting din shi,ya bud'e wata farar mota mai tsadar gaske shiga,driven motar dake d'auke da Sojojin yaja mota sukabar wajan dagudu kamar yadda Ogan nasu yaja tashi motai
Hanyar Hotel din daya sauka ya nufa,sauri-sauri yayi parking,ya fito yayi hanyar room d'inshi sojojin na binshi da d'an gudunsu,a bakin k'ofar ya juyo ya kallesu atare kuka k'ame,suna jiran command d'in shi
Agogon hannunshi yakalla"time for priyer"
"Yes sir"sukace ya juya ya shige ciki,bai tsaya Fallon ba yashiga bedroom wajan mirow yatsaya yana kallon kanshi,handsome guy ne with class,gentle ne,yanada fari soaai,ga sajanahi ya biyo gefen fuskar shi,sai lokacin ya fara tuno maganganunta" Mad man" sosai yaji maganai, afili yace"u will pay for it"yanayi yana cige,dai-dai nan aka fara kiran sallah, toilet yashiga yayi alwala ya fito ya nufi masallaci cikin sauri
*****Karfe 2:00 nadare Run yayi parking motar shi a k'ofar gidan wani shahararran dan siyasa da aka bawa Biliyoyin kud'i a zaman majalissar da sukayi

Janyeshi sukayi daga hanya,suka shigo harabar gidan,Gun ne da wani Bluetooth a kunnanshi da alama Wanda yake waya dashi,yana gaya mashi direction din da zasubi ta gidan

Mai gidan ya zo ya bude kofa,dan a tunaninshi maigadinshi ne,dan kayan shine jikin Danger

gaba d'aya Unguwar ta rikice

Saidai yau ba asalin gidan dake dajin suka shigaba,cikin garine sosai,suna zuwa suka ajewa Oga kayan aiki,suna bashi labari,Danger yace"waisu a tunanin police d'in zasu  iya damu
"
Ogan yayi darya,yace"nasan zuwa safe labari zai iske wannan tsohon d'an sandan,dan in k'ara mashi bak'in ciki shiyasa nace,yau asa police aiki"

******Wani irin harbe-harbe ake tsakanin police,sojoji da kuma su gun,gaba d'aya tinin ya hargitse,saukin lokacin k'arfe 2 na dare ne,wani abu su Danger suke suke jefarsu dashi mai wuta,gaba d'aya sojojin sun gane yaran sun fisu kayan aiki
Danger yafara yimasu magana akan su fara shiga mota saboda ganin sojojin sun kusa cin masu,Gun kau harbi kawai yake,sojoji kusan Ukku a kwance,duk sun shiga mota,sai Gun da Danger dake k'ok'arin hawa,ga Run yafara tafiya da mota,Gun kam da sauran sai harbi suke
Lokacin motarsu d'aya tayi gaba,harta b'ace,Gun ya haye motar,Ya zauna yana harbi,Dai-dai Danger zai kama motar ya hau wani d'an Sanda ya harba bindigarshi sai a k'afar Denger
Aikam kasa kama motar yayi,ya duk'e yana kama kama k'afar,Gun yafara gaya masu an harbi Danger,Run ya k'arawa mota wuta
Wayar dake kunnan Run da suke commicating da Oga,cikin wayar yaji ana fad'in an harbe,Oga yace"Ku tsaya Ku taho dashi"
Run dakewa mota wuta yace"no way out,suna gab da kamamu"
Oga yace"Gun ya harbe shi,kada kubarshi da rai"
Run yagayawa Gun,su Kansu sunsan hakan shine mafita,dan idan aka kama wani cikinsu to tabbas asirinsu ya tonu
Harbi kawai Gun ke kaiwa,Run kuwa yayi nisa wajan gudu,dai-dai lokacin Gun yasamu Denger saidai baya iya gane a inane
Gun yace"yes na harbe shi"
Kafin kace mi,sun fad'a daji,sukam dama sojojin Sun harbe masu taya babu yadda za'ayi su bi b'arayin
Hakan yasa sukayo wajan Denger,yana dafe da K'afa gaya kuma Gun ya harabar mashi hannu guda,haka suka gewayeshi suna anshe bindigar hannunshi
Yaukam Denger yana cikin tashin hankali,lokacin wata motar tazo wajansu,basu tsaya b'ata lokaci ba suka saka shi cikin mota,suka kwashe sojojin su da aka harba, sukayi gaba

Wani kalar jiri take gani dakyal tasamu ta isa akinta,kwanciya tayi tana karanto innallhi,gaba aya jikinta kyarma yake,a hankali ta mie tana fain "calm down,calm down islam"tana maganar tana sauke ajiyar zuciya
Koda can islam tana bain cikin kisan da akayiwa mahaifiyarta,balle yanzu datake cikin bain cikin rashinta
Wata zuciyar tana fai mata neman hainta da zatayi,ayan angaran zuciyarta yana nuna mata taya zataja da mahaifin Moh'd mutumin data amincewa auranshi,afili tace"indai har Moh'd yaza sojan kware mai kare hain alumma dole yagoya mata baya wajan ganin ta anso hainta"
Ita kanta tana tunanin wani lokacin da suna malaysia yadda Moh'd ya jajirce yana koyawa Mufeeda karatu amma yana magana akan hain alumma da jami'an tsaro suke karewa,sai kuma ta tuna sadda yace,jami'an tsaro basu aikata abu saida dalili
Islam ta mie tabbas tanason sanin dalilin yin hakan
Wayarta ta jawo tana kiran wani proffesor nasu,suna mutunci dashi tun tana malaysia,sosai tayi mashi bayanin duk abinda kenan,gaba aya ya warware mata hanyoyin da zatabi
Miewa tayi tana aukar result inta da sauran abin buata,tun bayan dawowar islam akwai wanda sueta son tafara aiki cikin awayenta da sukayi karatu,ajewa tayi tana fain gobe zata fara neman aiki
Daddare Moh'd yakirata yakirata amma bata auka ba,sbd bata da wani abin cemashi,abinda tasani shine tanason kwato hainta akan kisan mahaifiyarta da akayi
Sako ta tura mashi"My love nasan ba lallai kaji dain abinda zan fai makaba,amma inason ka kasance cikin jami'an tsaro masu adalci,ko bazaka taimakeni wajan kwatar hainaba,inso kada kasa mani baki a maganar,ayanzu nariga na haura da auranka,sbd inason bin umarnin best father ina,and zan au fansa kan abinda akaiwa Mamanah"
Moh'd har bacci yafara aukarshi,yaji arar shigowar sao,cikin tashin hnkli ygana kranta saonta,kiranta ya arayi saidai bata aukaba,Moh'd ya jinjina kai,yana tashi zaune
Afili yace dakanki zaki kai Dad inki kotu,dakanki zaki gane halin Dad inki,zakuma ki sakashi cikin tashin hankali,mohd yayi murmushi dan yasan Dad in bazai barta ta tada wannn case inba
Yana tunanin bacci ya aukeshi,ita kanta hakanne a angaranta,washe gari da safe ta fito ta bue gdan baya na motarta,ta jefa file inta,tana juyowa Dad ya fito daga part inshi,Islam ta nufeshi,tana fain"moning Dad"
Wani farin ciki yake ganin yadda fuskarta ta,yace"mornng yakk"
Islam ta shiga mota tana fain"lf lau"
Yana gani tafice daga gdan,har arfe Ukku tana kan neman aikintane,batasha wata wahala ba,akayi accepting tare da bata tabbacin za'a nemeta
Office in Mohd ta nufa dan tasn lokaci zuwa lokaci yakankai marece,cikin sa'a kuwa yana bakin motarshi zaifita,Islam tayi parkin harabar wajn moh'd yajuyo yana kallonta,wajn da take ya nufa,Islam ta sauke glss inta Moh'd ace"welcm"
Islam tace"zaka pitane?tana maganar bata kallonshi,Moh'd yaan lura da canjin da tayi yace"Baby kinason gani nane"
Islam tace"shine dalilin zuwana"
Mohd yace"yanzu nagaji,Amma kijira ni 15 mint in fito"
Islam ta kalleshi,wani iri takeji zuciyarta tana raya mata wannn shine anan wanda ya kashe mamanki,tace"anya zan iya jira"
Moh'd yace"plzz kijira"yana maganar yana komawa Office in,tsawan minti talatin kafin yafito lokacin islam ta fara gajiya da jira
Hangoshi tayi sanye da kayan gida,Islam ta tae baki,kenn ma wanka yayi,yana zuwa yaan tsaya wajan wani soja,yana bashi umarnin kaimashi motarshi gda
Ya nufo yana bue gidan gaba na motarta,yana shiga yace"sorry for keeping you waiting"
Islam ta juyar dakai jin yadda amshin shi ke dakar hancinta,wani kwanciyar hankali ya shigeta,saidai lokacin bata fahimtar komi,saboda tsanar shi da takeson sakawa zuciyarta
Tace"mi hakan ke nufi,nace inason magana dakai kabarni zaune,sai yanzu ka dawo"
Moh'd yace"ai nace kiyi hauri,and duk inda kikeso a shirye nake da binki sai inji maganar da zamuyi"
Islam tayiwa mota key,saida tafita get in ta tsaya tana fain"ina kakeson muje,nasan halinku basan shiga mutane kukeba yanzu kace kana buatar tsaro"
Moh'd ya juyo da sauri yana kallonta,kamar ya aleta sai kuma yace"duk inda yayi maki kije"
Islam taja mota,joint in da sukaje last ta nufa,basu fito motaba,Moh'd yace"tashi muje"
Islam tace"anan zamu tsaya"
Moh'd ya kaa kai"ina jinki"
Islam ta gyara zamnta tana fuskantarshi"inada tabbacin kafin ka fara aiki saida kayi rantsuwa akan kare hain talakawan ka,kasa hannu akan zaka gudanar da gskiya"
Moh'd yace"tabbas bayan wannn ma akwai abubuwan da nayi rantsuwa akan aikatawa domin tsaro dakuma ba alumma kariya"
Islam ta juyo tana zubda hawaye"duk maganar soyyya ajanyeta,ina son sanin dalilin kisan mahaifiyata da Abba yayi?"
Moh'd ya zaro ido"Abba kuma,yanzu abbana shine ya zama makishin Mama islam?"
Islam tace"tabbas,kuma na auki alawarin aukar fansa akn duk wanda ya aikata
"
Lokaci gida wani abu yafarayiwa Moh'd yawo a wuya,idanuwan shi suka canza, zuciyarshi tana harbawa,dakyal yake iya magana"Abbanah ko Abbanah"
Islam ta jinjina kai,tabbs Moh'd yasan idan ba islam bace zai iya hukunci akan kowaye yayi wannn maganar,gabanshi a fai mashi abbanshi yayi kisankai,yace"enought enought kada in arajin wannn maganar bakinki,Abba bai zama sakaran ma'aikaci ba,harya aje aiki ba'a
"
"Moh'd komi zakace dole kin auki mataki akan abind akaima"
"keee"Mohd yadaka mata tsawa"ko ba komi ina tunanin Abbana bai cancanci haka a wajankiba,amma bana goyan bayanki akan hakan,idan kuma kikace zakiyi,ga fili gamai doki kinada wanda zai hanaki"
Islam tace"ni kakewa tsawa,to wllhi babu wanda ya isa ya hanani,mi ake taama dashi?ilimi?kui?Mulki komi,duka munadasu kasani,yanzu haka na nemi aiki am very sure zansamu,within a time zakaji case in a kotu"
Mohd ya jinjina kai"yes nasan kunada duk abinda kika lissfa,amma tabbs kinada mai hanaki,lokacin daya hanaki inason ki tambayeshi dalilin hanakin da yayi"yana
maganar yana bue motar Islam ta ja motarta tabar wajan
Tun daga wannn lokacin babu wata magana mai dai a tsakaninsu,koda bata kiranshi ammashi yana kiranta,sbd yanason jin abinda ke tafiya a angaranta
Moh'd yana tsausayinta sannn yayi oarin sakawa zuciyarshi duk halin da zasu shiga bazai fasa aurantaba,abu aya yake damunshi kada Islam ta shigar da ara hakan yasa Abba ya ara zafin zuciya yace itama yarinyar baar kirki bace
Dad kuwa ganin Islam ta fita karkarshi hakan yasa yake ganin tabbas ta haura,dan bata gaya mashi cewar zata shigar da ara ba
Islam kam tsaye take kan shiga manyan mutane lawyers da kuma alalai,kafin kace mi har tasaba dasu sannn kuma sun fahimci kwarewarta kan aikin Lawyer da kuma irin jajitcewa da takeyi
Mufeeka kan batasan Halin da ake cikiba,hakan yasa yau Islam ta kirata waya,Mufeeda tafara dariya"kai frnd kamar kinsan Yau iyayan Imam sukazo suka ga Baba"
Islam tana murna tace"kai frnd kice magana ta kankama"
Mufeeda tayi dariya"wallhi kuwa,saura saka rana,addua kawai nake Dad ya amince,ayi bikinmu tare da daku"
Islam taja dogon lumfashi,"frnd kenn,wee breakup and never go back again"
Sosai hankalin Mufeeda yatashi,tace"ke sis bansan haka,miyayi zafi haka keda Mohd inki,gskiya ban yaddaba"
Islam ta anyi dariya mai ciwo tace"Mufeeda zaki yarda idan next week kinzo highcout kallon shari'ata dasu kan kisan da Babanshi yayiwa Mamana"
Hankalin mufeeda yatashi,take tafara tambayarta,Islam tabata labarin komi,Mufeeda ta dafe kai,Islam tayi mata sallama ta kashe waya
Mufeeda tafara kiran wayar Moh'd saidai har kira Ukku bai aukaba,lokacin yana tareda Abba,don soyake yatsawo kanshi,Abba yace"Mohd kai yanzu duk zaman da zamuyi naganar kenan kuda,haba kazama jarumi mana"
Kullun haka ake fama tsakanin Abba da Moh'd, a hankali Abba ya daina Jan wuyan da yakeyi saidai har lokacin bai CE wa Mohd ya amince mashiba
Moh'd yana fitowa yadawo part d'in Mom yana zuwa saiga Laihat cikin sauri tana kawo mashi waya,Moh'd ya ansa yana dubawa,Murmushi yayi yana d'auka, Mufeeda cikin tashin hankali take fadin"Ya Moh'd mi yayi zafi haka tsakanin ka da Frnd"
Moh'd yayi ajiyar zuciya na yana tambayarta,Mufeeda tace"yanzu yakirani muna magana take ceman next week inzo high court kallon shari'a tsakanin ta daku"
Moh'd kam baisan lokacin da yace"what?"yana maganar yana zaro ido,Mufeeda tace"wllhi kuwa"
Moh'd yace"shikenan zan kiraki back"yana maganar yana kashe waya keys d'in motar dake kan center table ya d'auka, Laihat ta biyoshi tana tambayarshi,Moh'd bai saurareta ba ya fice daga gidan
Yana mota yafara kiran wayanta sadai,yau kiranshi baya shiga wayarta,Moh'd ya kara kira still baya samu,lokacin yagane tayi blocking numbers dinshi daga kiranta
Tuk'i kawai yake yarasa ina zai je,dan ya k'agara yaganta don yi mata kashedin abinda take niyar aikatawa
Moh'd yaja tsaki yana dukan sitiyari yana fadin "why why why Islam"
Jin yana niyar fita haiyacin shi yayi pqrkin gefen titi yanason dawowa cikin natsuwarshi
So yake ya hanata sabd gudun zuciyar Abba da yake ganin ta farayin sanyi,yasan idan yaji yarinyar takai shi kotu,tabbas zata maida mashi komi baya
Moh'd yace"Nop Nop"cikin zuciya yace"lokaci yayi da zaki gane abinda nake gudun furta maki da bakina"yasa hannu yana tada mota dan nufa gida,zuciyarshi sai buga mashi take,wata zuciyar tace"idan bata yadda bafa"
A fili yace"zan tunkari Oga saidai duk abinda zai faru ya faru
"

Sosai yake gudu har yakai gdan,Horn yayi maigadi ya bude mashi,Moh'd ya tura hancin motarshi ciki,lokacin Kausar mai aikin Islam ta fito,Moh'd ya fito daga motar yana tambayarta Islam,Kausar tace"tun 7 ta fita"

Kausar tace"gaskiya ban saniba amma,nasan wata rana takan dawo wata rana kuma sai dare,amma kwana biyunnan data fara aiki tana dawowa k'arfe d'aya
Moh'd ya juya yana mata gdya,motarshi ya shiga ya fice,saidai baisan wajan aikin taba,lokacin yafara tunanin yadda zaiyi ya ganta,waya ya d'auka yana kiran Mufeeda, dama Mufeeda jiran kiranshi take dan ta kirashi yak'i dauka bayan sun gama waya

"Naje gdnsu batann,and ance man tana wajan Aiki"

Ba b'ata lokaci,Mufeeda ta kirata saidai abin haushi ta ki d'aukar waya,Mufeeda takira tagaya mashi,Moh'd yace"tana tunanin wani abu shiyasa bata dauka ba"
Mufeeda tace"dan Allah kayi hakuri Moh'd, wallahi ba halin Frnd bane nasan abinne dole take son d'aukar fansa"
Moh'd yace"kuma akan mahaifina Mufeeda, wane irin abune takeson jawo mana?"
"Moh'd kabar komi hannuna,insha Allah gobe Zanzo Abuja kawai kabar nemanta,idan nazo zan nemeka,komi kenan we can solve together"
Gaba d'aya Moh'd baiso Mufeeda tashiga maganaba,saidai batada yadda zaiyi yasan itace kawai zata iya taimakon shi
Haka suka shirya,Mufeeda kam ta tambaya gida abarta taje ganin Islam Babanta baiyi gardama ba yabarta ganin itama Islam din ta taba zuwa gdansu
Aikam tafiyar safe tayo,tasha zaman mota,Islam batasan da zuwanta ba,lokacin data isa gdansu Islam batann,sai su Mama ne suka tarbeta,d'akin ta shiga ta ajiye kayanta,kafin tafito
Su Mama suna ce mata,tajira taci abinci amma tace saita dawo,tana fito wane tayi karo da Dad,Dad yace"oyoyo Daughter ba sanarwa saidai muganki"
"Wallahi Dad tafiyar ce tazo da haka"

Cikin tashin hankali Dad yace"aiki kuma,wane irin aiki ni bnsani ba?"gaba daya ya rikice dan yasan Islam babu wani aikin da zatayi idanba na Law ba dan yasan shine karatunta,sai lokacin yakeji wani tashin hankali,dan bayason tasaka kanta cikin irin wannn case din
Mufeeda tace"to Maybe wasa take man"
Dad yace"kije bari in shiga ciki,yana maganar yana bin hanyar part dinshi

Yafara yi mata sannu da zuwa,yana kawo mata lemu,Mufeeda tace"yunwa nakeji banyi break ba muka taho "
Moh'd yayi dariya,ya d'auki wayarshi ko 15mint ba'ayi ba aka kawo mata abinci,taci tasha lemun tana cewa"yauwa Yaya yanzu hanklina yadawo jikina"
Moh'd ya jinjina kai"ta INA zamu fara"

Moh'd kam yasan ayi haka,dan baya tunanin da sanin Dad zata fara aiki,Moh'd yace"yauwa"yanzu ya za'ayi musameta"
Mufeeda tayi dariya"kai wai Frnd ta b'ata a garin Abuja"
Moh'd tayi dariya,Mufeeda takira wayarta cikin sa'a ta dauka,Mufeeda ta kalleshi tana saka speaker "Hello Frnd sorry i saw your miscall yesterday and I didn't call back"

Islam tana murna tayi mata kwatancan Office din,Mufeeda ta kashe tana fad'in tashi "muje"

"kasan bansan wajanba"

Haka akayi,Islam tana zaune saiga Mufeeda sosai taji dad'i ganin best Frnd dinta
Nan suka zauna sunata fira,sun jima Islam batayi mata maganaba,Mufeeda tace"Frnd Office yayi Allah ya tsare"
Islam tayi smiling tace"amin saura ke"

Islam tace"eh duk abinda kikaji hakane"Islam tacigaba da bata labari,Mufeeda batace komiba,kuma bata bata wata shawaraba saidai allah yasawke datace
Haka suka koma wata maganar,wani matashi ya shigo yana fad'in Islam tanada Bak'o,Islam tace"OK kace ya shigo"
mufeeda zatayi magana Moh'd ya shigo Office d'in, Islam ta mik'e tana kallonshi,Moh'd ya zauna yana kallonta yace"abeg sit mana"Islam tace"Moh'd ina gudun had'uwa dakai,hakan yasa na daina kiranka da kuma daukar wayarka,banson had'uwa mu ta bamu matsala sannan

Moh'd ya daga mata hannu"zowa nayi ince kada ki shigar da k'arar da kike niyar yi"

Islam ta kad'a kai"kada ka zamo cikin mutanan da basuda adalci mana,tun yaushe kasan da cewa duk ranar dana gane makashin Mamana,bazan bariba"
Moh'd ya zaro ido dan bayasan jin tana maganar Abban shi akan kisan Mamanta,"Islam Islam Islam be careful iyaye basufi iyayeba,INA gudun halin da zaki shiga idan kika jawowa kanki magana"

"Amma ai yakashe Mamana?"
"Ki daina magana kamar ba Lawyer ba,idan kina fad'in haka nizan iya mamaki kotu akan maganganun ki"

"Kada kisake kikai mahaifina kotu,wallahi Islam ke zaki tsani kanki lokacin"
Islam zatayi magana Moh'd ya mike ya gewaya wajan kujerar ta,tayi saurin mik'ewa,yatsanshi ya nuna mata"this is the last warning Islam kada kisake ki kara maganar kisannn idan ba haka ba,wallahi wallahi
" Moh'd yakasa ida maganar saidai cije leb'o da takeyi,Islam tace"kana tunanin Jan wuyanka zaisa in janye daga
"
Moh'd ya sauke ajiyar zuciya da sauri yace"a a ba Jan wuta bane"yana maganar cikin sanyi"kiyi hakuri kada kikai maganar sama na rik'e ki"yana maganar yana ruko hannunta,Islam jikinta yayi sanyi ta koma tana kallon hannuwansu dake had'e,wani sanyi taji ya ratsata
Ajiyar zuciya tayi,Moh'd ya d'ago ya kalleta,Islam tayi saurin janye hannunta dan batason ya fahimci wani abu
Moh'd yace"kije kiyi tunani,ni ban kasance azzalumin ma'aikaciba,ko yaushe gurina ganin na kwatowa mai hakki hakkin shi,wlh wlh wlh ko waye bazan bar shiba,Islam yau nine gabnki ina rokon ki janye magna amma kink'i" Moh'd yana gama fadar haka ya juya ya fice
Mufeeda kam dama batayi niyar maganaba,Islam ta zauna tana Ajiyar zuciya,ta kalli Mufeeda"jibeshi wai shi mai gskiya ne"
Mufeeda ta tab'e baki"Allah yswke,amma Frnd da kinbar maganar nan,Muyi wa Mama Addu'a shine Alkhairi"
Islam tace"alk'awarin Dana dauka fa?to miye amfanin karatuna,"
Tana maganar tana mik'ewa"muje gida ki huta kinsha hanya"
Mufeeda ta mik'e suka tafi,a harabar gidan suka yadda Dad,yakallesu yace"miyasa INA kiran wayarki baki dauka ba?"
Islam ta matsa wajanahi"sorry Dad bana kusa ne"
Dad yace muje ciki,suna shiga falon ya fara magana"Dazu akaceman kin tafi Office wane Office kenn?"
Islam ta dan fara dariya tana Sosa kai"Dad yanzu fa yarka lawyer ce mai zaman kanta"
Dad yace"what,kinfara aiki?"
Islam tace"sorry Dad wllhi surprise nakeson baka that is
"
"Surprise?,Islam Islam bazaki fara aikiba yanzu,bazaki faraba,kibari saikinyi aure sannan,amma badai yanzu ba" Islam kallon Dad take yadda yake maganar sosai hankalin ta yatashi,Mufeeda tana ganin haka ta mik'e ta shige d'akin Islam
Islam kam Dad yakoma gefe kan bazata fara aiki ba,gaba d'aya wannn lokacin Islam tarasa gane kan Dad,d'akin ta shigo tana hawaye,Mufeeda ta rink'a bata hakuri,Islam tace"wai ya Dad yakeso inyi,na kawo miji yace bai mashiba,yanzu na fara aiki still yazo yana hanani,shikenan komi nawa haka zai kasance yanzu
Mufeeda ta kalleta"Islam Dad yanason ya horar dake bin umarni ne,wannn kamar misalin abinda Moh'd yakeson hanaki ne amma kinki,Islam kenn idan Allah yasa kunyi Aure haka zakiyi mashi,ya hanaki abu amma kice sai kinyi,ke yanzu Islam baki tunanin Addu'a zakuyi har Allah yakawo lokacin da iyayanku zasu amince kuyi aure,amma baki tunanin hakan"
Islam batace komi ba ta mik'e ta shiga toilet,tayo wanka,zuwa tayi ta kwanta tanason samun sauk'in abinda takeji"
Mufeeda tana kallonta batace komiba,tunanin kawai takeyi a yanzu rayuwarta ta chanza,Sai yanzu take tunanin rikicin rayuwarta da Dad yasakar mata,yasaka mata tsoron jami'an tsaro,lokacin da zatayi karatun law dakyal ya amince mata,ya hanata yin Frnds,ya kuma hanata auran Moh'd saboda yana soja,daga k'arshe yace Suna gaba da Mahaifin Moh'd sabda shine yakashe Mamarta
Mufeeda kamar tasan tunanin da takeyi tace"Islam Dad yana son Mama sosai kafin rasuwarta,miyasa shi bai CE zai anso hakkin Matar shi ba sai ke,Dad yasan dadin matar shi Amma baice zai dau fansaba saike"
Islam ta dafe kai tana kallon Mufeeda, Mufeeda tace"kiyi Hakuri Frnd kada k'iba kamar ina goyan bayan Moh'd ne,a'a ina gudun abinda hakan zai haifar"
Gaba d'aya Islam ta shiga rikici,sai lokacin take tunanin yadda Dad yake gaya mata soyayyar da yakewa mahaifiyarta,Wanda shine dalilin shi nakin k'ara aure bayan rasuwarta,sbd bayasan ya auri matar da zata takurawa yarshi"
Islam kam wani kalar abu takeji, ga maganganun Moh'd da yayi mata sunayi mata yawo,akan kada tayi k'ara idan tayi tabbas saita tsani kanta
Islam tace"Mufeeda Nifa kaina ya kulle"
Mufeeda tace"yanzu dai kin samu aiki,and Dad ya hana,amma banaso ki daina sabd damace Allah yabaki,saidai ki aje zuwa lokacin da Dad din zai amince"
Cikin kwana biyu Islam ta shiga rikici,kanta yana kullewa,a cikin wannn lokacin Dad gaba d'aya baya zaman gidan tun marece idan yatafi sai gobe yake dawowa,ko da can abin yana d'aurewa Islam kai balle yanzu da duk ta rasa kan Dad din nata, saidai tana Mamakin irin siyasar Nigeria dan ita a Malaysia y'an siyasa a gidagen su suke kwana
Kotun datakai k'ara kuwa,tuni aka fara shirin kai wa Abba takardar nema daga kotu,yaran da akaba kai aiken takardai,yasan Moh'd hakan yasa hankalin shi yatashi ya nufi Office d'in Moh'd,don yafara nuna mashi kafin yakaiwa mahaifinshi
****Dad yana saka agogon Hannunshi wayace mak'ale akunnanshi dasu Danger yake waya"Nop kubar Garin Barno,kutafi Adamawa kafin dare,INA da tabbacin yabar garin"
Islam tana shiga falon,dan kusan kwana Ukku kenn bata samu ganin Dad d'inba gaya tanason magana dashi,tana zuwa k'ofar falon tafara jin muryarshi
"Yes Gun this is your time,Gun everyone with your Gun,idan yayi maka gardama Ku had'a harda
"
Cikin sauri Islam ta dafe bakin ta saboda k'arar da takeson saki,tana ja da baya,ta kaima wani flower verse karo,tafad'i
K'arar mutuwar kaskon ta sa Dad tsayawa yanason sanin wanda ke wajan
Dad ya fito yana fad'in waye,hankali tashe Islam kalleshi "sorry Dad nazo wucewa ne nabige"
Dad ya kalleta"bakiji ciwo ba"
Islam ta d'aga mashi kai tana juyawa,maganganun Moh'd suke dawo mata,keya d'inta ta d'auka tana nufar Office dinshi
Ya fito ya Tara sojoji gaban shi,fad'a yake masu sosai akan ana zuwa ganinshi suna wulakanci suna hanawa,sbd bak'on da yazo wajanshi da saida yafito sannan suka barshi shiga
Islam ta samu tayi parking ta fito,ta tsakiyar sojojin tabi dan ita gaba d'aya idonta ya rufe batama kula da shiba tana hawa step d'in shiga k'ofar,Moh'd ya matsa yabata hanya,dan gaba d'aya yadda yaganta yasan akwai wani abu
Sojojin suka farajin dadin zuwanta,dan sunsan zai raga masu,haka kuwa akayi,warning yabasu yana juyawa dan Binta
A falon farko ta tadda mutumin zaune,ta zaro ido dan tana Office aka bashi aike,kallonshi tayi tana mik'a mashi hannu "Bani Bani bani" tana nuna mashi takardar hannunshi
D'an Aiken yace"Sorry Mah"sabd yaron Office d'insu ne da take aiki,yana maganar yana mik'a mata
Moh'd yayi saurin shigowa yana riganta anshe takardai,Islam ta kalleshi,tana fad'in"get out"yaran yamike yana ficewa hankali tace dan yasan yayi laifi
Moh'd ya kalleta yana d'aga mata gira,Islam ta mik'a mashi hannu"kabani"
Moh'd ya fara k'ok'arin bude gum din da aka lik'e envelope d'in,Islam tayi saurin matsawa zata ansa,Moh'd ya kauda hannun shi,Islam tace"don't open it"
Moh'd yafara kad'a mata kai,Islam tace"ba taka bace kada ka bude"ganin ya fiddo takardai,wani tashin hankali ya shigeta, ta yi saurin zuwa wajan tana k'ok'arin anshe takardai,Moh'd ya d'aga takardai sama yana kallon yadda Islam tayi Huging d'inshi tana d'aga k'afarta don k'ara tsawo
Duka hannuwanshi ya d'ago yanason karantawa Islamtace" kada ka karanta,Mohd kada ka karanta" 
Tana maganar cikin tashin hankali har lokacin tana rik'e dashi, cikin sauri ya juyo yana kallonta

*****K'arfe d'aya da Rabi na dare Islam tamik'e wayarta ta d'auka tana duba time,hannu tasa tana murza idanuwanta,ahankali ta sauko daga kan gadon ta bud'e wadrop ta d'auki hijab tasaka SBD kayan baccin dake jikinta

Islam ta durkusa tana bude lokar farko,wasu takalmane dayawa ciki,rufe suke,Islam tasa hannu tana dubawa,gaba d'aya bak'ake ne
Islam ta saki takalmin,suna fad'uwa kasa, taji wata k'ara,da sauri ta duba saiga wuk'a ta lek'o gaban takalmin, wani tashin hankali ta shiga
Da sauri ta d'auki takalmin,tana ajesu yadda tagansu,wuk'ar ta koma,hankalin Islam yatashi,kenn suna amfani kamar idan za'ayi harbi,da anyi motsi k'arfen wuk'ar yake fitowa
Islam ta maida lokar kamar ta fito,sai kuma ta bud'e lokakar gaba,wakayane bak'ak'e cotting gaba d'aya jikinsu wani gashi gashine,Islam ta d'aga tana dubawa,rigar had'e take da wando,tayi saurin maidawa,kenn mahadin takalmin ne,ga Marks d'in data gani,wani tsoro yakamata lokacin da tayi tunanin yadda mutun zai koma idan yasaka kayan
Wata k'ara take niyar saki,da sauri tasa hannu tana dafe bakin ta

22
Cikin sand'a take fitowa,tana jawo d'akin ta tuna bata kashe wutarba,ta koma ta kashe,gaba daya hankalin Islam baya tare da ita,d'akinta ta nufa tana kuka,kan gado ta fad'a tana dafe kai,kuka take mai tsuma zuciya,kaichon kanta tafarayi data kasance d'iyar Dad,gaba d'aya taji ta tsani kanta
Irin wannn abubuwan data gani,tasan ba k'ananun yan ta'addne zasu mallake suba,Islam zuciyarta harbawa takeyi,tasa yadda zatahi,wata k'ara ta saki da karfi dan tanason tasamu sauk'in abinda takeji
Mama ta turo k'ofar da sauri tana tmbayrta lfy"Islam batayi tunanin k'arar data saki tafita sosai ba,Islam dage ta dai daita tace "bakomi"
Mama ta juya tafita,Islam ta d'ora hannu akai tana karanto addu'oe dan gani take kamar bata cikin hankalinta,lokacin k'arfe Ukku saura,Islam ta jawo wayarta tana danna kiran Moh'd, kira Ukku amma bai d'auka ba,sbd yasaka wayar chaji yana bacci,Islam ta fara sabbatu"ka dauka,Moh'd ka d'auki waya"
Tana magana tana tillar da waya kan gado,ji take dama ta mutu ta huta da irin rayuwar data tsinci kanta,Sauki kawai take nema
Ta mik'e taje tayo alwala tadawo ta kabbara salla,nafila ta ringa jerowa tare da Addu'ar samun Sauki
Tana gamawa ta mik'e tayi wanka,tana fitowa tasaka doguwar riga,fita kawai takesonyi,saidai har lokacin ba'ayi sallar Asba ba,zama tayi gefen gado tana kuka,sallah aka farayi Islam ta mike tayi sallah tana gama wa,ta fito falon,lokcn taji shigiwar motar Dad,wani sabon kuka ta cigaba tana fad'in Dad ka kwareni,kaci amanata,ka cutar dani ta hanyar cigar dani haram
Ta sanin ya shiga d'akin shi,Islam ta fito ta shiga Motarta,ta fice daga gidan,saidai tarasa INA zatayi,zuwa wannn lokacin tasan Moh'd babu yadda zatayi ta ganshi sanin cewa lokacin yana GDA
Kiranshi ta k'ara yi,saidai lokacin yana massllci,yagama sallah saidai gaba d'aya jikinshi babu dad'i,hakan yasa ya zauna msllcin
Islam kuwa tayi kira yafi akirga bai d'auka ba, wani kuka tasaki dan batasan dalilin rashin d'aukar ba,tuk'i kawai take batasan INA take nufa ba,har gari yafara haske,Islam tagama yanke shawarar ganinshi da take sonyi hakan yasa ta yanke shwrar zuwa gidansu
Moh'd yatashi ya shiga gidan,bai wani b'ata lokaci ba,ya shiga toilet yayi wanka,yana cikin shiri,wayarshi tafara ringing
Moh'd ya saka lens d'in kayan yana zuwa ya d'auki wayar,ganin itace yayi saurin saka wayar a kunnai,Islam tana jin ya d'auka ta fashe da kuka,Moh'd yace"ya akayi"yana maganar yana saka turare Islam tace"INA kiranka baka dauka ba,gani bakin gate dinku"
Kwata-kwata hankalinshi ya fita jikinshi, jin muryarta,dakuma fad'in tazo gidansu Dan lokacin ko 7 bata idaba,Moh'd ya fito da sauri yana nufar wajan,mai gadi ya bude mashi
Tana zaune cikin mota tana kuka,Moh'd ya isa wajan cikin Mamaki,abinda ya fiddo ta irin wannn lokacin
Motar ya bude zai zauna sit d'in,sanin matsalace ta kawo ta,yasashi tsayawa yana fad'in "dawo nan,bani driving d'in"
Islam batayi gardama ba,ta fito jikinta har kerma yake,Moh'd yayi saurin ruk'ota,yana gewayowa da ita,yad'an tsaya yana tambayarta,still kuka takeyi
Moh'd yanzu har yafara sabawa da yanayin kukanta,yana rik'e da hannunta zai Bud'e mata mota,Haidar ya nufo gidan yadawo daga massllci,Ganinsu yasashi nufowa inda suke
Yana ganin halin da suke ciki,hankalinshi yatashi yana fad'in"miya faru Yaya"
Jin Maganar shi Moh'd yajuyo ya kalleshi,damuwa sosai a fuskarshi,yace"nop kada ka damu"yana maganar yana rufe mata mota
Haidar yace"Amma Yaya ai
"
Moh'd ya d'aga mashi hannu,"till I came back "yana maganar yana komawa mazaunin driver
Haidar ya nufi gate d'in su,Moh'd yayiwa mota key,ya fara tafiya,Islam kuka kawai take,bai damuba yayi hanyar Office dinshi,akwai tazara sosai hakan yasa yake shara gudu,lokaci da suka isa babu kowa sai maigadi,Moh'd ya shiga yayi parking,Islam ta bud'e k'ofa Moh'd yazo ya kama hannunta
Maigadin ya Riga yana bud'e mashi babbar k'ofar shiga,Moh'd ya shiga Falon,ya zaunar da itakan kujera,Islam ta dafe kai sabda yadda kanta yake sara mata
Moh'd yace" kingani ko,zaki jawa kanki ciwo"
Islam ta kama kad'a mashi kai,Moh'd yace"miya faru?"
Islam tana kuka tace"dama nagaya maka,na gaya maka Dad Dan fashine,amma kaman gardama"tana maganar tana fashewa da kuka mai tsuma zuciya,wani mugun tausayi ta bashi, Yakama hannunta saidai baisan ta yadda zaiyi ya lallashe taba
Islam ta aza kanta saman hannunshi tana kuka,Moh'd yace"kada ki k'ara rikita kanki Islam, Dad d'inki bai
"
Islam ta d'ago da sauri tana fad'in "Haba Haba Haba,lokaci yayi da zan daina yaudarar kaina Moh'd tabbas Dad d'ina Dan fashine,inba haka ba mi zai had'a shi da abubuwan Dana gani d'akinsh" Islam ta cigaba da gaya mashi abinda tagani tana maganar tana kuka
Moh'd yace"Islam kar
" 
Islam ta dad'e kunnanta"Dan Allah kada ka gayamn komi idan ba cewa zakayi Dad bashine mahaifina ba,Dan Allah ka gayaman haka"
Moh'd yakalleta cikin tausayi,"Islam wannn kad'ai bazai zaba abinda zaisa ki aminta da mahaifin ki d'an fashi bane,wannn ba hujja bace"
Islam tace"rashin kwann Dad gida shima ba hujja bane,Dad baya kwana gida,miye dalilin shi na tsanar Jami'an tsaro?miyasa lokacin da zanyi karatun Law yak'i yadda?miyasa har zuwa yanzu babu wani cikakkan bayanin rasuwar Mamana daga bakinshi ba"tana maganar tana kad'a kai"Moh'd kada kasa in cigaba da yaudarar kaina"Mahaifinta yakasance police miyasa Dad ya kulla gaba dashi?miyasa ya hanani auranka daga karshe yabani hujjar cewa Abbanka ya kashe Mamana"tana maganar tana kuka"yanzu haka nafara aiki Dad ya hanani gudun kada yasamu matsala dani,yan gudun kada insaba da mutane,Dad bai nunaman dangin shiba saida yaga na dage akan son ganinsu"
Moh'd yasan tabbas maganganun Islam gaskiya,yasan yariga ta gama yadda,tausayinta ya k'ara kamashi,ahankali yasaki hannunta yana mik'ewa tsaye, fara gewaye falon yayi,zuciyarshi tana harbawa,dakyal ya iya bude baki yafara magana"Islam ki kasance mai tawakkali,ki kasance mai iya d'aukar kaddara mai kyau ko akasin haka,duk abinda Allah ya kaddarawa bawan shi babu Wanda ya isa ya kauda,babu Wanda ya isa hana abinda Allah ya tsara faruwa,ki godewa Allah kinada ilmin Addine,ta yadda zaki iya d'aukar wannn kaddarar da Allah ya kawo maki"
Islam tayi saurin mik'ewa tsaye tana nufarshi,cikin tashin hankali, ta rik'e hannunshi "Moh'd da gskene kenan?Mahaifina Dan fashine?da gaske ne?"
Moh'd yafara d'aga matakai,tare da rik'e hnnt shima"kiyi hakuri Islam nasan akwai ciwo"
Islam jikinta yayi sanyi,zuciyarta tana harbawa,Moh'd ya zaunar da ita kan kujera sai kuma ta fashe da kuka"kenan kasani,kasani amma baka gaya man ba"tana maganar zafafan hawaye nazo mata
Moh'd yace"nasani Islam nasani,d'auki Kaddara tabbas mahaifin ki d'an fashine "
Islam ta dafe kai"miyasa baka gayaman ba,Moh'd miyasa kabarni na cigaba da rayuwa cikin Haram,Abinci,kudin,kaya,Moh'd hatta ruwan da na rayu inasha Haram ne"tana maganar tana rirrik'e shi,Moh'd yace"taya zan gaya maki?taya taya taya kikeso in fito in gaya maki cewar mahaifin ki yana cikin y'an ta'adda"
Islam ta rushe da kuka"Nashiga Ukku wayyo Allah"Moh'd yafara fad'in" Hasbnallhu wa ni'imal wakil,innalllhi wa inna ilaihi rajiun,tawakkaltu alallah"sosai yake mai maitawa Islam ta fara fad'in kamar yadda Moh'd yake fad'i
Gaba d'ayansu cikin tashin hankali suke,Islam tace"shikenan nikuma haka tawa rayuwarta tazo,miyasa baka gayaman tun wuriba"gaba d'aya Islam ta maida laifi kan Moh'd,akan bai gaya mata ba,Moh'd yace"islam bazai yiwu in gaya maki ba,mahaifin kine fa"

"
"Islam wannn daban, amma fitowa ingaya maki Abban ki d'an fashine,wani babban al'amrine"

Moh'd yace"Islam,bari in baki kad'an daga cikin abinda na sani"
Islam tana kuka tana kallonshi,Moh'd yace"kinsan mahaifina Tsohon police ne,sannan yakasance mutun mai adalci da kuma san kare al'umma,tunda ya fara aiki kan gaskiyar shi yake,duk inda yaji wani abu makamancin ta'addanci saida yayi maganin wannn matsala,hakan yasa Al'ummar Nigeria sukayi na'am dakuma nuna godiyarsu da yakasance Wanda yake zagorantar folisawa"
Islam ta rushe da kuka,jin yadda Moh'd yake fadin kyakykyawan halin mahaifinshi, Moh'd ya lumfasa"zan daina tunda kuka kikeyi"
Islam da sauri ta goge fuskarta,saidai shikanshi yasan bata iya tsaida kukanta,yaci gaba"Abba irin mutanan nanne masu ra'ayin rik'au idan yayi niyar abu babu Wanda ya isa yahana,sannan idan yayi magana babu Wanda ya isa ya canza mashi Sanda yasan kan gaskiyarshi yake,tun da nayi hankali nagane yadda Abba yake kare hakkin al'umma,hakan yasa ta'addanci yayi k'aranci a gari,saboda mugun kamun da Abba yakeyiwa yan ta'adda "
Islam ta jingina kanta da kujera tana saura ranshi,Moh'd yacigaba"ana hakane wani group d'in y'an ta'add,yan fashi suka shigo,lokaci guda suka fara gagarar Nigeria,gaba d'aya basu kamuwa sannan kuma babu wani bayani akansu,Abba yayi yayi k'ok'arin kamasu amma abin ya gagara ganin cewa manyan yan fashine,Abba yasaka masu ido sosai,saidai Allah bai basu nasarar kamasuba,Abba yayi nisa wajan bincike wannan group anan ne yagano dukan yaran suna karkashin wani mutun a k'asar nan"
Islam tace"Dad d'ina kenan?"
Mohd bai Saurareta ba yacigaba"hakan yasa Abba yacigaba da bi biyar shi,saidai talent d'in y'an fashin yahana Abba samun cikakken bayani akansu gaya kuma ankasa kamasu,to shima ogan y'an fashin yariga yagane Abba hakan yasa mugiwar gaba a tsakaninsu,ana haka Abba ya aje aiki"
Islam ta cigaba da kukanta,Mohd yace"Abba yayi bakin cikin rashin kama wadannan mutane,tun kafinann nikuma nafara aikin soja,Abba yayi yayi Haidar yayi aikin d'an sanda Amma Haidar yak'i,sai cikin shekarar data wuce yan Sanda suka kama d'aya daga cikin yan fashin, amma abin Mamaki,sukazo suka d'auke shi suka kashe polisawa,ganin ran Abba yab'aci akan rashin tsaro hakan yasa Haidar ya shiga aikin police "sosai Mohd ya warware mata komi gameda Dad d'inta
Islam tace"shikenan Dad d'ina Dan fashine,Ashe shine dalilin dayasa yake gaba da Abba"
Moh'd yace"kiyi hakuri Islam ki yadda da k'addara"
"Moh'd sonike inji Wanda zaice Dad bashi ya haifeniba ko zanji sauki" mohd ya gilgiza matakai,"tabbas shine mahaifin ki"
Islam tace"ya aikai ya kashe Mamana"
Moh'd yace"bana sheda,iyakar abinda na sani nagaya maki"
Gaba d'aya jitayi ta tsani kanta,Moh'd yace"ki koma ki Zauna da Dad k fuskanci juna wata kila zai daina"
Islam tace"haba Mohd,banason ganinshi,banason had'a ido dashi,tsawan shekara talatin yana abu,taya kake tunanin na isa in canza mashi ra'ayi,nariga nagane Dad yanada tsaurin rai zai iya kashe ni akan wannn abin,sbd haka Dad bazai k'ara ganina ba,ko yaganni tom
"
Moh'd ya kad'a mata kai"a'a Islam Addu'a zakiyi yadaina"
Islam tazaro ido"idan yadaina yazayayi da hakkin Al'umma dake kanshi, Moh'd miyasa ka kasance raggon soja,miyasa baka cikawa Abba gurinshi na ganin kakama Dad da mutanan shiba,miyasa dakaga abin yafi karfin police baka maida Neman su a hannun kaba?"
Moh'd yace"lokacin da abin ya k'arayin nisa bana nan,naje Malaysia, sun rok'eni zuwa ba yaran sojojin su training"Nanma Moh'd yabata labarin ya warware mata komi na Malaysia,har haduwar su
Islam tace"k'asar ka tana neman taimako amma katafi k'asar wasu"
Moh'd yace"idan banjeba,aya zamu had'u,kuma har natafi inada gurin hakan,Islam wayar da kika tsinta tawa,asalinta saboda aikin kamasu ne"
Islam ta goge hawayenta"ko yanzu kakama shi,inaso kakama Dad Moh'd ina goyan bayan ka,Dan Allah kayi maganin ta'addancin nan"
Moh'd yagane da gaske take maganar yace"Dad nefa?"
"Nagaya maka bazai k'ara ganinaba,nagama rayuwa cikin Haram" tana maganar tana kuka"ina goyan bayan kama Mara gaskiya Moh'd, INA goyan mayanka"tana maganar tana had'a hannuwansu,Tana kuka,Moh'd ya dafa kanta yana d'orawa kan kafad'arshi"ki daina kuka,kada ki shiga wannn case din "

Sosai suka kama magana,Islam tana kuka gaya tana kafiya akan yabarta,Moh'd yace"shikenan naji naji,Amma idan har kinason hakan,dole ki koma gidan ki zauna,kada ki nuna mashi komi, ta hakane zamu samu sauk'in kamasu"
Islam tace"dukiyar Haram"
Moh'd yace"Islam saidai idan baki son kama Dad amma wanna itace hanya mafi sauk'i garemu"
Yana maganar yana kama hannunta,ta goge hawanta,ta juya tana fad'in "yarinyar zakaba kulawa zata zama sanadin kamaka Dad,Dad miyasa kasa rayuwrka cikin wannn halin,dama kai kad'ai gareni,miyasa zaka man haka,miyasa zaka maida ni maraini"
Moh'd yasa hannu ya juyo da fuskarta,yana goge mata hawaye"kada ki k'ara kiran kanki marainiya"
Islam tace"banda kowa,kuma bazan k'ara samun kowa cikin rayuwataba,saidai in fara aiki in samu kud'i in cigaba da neman karatu ta yadda k'asa ta zatayi alfahari dani wajan kare hakkin al'umma,injira har lokacin mutuwata tazo,sbd nasan babu Wanda zaice zai aureni"
Moh'd yazaro ido,"haba haba kidaina fadar hakan"Islam ta fad'a jikinshi,Moh'd ya d'ago ta"kina dani Islam"
Islam ta kad'akai"kod'aya Moh'd,bazaka tab'a aure Nana,koda kuwa Abba ya amince maka,ni bazan amince ba,dan bazaso yarana sutashi ana yi masu gorin Kaka ba,kai kanka bazanso ana maka gorin mataba"
Moh'd yafara kad'akai "Abba zai amince,kuma bazaki tab'a kuka akan rashin wani d'an uwankiba,nine d'an uwanki Islam,kuma nizan kasance mijink
"
Islam tasa hannu ta rufe mashi baki,lokaci guda ta mik'e tsaye tana kauda damuwar fuskarta,tana fad'in "zan kasance abokiyar akinka,inason ka kama Dad cikin gaggawa,bamuda lokacin da zamu tsaya b'atawa,kullun cikin k'ara zalunci suke a cikin Al'umma"
Moh'd yakalleta,duk tausayinta yakamashi,yace"ni mi kikeso inyi?"
"Aikin ka zai fara daga yanzu, nidai banida ilmin kama mutun,amma inada ilmin kare hakkin mai gaskiya,yanzu ta ina kake ganin zamu fara"
Moh'd ya tsaya yana tunanin,dan baisan mi zaice mataba,Islam ta fahimceshi sosai tace"wannn ma aikin police ne,tashi muje wajan Abba"
Moh'd ya zaro ido,Islam tasa hannu ta rik'oshi,taso muje"Abba kad'ai zai iya gaya mana hanyar da zata fishshe mu"
Moh'd ya mik'e yana Binta jiki babu kwari,itakam Islam yau jinta take kamar itace sojan,suka fito Office d'in suka kama hanyar zuwa wajan Abba

"

Islam tana maganar tana kuka,Abba yace"waya kaya maki,Moh'd ko"yan maganar yana nuna Moh'd da hannu,Islam tace"Abba wlh nina gane"Abba ya tsya yana kallonta,Islam tacigaba da bashi labarin rayuwarta,sosai sukaji tausayinta

Ta koma kallon Moh'd tana kallonsu Mom"Moh'd ka godewa Allah Mahaifanka mutannn kirkine,Nikam fah,dama taya Abba zai bari ka aureni,wallahi banga laifin Abba ba,ni yanzu banida wani gata,Babana ga abinda ya shuka,yasaka ni a *k'urar baya* mahaifiya kuma banda ita bansan wani Wanda yasanta ba

Sai lokacin hankalin Islam ya kwanta,Abba yafita cikin wani irin yanayi,yadda uba yasaka Yar cikinshi cikin bala'e

Islam tad'an fara dariya, saiga mai aikinsu ta shigo da tire a hannunta da kayan abinci,Islam ta anshe ta, tana fad'in nagode
Moh'd sai kallonta yake,Islam ta had'a tea tafara sha,tana d'aukar Omelat,tana ci,Sosai tafara ci,Moh'd yana kallonta,Islam tace"kamar yau na faracin Halal "

Sun jima zaune Islam taci abincin sosai,ta zuba mashi ta mik'a mashi,saidai kad'an yaci saiga Haidar ya shigo,sabda Abba ya turo shi
Islam ta ce"Oyoyo Ya Haidar"
Haidar ya zauna kan kujera,yana gaida Moh'd, Moh'd ya ansa,Islam bata wani jiraba ta farayi mashi bayanin abinda takeso,dama Abba ya riga,yagaya ma Haidar komi
Haidar yace"shikenn komi zaizo cikin sauki,an saikin dage wajan nemo bayanai akan abinda suke shiryawa,sannan kuma sai kin daina mu'amula da Moh'd "
Islam ta zaro ido"kai Police banda wannn kuma"
Haidar yayi dariya"ina nufin kirage,gudun kada yagane"
Islam tace"haka zakace"
Haidar yacigaba da bata logics da dabaru,da hanyoyin da zatabi,Moh'd kam kallonta yake yadda ta dage d'aukar darasi,sun d'auki lokacin kafin Islam ta bar gidan
Bayan tafiyarta Familyn suka zauna suna tatauna maganar,Lokacin Laihat tadawo daga lectures, hada kukanta
*****Itakam Islam tunda takoma gidan gaba d'aya duk wata damuwa tayi k'ok'arin kauda ta,sotake takoma ma Dad Islam d'in ta tada,haka kuwa akayi,lokacin data koma gidan Yana zaune a harabar gidan cikin wajan shan iskan da yake yawan zama
Islam taje tana zama gefenshi,Dad yace"nashiga banganki ba sai yanzu kike dawowa? "
Islam tace"Dad nazama committed ne,naje wajan aikin nan ne nagaya masu Babana ya hanani aiki,sbd haka bazanyi ba"
Sosai Dad yaji dad'i yace"yauwa banason kina wahala,yanzu gayann naga duk kin rame idonki yayi ja"
Islam tace"wani abu yafad'a idon shiyasa"
Dad yace"OK nawane zaki rink'a d'auka albashin,evry mouths I will pay"
"Dad bana buk'atar komi fa,kawai dama nayi tunanin zaka barni yin aiki ne"
Dad yace"OK shikenn,kitashi kije kici abinci"
Islam tace"nop zanyi baccine kawai"tana maganar tana mik'ewa,ta nufi gidan,jitake duk ta tsani gidan,ta shiga d'akinta tayi wanka ta koma ta kwanta dan tanason hutawa,SBD zafin da kwalwarta ta d'auka
***Daga ranar Islam gaba d'aya rayuwarta takoma sakawa Dad ido,dakuma lab'ewa wajan sauraran shi idan yana gidan,saidai tsawan sati Ukku babu wani bayanin abinda taji,shikam Dad harkarshi kawai yake,yanzu hankalinshi ya kwanta ganin cewa Girl d'in shi ta daina maganar Sojan nan,hakan yasa ya aminta da ta yarda da maganar shi daya gaya mata na cewar Baban Moh'd ne ya kashe Mamanta
Yau tana zaune falon,hannunta rik'e da waya tana chart da Moh'd,lokacin K'arfe biyar da Rabi na yamma,Dad ya shigo hannunshi rik'e da wata Leda Islam tayi mashi sannu,Dad yace"girl yakike"
Islam tace"lfy lau"Dad ya wuce,Islam tana ganin ya shige ta mik'e tabiki shi baya,tana kashe wayarta,ta jima bataji motsin shiba,har zata juyo taji yana d'aukar waya,yana fad'in yafito daga wanka ne,amma yanzu zai taho
Islam ta k'ara lafewa bayan labulan,Dad yacigaba da waya"Nop gasunn wajena,yanzu zan taho maku dasu saidai ba'a samu black ba sai Dark blue,amma ko sune ba'a ganewa"
Islam tafara tunanin abinda yake nufin zai tafi dashi,jin ya cigaba da magana,ta k'ara kasa kunnanta"a'a ta titin zakubi"saidai yana magana yana fad'in wajan da zasu tsaya
Jin taji wajan tayi saurin lallab'awa tana komawa falon,harta zauna sai ta mik'e ta shige d'akinta

***Ana sallar Asba suka shiga gidan,Lokacin Islam wani bacci yad'auke ta,suka gama shirin su sukabar gidan
Moh'd ana gama sallar Asuba labari yaje mashi,dafe kai yayi,ya shiga d'akin,Haidar yana sallah lokacin,Moh'd yasa hannu ya d'auke wayoyin shi ya fice,ko minti goma ba'ayiba sojoji sukazo wajan
Moh'd ya nufi Asibitin da akakai su Khulsum,har anyi masu Allura su duka,SBD har lokacin Powder bata bar jikinsuba
Asibitin cike take ga yan uwasu duk sunzo,Suka kawai suke,k'anan Khulsum, Abdussabur shi kadai ke waje,yana bada labari yana kuka,saidai har lokacin likitoci basu fad'i rasuwar Alhjin ba
Moh'd ya tsaya yana kallon Mutanan,saidai an hanasu shiga suna bakin emergency room tsaitsaye
ga security sun cika wajan
Moh'd ya nufi k'ofar cikin dakewa,Security d'in sun ganshi,hakan yasa suka fara Sara mashi suna bashi hanya,Moh'd ya shiga,sojojin dake bakin wajan suka bi bayanshi
Likitoci suna bakin k'ok'arin su,Moh'd yace"INA fatan duk suna lafiya"
Likitocin suka kalleshi,d'ayane yafara ganeshi"GMM saidai Alhjin Babu shi"yana nuna Alhji da suka rufema fuska
Moh'd ya dafe kai,yana bud'e fuskarshi da suka azama wani kyalle"subhanallah"yana maganar yana saurin maida mayafin,ya dafe kai,lokacin wasu hawaye suka zubo mashi,da sauri yasa hannu yana sharewa
Khulsum dataji abinda likitan yace,ta k'urma ihu,Moh'd ya nufi inda take,ta duro daga kan gadon,tana nufar su,tafara,sabbatu tana maganganu,kamar wacce hankalinta yafita,Takarda ta fad'o daga jikinta
Moh'd yabi takardar da kallo,sai kuma yasa hannu ya zaunar da Khulsum, kuka kawai take
Moh'd yajawo takardai,ya bud'e"WE ARE ALWAYS ACTIVE,NEXT TIME IDAN BAKA FITA HARKARMU BA,BABANKA ZAMU D'AUKA"
Moh'd yayi wata irin k'ara"NOOOOOO" yana mik'ewa tsaye,Gaba d'aya hankalin kowa yayo kanshi,sojojin suka Mara mashi baya,Moh'd yabasu umarnin barin yar uwar Khulsum mata biyu su shigo,SBD yaga yadda Khulsum tafita hankalinta
Takardar hannunshi ya fita,gida ya nufa,lokacin kayan sojojin shi yasaka,Mom kuka ta kamayi"yanzu Moh'd saboda Ku suka kashewa yarinyar Baba,SBD Ku zasu raba bawan Allah da rayuwar shi

Ya d'aura takalmin shi,ya kwashi wayoyinshi dana Haidar daya d'auko dan bayason agaya mashi,ya fito waje,lokacin sojojin sun cika harabar gidan,wani soja yazo ya anshi wayoyin da Moh'd ya fito dasu,saidai takardar tana hannun shi
Asibityn ya nufa straight, dan rashin zuwan shi da Kaki,duk ya tsani kanshi

Hankalin Islam yatashi jin yadda Mama tabada labari,Dan sandan da aka harba,an kashe baban yarinyar da zai aura saboda yafita harkar yan fashin da yake bibiya
Islam tafara kiran wayar Haidar bai d'auka ba,ta kuma kira kusan sau Ukku sai kuma ta koma kiran Moh'd still shima haka
Islam ta d'auko carkey d'inta,ta fitowa taga Dad harabar gidan,dasauri takoma ciki,Allah yasa fita zaiyi
Aikam yana fita itama ta fice,Asibitin da Mama tace mata yana ankaisu tayiwa tsinke,tun a babban Gate tagama yadda ganin yadda sojoji da police ke wali a wajan
Wani kuka ta farayi,tasamu ta aje motarta,ta fito
Moh'd yana bakin Emergency,yan jarida sun gewaya shi,saidai zuciyarshi tsaye take yana bayani
Islam ta sulale saman wani dakali tana kuka,Lokacin taji labarin abinda ya faru wajan wasu dake gefenta,kad'akai kawai take"Dad baka kyauta ba"
Tana maganar tana mik'ewa,lokacin yan jaridar sukabar wajan,an bude masu k'ofa Islam tasamu ta shiga,da gudu gudun ta
Moh'd yad'ago yakalleta hankali tashe,yana kallonta,ciki ta wuce,tana shiga taga wannan tashin hankali,lokacin ana shirin fitowa da gawar Alhji
Islam ta dafe kai tafara zunduma ihu,tana kururuwa,ta juyo tayo hanyar wajan,tunda Moh'd yaga shigarta yaja ya tsaya saidai bai juyaba,zuciyarshi tana mashi k'una
Gaba d'aya Islam bata cikin hankalinta,dakarfi take magana"ansan Wanda ke aikata abu baza'a dau matakiba,wallahi yau sai an kamaka,yau sai an kamaka,baza'a barka ba"
Mohd maganganun ta yaji kamar marar hankali,ya juyo da sauri,gani yayi mayafinta ya fad'i,dama ita ba kwanar saka d'ankwaliba
Ta nufo bayan Moh'd kawai"wai bazaku iya ka mashi bane?kai baka San shiba"
Tana maganar tasa hannu,ta jijjigashi,Moh'd ya kalleta yadda take magana"wallahi ni yau saina fad'i gaskiya,saidai idan nima a d'auki ray
"
Wani wawan mari Moh'd ya sakar mata,zata k'ara magana,ya k'ara sauke mata mari,zuciyarshi tana harbawa
Ihu tak'ara sakawa,tana dafe kai

***Islam kuwa tanaji tana gani sojan ya cigaba da drivern sai lokacin ta kula da hanyar gdansu Moh'd yayi,Kukanta kawai take,zuciya tana mata k'una yadda yau Moh'd ya d'aga hannu ya mareta,wani matsanan cin kuka ta saki,dan yasan yau Dad d'inta yaja mata,wannn shine babban k'alu balan data fara fuskanta a rayuwarta,Wanda takeso shine ya marera,wani kuka ta k'ara yi dai-dai lokacin aka bud'e masu gate suka shiga

Tana maganar tana kuka,Mom ta jawota"ya isa haka"
Abba ya mik'e,yafice na tare da yace masu komiba,Mom tacigaba da lallashin Islam,Laihat ta fito daga d'akinta,ga alama kuka kawai tasha,hankalin Islam yatashi yadda Mahaifinta yasa rayuwar Al'umma da dama kuka,saidai batada yadda zatayi

"

****Tun Asba da suka tashi,suna gama sallah tasaka dogon hijab d'in Laihat ta fito,kitchen ta nufa,nan ta tadda mai aikin gidan Tana had'a break fast,Islam ta shiga kitchen d'in ta gaidata tana kama mata aiki,Matar tace"haba kibar shi mana"

"

"
"Mom banda wannn dalilin banga abinda zaisa yarinyar ta koma wajan shiba"

Moh'd yace"duka kwana biyu dayi maka aiki,kake fad'in ka k'agara"

Driver yafara tafiya,Moh'd yana mashi magana ta abin kunna daya basu,yana gaya mashi wajan da suka nufa

****Dad kam yanzu inda ya gudu hankalinshi a tashe yake ganin yadda yanzu kwamnati ta dage Neman shi take,Al'ummar gari kuwa kowa yana mamakin mai matsayi irin nashi ace yana aikata irin wannn abu,Dayawan abokan siyasar su sunyi Allah wadai da hali irin na Alhj Kabir,mafi yawan mutanan da suka san yadda yake gudanar da rayuwarshi cikin san mutane da kyautattawa al'umma,wasu sukance gaskiya basu yadda ba

****Ranar Monday k'arfe takwas na safe Moh'd ya tura motocin da zasu tafi da lauyoyinsu,lawyer sunkai goma,suka shiga court d'in saidai sai k'arfe  goma za'a fara shari'arsu
Moh'd ya fito daga gida ya nufi station d'in,kaya yakaimata sabda su Mom sun tafi Court d'in,Islam kam ranar batayi bacciba,tsaye take addu'o'e kawai take,Moh'd ya mik'a mata ledar kayan yace"kisaka kafin azo tafiya dake"
Islam ta kalleshi, yau fuskarshi a sojan ya fito babu alamar dariya a tare dashi,jitayi ya burgeta,wani sonshi yake k'ara shigar ta,ta juya ta koma ciki,Moh'd ya fito ya nufi court d'in,a can suka had'e da y'an uwa har su Mom gaba d'aya sun isa kotun,Mufeeda kam ranar kayan lauyoyi ne jikinta
K'arfe goma saura,motar y'an Sanda ta shigo wajan,dasu Islam,hand cup a hannunta,haka ma su Gun,saidai su daka gansu kasan basuda wani gata
Islam ta sauko daga motar folisawa zagaye dasu,Gaba d'aya suka shiga,yan jarida sai d'auka suke,Islam tasa hannu tajawo mayafinta tana rufe fuskarta,aka nuna mata wajanda zasu tsaya
Bayan wata kanta ta tsaya,hakama su Gun saidai su su ukkune Gun,Run,Zaid,dama can asali sune manyan y'an Islam danger kuwa an shek'a lahira
Kowane ya zauna muhallinshi,wasu alk'alai ne manya a saman steps d'in,lawyoyi suka zauna,Moh'd ya zauna kusa dasu
Mufeeda kam su Biyune kawai suka fita a matsayin masu kare Islam, abin Mamaki kawai sai sukaga wasu Lawyoyi sun zauna b'angaran dasu Gun suke,Mufeeda hankalinta yatashi,ta juya tana kallon Moh'd, shikanshi yayi mamaki,kai kawai ya d'aga mata
Alk'alai suka fara maganganu tsakaninsu,d'aya ya d'ago yana fad'in"registerer"
Wanda aka kira rijistara yafara karanta case yana mik'awa alk'ali file d'in
Nan su Mufeeda Suka fara gabatar da kansu,da matsayinsu,haka b'angaran lauyoyin su Gun
Alkari yafara ba masu k'ara damar yin magana,Mufeeda ta mik'e tafara kare Islam akan bata aikata fashiba,kuma sannn bata cikin yan fashin
Tana maganar tana komawa tsakiyar Court d'in, gaba d'aya hankalin kowa yana kanta,Mufeeda tace"mai shari'a munason samun bayanai daga bakin wanda sukace Islam tana cikin masu aikata ta'addanci"
Alkhali yayi rubutu,ya kalli lauyoyin su Gun yace"munason samun magana daga wajanku"
Wani ya mik'e yafara magana"Islam kabir tana cikii y'an ta'addan kasancewarta d'iyar Ogansu,wanda duk wani ta'addanci atare suke shiryashi,munaso wannn kotu tayi adalci ta hukunta masu laifin gaba d'aya batare da ta ware wani ba"
Moh'd yaja tsaki dan yasan wannn ba wata hujja bace,Islam ta duk'ar da kanta
Mufeeda tace"munason wannn kotu mai adalci tabani damar yin magana da wad'an nan mutane"
Alk'ali yasa hannu yana rubutu,ya d'aga bata kai,Mufeeda tace"Nagode mai Shari'a "
Tana magana ta koma gaban wajan dasu gun suke tsaye,tace"kunce atare kukeyin fashi da Islam "
D'aga mata kai sukayi,Mufeeda tace"magana zakuyi"
Run yace"eh"
Mufee tamaida hankalin ta wajnshi tace"shawan wane lokaci kuka d'auka kuna ta'addanci tare da ita"
Gun yace"shekara goma"
Mufeeda ta jawo watakarda tace"CP ya bada rubutun da yayi akan kunce tun tana k'ara mane kuke fashi tare da ita"
Gun yace"a'a shekara goma mu kace"
Mufeeda ta jinjina kai tace"ko zaku iya fad'in ina da ina kukayi fashi tare da Islam?"
Zaid yace"gidan C
costom,da gidan ministan tsaro,wanda abokin Babanta ne"
Mufeeda ta kalli alk'ali tace"mai sharia,asalin Islam a America tayi karatunta daga pri
har secndry,har tagama secndry dududu zuwanta biyu Nigeria,batafi wata biyuba,Babanta ya tura ta karatu Malaysia tayi degree,bai bari ta dawoba ya kuma sama mata gurbi tayi masters digree d'inta,saida tagama tadawo acikin shekarar data wuce Wanda yanzu watanni sha d'aya kenan da dawowarta"
Gaba d'aya hankalin mutane yakoma kan Mufeeda,Mufeeda ta matsa ta d'auki wata takarda"Mai shari'a wannn shine takardar zuwan Islam Nigeria da muka anso da record d'in ta na shiga da fita,Wanda hakan zai tabbatar da cewa Islam bata zauna a Nigeria ba balle ta kasance cikin yan ta'adda "
Tana mik'a wa,Lauyan su Gun yace"mai shariya ka tsaya ka duba wannn abu,record ne wanda kowace computer zata iya rubutawa"
Alk'ali yagama dubawa ya kalli Mufeeda yace"Brister Mufeeda wannn bazai zama shedaba,ko kina da wata kwakwkwar shedar"
Kowa hankalinshi yatashi ganin an fara tire sheda guda daga cikin shedarda suke da ita,Mufeeda ta gyara zaman rigar ta tace"inada ita"
Alk'ali yace"muna sauraran ki"
Mufeeda tace"sun ce sunje fashi tare da Islam a gidan controller na costom,yanzu haka controller yana cikin kotu,inaso yabani damar yi mashi tambayoyi"
Alk'ali yayi rubutu yace"kotu tabaki dama"
Mufeeda takira controller,yazo ya tsaya ya gabatar da kanshi,mufeeda tace"munason samun bayanin mutanan da sukaje gidan ka"
Controller yayi bayani,Mufeeda tace"Akwai mace a cikinsu"
"A'a gaskiya babu mace cikinsu"
Lauyan su Gun yace"inada ja mai shariya"
Alk'ali yace"ina sauraran ka"
Lawyan yace"taya Wanda aka shigarwa gida da bindigu zai iya tantance mutanan da sukaje mashi"
mufeeda tace"mai shariya inaso kaja mashi kunnai akan shiga magana ta da yakeyi"
Alk'ali yace"ka kiyaye Brister"
Mufeeda tace"minister baya kusa amma zamu iya sada kotu dashi yanzu"
Tana maganar Alk'ali yace"Barrister Mufeeda wannan bazai zama shedaba,kasancewar duk Wanda aka shigarwa gida bazai iya tantance mutanan dake kanshi ba"
Islam ta fashe da kuka,Mohd ya cire hular sojojin dake kanshi,lokaci guda aka fara surutu a kotun,Alk'ali ya buga table din akayi shiru
Alk'ali yace"Brister mufeeda har yanzu babu wata shedar da kotu zata iya yarda da ita,ko kinada wani bayani"
Mufeeda ta goge zufar dake kanta"inason k'ara magana da mutanan nan"
Alk'ali yace"kinada damar yin hakan"
Mufeeda ta matsa wajnsu Gun"Islam tana Malaysia take zuwa kuyi fashi?"
Gun yace"a'a" Zaid yace"eh"
Islam tayi saurin kallon Alk'ali tace"da fatan kotu taji magana biyu da muka samu,A'a da e"
Alk'ali ya d'aga kai"kauda kace A'a kenan Islam bata fashi"
Gun ya fara zare ido"a'a danace ina nufin sai tazo hutune"
Alk'ali yayi tagumi yana kallonsu,dan yad'an fara gano k'arya a tare dasu,ya juya yana magana da sauran Alkalan k'asa k'asa
Mufeeda ta kalli Zaid tace"kai kuma kace Eh"
Zaid yace"eh ai daga can  take zuwa muyi aiki takoma"
Moh'd ya dafe kai,a iya zuwan shi Malaysia Islam bata tab'a zuwa Nigeria ba,Moh'd ya mik'e tsaye,Abba yasa hannu ya zaunar dashi dan yasan zai iya aikata abinda bashi bane
Alk'ali yakalli sauran abokan aikinshi yajawo shedun da Mufeeda tabashi,ya mik'awa sauran Alkalan,sun jima suna maganganu k'asa-k'asa,lokaci guda suka fara d'agawa juna kai
Alk'ali yace"Barrister Mufeeda jeki zauna"
Alk'ali yace"abisa zama dakuma lura da shedun da muka samu,wannan takarda ta bada tabbacin Islam bata zauna a negria ba,saboda takardar tafito daga hukumar shiga da fice,Kotu tayi lura da cewar kowa da irin yadda yake razana idan tashin hankali yazo mashi,zai iya yuwowa Controller baya rikicewa yayin tashin hankali hakan yasa yagane cewar Islam bata cikin Wanda sukaje gidanshi,abu na k'arshe,Barrister Mufeeda tayi tambaya akan daga Malaysia take zuwa ayi fashi,wani yace eh,wani kuma yace a'a"
Gaba d'aya aka d'au maganganu,yanzu su Moh'd sun gane akwai alamar nasara a tare dasu
Alk'ali yacigaba"wannn shedu kotu ta aminta dasu,ganin yadda suke magana biyu suna son wasa da hankalin kotu,SBD haka,court ta wanke Islam daga zargin da ake mata saidai idan d'ayan b'angaran sunada Wata shedar"
Gaba d'aya Ihu ake,murna sosai,kowa sai kallon Moh'd yake dan yafi kowa murna,Islam ta fara dariya ga hawaye a fuskarta
Gun yayiwa Lawyansu magana,Komi yace oho,lauyan ya mik'e tsaye"Munada wata shedar yamai shari'a"
Gaba d'aya akayi shiru,kowa yana kallonsu,masu murna,murna ta koma,Alk'ali yace"muna jinka"
Lauyan yace"inaso abani damar magana da wannn"yana maganar yana nuna Gun,Alk'ali ya d'aga kai,Lauyan yace"wace shedace gareka"
Gun yace"yanzu haka Islam tana tare da set na sark'ar da mukayi fashin ta jikin wata mata"
Hankalin kowa yatashi,Mufeeda tace"munada ja ya mai shariya,subada shedar hakan"
Islam ta fashe da kuka,Mom Abba da Laihat duk suka dafe k'irji,Mohd ya tuna cewar Mom ce akayiwa fashi kuma tace taga sark'ar a wuyan Islam
Alk'ali yace"ko kunada sheda akan hakan"
Gun yace"mai shari'a ita take amfani da sark'ar saboda haka munsan idan aka dubo d'akinta za'a samu"
Alk'ali yace"kotu tana buk'atar 1hr don binciko gaskiyar lamarin"
Mufeeda hankalinta yatashi,saidai yanzu batada abin cewa
Alk'ali yace"munaso aba Wand'an ake tuhuma tsaro zuwa 1hr da kotu zata nemesu"
Alk'ali ya juya yana bada umarnin aje a dubo sark'ar,Gaba d'aya aka mik'e yan Sanda suka fito da masu laifin
Moh'd yazo wajanta,yana rik'e, Islam ta kad'a mashi kai"bazamu tab'a fita"
Moh'd ya dafe kai"tana wajanki sark'ar? "
Islam ta d'aga kai,Mufeeda ta dafe kai,Laihat ta saka kuka,Abba yace"ya salam"
Mom zatayi magana aka wuce da Islam
Islam da ma'aikatan akaje gidansu aka duba,lokacinaka jawo sarka,Islam hankalin baitashiba,dan dama tasan tana wajanta
****Dad kam dayaji labarin kama Islam harda hawayenshi,yasan tabbas su Gun bazasu tab'a kyale mashi Girl ba,yasan wahala zasu bata sosai,hankalin shi yayi mugun tashi,hakan yasa yau ya kunna kallo yanason ganin yadda shariyar ta kasance Dan yasan Dole,anuna a gidajan television
Hankalinshi ya kwanta,ganin Islam ta fita,saidai maganar sark'ar dayayi yasan tabbas akwai sark'ar hannun Islam, sannn kuma dakanshi yaga yawasu gun cewar sark'ar tana hannun Islam
Wani tausayin yarinyar shi yaji,tabbas yasan ya chutar da ita,abubuwa da dama ya jefata matsalar rayuwa
*****Lokacin da aka dawo kotu,su Mohd babu inda sukaje,Alk'ali yana gama wata Sharia yadawo tasu Islam,Wani ma'aikacin kotu ne ya gabatar da sark'ar ga alk'ali
Alk'ali ya kalli su Gun yace"wannan itace sark'ar?"
Gun yace"eh"
Alk'ali ya d'aga sark'ar yana dubawa,yace"a ina kukayi fashin ta?"
Run yace"hannun wata mata lokacin hanyar Katsina zuwa Abuja"
Alk'ali yace"ko lauyan Wanda ake tuhuma yanada Jaa?"
Duk suka sauraran,Lauyan Gun yace"inason wannn kotu tabani damar yin magana da wadda ake tuhuma"
Moh'd yayi sauri mik'ewa yana d'agawa Mufeeda hannu,akan kada tabari ayi magana da Islam, dan yasan tabbas zata badasu,kuma bazata fitaba
Mufeeda tace"mai shariya bashi damar magana da Islam kamar
"
Lauyan yace"wannn kotu tanada adalci,ganin cewar tabar lauyan Wanda ake zargi tayi tambayoyinta a lokacin da takeso baikama ahana magana da Wanda ake zargi ba"
Alk'ali ya kalli Mufeeda yace"kiyi ahankali barrister "
Mufeeda ta zauna,Mohd ya dafe kai yana kallon Islam,Islam wani sabon kuka ta farayi,lauyan su Gun ya je kusada ita"Islam kince baki cikin masu ta'adda mi yakai sark'ar da akayo fashinta d'akin ki?"Islam ta goge idonta tace"Babana yabani?"
"Taya Babanki zai baki sark'ar batare da kinsan ina aka same taba?"
Tambayar tayiwa Islam nauyi,tace"mikace?"
Baristern Islam yace"mai shariya tambayoyin suna yiwa wadda ake tuhuma nauyi"
Alk'ali ya kalli lauyan yace"akiyaye"
Ya juya yana k'ara tambayar Islam"kince babu ke acikin yan fashi,sati shidda daya wuce,anyiwa wani mai saida sinarai fashi,kuma yace akwai sunnki acikin mutanan"
Islam ta zare ido,Lauyan ya kalli Alk'ali yace"munaso kotu tabamu damar gbtr da Usman Shehu mai sinari"
Alk'ali tace"Kotu tabaka dama"
Lauyan ya juya yana gabatar da Mai sinarin da aka kira,Wanda shine su Mohd sukaje karewa,lokacin da aka saka masu Guba
Mutumin ya gabatar da kanshi,lauyan yace"kotu tanaso kabata barin yadda akayi maka fashi,aka kwace maka akwatin kayan daka saro"
Mai sinarin ya watsa ma lauyan Harara,yace"aka cemaka ina goyan bayan rashin gskiyne"ya juya yana kallon su gun yace"kai kuma wallahi sai kun maido man kayana,dan bazan barkuba,tsinannu"
Gaba d'aya yaba kowa dariya har Alk'ali saida sukayi murmushi irin na girma kafin yace"Mai sinari kotu tanason jin yadda akayi"
Mai sinarin yabada labari har k'arshe ya d'aura da cewar"ni bana sheda akan yarinyar Yar fashice,abinda nasani kawai Alhji kabir ya had'a Law akan cewar in warewa yarinyar shi Islam guda sbd tanada biki kuma indawo da wuri kafin bikin,zatayi amfani da kayan"
Lawyer su gun yace"Islam taya sunanki ya fito cikin wannn fashin"
Alk'ali ya kalli agogo,yace"muna neman bayani daga bakin wad'anda suke k'ara"Duka su Mufeeda suka d'an sauraran
Alk'ali yace"bisaga shedu da muka samu,kotu ta d'age zamn wannn k'ara tare da Bada Umarnin k'ara tsare wadda ake zargi har zuwa 13 ga watan da muke ciki"
Dad dake kallon t
v ya dafe kai,yana Allah wadai da mugun ta irin tasu gun,nuno Islam da akayi cikin hali hakan ya k'ara hargitsashi
Gaba d'aya hankalin mutann kotun ya tashi,Islam ta fashe da kuka,lokacin aka fara fita,Moh'd ya mik'e yana kallon Abba Mufeeda ta fashe da kuka
Akazo za'a tafi da Islam,duk Suka yo kanta,Moh'd ya ruk'ota, wannn lokacin hawaye ne kwance idon soja,Islam dakyal take iya d'aga hannu sabd Handcup d'in dake hannunta,takai hannunta tana goge mashi fuskarshi"miyasa?miyasa zakayi kuka miyasa haka?kamar ba soja ba"
Wani abu Moh'd yake had'ewa mai d'aci,ya k'ara rik'e ta,Wasu yan jarida suka tareta lokacin ankai bakin k'ofar fita,Islam ta tsaya ganin yadda masu neman labarun sunason samun bayani daga wajanta
Wani ya farayi mata tambaya"Islam kin kasance wadda ake zargi,wace sheda kike tunanin gabatarwa a matsayin kariya"
Islam ta girgiza kai"Allah ne shedata,sannn Babanane kad'ai zai iya fiddani daga inda nake
"tana maganar tana dafe k'irjinta,ahankali takejin bazata iya tafiyaba,ta kalli Moh'd dake gyara mata mayafi tace"Yaya inajin wani abu,zuciyat
"
Tana maganar tana shirin fad'uwa,cikin sauri suke rik'e ta saidai ina Islam har takai k'asa,a gigice Moh'd yabita yana ruk'ota
