31
bata cikin hayyacinta,ga mutane sun rufe wajan,Moh'd k'ok'arin d'ago ta yakeyi,saidai mutane sun hana,wasuma waya suke sawa suna son d'auka sun rufe wajan
Wata k'ara ya saka ganin cewar Islam batasan ina kanta yakeba,d'akyal folisawan suka taimaka dasu Abba aka fidda Islam daga wajan,Mota police suka nufa da ita,lokacin Haidar yazo da mota wajan,Moh'd ya nufi Motar Haidar da ita,wasu Police sukazo suna fad'in"sir doka bata bada damar shigar da ita wata motaba saita police"
Moh'd ya d'ago Lokacin yana saka Islam mota,wani gigitaccan mari yakai ma Police d'in,yana nunashi da hannu,Abba yace"Moh'd "
Mohd yace"barni dasu Abba,Barsu,ganin da suke man a fili batare da neman iziniba shine zai kawo raini tsakanina dasu"
Haidar ya tada mota,Moh'd yakalli d'ayan police d'in yace"bani Key d'in ankwa d'in"
Jiki na kerma,dan sandan ya mik'a mashi,Moh'd ya shiga motar yana d'ago kan Islam,ya d'ora saman cinyarshi,ya rik'e hannunta yana cire Ankwa d'in
Lokacin Haidar gudu yake sosai,suka nufi wata Asbty,taimakon gaggawa suke nema,aikam ba'a b'ata lokaci ba aka shiga da ita ciki ana neman lumafashinta
Moh'd kam bakin K'ofa ya tsaya yana kai kawo,zuciyar shi tana harbawa,dan tunda yake bai tab'a tunanin zasu shiga irin wannn rayuwar ba,tabbas dole ya fidda Islam daga k'angin da take
Yana nan su Abba suka iso,da Mom Laihat kuwa kuka kawai takeyi,suna son ganin Islam saidai doctor yace abashi time
Abba ya kalli Moh'd yasan tabbas Moh'd yau yana cikin damuwa,hakan yasa baiyi mashi magana ba,Mom ta tsaya tana fad'in "an fara dubata?'
Moh'd ya d'aga kai dan bayajin zai iya magana,wasu Police sukazo wajan da mota,Moh'd yaja ya tsaya,Abba yayi saurin nufar su,dan yasan Moh'd zai iya wulakanta su a irin wannn halin da ake ciki
Suna magana da Abba,Mohd yazo wajan,Mota ya bud'e ya d'auko Handcup d'in daya cire jikin Islam, yazo yakama hannun police d'aya ya mik'a mashi,yana nuna mashi hanya" kafin in bud'e idona kubar nan"
Kowa tsoron magana yake,Abba kam yasan babu Wanda zai iya contaroling Mohd,cikin lokaci kad'an suka tada mota sukabar wajan
Moh'd ya bud'e idonshi,ya kalli Abba,idanuwan Moh'd sun kad'a,Abba yace"calm down soja"
Mohd baiyi magana ba,ya koma bakin k'ofar,Mom taja ta tsaya,Haidar yasan idan yayi magana fad'an akanshi zai koma kanshi
Abba yaje wajan yana kallon yadda Moh'd yake zufa,yace"I said calm down"
Mohd ya goge zufa"ni za'a raina a gari,wallahi basu isaba,dan kawai sunga nabi doka akan su rik'e ta,na basu ita tsawan kwana ukku,idan naje bazataje ba,wallahi banga ubanda ya isa ya canza man magana ba,inason yin adalci arayuwata,yarinya batada lafiya,har sun isa su gayaman bazata shiga wata mota ba saita police"
Abba ya dafa kafad'arshi "yanzu dai ya wuce,ka kwantar da hankalinka"
Moh'd ya kad'a kai"zanga Wanda ya isa ya k'ara tsareta"
Abba zaiyi magana,wata ma'aikaciyar jinya ta fito tana fad'in "ina Moh'd"
Moh'd ya kalleta,yace"gani"
Tace"patient d'inku tana nemanka"
Moh'd yayi kamar zai bigeta ya wuce sbd sauri,ta matsa ta bashi hanya,Islam tana kwance kanta sama tana kallon silin,ga drip a hannunta,Moh'd yaje yana rik'e mata hannu,Islam ta guyo da kyal tana bud'e baki tana magana"Yaya wani abu yanaman yawo a zuciya,ciwo nakeji"
Moh'd ya matse hannunta cikin nashi,yana kallon doctor d'in daya shiga yace"miye matsalar,tace zuciyarta"
Likitan ya kunna wata system yana aza wani abu a kirjin Islam yace"damu wace ta mata yawa,yarinyar kamar tana cikin matsala,zuciyarta tafara kumbura"
Moh'd ya kad'akai yana sauraranshi,likitan ya matsa wajan Computer yana nunawa Moh'd,saidai Mohd baiyi mamaki ba,sbd yasan matsaltsalun da Islam take fama dasu,wannn shine babban abinda yake gudu tun kafin wannn lokacin
Ya juya yana kallonta,saidai ta rufe idonta,kamar bacci ya d'auketa
Moh'd ya mik'e tsaye saidai har lokacin hannunta yana cikin nashi yace"yanzu miye abinyi ?"
doctor yace"treatment zamu bata,amma gskiya sai an kiyaye akan matsalar ta"
Moh'd ya jinjina kai,ya koma yana kallon fuskar Islam,ba k'aramar rama tayiba,sbd matsalar da take ciki
Moh'd yace"duk abinda Ku kasan yadace,kuyi don ganin tasamu lafya"
Doctor ya d'aga kai,Moh'd ya zauna samn wata kujera dake gefe,likitan yayi wasu Alluraii cikin k'arin ruwan,Moh'd yace"bacci takeyi"
"Eh munason tasamu hutune"
Moh'd ya d'aga kai,yasa hannu yana dafa goshinta,ahankali ya cire hannunshi daga nata,ya mik'e yana fitowa,lokacin yad'an samu natsuwa,nan yaga yadda mahaifanshi suke,ya kalli Mom yace"Mom kizo ki zauna nasan kin gaji"
Mom tasaki fuska,dan tanason ganin yaron ta yadawo nutsuwarshi,tace"ya jikinta"
Moh'd yace"sun mata Allurar bacci,sunaso ta hutane"
Abba yace"bari inshiga in dubata,zan wucene inji yadda za'ayi"
Moh'd yayi ajiyar zuciya "Abba kada ka b'ata Lokacin ka,kawai ka k'alesu"
Abba ya juya ya shiga yaduba,Islam sosai yarinyar take bashi tausayi,ya fito yana kad'a kai
Moh'd ya anshi carkey d'in Haidar ya tada mota yabar Asibitin,gida ya nufa,wanka yafad'a ya jima yana sakarwa kanshi ruwa,fitowa yayi yana shiryawa,shadda yasaka Ash colour, d'inkin ya anshi jikinshi,yasaka dark ash takalmi,kanshi babu hula,yafito
Yana fitowa ya tadda sojojinshi cike da gidan,Moh'd ya tsaya,aka bud'e mashi moto ya shiga,driver yaja mota,wasu yayiwa Umarni zuwa restaurant su sawo abinci,amma shi Asibitin kawai ya nufa
Lokacin daya isa,bacci take har lokacin bata tashiba,Jiniyar Sojoji yasa su Mom suka kalli juna,Haidar yace"yaufa an b'ata ran soja "
Mom tayi dariya,Mohd ya shigo d'akin yana tafiya a hankali,tun a reception din ake kallonshi sbd yadda yake tak'ama ga sojoji bayanshi,hatta ma'aikatan rikicewa sukayi
Wata sister Khdija t
j ta kalli abokiyar aikin ta tace"kai wannn ko waye?"
D'ayar aka tambaya tace"ke sojane shima,d'azu da kayan sojoji yazo"
Khdja t
j tace"kai ammm ya had'u "
Mom ta kalli Mohd,tace"Abba yana gida?"
Moh'd yace"bafa gida yayiba"yana maganar yana isa bakin gadon,ya kalli Laihat yace"ta farka kuwa?"
Laihat tace"tad'an bud'e ido,amma bata tashiba"
Moh'd ya kad'a kai,Haidar ya mik'e yana fad'in"Have a sit sir"yana maganar yana bashi kujera
Moh'd baice komiba ya zauna,yana fiddo wayarshi yana dannawa,Haidar ya tsaya Laihat ta kalli Haidar suna had'a ido Haidar yayi dariya,Laihat tasa hannu tana toshe bakinta dan tasan idan Moh'd yaganta bazataji da dad'i ba
Sunan shiru,ba mai magana,Daga Haidar sai Mom,yaran Sojojin suka shigo da take away dayawa na abinci da drinks,Moh'd ko d'agowa baiyi ba,suka aje suka fita
Mom ce tayi masu umarni suci abincin,saidai banda Moh'd dan tasan bazaiciba,gaba d'aya suka fara cin abincin,Haidar kuwa a tsaye yake cin abincin,Moh'd ya mik'e tsaye,baiyi magana ba yakoma bakin gadon da Islam take,hakan yasa Haidar yagane yana nufin ya zauna
Haidar yaja kujera ya zauna,Haidar ya cigaba da latsa waya
Islam ta fara motsawa tana salati,Moh'd ya juyo yana kallonta,Islam ta bud'e ido tana niyar tashi zaune,Moh'd yace"zaki iya kuwa?"
Islam ta d'aga kai tana cije leb'o, Moh'd yasa hannu ya d'ago ta ta zauna,ta fara juyawa tana kallon su,Sannu suka farayi mata,Laihat tace"bari in kira doctor "
Moh'd ya mik'e yana fad'in"zauna ci abincin"
Yana maganar yana mik'ewa yayi hanyar fita,dakanshi yayi hanyar waje,tagaban ma'aikatan jinyar ya wuce,sai kallonshi suke,ya shiga Office d'in likitan,ba jimawa suka dawo tare da likitan,sisters d'in suka biyoshi baya
Likitan ya fara duba Islam,Moh'd yana tsaye,aune-aune yayi mata,ya kalli Moh'd yace"zuwa anjima za'a k'ara yi mata awan aga yanayin kumburin zuciyar"
Moh'd ya d'aga kai,Likitan yace yanzu allura za'ayi mata,yana maganar yana ansar kayan aikin daga hannun Sister Khdija,Moh'd ya kalli Mom dake tsaye yace"Mom kin gama cin abincin?'
Mom tace"eh naci"
Doctor ya kalli Mom yace"sannu Mama"
Mom tace"yauwa doctor dubaman y'ata dakyau"
Sister Khdija gaba d'aya hankalinta yana kan Moh'd, likitan ya cewa Islam kawo hannun,Mom tace"Allurar jijiya?"
Likitan ya d'aga kai,Moh'd ya kalli Islam da alama tanajin ciwo,Doctor yafara neman jijiya,Islam ta fara janye hannunta,Moh'd yace"ki tsaya"yana maganar yana rik'e hannun
Islam ta langwab'ar dakai tace"da zafi"
Laihat ta taso"sannu"
Moh'd ya zauna bakin gadon,Likitan yace"Sister khadija rik'e nan"
Khadija kam lokacin ta maido hankalinta wajanshi,tana rik'e abinda yake bata,Moh'd yace"haba da zafi fa"
Gaba d'aya suka kalleshi,Mohd ya had'e rai yana kallon Islam da hawaye suka zubo mata,Mohd ya kalli likitan"wait wait"
Likitan ya tsaya yana kallonshi,Moh'd ya kalli Islam yace"ya akayi da zafi"
Islam ta d'aga kai,Mohd yace"DA zafi"
Likitan yace "inaso in samu jijiyane"
Mom tace"doyata tasha wahala,jijiyarma ta b'ata "
Moh'd ya kalli likitan yace"yanzu ya za'ayi"
Likitan yace"Mom ce yafita"
Gaba d'aya suka saka dariya,Moh'd Lokacin yagane suna nufin yaki bari ayi mata"
Moh'd ya mik'e tsaye,yace"Girl tsaya"
Da sauri Islam ta kalleshi jin yakirata da sunan da Dad yake kiranta,jitayi wani iri,yagane hakan,da sauri ya kauda kanshi yasa hannu ya rik'e ta sosai ya kalli doctor d'in yace"go ahead "
Likitan ya cigaba da aikin shi,dakyal yasamu yayi mata allurar,Moh'd ya zauna yana aza kanta saman kafad'arshi,Islam ta janye kanta tana k'ok'arin kwantawa,Mohd ya d'agota,yace"Laihat bani yoghurt din nan"
Laihat ta mik'e mashi,Mohd ya bud'e yana bata,ta sh sosai SBD yunwar dake addabarta,Mom tace"kamata yayi taci wani abu"
Islam ta kad'a kai,Moh'd yace"gskiya "
Mom tace"to ni bari in tafi gdan sai in had'a mata ko Pepper chic ne"
Moh'd ya d'aga kai,Islam ta kalli Mom lokacin likitan yana fita,Mohd yace"amma yanzu kin daina jin abinda kike ji"
Islam ta d'aga mashi kai,Haidar yace"sannu sis"
Islam tace"yauwa"tana kallon Mom dake fita,Haidar ya bita baya
Islam ta kalli Moh'd tana hawaye,tace"Yaya Yaya Yaya"
Moh'd yasan tabbas akwai abinda takeji a zuciyarta,yace"nace komi ya wuce"
Islam ta kad'akai,Moh'd yace"ki kwanta"
Islam gani take ydd Mom take hidima da ita kamar ita ta haifeta,ta goge hawaye tace"Yaya Mom tana sona"
Moh'd yayi murmushi yace"sosai kuwa"
Islam ta kwantar da kanta,Moh'd ya kalleta wani soyayyar ta yakeji,shi duk wannn case din jiyake kamar an k'ara mashi wani sonta
Har dare suna tare,Moh'd ko motsawa baiyiba, sallah kawai yake zuwa yayo yadawo,Islam kuwa dama wannn damuwar ce yasata ciwan zuciya,saidai yanzu Mohd ya kwantar mata da hankali,ta samu sauki saidai jikinta babu kwari
Suna zaune lokacin k'arfe goma na dare,Suna shirin tafiya saidai Mom ce zata kwana a wajan, Mohd yagama bata naman,dan gaba d'aya Mom tagane bayajin kunyarta indai gaban Islam ne
Islam tana zaune kan gadon,Moh'd yace"mu tafiya zmyi"
Islam zatayi magana wayar Moh'd tafara ringing yad'auka yana magana,Islam tayi shiru,Moh'd yace"nop a'a tana hannuna"
Basu gane maganar da yakeyi ba,ya d'anja lumfashi,yace"eh to yanzu haka tana kan gadon Asbty,shiyasa na anshe ta,ranar da za'a shiga kotu zan kawota"
Sai lokacin suka fahimci maganar Islam ce yakeyi,Islam ta rufe ido,Mom kam ki take saurare,yace"ba matsala,OK komi kenan zaku iya nemana"yana magana ya kashe
Ganin Islam ta rufe ido ya kalli Mom yace"kinga sun nemeni ko?"
Mom tace"nagani"Haidar yace"waye mai maganar"
Moh'd yace"chief justice ne"
Haidar yayi dariya"wallahi su Kansu sunsan k'arya ne ake mata"
Moh'd yace"na rantse da Allah sai sunsha Azabata"
Laihat tayi dariya"ai bamai goyan bayansu a kotun"
Haidar yace"ai tunda aka kamasu babu Wanda yazo wajansu"
Mom tace"wa zaizo yajawa kanshi bala'e "
Moh'd yace"suma justices din sun fahimci basuda gskiya"
Mom tace"Allah ya sawke dai"
Mohd yace"Amin"yana d'aukar key,Laihat tace"wai Yaya INA Mufeeda "
Mohd yace"nace tayi hidimar lauyoyin nan sbd zasu koma Kano,to kuma tabisu"
Islam sai lokacin ta tuna da Mufeeda duk da cewar tana ranta,Haidar yace"ai gskiya itama tayi k'ok'ari"
Moh'd ya d'aga kai"sosaima kuwa,banda yanayin anzo da maganar sark'ar da tayi winng"
Ya juya ya kalli Islam,har lokacin idonta rufe yake,hankalinta yad'an kwanta jin Mohd yace bazata koma cel dinba,ya CE"saida safe"
Mom ta kalleshi "ai kamar tayi bacci"
Moh'd yace"ba bacci tayiba,ni takeso in tsaya ke kuma kitafi gida"
Cikin sauri Islam ta bud'e ido,Tace"a'a Mom"Mom tayi dariya tana ficewa,Haidar yabita,Moh'd yace"bakiso inyi jiyarki?"
Islam ta tashi zaune tace"nafison Mom"Mohd ya duk'a yana mata magana"nikuma nafiso nayi jiyarki"
Janye kunnanta tayi,jin yadda yake mata lumfashi a kunnai,Moh'd yace"let me kiss joo"
Islam ta janye fuska,Moh'd yakama hannunta,yakai kan lip dinshi "Muahhh" ya kuma kallonta,Murmushi tayi tana kallon hannun,yace"sai kin rama man"
Islam ta zaro ido,tun suna Malaysia Moh'd ne kawai yake yi mata pick a kumatu ko hannu,har zuwa wannn lokacin bata tab'a attemting kissing hannunshi ba
Moh'd yace"eheee"Islam tace"wai me?"
Mohd yace"kiss mana"yana mik'a mata hannu,Islam ta ture"saina gayawa Mom"tana maganar tana kwanta wa
Moh'd yayi dariya,itama d'in dariya tayi,Mohd ya fita,koba komi dai yasaka ta dariya,suna tafiya Mom tadawo
Haka Islam tayi kwana biyu a Asibity,kulawa sosai suke bata,harta fara manta matsalarta,musamman idan ta tuna yadda Mufeeda tayi tsaye wajan kareta,sai kuma ta tuna itama lauyace,hakan yasa ta kauda duk wata damuwa,ta warware sosai ta samu lafiya,ranar kuwa Likitan ya sallameta
***Cikin kwanakin da basu wuce biyarba, Islam ta saki a gidan,kamar ba itaba,hakan yasa shima Moh'd hankalinshi ya kwanta,yakoma aikinshi,sannn kuma tsaye yake wajan samo bayanan da zasu kare Islam
Ana gobe zasu koma kotu,Islam ta nemi birkice masu,ganin Mufeeda harta ido,Mom ta kalleta tace"Mufeeda kinganta ko harta d'aure fuska"
Mufeeda tayi dariya"Allah Frnd ki kwantar da hankalin ki"
Islam zatayi magana Moh'd ya shigo yana sallama,suka ansa,ya zauna yana tambayar Mufeeda hanya,Mufeeda tace"lafya lau Alhmdllh "
"Yasu Baba"
Mufeeda tace"yana gaidaka,ai nagaya maka ko baka kirashi ba bazai hanaba"
Mom tace"a'a ai da dadi aba iyaye hakkinsu"
Moh'd yakalli Islam har lokacin batayi magana ba,ya maida hankalin shi kan Mufeeda yace"Lauya yanzu ya muke ciki,kitashi mufita,har yanzu bamuda wani bayani da zamu yiwa Kotu"
Mufeeda tayi ajiyar zuciya "abin yana tada man hankali"
Ta juya ta kalli Mom tace"mom ko zaki iya tuna lokacin da yan fashi suka tareku?"
Mom ta d'aga kai,tace"amma lokacinfa a rikice nake"
Moh'd yace"amma dai ai babu Aysha a cikinsu ko?"
Islam tayi dariya jin yakira sunanta da yake kiranta a Malaysia,Mom tace"a'a Banda y'ata"
Mufeeda tace"to Mom idan mukaje kotu bacewa zakiyi a rikice kikeba lokacin"
Dariya suka saka,Laihat tace"kada Mom ta b'ata zance"
Mufeeda tace"wallahi kuwa"
Moh'd yace"kina ganin Mom kawai zata iya zama shedarmu"
Mufeeda ta kalli Mom tace"yauwa Mom nikau ko akwai rasid'i shedar sayan Zinarin?"
Mom tace"eh mana tananna ina ajiya takardai"
Ihu suka saka,Islam tanajinsu,tace"laihat tashi kirakani"
Moh'd yace"INA?"
Batace komiba,laihat ta mik'e, Moh'd yace"Laihat zauna tunda bazata fadiba"
Islam takalli Mom tace"Mom in tafi? "Tana maganar alamar neman izini,Mom tace" a'a kada kitafi"
Moh'd yasa hannu cikin kunnai yana mata kwalo,Islam ta zauna tana turo baki,Mufeeda tayi dariya
Sannan zaune su kulla wannn su saka wancan,har dare yayi kowa ya kwanta, saidai Islam ta Dade kafin bacci ya d'auketa
Tunda ta tashi tayi wanka,ta shirya lokacin ta zauna falo zaman jiran su,Abba ya shigo falon yace"a'a ke harkin shirya"
Islam tace"wallahi kuwa Abba ni nama k'agara mutafi"
Abba yace"jeki tado shi maybe bai tashiba"Mom tafito tana cewa"kodai ya manta ne?"Abba ya k'ara kallon Islam "shiga ki kirashi"
Islam ta mik'e saidai bata tab'a zuwa b'angaran Mohd ba,amma dai tasan nan hanyar yakebi,tana zuwa ta tadda d'akuna guda biyu a rufe
Tsayawa tayi tana tunananin wanda shine nashi,tana d'aga kai taga wani abu kamar sticker mai alamar Army hakan yasa tagane nanne b'angaran shi
Moh'd kam yagama shirin shi tsab,takalma yake sakawa,Islam tayi sallama a hankali,saidai bata shigaba,Moh'd ya ansa,jin bata shigoba yace"ya dai?"
"Abba yace ingani ko baka tashiba"
Ji yayi muryarta babu alamar damuwa,yace"shigo"
Islam ta shiga tana kallonshi,kayan sojojine saidai nayau daban suke,kamar ba kalar na kullunba"
Islam taja ta tsaya"INA kwana"
Moh'd yace"lfy lau"yana maganar yana kallonta,kamar wadda tazo daga saudiya,yace"daga ina kike?"yana maganar yana d'aukar wani icce kamar abin bugu
Islam taja baya,Moh'd yayi dariya, yace"muje"yana maganar yana danna wayarshi
Islam tayo gaba suka fito,a falo suka tadda Mufeeda,Laihat,Abba,Mom,Haidar,Moh'd ya kalli Mufeeda ya mik'a mata wayarshi yace"d'aukar mu"
Abba ya gilgiza kai yace"wato photo ma zakuyi"
Moh'd yayi dariya Islam ta duk'ar dakanta,mohd yadawo kusa da ita,Mufeeda tacigaba da D'auka,Abba ya fice tare da Mom
Haidar yace"Dan Allah kuzo muje munbar mutane a can"
Moh'd ya kalleshi "wa muka bari"
Haidar yasa hannu yana Sosa kai yace"Khulsum tana bakin kotu tana jiran mu"
Duka sukayi dariya,Moh'd ya ruk'o hannun Islam suka fito,motarshi ya sakata,saidai baya tashiga,shima d'in bayan ya zauna,yana kallon agogo
Bajimawa Jiniya tafara saiga sojoji sunzo,suna zuwa wani yashiga Motar su Moh'd yana zama wajan driver, yaran suka kama Sara ma Moh'd,hannu ya daga masu
Islam ta kalleshi "mi hakan ke nufi?"
Moh'd baiyi maganaba,ya rik'e handle yana gyara zama,Islam takoma tana kallonshi "Yaya kada fa aga munje tare ayi tunanin ko kanason kareni"
Moh'd ya juya baya yana d'auko iccen daya aje,Islam tayi saurin ja baya,kawai sai yasaka dariya,dan yaga tana tsoro,yace"to bani nace masu zan kaiki ba"
Islam ta zauke ajiyar zuciya, suka kama hanya dansu har sunyi nisa
Kotu cike da mutane,Islam ta zauna tana waige-waige Moh'd yace"ya akayi"
Islam sai hawaye,"miye wai?"
Islam tace"babu komi"
Zai k'ara magana al'kalan,suka shigo,Moh'd ya mik'e ya kama hannunta ya kaita wajan da zata tsaya,lokacin aka shigo dasu Gun,yan iska duk sun k'ara lalace
Anan aga gabatar da k'ara dakuma inda aka tsaya wajan sharia,Alkali yafara leman su Mufeeda su gabatar da shedunsu
Dad ya k'ara gyara zama yana kallonsu,tabbas yasa su Gun sunsha wahalar rayuwa cikin lokuttan da basu fi sati Hudu da kama suba,hankalinshi yatashi sosai
Ganin Girl dinshi cikin shiga ta alfarma hakan yadan kwantar mashi da hankali,lokacin yayi nadamar hana GMM auranta ganin cewar yanzu shine yake taimakon ta,tabbas yasan babu Wanda yadace da Islam idan ba Moh'd ba
Tunani kawai yakeyi yarinyar shi zatasha wahala,gaya asalin bai nuna mata dangin Mamanta ba,sannn kuma ya zalince ta sbd rashin gaya mata dalilin rasuwar mahaifiyarta, Shi kanshi Dad yasan yarinyar tanada alhaki sosai akanshi, kuka yakamayi duk wani gata dayaba yarinyar tabbas yasan Haram ne,tausayinta yaji sosai
A kotu kuwa Mufeeda tagabattar da Mom a matsayin wadda zinarin yake mallakinta,sannn kuma tana cedar cewa babu mace a cikin mutanan da sukayi mata fashi
Alk'ali yayi rubutu,yana jinjina kai,ga alama yana niyar amin cewa,lauyan su gun yace"inaso wannn kotu mai adalci tayi duba ga wannn bayani,taya za'a kawo wata mata ace itace mamallakiyar zinarin batare da wata sheda ba"
Moh'd yayi smiling yasan cewa zasu fita,Islam kam hankalinta yana kan Moh'd
Alk'ali yace"Brister Mufeeda kotu tana buk'atar wata sheda"
Mufeeda ta bud'e file d'inta ta fiddo takarda,ta matsa ta mik'a Alk'ali ya ansa yana dubawa,saidai rubutun larabcine,Alk'ali ya karanta yace"kotu ta yarda cewar wannn zinari na Mrs Mansur ne"yana maganar yana mik'awa mutane suduba
Lauyan su gun yace"Mai sharia,wannn shedar bazata zama amintattaba,ganin cewa yana iya yuyuwa lokacin da akayi fashin ita wadda ake zargi tana zaune cikin mota"
Dad dake kallo ya wurgar da remote d'in hannunshi yana mik'ewa tsaye"kubar man d'iyata"
Moh'd ya d'aga iccen hannunshi yana shirin jifar lawyern su Gun Abba yayi saurin rik'e iccen da sauri,Moh'd ya kalli Abba,Abba yace"soja soja kafita idona in rufe"
Lokacin Moh'd yadawo hankalinshi,Islam kam hawaye ta farayi jin ana k'ok'arin kadasu
Alk'ali yace"Da yawan y'an ta'adda lokacin fita aikinsu sukan rabawa kowane aikin da zaiyi idan sunje fashi,kamar yadda Lauyan Wanda ake tuhuma yayi bayani,zai yiwu lokacin da akayi fashin sark'ar wadda ake tuhuma zata cikin Wanda zasu baiyana kansu"
Gaba d'aya kotu aka kama surutu da ihu jin Alk'ali yana ba su Gun gaskiya
Moh'd ya dafe kai,yana huci,Islam kam wannn lokacin babu hawaye idonta,Moh'd yakalleta,Islam ta jinjina kai,tana mashi smiling yad'an ji natsuwa ganin bata tada hankalinta ba
Alk'ali yace"kotu tayi duba ga shedun d'ayan b'angaran ta kori wannn k'ara tare da bada Umarnin hukunta wadda ake zargi tareda sauran masu laifin"
Islam ta dafe kai,tana kuka,Gaba d'aya aka kama hayaniya,kowa yarasa abin cewa duk an shiga rikici,Mufeeda jiki babu kwari takoma ta zauna,Islam zata fara tafiya folisawa sukayo kanta,wani Ihu ta saki,cikin gigicewa
Moh'd ya d'auki wayarshi dake k'ara,yana dubawa saidai baya iya tantance mai kiran,Mohd ya kara a kunna
Dad yace"GMM ko"
Moh'd yace"eh"
Dad yace"Alhji kabir Tate ke magana,Dad na Islam"
Moh'd ya zaro ido Dad yace"ya kayi shiru"
Moh'd zaiyi magana Dad yace"kasan kamani shine kad'ai zai iya fitar da Islam daga halin da take"
Moh'd yace"Dad Dad miyasa"
"GMM ka kama yarana, yanzu haka na shirya wasu yaran don cigaba daga inda na tsaya,sbd haka kenan Islam zata dauwama cikin bak'in ciki"
"Impossible bazai yiwu ba,nizan kamaka"mohd yana maganar yana mik'ewa tsaye
cikin sauri Yayo waje,Dad yana gefe yana kallonshi
Harbin bindigu aka farayi,Moh'd ya koma jikin bango yana lafewa dan baisan masu Harbin ba,Dad yayi dariya yana kad'a kai

Mutane duk hankalinsu ya tashi,Moh'd yayi k'arfin halin lek'awa ta window lokacin yaga ashe yaran shi ne suke harbi sama
Dad kuwa ya ja glass d'in black motar da yake ciki shida wasu yara,gudun kada Moh'd yabarshi, wani yaro yace"Oga kawai kabarmu muje"
Dad yace"jira Virus bkasa GMM ba,zai iya kamaka anan,dan nafi k'arfinshi ni"
Virus yace"wlh duk munfi tsofaffin yaran ka iskanci"
Dad ya kad'a kai ganin an fito da Islam ana niyar shiga da ita motar y'an sanda
Wannn lokacin kuka kawai take,Mohd kam bayajin zai ita ganin yadda za'a tafi da ita,saidai yanzu yasani dole yayi amfani da k'arfin mulkin shi wajan anso rabin ranshi,hakan yasa bai damuba sosai
Dad yaja mota yana fita daga harabar court din,lokacin Moh'd ya nufi wajan yaran yana tambayar su dalilin harbe-harben,babban yaron shi ya kalleshi,shi kanshi ranshi a b'ace yake yace"muna bak'in cikin rashin nasarar ansar Matar Oga"
Moh'd ya gilgiza kai,yana kallonsu,duk sukayo kanshi,sun Sara mashi,juyawa yayi yana komawa wajansu Abba inda Laihat da Mufeeda suke Kuka,yace"kufa miye?ya kamata kuzama kamar kun saba,shi dai Allah baya zalinci kun sani,kuma Islam bazata tab'a dauwama a wannn halinba"
Yana maganar ya juya yana kallon Abba,Abba yaji dad'i sosai ganin Moh'd bai tada hankalin shiba,yace"yauwa soja haka nikeso,waye yabaka kwarin guiwa haka"
Moh'd yayi Murmushi "nasan na kusa kama Oga,shine yabani kwarin guiwa,yanzu yakeman waya wai yasamu sabbin yara zai cigaba daga wajan da ya tsaya"
Haidar yaja tsaki,yace"waikau mutumin nan yanada hankali kuwa,shi bashi da tausayi"
Mom tace"gskiya ina tantama idan Wannn mugunne ya haifi Islam "
Abba ya kad'a kai,Moh'd yace"kuzo muje gida"
Mufeeda tace"ni Kano zan tafi daga nan"
Moh'd yace"a'a dan Allah kada ki tafi yau"
Abba yace"kibari mutafi gobe gaba d'aya, dan yakamata muje wajan dangin Islam muje ko sunsan da wannn maganar"
Moh'd yace"nidai bandani,ba zanyi nisa da gidaba gudun faruwar matsala"
Abba yace"badamuwa kanada gskiya"
Haka suka dunguma suka nufi gida,kowa yana bakin cikin wannn abu,musamman Moh'd,saidai yanzu yasawa ranshi tabbas sai yayi maganin Oga cikin d'an lokaci
A b'angaran Islam kuwa,batasan abinda ke faruwa ba,kawai dai tasan ansakata cikin y'an ta'adda, wannn rana tayi kukan bak'in ciki,Haidar ne kawai yaje wajanta,yayita lallashinta har ta hak'ura
Washe gari su Mom sukaje da safe,sannn suka wuce Kano,Islam tayita baza ido taga Moh'd amma bata ganiba,har suka tafi,dakanta tayi masu kwatancen gidan da Dad yaje da ita
Moh'd kuwa,aikinshi yatafi,a wannn lokacin ya cirewa kanshi damuwa,sannn kuma ya cirewa ranshi cewar zaisa a fidda Islam,saidai yayi alk'awarin kama Dad sbd hakan shine kawai zai wanke Islam daga zargi
Su Abba basu sha wahala ba wajan gane gidan Yayan Dad,anan suka tarbesu saida Abba ne yayi masu bayani ko shi waye,sannn ya d'ora da basu bayanin Dalilin zuwansu,Alhji Samaila hankalinshi yatashi jin abinda sukace akan d'an uwanshi
Habiba da Abba yaran Alhji Samail kuka suka kamayi,Inna tace"Alhji dukafa kwana Ukku kenan saida Alhji Kabir yazo gidan"
Abba yayi mamaki yace"to kunji halin da ake ciki "
Alhji Samaila yace"shikenan bari in kira uncle Sani ingaya mashi"Sunann zaune Alhji Samaila yaje gidan k'anan shi Wanda ke bima Dad sai gashi sun taho tare hankali tashe,kowane ya shiga tashin hankali
Neman shawara suka kamayi Abba yace"yanzu munyi iyakar yinmu,shiyasa mkace bari mufita hakkinku"
Tausayin yarinyar Yakama su sosai,saidai sunsan basuda yadda zasuyi,dama su ba hali haresuba,asalin Dad ne yake taimakon su
Lokacin dasu Abba zasu taho,Saida yace masu subar maganar a sirri tsakaninsu gudun faruwar matsala,kada Dad ya sa ayiwa wani wata illa
Suka kamo hanya suka dawo bayan sun raka Mufeeda gida,Babn Mufeeda yaji dadi sosai sannn shikanshi yashiga damuwa tareda tausayawa Halinda Islam take ciki
Mohd suka tadda zaune falon shida Abbakar, lokacin angama sallar isha'e,Moh'd ya taresu yana masu ya hanya,Abba ya zauna yafara basu labarin irin damuwar da suka shiga
Moh'd yace"wayyo Allah,gskiya Dad bai kyauta ba"Abbakar yace"wallhi shiyasa gaba d'aya na d'auke k'afata,tunda aka kamata ban fad'iwa Yusra ba nasan tada hankalinta zatayi"
Mom tace"kasan labarin case din nan,ya gewaya Nigeria sunce sunsan labarin saidai basusan abin kansu yakeba"
Laihat tace"Yaya yau kaje ka dubata kuwa"
Abbakar yace"nace yatashi muje amma yak'i"
Abba yace"miyasa Soja "
Moh'd ya kad'a kai"nifa bazanje ba"
Haka suka barshi,sun jima suna tattaunawa,kafin suka tashi daga firai
Islam kuwa har dare batayi bacciba,jira kawai take taga zuwan Moh'd amma har safe babu shi babu k'eyarshi,hakann take rayuwarta cikin cel d'in,Laihat da Mom sunje dubata Amma takasa tambayarsu Moh'd d'in,tuni zuciyarta ta kare ta kama kuka,yinin ranar haka tayishi
****Dad yana zaune wani katafaran falo,hannunshi rik'e da wata k'aramar bindiga,ya kalli yaran dake gaban shi su shidda,gaba d'ayansu da alamar shaye-shaye a tare dasu,sab'anin su Gun da ko sigari basasha
Dad ya kalli yaron daya sawa suna Virus,da alama wannn karan yafiji da yaron,yace"yau yau inson jin labarin mutuwar Justice d'in dana nuna maka"
Virus yace"si d'an iska tunda yak'i sakar mana k'anwa sai na d'auke kanshi"Dad yayi dariya dan saiya tuna mashi Danger haka yake gudanar da maganar shi idan yana basu aiki
Duk tsawan lokacin nan Dad training ya cigaba daba yaran sosai,Haka suka cigaba da Magana Dad yace"da kun kashe shi zamu bar Abuja mukoma Kaduna
Aikam ranar Daddre Alk'ali yana shirin shiga gida Lokacin takwas na dare yayi,yana tura gate zai shiga,kawai Virus ya d'auke kanshi,a take Alk'ali ya fad'i amace
Unguwar Babu kowa,Virus suka fito daga mota suka saka mashi takarda a Aljihu gaban Riga ta yadda kowa yazo zai gani
Moh'd yana cikin bacci wayarshi ta fara k'ara ya d'auka yana dubawa bacci yakama shi sosai,ya kara a kunnai
Gaya mashi akayi abinda ke faruwa,cikin tashin hankali Mohd ya mik'e jallabiyarshi yasaka yana fitowa,B'angaran Abba ya nufa yana knowking Abba yatashi yana tambayar ko waye
Moh'd yace"Abba zan fita,yanzu aka kirani waya an harbe chief justice "
Cikin tashin hankali Abba ya fito,yace"garin Ya?"
Moh'd ya yarfa hannu"gayann dai zanje wajan"yana magana ya danna kiran sojojinahi,ya shiga Mota kusan a tare suka isa,har lokacin ba'a kauda shiba balle a tafi Asibiti ga babu police ko d'aya a wajan
Moh'd cikin tashin hankali ya isa wajan,babu mutane sosai wasuma daga nesa suke,sai iyalan Mamacin dake jijjigashi suna kuka
Moh'd ya kalli sojoji yana yimasu nuni akan su matsa,Moh'd yana kallob justice ya rufe ido,ganin yadda aka fashe kanshi
Wani abu yakeji zuciyarshi tafara bugawa,yaran yafara d'agawa yana fad'in "kutashi Ku matsa"
Yana maganar yana k'ok'arin d'aga gawar justice,y'ayanshi hada y'an mata duk sun fita haiyacinsu
Sojoji suka d'ago gawar,Moh'd yana kama masu,suka nufi Hilux d'insu suka saka shi,yaran sai kuka suke,suka rirrike motar,Mohd yasan tabbas akwai ciwo yakallesu ya nuna masu alamar su shiga,aikam suka zauna suna rik'e mahaifin nasu
Mohd wani yawu yake had'iyewa mai d'aci,ya duk'a yana kallon gawar,idonshi yakai kan takardai gaban aljihun justice yayi saurin d'auka ya bud'e
*SECOND TEAM,STARTED WITH JUSTICE,KAGA DAGA YAU SAIKA HANA A FITAR DA GIRL D'INA, SAURA BARISTER,SOJA TAKE HEART WE ARE ALWAYS ACTIVE* 
Moh'd ya cimimiye takardai,baiyi mamakiba,dan yasan k'aramin aikin Ogane wannan,lokacin suka isa Asibiti, hankalin Moh'd tashe,yana tunanin cikin lauyoyin su Gun wa ake nufi,Moh'd afili yace"duka dole in kare rayukanku"
Yana maganar yana fitowa daga Asbtin,gida ya nufa,yasaka kaya,lokacin ya tadda duk su Mom sun tashi k'arfe Ukku da rabi na dare
Bai tsaya sauraran suba yabar gida
****Labari ya gewaye ko INA akan cewa Oga yasawke sabbin yara,gwamnati tayi Allah wadai dashi tare da k'arfafa guiwar kama shi,sauran y'an siyasa abin yabasu mamaki,SBD basu tab'a tunanin Dad zai aikata wannn abin
Islam batasan abinda ke faruwaba,bata cikin kwanciyar hankali,dan yanzu gani take Moh'd yadaina sonta,yadaina tausayinta,hakan yasa yadaina zuwa wajanta
Kullun cikin kuka take,ta rame sosai,su Kansu su Mom sun fahimci hakan, gaya tadaina cin abinci,har kullun tunanin ta batada kowa sannn kuma wata rana suma su Mom din zasu gaji su daina kulata
Islam da muka sani Yar gayu yarinya yar kwalisa,maiji da dukiya,ga kwalliya,amma yanzu duk hakan ya gushe mata,sbd yanzu hankalinta yakoma kan juya mata ya moh'd yayi
***Moh'd kam yanzu babban gurin shine yaga yakama Oga,sannn kuma rayuwarshi baya iya jure ganin Islam cikin wani hali,yasan damuwa zasu daurawa Kansu su duka,wannn ne dalilin dayasa ya d'auke k'afa zuwa wajanta
Yau yana zaune a Office Abbakar yazo suna fira,yace"wallahi kwana biyu bana samun bacci"
Abbakar yace"miyasa"
Moh'd ya jinjina kai"kasan tun sati biyunnn kullun saina fita patrol"
Abbakar yace"gaskiya Mohd kana k'ok'arin ni nasan baza'a tab'a samun babban soja irinkaba"
Moh'd yayi murmushi"har kullun inada ra'ayin ganin ana yabona,kamar yadda ake Gabon mahaifina"
Abbakar yace"Allah ya shigemana gaba"
****Titin cike yake sosai,motoci duk sun tsaitsaya,wasu suna k'ok'arin juyawa ganin cewa hanyar babu lafiya SBD k'arar harbin da suke jiyowa
Y'an fashin sun tare hanya,suna samn titin k'arfe sha biyu na dare,Oga motarshi tana gefen titi,wannn lokacin yana bin yaran gudun samun matsala kafin su ida kwarewa
Yaran suna jin jini a jiki,hakan yasa basajin tausayin kowa,aikin su kawai suke,duk wanda yayi gardamar basu abinda suka nema su d'auke k'afarshi da har sashe,wannn dalilin yasa duk Wanda yazo wajan baya gardama
Moh'd ya hawo titin,yana fara hango abinda ke faruwa,mamaki yafarayi,kafin daga baya ya jiyo Harbin bindiga
Kallon yaranshi yayi yana masu nuni da wajan,haka suka sauko daga motarsu cikin sand'a suke bin wajan,saida suka fara isa sannn sojojin suka fara Harbin b'arayin
Take suka gane cewar ma'aikatane,Dad hankalinshi kwance yasan cewa bazasu iya ja dasuba,kafin wani lokaci Moh'd ya shige cikin yaranahi sai bata kashi sukeyi
Cikin lokaci k'an k'ane suka kar yaran k'asa,sabd basuda yawa
Dad kam dirowa yayi daga mota yana aje wata stand Gun,Mohd ya zaro ido hanggoshi da yayi,cikin tashin hankali,ya anshe bindigun hannun yaran
Wajanda Dad yake ya nufa yana kwantawa gefen wata mota,kwata-kwata Oga bai kula da Moh'd ba,sai ji yayi an sakar mashi harbi a k'afa
Wata k'ara yasaki yana mirginewa k'asa,sabd k'afar bazata iya d'aukar shiba
Moh'd ya koma k'ark'ashin motar yana lafewa ganin yadda bindigar da Dad ya had'a take fidda harsashe
Dad kam ya fad'i k'afa bata iya d'aukar shi,wani Ihu yafara sakawa,ganin yadda kashin shi yake neman bushewa
Yasa hannu zai d'auki bindigar,bindigar ta fad'i ta b'angaran da yaranshi suke,aikam ya cigaba da harbe su
Tsawan binti goma bindigar tak'i tsayawa,hakan yatada hankalin Moh'd da yaranshi,Dad yafara yunk'uri yana matsawa zaije wajan Bindigar
Moh'd yayi saurin fitowa yana saurin zuwa wajan shi, Dad ya fiddo wata bindiga k'arama daga k'ugunshi yana nuna Moh'd
Moh'd ya nuna Dad da tashi bindigar,Dad sauri yake yanason harbawa,cikin Kuzari Moh'd ya kauce yana fad'awa kanshi,ya rik'e bindigar
Lokacin yaran Moh'd sukayo Kansu,Dad yana mirgina yanason kwace bindigar,Amma ina Moh'd yafi k'arfinshi
Dad ya rik'e bindiga yana harbawa,Mohd ya hanne wuyan hannunshi yana bugawa
Dad ya saki bindigar, yaran suka ida matsowa,yana mashi ihu,Moh'd ya mik'a masu Hannu yana dariya,Gaba d'aya yaran suka d'ago Moh'd
Dad Kuwa yana k'asa,Moh'd ya kalli yaran zaiyi magana suka kama wata wak'a duk lokacin da sukayi Winning haka sukeyi
Moh'd ya duk'a yasa hannu ya d'ago Dad yace"shikenan yau yarinyar ka zata fita"
Yana maganar yana kwaikwayon wak'ar da sojojin sukeyi,ga wayoyi suna d'auka
Moh'd ya kalli Dad dake hannunshi,sai lokacin yakejin wani bak'in ciki wani b'angaran kuwa farin ciki yake yacigawa mahaifinshi gurinshi,sann kuma Islam zata kubuta daga zargi
Wata zuciyar tana kallo mashi irin halin da zata shiga idan taga Dad a hannunshi
Sojojin sukazo da Motar su,Suka fara jan Dad Moh'd yace"be careful"
Hakan yasa sojojin suka kama Dad suka azashi mota,suka koma suna kwasar yaran
Lokacin dayawan mutanan da Yan fashin suka tare sunyi ta kansu,sai d'aid'aiku suke wajan
Moh'd ya shiga gaban motar ya zauna,Driver yaja mota,tun a hanya yaran suka kama kiran waya suna fad'iwa abokan aikin su Moh'd yakama Oga
Barracks suka nufa lokacin dare ya nutsa sosai, barracks cike take sojoji duk sun tashi suna jiran isowar Moh'd
Sojojin da ihu da wak'a suka shiga barrack d'in,Moh'd ya diro daga mota,Sojoji suka jera suna mashi Farat,Mohd kallonsu kawai yake,shi kad'ai yasan halin da yake ciki
D'aukar video kawai suke,Moh'd yana tsaye ya hard'e hannuwa a baya,wani yanayi yakeji yasan tabbas Islam yau zata k'ara shiga bak'in ciki
Moh'd ya juya ya shiga wani Office yana zama,yabarsu nan,lumfashi yafara maidawa,yana karanto Addu'a dan yanason samun nutswa
Sunann zaune har aka fara kiran sallar Asba,Mohd ya mik'e ya shiga yayi Alwala ya fito yana nufar hanyar massallaci,har lokacin sojojin shgalinsu kawai sukeyi kamar masu parti,gasu Dad cikin mota kowane harbin da akayi mashi yayi tsami
K'arfe bakwai sannn Moh'd ya fito daga masallacin,dan yajima ya sak'a da warwara
Y fito yana fitowa ya tadda,sojojin sun had'a motoci,haka yabi t gaban su jikinshi babu kwari,ya koma Office d'in
Shi ne bai fitoba sai takwas saura,saidai da wani sabon shirin ya fito amma har lokacin kayan sojojine yasaka
Tafiya yake suna binshi,y bud'e motarshi ya shiga,Driver ya zauna,Mohd yace"central Police station zamuje"
Gaba d'aya motocin sojojin sukayi tawaga sukabi motar,police station suka nufa,police d'in a cike,CP yana tsaye yana jiran Moh'd
Y'an siyasa kuwa jira kawai suke suga zuwan GMM da Dad,kowa hankalinshi yana Kansu
Moh'd yafito daga Mota mutane sai d'aga mashi hannu suke,Moh'd fuskarnan babu alamar fara'a
Yana tahowa yaci karo da Mom dasu Abba, Haidar ya d'aga mashi Hannu,yi yayi kamar baiganshiba,cikin station d'in ya shiga
Yana shiga Folisawa suka fara bashi girma,ya kallesu yace"your welcm,INA key d'in cel d'in da Islam Kabir yake"
Wani police yace"gaya nan sir"
Yana maganar yana nufa akan cel d'in, yana bud'ewa
Islam tana zaune,saman carpet din da tke zama,da hijab a jikinta,doguwar rigar atamface jikinta,fuskarta tad'anyi duhu,ta rame hakan yasa dogon hancinta ya k'ara fitowa
Moh'd tagani ana bud'e mashi k'ofa,cikin razana ta mik'e tsaye,dan rabanda taganshi tun ranar da suka fito kotu,lokacin hankalinta yatashi dan batasan miyazo yiba,bayan tagama fidda rai akan zaizo
Inda take ya nufo,Islam tace"Yaya "
Tana maganar tana ja baya,shi kanshi yasan yayi kewar Islam,saidai hakan da yayi shine kawai mafita a tare dashi
Ganin tana ja baya,hakan yasa Moh'd shigowa yana kama hannunta,Police d'in yace"fita zakuyi?"
Moh'd ya d'aga mashi kai,Police din ya fiddo Ankwa ya d'orawa Islam,Islam hankalinta bai tashiba,dan tadaina tada hankali,still Moh'd ya k'ara kama hannunta suna fitowa,ya anshi key daga hannun police d'in
Suka fito harabar Wajan,mutane cike,sai hayaniya akeyi,Islam kallon mutane kawai takeyi batasan abinda ke faruwaba,saima y'an jarida da suka bata haushi ganin cewa su basu gajiya da d'aukar labarai 
motar da Dad yake suka nufa,Abba dasu Mom suka biyosu,da sauran masu fad'i aji
Islam kam kallon mutane takeyi,saida suka tsaya Moh'd yace"Girl"
Islam ta juyo ta kalleshi,Moh'd yasan bataga Dad ba,yasa Hannunshi yana kwance mata ankwa,Islam kallonshi kawai take sotake tagane yanayin dayaso bata dashi bayan nisanta kanshi da yayi da ita
Ya d'ago ya kalleta yana nuna mata mutannn dake bayan Hilux d'in,idonta ya sauka kan Dad,cikin razana tafara fad'in "Daddddd"
Tana maganar tana ja baya,Moh'd ya matsa yakama hannun Dad yana maida mashi ankwa daya cire hannun Islam
Dad kam lokacin wasu hawaye suka zubo mashi,Islam ta fara murza ido,tana karanto innalllhi, Dad yace"ni ne Girl,nine Dad d'inkin"
Islam ta fasa k'ara tana dafe kai,gaba d'aya wajan ita ake kallo,ta juya ta kalli Moh'd tace"a ne?"
Moh'd baice komiba,Islam ta fashe da kuka,ta matsa wajan Dad ta kamo hannunshi tana had'awa da nata,Dad ya fashe da kuka,Islam ta kama jijjigashi,dan gaba d'aya bata gama yadda ba
Dad yace"ki daina kokonto Girl"Islam ta saki hannunshi ta juya tana kallon Su Abba ta maida Hankalinta kan Moh'd tana fad'in "na shiga Ukku"
Tana maganar tana dafe kai jitake duniyar tana juya mata,da kyal take iya kallon Moh'd tana magana"ka ceci al'umma dake k'ark'ashinka,ka cikawa Abba gurinshi,ka kubutar da mutane da dama"
Ta kalli Abba ta rik'e shi"Abba Abba kai Ubane nagari ka haifi yaro nagari,Abba ni miyasa na kasance mutuniyar kirki bayan Babana bashida kirki"
Gaba d'aya sukayo kanta,Abba yace"a'a Islam ki dawo hankalin ki"
Bata saurari Abba ba ta juya tana kallon Moh'd,rik'e shi tayi tana kallon Dad tana tuno irin rayuwa da soyayyar da Mahaifinta ya nuna mata,ta fara jijjiga Moh'd, Moh'd ya tsaya yana kallonta,saidai kwata-kwata batada k'arfin da Moh'd zai matsa daga tsayuwar da yayi"Mohd Babana,Babana ne fa Moh'd"
Tasa hannu tana rik'e Dad tana k'ok'arin shiga motar,Dad ya fashe da kuka"kiyi hakuri Girl kiyi hakuri,yau nayi maki nisa,na cuci rayuwarki"
Islam tace"Dad miyasa?miyasa Miyasa kayi haka"tana maganar cikin k'ara,Moh'd yasa hannu ya fiddo ta daga motar ya kalli sojojin yaja masu nuni akan suja mota
Ba musu taga mota tana tafiya,ga Dad yana kuka,Islam tace"Dadddd"cikin k'ara Moh'd ya ruk'ota, cikin tashin hankali take fad'in"ka sakeni,kasakeni nace"
Kafin kacemi,motocin sunyi nisa,Islam ta durk'ushe a wajan

33
Moh'd dasu Abba sukayi kanta suna rik'ota,Islam ta d'ago tanason mik'ewa, saidai jitake kamar bata da wani k'arfi jikin ta,Mom tana hawaye,ta ruk'o ta,dan shi kanshi Moh'd bayajin yanada kuzari a lokacin
Laihat kam tayi gefe tana kukan tausayin Islam, Mutane kam tuni suka juya suna bin motar da aka tafi da Oga
Abba yace"Hajiya sakata mota"
Moh'd cijewa kawai yake,Mom tayi mota da Islam, ta saka ta gaba d'aya family d'in suka shiga mota,Islam ta jingina kanta da k'ofa kuka kawai take mai tsuma zuciya, Abba ne yaja motar suka nufi gida
Kusan a tare suka isa gidan,dan Moh'd bayajin zai iya yin nisa da ita,Islam kuwa ita kad'ai tasan abinda takeji, zuciyarta tana mata ciwo,ganin Babanta a hannun Moh'd a matsayin d'an fashin daya kamo,sannn kuma yau ta shigo gidansu Moh'd batajin zata samu wani gata ganin cewa duk wani gata da take dashi a duniya ya gushe,dama soyyar mahaifi tasamu,yau gashi tasan yayi mata nisa dan tasan Shari'a bazata tab'a fitar dashiba, wani zafi takeji,yanzu ne ta tabbatar cewar shine ya kashe mahaifiyarta
Mom tana rik'e da Hannunta suka shiga falon,saidai ita bata cikin haiyacinta,ta zauna kan kujera,Moh'd,Haidar suka shigo,Laihat tn binsu a baya
Islam ta kallesu,yau su hankalinsu kwance cikin rufin asirinsu,babansu bai jamasu zagi da bak'in cikiba
Wani sabon kuka tafaraji,Abba ya zauna yana lallashinta,Islam ta dafe k'irji,sbd ciwan d take ji,"Abba nasan bazan tab'a samun farin ciki ba aryuwata,mahaifina ya jefani k'angin da bazani tab'a samun natsuwa ba,ya zama shine mutumin dana saba dashi,dake sonshi fiye da raina,fiye da komi nawa,haka shima yabani kulawar da ba kowane d'a yake samu daga wajan mahaifinshi ba,daga k'arshe duk wannn abin a nan ya k'are,miyasa Dad d'ina baiyi mani adalciba,bai yiwa kanshi ba,sannn bai yiwa Al'umma ba,ga fashin Allah miyasa Dad yayi haka"
Kowa rarrashinta yakeyi,banda Moh'd dake tsaye yakasa motsi,shikn shi yana cikin bakin ciki dakuma tausyint
Islam t rik'e hannun Mom tace"Mom nasan yadda kike son yaranki da Abba,naga yadda kike basu kulawa,haka Abba yake nuna kulawa akanku,amma Mom ni miyasa Dad zai zama sanadiyar rasa tawa mahaifiyar"
Mom ta kama d'aga kai,alamar rarrshi dan duk wani magana da zatayi don Islam ta hak'ura abin ya gagara,takoma ta kalli Laihat,ta kad'a kai,ganin Laihat tana kuka,ta mik'e ta koma kusa da ita ta durgushe,tana rik'e ta"ki daina kuka Laihat,ki godewa Allah,kinyi rayuwa mai tsabta tare da mahaifanki,nifa?nifa?duk zaman danayi a tare da mahaifina zaman yaudara ne,zaman cuta,gaba d'aya cikin Haram na ginu"
Tana maganar tana dafe k'irji,Moh'd yazo yana rik'e ta,dan yasan matsalar da doctor yagaya masu,Islam ta kalleshi"ka daina rik'e ni,kabarni kawai,Moh'd kaji dad'i ko yanzu ka aje kaki ka daina aiki tabbas sunanka yagama d'aukaka a duniya,nasan duk wani abu kagama nema a rayuwarka"
Moh'd ya daure yace"Islam ki daina,ki d'auki wannan a matsayin kaddarar rayuwarki,wannn abin daya faru dama rubutacce ne,babu Wanda ya isa ya cireshi daga littafin rayuwarki,abu d'aya zakiyi Hakuri shine kawai zai sa kisamu sauki"
Islam ta d'aga kai"dole zanyi hakuri amma zan zauna cikin bakin ciki har k'arshen rayuwata,yanzu abubuwa kad'an suka rageman, inkare hakkin mahaifiyata,in kare hakkin Al'ummar da Dad ya zalinta,duk dadai nasan karatuna nayi shine cikin Haram,zan cigaba da amfani dashi ta hanyar k'awatar wa al'umma hakkinsu"
Abba yace"Islam banda shari'ar Dad"
Wani abu Islam taji,dan maganar Abba kamar ta soketa da mashi,ta ja jiki ta koma gaban Abba,tace"Abba idan har banyi shari'ar Dad ba tawa zanyi?Nisan duk Nigeria babu mai laifin daya kaishi,komin laifin mutun Babana ya sameshi ya shanye,yayi kisa,yayi sata,yayi yaudara,cin Amana,zalunci,ga b'ata tarbiyar matasa"
Ta goge hawaye tana mik'ewa wani k'arfin zuciya takejin yana shirgarta,ta gyara hijabinta,tace"Abba nagode Nagode nagode sosai da kulawarku,tabbas nasan bazan tab'a samun mutane irin kuba arayuwata,kun soni tun kafin kusan wacece ni,haka kun soni har zuwa wannn lokacin da Ku kasan asalina na kasance wata d'iyar Wanda bayason ka"
Ta juya ta kalli Moh'd tace"Mom kinga Moh'd asalin Had'uwata dashi fad'ane,muna d'auki lokaci ina shuka mashi rashin kunya a Malaysia, bayan tsanar juna da mukayi,daga baya muka koma soyayya,Mom nayiwa Moh'd b'anar mota,bai damuba,nikam ganin muna fad'a nace zan biyashi,haka na gayawa Dad,Dad ne dakanshi yakai man mak'ud'an kud'i Malaysia, naje nakaiwa Moh'd amma yace yafi k'arfin kud'in,nikuma nabar mashi su"tana maganar wannn lokacin da alamar fara'a a fuskarta,saidai daka gani kasan akwai damuwa a tare da ita
Kowa yayi shiru yana jinta,dan inba Laihat ba babu Wanda yasan asalin labarin,"abubuwa da dama sun faru kafin fara soyayyar mu,Babana ya saka mani tsanar jami'an tsaro, amma Moh'd shine ya ruguza duk wani tsari na Dad,zaman shekara da mukayi da Moh'd ban tab'a sanin shi soja bane,sai saura kwana biyu mu dawo"
Moh'd ya zauna kan kujera,Abba kam kallonsu yakeyi,dan yanason jin cigaban labarin,Islam ta mik'e tace"Abba dan Allah kuyiman Alfarmar zama tare daku kafin zuwa lokacin da zan gama fafatawa da Dad"
Abba yace"Islam Islam ki kiyaye kada ki shiga fushin Allah,idan kin dage saikinyi shari'a da Dad kiyi dan Allah badan d'aukar fansan abinda yayi maki ba"Abba ya gyara zama yacigaba da yiwa Islam nasiha, sosai jikin Islam yayi sanyi
Ganin Haka Hankalinsu yad'an kwanta,Ita kanta tasamu nutsuwa kan maganganun Abba,wani dad'i tafaraji
Abba ya mik'e yana barin wajan,Haidar ya bishi,Mom tace"tashi muje kiyi wanka"
Islam batayi gardama ba,ta mik'e, Moh'd ya sauke nannauyar ajiyar zuciya,yatashi yana shigewa cikin b'angaran shi
Islam kuwa wanka ta shiga ta jima sannan tafito,gaba d'aya idanuwanta sunk'i daina zuba hawaye,hakan take gogewa,yanzu kan jitake bata buk'atar komi na jin dadin rayuwa,dan tasan bazata samu d'aurewar hakanba,dalilin ne yahana tsafa duk wani abu da ke aje kan mirron Islam
Tana zaune d'aure da toiwel,tunanin kawai take yau itace batada wani kayan da zata sa,kuka takamayi,ta jawo rigar atamfarta data cire,Wanda dama asalin rigar Laihat ce ta kamata ita tasaka,tana cikin saka kayan Laihat ta shigo
Kallon Islam ta tsaya yi,tabbas tasan Islam dole tayi kuka,zama tayi tana kallonta,tace"Haba Aunty dan Allah kiyi hakuri,kidaina kuka,kukanki damuwa yake sakamu"tana maganar tana ansar rigar da Islam take k'ok'arin sakawa "yanzu fa kika cireta"
Islam ta koma ta zauna,tana kuka"duk wasu kaya nawa yanzu ba nawa bane,suna k'ark'ashin iko ne,nafison nasaba da amfani da abinda nake dashi,sbd haka kibarni namaida kayana tunda kin riga kinbani"Laihat ta kama kuka itama,"haba haba Aunty dan Allah ki daina,wallahi komi nawa nakine,duk abinda kikeso a d'akinnn ki d'auka kada kiyi tunanin wani abu"
Islam tace"haba idan nayi amfani dasu yanzu,ranar da nabar nanfa?waye zai bani,zan koma wajan dangin Babana,kinsan ba halin hakan garesuba,mi zaisa nasabawa kaina"
Laihat ta bud'e wadrop ta fiddo kaya,riga da sket na lace,suka kayan sabbine ta mik'awa Islam,tana bata ta fice daga d'akin
Room d'in Moh'd ta nufa,Kbowking tayi Moh'd yace"shigo"dan yasan kowa ye bazai wuce cikin y'an gidanba,kwance yake samn gadon yayi rigingine yana kallon silin,tunanin kawai yake,Laihat ta zauna kan bedside locca,Moh'd ya mik'e yana jan fulo,ya zauna
Laihat tace"nayi tunanin bacci kake"
Moh'd ya kad'a kai yana kallonta,yace "har yanzu bazaku daina kukaba"
Laihat ta goge fuskarta,"Yaya inason Islam,bazan iya ganinta tana kukaba,bana iya jurewa"
Moh'd yasauke ajiyar zuciya shikanshi abinda ke damun shi kenan,yasan Islam bazata daina kukaba,yace"kinsan dole ta damu abin da ciwo"
Laihat tace"Yaya musamman irin na Islam,ace Wanda kakeson aura shine zai kama mahaifinka"
Moh'd ya cije leb'o, yace"hakane abin da ciwo "
Laihat ta koma bakin gadon ta zauna"Yaya plzz and plzzz dan Allah kada ka guji Aunty Islam "tana maganar tana kuka,Moh'd ya ruk'o hannunta,tabbas yasan Laihat tanason Islam,yace"bar kuka,bazan tab'a gudun taba,bazan tab'a cutar da itaba,insha Allah zan mantar da ita rad'ad'in abinda takeji,zan sakata farin ciki"
Laihat ta share hawaye"katashi Yaya ka fara tun yanzu,Islam tana kuka sbd batada kayan sakawa,kuma batason amfani da nawa sabd tana tsoron komawa hannun dangin Babanta basuda halin yi mata"
Sosai abin ya tab'a zuciyar Moh'd ya mik'e yana saka silifas d'inshi dake gefen gado, ya d'auki rigar shi,yana sakawa,kalar wandon dake jikinshi,dan dama yayi wanka saidai yakasa shiryawa,ya d'aura rigar saman singlet d'in jikinshi,Yace"tashi muje"
Laihat ta biyoshi,wajan corridor ya tsaya yana saka takalmi dake jere cikin shoe rag,ya rik'o hannun Laihat suka fito main Falon
Mom da mai aiki suke kawo kayan abinci saman carpet d'in falon,Moh'd yace"sannu Mom"
Mom ta kalleshi,gaba d'aya ya canza sbd damuwa,tabbas tasan yanason Islam,tace "yauwa,ka fito"
Moh'd yace"eh amma fita zamuyi"
Mom tace"to ku jira kuci abincin,sannn amma tare da Islam zakuje ko?"
Moh'd ya zauna bashida amsar dazai ba Mom,Laihat tace"bari in kira Autyn"
Lokacin da Laihat taje,tasaka kayan tana zaune,Tace"kizo Mom tana kiranki"
Islam ta warware d'ankwalin kanta ta rufa,ta biyo bayan Laihat,suka fito,Mom tace"zauna ga abinci nan"
Lokacin Moh'd ya zuba abincin,saidai yana rik'e da Plate din yana kallon yadda fuskarta ta kumbura gaya tayi ja,Islam ta kallesu,ta kalli abincin,ta koma kan kujera ta zauna"Mom taya zakusa insaba da gatan da bazai d'oreba,dan Allah kubarni"
Moh'd ya aje plate din, ya had'e yatsun hannunshi yana kallonta,Mom ta juyo tace"kenan nan ba gidanku bane?"
Islam ta kama kad'akai,Mom ta mik'a mata plate din, Islam ta ansa tana ajewa,Mom tace"cewa nayi kici"
Islam ta fara yamutsa abincin,taga Moh'd tun zuwanta,amma ba tashi takeyi ba,yanzu sotake ta fidda komi game dasu,ganin cewa ba Matsayin su d'aya ba,ayanzu
Laihat ta anshi plate d'in, Mom takoma ta zauna,tana fara cin abincin,saidai hankalinta yana kan Moh'd, dake kallonsu Islam
Laihat ta mik'awa Islam spoon da jalopp d'in maccaroni,dayaji kayan had'i,Islam tasa hannu ta anshi spoon din,tace"zanci dakaina"tana maganar tana d'an murmushi
Laihat ta bar mata takoma tana kallonta,Islam ta cigaba da tsakurar abincin,Mom kam tasan Moh'd yadamu akan hakan,tace"zo nan,zo in baki"
Islam ta saki fuska,saidai fuska duk hawaye,tace"a'a Mom zanci"
Moh'd ya mik'e yace"laihat d'auko mata mayafinta,kuzo muje"
Islam ta kalleshi,tace"ina zamuje?"
Moh'd yayi shiru,lokacin Laihat tadawo tana bata mayafin,Laihat ta anshi plate d'in ta aje dan dama baci takeba
Ta kama hannunta,suka mik'e,Islam ta kalli Mom cikin girma mawa tace"Mom zamu fita"
Mom tace"sai kundawo"
Lokacin Moh'd ya fice,suna zuwa ya bud'e mota ya zauna,Islam tayi saurin bud'e gdan baya,Mohd ya kara waya a kunnai,yana magana"zan maka massge yanzu"
Laihat ta zauna kusa dashi,Moh'd ya d'aura sit belt yana tada mota,yaja suka fice
Restaurant ya nufa dasu,Islam batayi Mamaki ba,dan tasan saboda ganin bataci abincin bane
Wajan babu kowa,sai ma'aikatan daketa gyara wajan,Moh'd ya fito Laihat tace"muje Aunty"
Wajan table din da Mohd yake suka nufa,Laihat taja kujerar kusada Moh'd tana nunawa Islam ta zauna,batayi musuba ta zauna,lokacin aka fara kawo masu abincin kala-kala
Moh'd ya kalli Islam"mi zakiji"Kawai sai ta kama kuka,Mohd ya daure yana lallashinta,dakyal tayi shiru,yaja bowl din farfesun y'an ciki yana saka spoon
Ya kalleta,ya d'ebo farfesun yana bata,Islam ta bud'e baki ta ansa,tasan kotayi gardama bazai bar taba,dakyal take cin naman
Moh'd ya mik'e ya k'ara jan kujerrshi,yana had'awa da tata,Laihat ta mik'a mashi cup din lemu,ya ansa ya dafata yana bata,Islam tasa hannu ta ansa,tasha ta ajiye
Ya cigaba da bata naman,taci sosai dan dama tanajin yunwa,ya janye bowl din farfesun yana shirin fara bata friend rice,Islam ta kad'a kai"nak'oshi"
Laihat tace"haba Aunty si bakici abinci ba"
Raurau tayi da ido,Mohd yakai mata abincin abaki,ganin bai tsaya saurarentaba yasata ansa tana ci dakyal, tasamu ta had'e zai k'ara mata ta kaudakai
Wani Waiter ya kira,yace"plzz munason Milk drinks ko yoghurt"Islam ta kalleshi,shikam Moh'd soyake yaga ta k'oshi,tayi saurin kaudakai
Moh'd ya cigaba da cin abincin,ko 5 mint ba'ayiba aka kawo masu,Moh'd ya bud'e robar hollandia milk d'in ya zuba cikin Cup ya nufi bakinta,dan dole ta ansa tasha
Saida ta janye ta dauke kanta sannan ya aje cup d'in,Islam kam saita koma kallonshi,,mamaki kawai take,wai shi baiji komiba ameda abinda ya faru,sai tattashin ta yake
Ta jima bata d'auke kan taba saima hawaye da suka koro,Mohd yace"a'a banason kuka kinsani"yana maganar yana aza kanta kan kafad'arshi,ya d'ora kanshi saman nata, hannunshi saman bayanta,d'ayan hannun yasa yana goge mata hawayen
Ajiyar zuciya tacigaba da saukewa,wata nabin wata,Moh'd yanaji ya rink'a Shafa kayanta alamar rarrashin,zuwa lokacin babu mai iya magana cikinsu,Laihat ta aje cup d'in hannunta,Islam tayi saurin janye kanta daka kan kafad'arshi
Moh'd ya kalleta"take heart dear,forget about pass,ki fuskanci abinda zai faru agaba"
Islam ta kad'a kai"can't believe it,zuwa wannn lokacin ace akwai wasu akusa dani"
Laihat tace "kada kiyi Mamaki,farin cikin ki mukeso"
Moh'd yace"ki daina"
Islam tace"Hmmm Yaya"
Moh'd yasan bata iya magana ne,hakan yasa yabarta,suka mik'e suna fitowa,Moh'd yaja mota suka nufi Jifatu store, Iapam tana baya,akwai Yar tazara tsakanin inda zasuje
Itadai tana baya jingine,tasaka hannu ta rufe fuskarta,babu jimawa wani sakaran bacci ya d'auketa
Saida suka isa Store d'in,sannn sukasan bacci takeyi,Moh'd yace"ya za'ayi?"
Laihat tace"kada ka tadata,nasan tanajin baccin ne"
Moh'd yasa hannu ya fiddo wallet dinshi,ya fiddo ATM card d'in shi,yace"to kije ni sai in zauna"
Laihat ta ansa,Moh'd yace"duk abinda kikasan zata buk'ata ki sawo"
Laihat ta wuce ciki,Moh'd ya fita ya koma baya kusa da ita,yana k'ara k'arfin Ac d'in,kallonta yake tana bashi tausayi sosai,saidai yasawa zuciyar shi zai taimaka mata,bazata tab'a neman abu tarasa ba indai yana raye
Laihat kuwa kaya ta kwaso sosai,laces atamfofi,material,dogayan riguna sosai, ga kayan Shafa da under wear,duk wani abu buk'ata saida ta kwaso,takai 2hr sannn ta fito
Aka cigaba da zuba masu kayan a boot, har lokacin Islam bacci takeyi,batasan abinda ke faru ba
Moh'd ya fito,Laihat tace"a'a ka zauna Bari in tuk'a,tana maganar yana zama kujerar driver, Moh'd kuwa yana gefen Islam suka wuce gida,lokacin da suka isa gida ana sallar Magrib
K'arar bud'e gate yatadata,tana salati,Moh'd ya kalleta,ta tashi zaune sosai tana mamakin yadda har duhu yafara, ga Moh'd kuma a kusa da ita,tace"ya akayi"tana murza ido, Moh'd yace"bacci kikayi"
Laihat tayi parking suka fito,baccin da tayi yasa taji kamar am yaye mata rabin damuwarta,gidan suka shiga Moh'd kuwa fita yayi ya wuce massallci
Suma sallah sukayi,Islam ta dade tana Addu"'oin samun dakewar zuciya dakuma neman taimakon Allah,har tayi sallar isha'i,tana zaune Laihat ta shigo ta kirata suka fita
Mom da laihat kawai ne a falon,sai wani matashin,Mom tace"ga telanan ki gaya mashi yadda kike son d'inkunan ki"
Islam ta kama kallon kayan,ko lace yafi biyar,ga atamfofi,ta dafe kai,Mom tayi saurin cewa"fad'i fad'i sauri yake"dan tana gudun Islam din tayi wata magana gaban shi
Islam idanu suka ciko,tace"duk yadda akayi"
Laihat tace"a'a Aunty"
Mom tace"shikenn"
Islam ta zauna gefen Mom,Laihat tace"Kayi mata gogayan riguna wasu kuma riga da sikert"
Sai lokacin Islam ta lura da tulin kayan da Telan yake lodawa cikin manyan ledoji,Moh'd ya shigo gidan,yabashi hannu suka gaisa
Laihat tace"Yaya ga telan nan"
Moh'd yace"ya gaya maki ko nawa zaiyi?"
Laihat tace"a'a gayann kuyi magana"
Islam ta kwantar da kanta kan cinyar Mom tana kuka
Mohd yace"nawa ne kud'in? "
Telan yace"yallabai saina koma shagon inna lissafa zan gaya mata"
Moh'd yace"Badamuwa"
Telan ya tafi,Mom ta d'ago kan Islam"indai haka zakiyi rayuwarki bazamu daidaita ba"
Moh'd ya zauna yana mik'a wa Laihat wayar Islam da gobe da kuma agogo,yace"mik'a mata kayanta daga Police station nake"
Islam ta ansa,ta kalli wayar,lokacin ta tuna Dad ne yasai mata wayar bayan fad'an ta da Moh'd, tasa hannu ta bud'e bayan wayar,ta fidda sims card d'in,ta mik'a wa Laihat wayar"Ajiye hannun ki,idan kotu buk'atar kayayyakin sai ki tuna man a had'a masu"
Duk jikinsu yayi sanyi,jin abinda tace,Moh'd ya kalli Laihat yace"je cikin lokkar Mirrow waya nanan d'auko tafara saka Layinta "
Lokacin da Laihat ta dawo Mom tana danna wayarta,Moh'd ya fito daga kitchen da cup hannunshi,shayi ne saidai babu madara, yana kurbawa
Laihat taba Islam wayar,tana fad'in"tashi muje asaka wannn kayan a wadrop"
Islam ta kalli Mom,sai kuma takama kuka,Moh'd ya zauna yana cire tea bag,daga cikin shayin,Mom ta janye idonta kan wayar tace"Islam "
Islam tace"Mom ngde ngd,Allah yasaka maku da Alkhairi "
Mom tace"tashi jeku had'a kayan
Islam jiki babu kwari ta mik'e Moh'd yabita da ido,D'akin Laihat suka shiga,Laihat tace"a ina za'a saka kayan'
Islam tayi shiru,Laihat tace"bari in maida sauran kayana cikin waccan wadrop din,ke saikiyi amfani da wannn"kasan cewar D'akin akwai wadrop din bango,sannn kuma akwai ta set din gadon
Itadai Islam ba magana,Laihat kam aikin ta ta kamayi,cikin lokaci ta shirya wa Islam wadrop,kamar wasa kaya masu yawa Islam tayi mamaki
Haka suka zauna,babu wata fira,lokacin da suka farajin bacci sukayi shiri suka kwanta,basu jimaba bacci ya d'auke su
*****Washe gari Islam ba laifi,ta saki jikinta harda shiga kitchen tataya Mom da mai aiki aiki,saidai ita kadai tasan abinda takeji,Moh'd kuwa tun kafin tatashi shi harya ficewarshi Office,Laihat ma Tara nayi tatafi lectures
Gidan daga Mom sai ita,Abba ma ya fita,Sunann zaune babu magana,Mom CE take d'an jawo mata labari gudun kada takama tunanin
Mom hada bata labarin zamansu katsina,har dawowarsu Abuja,Islam tace"mom kenn kunfi dadewa a Kaduna"
Mom tace"a'a a katsina mukafi dad'ewa sannn muka koma Kadun munyi zama Kano saidai bamufi shekara Ukku ba"
Islam tace"Allah sarki ma'aikaci yana ganin zauna nan koma can"
Mom tace"musamman Jami'an tsaro "
Islam tace"amma Mom nasan kinason komawa Katsina kodan family d'inki"
Mom tayi dariya"wayace maki niyar Katsina CE"
Islam tace"laaa ace k'iba y'ar katsina bace"
Mom tace"ni ba y'ar Nigeria bace,ni y'ar asalin Niger CE"
Islam ta zaro ido "tab yo INA zansani,amma kwata-kwata bakiyi kama da Yar Niger ba"
Mom tace"taya zanyi kama dasu,bayan tun ina 15year aure yara bani dacan,saidai mukai masu ziyara"
Islam tace"Allah sarki,kinga ban tab'a zuwa k'asar ba"
Mom tace"ai yanzu zaki rink'a zuwa"
Islam zatayi magana,Mufeeda tayi sallama, Mom tace"a'a a'a oyoyo"
Mufeeda tashigo,Islam ta mik'e ta rungumeta tana kuka,Mufeeda itama kuka takeyi,Mom tace"shikenn nasamu tayi shiru kin tada man ita" 
Mufeeda tajata suka koma kan kujerar,suna wani sabon kukan jin yadda islam take kuka Mom tace"Mufeeda kada kiman haka,plzz"
Mufeeda ta janye jikinta ta mik'e"Mom tare da bak'i nake,Uncles d'in Islam suna waje"
Islam cikin kuka ta mik'e da sauri tana fita,a harabar gidan ta taddasu tsaye,aikam tayi kansu tana kuka,su kansu suna cikin hali,hakan yasa suka yanke shawarar zuwa,kodan suji halin da ake ciki

BAYA DA K'URA - BAYA DA K'URA 34 - Page 5 - Wattpad
*BAYA DA K'URA*
AUNTY HALILOSS
34
Uncle sani da Alhji Sama'ila,sukan su daka gansu kasan suna cikin tashin hankali,Mom ce tafito,kasan cewar gidan babu kowa tayi masu iso zuwa falon Abba,ganin yadda Islam take kuka sukansu hankalinsu yatashi
Mom ta fice ta barsu,suna rarrashinta, amma gaba d'aya sun kasa samun kanta,Mufeeda dama data shigo tayata kawai take,hakan yasa shikanshi uncle sani kukan yakeyi
Mom ce ta cika masu gabansu da kayan abinci,da drinks,tare da sheda masu Abba yana kan hanayar zuwa
Sunyi k'ok'ari sosai wajan kauda damuwa,saidai tabbas kasan suna cikinta,ba'afi minti ishirin ba,saiga Abba ya iso
Nanfa Abba ya matsa masu akan suci abinci,bawani sosai suka ci abincin ba,Alhji Sama'ila ya kalli Abba yace"Alhji Mansur mungode fa,mungode da abinda kukai mana"
Abba ya kad'a kai,dan baya buk'atar godiyar,ganin cewar suna cikin damuwa
Uncle sani yace"wannn kuma wata kaddarace a cikin rayuwar mu,tabbas bamu tab'a tunanin haka daga wajan Yaya Kabir,yadda yake son yan uwanshi,da duk wasu al'ummar dake k'asanshi amma ace yau ga halin da ya saka kanshi,wanda duk Wanda yaji zaiyi mamaki"
Islam ta cigaba da kuka,tabbas ita kanta tasan Babanta mutumin kirki ne,azahiri,saidai tana kuka akan abinda ya aikata a boye"
Sun jima suna tattaunawa,Islam ta tashi tabar falon ta koma d'akin Laihat tana kuka,sai k'arfe hud'u Moh'd ya shigo gidan,saidai bayan ya shigo Mom take gaya mashi sunada baki,hakan yasa ya shiga b'angaran shi,yayi wanka cikin sauri ya shirya yaje suka gaisa
Mufeeda kuwa tana falon bak'i itada Laihat da Imam dan shine ya kawo su,sabda yanason yiwa Islam jajan abinda ya faru,saidai har wannn lokacin bai samu magana da itaba
Islam tana kwance tana kuka lokacin takejin tsanar kanta yana k'ara shi garta,afili tace"Dad miyasa bakayo halin y'an uwankaba?miyasa bakayi gudun jefani a irin wannn halinba,miyasa ka nunaman soyayyar da bazani tab'a dauwama a cikinta ba,kasani farin cikin da nayi bak'in cikin samun shi,farin ciki ta hanyar Haram Dad,Dad miyasa?"tana maganar tana mik'ewa,dan gaba d'aya rayuwar tayi mata zafi,jitake dama Allah ya d'auki ranta da irin abinda takeji a yanzu,tasan mutuwarta ce kawai zatasa tada inajin halin da take ciki
Islam tasa hannu ta goge fuskarta,tunanin kawai take tasan bazata tab'a samun gatan data samu a bayaba,tabass bazata tab'a samun masoyiba,tasan duk wanda zai sota dole akwai k'alu bale a rayuwarshi,wani kuka ta k'ara sakawa,yanzu ne dai-dai lokacin daya dace tayi Aure Amma ga abin daya faru da ita,tasan ko Moh'd da yake sonta tabbas wata rana akwai abinda sai tasamu matsala dashi,musamman shi dayasan duk wani abu daya faru da ita,sabon kuka takeyi,wata zuciyar tace"inda ina tare da Mahaifiyata,nasan zanta zama da ita har lokacin da zan samu sauk'in abinda nakeji"
Gaba d'aya Islam tasan tarasa gata,batada wani gata daya wuce Babanta gashi ta rasa shi
Wayarta ta d'auka ta jawo wani k'aramin Akwati,tafara jera wasu kayan da su Islam suka sawo mata,saidai kuka yana son fin k'arfinta,zuwa yanzu sotake kawai ta nisanta kanta da kowa,ganin datakewa mutane yanasata jin zafin zuciya, musamman su da sukasan abinda ya faru,tasan nisanta kanta da kowa
Islam ta d'ago kanta daga kan Akwatin,ta saka duk wani abu da zata buk'ata,fitowa tayi tanason ganin idan Babu kowa a falon dan batason a hanata abinda zuciyarta take gaya mata
Cikin sa'a kuwa duk mutann gidan suna b'angaran Abba,Islam ta fice ta k'ofar kitchen tana kuka,tabbas taji fad'in karamcin dasu Moh'd sukayi mata,sannn basu tab'a goranta mataba,saidai dole ya nisanta kanta dasu,especially Moh'd Wanda tasan bata tab'a zama matsayi d'aya dashiba
Tana fita gate d'in tana kuka,gaba d'aya rayuwarta tayi mata zafi
Wayarta ta kunna,sbd tunda Moh'd yabata ita a kashe take,tana kun nawa sak'o yacigaba da shigowa,Islam bata damuba,saidai tunanin abinyi take,tana kuka har takai Babban titin Unguwar
Napep ta tsaida,tana gaya mashi tashar Kaduna zai kaita,dan gaba d'aya so take tayi masu nisa,tana shiga ta kuma fashewa da kuka,sabd tunda Napep ta shigo bata tab'a hawan Adai-daita ba,tunanin take wannn wane kalar gatane Abba yabata
Har mai Napep yayi nisa,Islam cikin kuka tace"malam kaini wani GTBank"dubawa datayi batada wani kud'i a tare da ita,suna zuwa Islam ta fita tana fidda ATM a jakarta,ta saka tana cire kud'in,saidai ga mamakinta datayi checking blance taga kud'in sunyi yawa sosai,sabda tasan kud'in daya rage zata iya amfani dasu basufi 40k ba,sauran kuwa dama bazata tab'a amfani dasuba
Ta fidda 40k,ta saka jakka,ta shiga Adai-daita a lokacin tad'an rage kukan sbd ganin Mutane suna kallonta
Tasha aka ajeta,ta fiddo kud'i taba mai Nappep,tana gani ana cika motoci taja tayi tsaye tana kallon yadda mutane suke hada-hadar su,ita b'ata tab'a tafiya a motar hayaba,batasan ya zatayi ba
Takai 30mint tana kallon mutane,wani ma'aikacin tasar ya nufo ta,"Hajiya ina zaki?"
Islam ta goge fuska tace"Kaduna"
Mutumin yace"kina kallo aka cika motar Kaduna Amma baki shigaba"
Islam takalleshi,tace"si bansani ba"
Mutumin yace"zoki jira mugani idan amsamu wasu persenger sai a baku wata motar"
Islam taja tayi tsaye,an k'ara d'aukar lokaci,mutumin yace"zo muje"
Aka sakasu mota,babu jimawa mota ta tashi,bayan biyan kud'in da sukayi, Islam tana gani aka fara barin garin Abuja,lokacin k'arfe shidda na marece,wani sabon kuka takeyi
Har wata mata dake kusa daita taga kukan yak'i k'arewa tatambayeta ko rasuwa a kayi mata,Islam tayi saurin kad'a kanta tana goge hawaye
Har suka iso Kaduna lokacin,angama sallar isha'i Tara ta kusa,hakan yasa hankalin Islam yatashi
Tafara tunanin yadda zatayi,tunawa tayi da gidan Abba da suka tab'a zama lokacin datayi zuwa wani Hutu,hakan yasa ta yanke shawarar taje kafin tasan abinyi,saidai bata samu abin hawaba
Takai minti talatin,ga gari yayi duhu,takoma cikin tashar ta nufi motar,sai taga driven yana shiga mota,lokacin zaibar tasha
Islam taje tana rok'onshi akan yakai ta konawane zata biyashi,jinhakn yasa ya yarda ya d'auketa
Tana gaya mashi har suka isa Unguwar,Wanda babu kowa sai hasken fitulun gidaje,Islam da kyal tagane gidan Driven ya tsaya
Ta fito ta nufi gate d'in,bata kula da wata k'atuwar kaca kamar sark'a,saida taje bakin gate d'in, ta kula,gate d'in a ruf a k'aton padlock
Islam ta zaro ido,sai kuma taga wata takarda da aka lik'a,Islam ta fara karantawa,lokacin tagane gwamnati CE ta rufe gidan
Wani tashin hankali ta k'ara shiga,ta juyo tana cewa mai Motar "dan Allah kaini wani Motel" 
Lokacin data shiga motar ta k'ara rushewa dakuka,tabbas tasan babu inda maganar case d'in Dad bataje ba,sanin cewa babu Wanda baisan shiba a k'asar nan
Bakin Hotels din ya ajeta,ta bud'e jikka ta fiddo 5k tabashi,Mutumin yace"a'a hajiya sunyi yawa sai kacedai zamubar garin"
Islam tace"kadaika Nina baka"ta juya tana tafiya,shikuma yatada mota yana zuba godiya
Reception ta nufa,tana daidaita fuskarta,don tanason samun d'aki,Islam tayi booking single Room aka bata key ta tafi
D'akin ta shiga ta zauna bakin gadon,tabbas tasan nisanta kanta dakowa shine kawai zaisa tasamu sauk'i, ta goge hawaye, ta mik'e ta shiga toilet tayo Alwala,oo ta bud'e akwatinta,ta fiddo hijab tasaka ta fara gabatar da sallolin da ake binta
Tajima tanakai kukanta ga Allah,kafin ta sallame ta koma toilet tayi wanka,ta fito tasaka kayan baccin data d'auko tana sakawa ta fad'a kan gado ta kwanta
Lokacin jitake batajin yunwa,duk da rabamta da kalaci tun break fast datayi,Islam ta kwantar da kanta kan filo,nan fa tacigaba da wani sabon tunanin tana kuka
Handbag d'inta dake gefe ta fiddo tana fiddo wayarta,lokacin ne ta kulada miscall da Massges din dake wayar
Massges tafara dubawa,babu wani massge sai Alert data gani kusan guda biyar na kudine,cikin Mamaki take karantawa tanason ganewa,anan ta kula,Albashi ne na tsawan 3month da fara aikinta,Islam tasha mamaki,dan batayi tunanin zasu fara binyanta kudin ba bayan tad'auki hutu,saidai tafara tunanin kiran wani Brister Wanda shine yayi mata hanyar samun aikin,ganin dare yayi yasata fasawa
Miscall ta koma dubawa,lokacin ta kula duk kiran Moh'd ne da Mufeeda, a lokacin tasan cewa sun gane bata gidan
Islam ta kad'akai tana sharar kwalla,afili tace"kayi Hak'uri Moh'd nayi maka nisa,kamar yadda kaci k'arfina,dole na nisanta kaina daku"
Ta runtse idonta tana tunanin Mufeeda, tabbas Mufeeda itace second Lov d'inta,daga Dad sai ita acikin mutanan datafi aminta dasu
Sosai take kuka tana tuno abubuwanda suka faru,lokacin ta tuno da yadda Babanta yake gaya mata cewar sark'ar data gani d'akin shi ta Mamn tace,wani sabon kuka tasaka,har dare ya nutsa batayi bacciba
****A b'angaran su Moh'd kuwa sai da akayi kiran sallar Magrib sannn sukabar d'akin Abba suka wuce masallaci,bayan sun dawo ne suka tadda Mom, Laihat da Mufeeda suna Neman Islam

Ya tashi zaune yana Jan filon,ya kuma kiran wayarta,Islam kuwa ganin hasken wayar tayi,saidai tasan bazata d'auki wayarba
Moh'd ya cigaba da kira,Islam kuwa bata d'auka ba,saidai kuma ba kuka takeyi ba,Moh'd ya cillar da waya jefe,yana komawa ya fad'a kan gadon,wani tausayinta ya k'ara rufe shi,gata mace tabbas yana tsoron halin da zata fad'a ganin cewa ba kowa ta saniba,batada kowa saisu Uncle sani,gaya kuma yasan ba wajansu ta tafiba,Moh'd yajawo wayar yana sabbatu"miyasa zaki tafi,Ialam miyasa zakiman haka,bakisan abinda nakeji ba,miyasa zaki fara tunanin bazamu iya kulawa dakeba"
Islam kuwa wayar ta kifa yadda bazata k'ara ganin haskenba,tacigaba dakuka,dan jitake kamar yana k'ara tuno mata da halin da take ciki,tana hawaye har barawo bacci ya d'auke ta
Hakan tafaru a b'angaran Mohd,ranar da kayan jikinshi ya kwana,dan baya iya canza wa zuwa kayan bacci
***Haka Islam ta tashi da Asba,tayi sallah itace bata tashi daga kan capert d'inba sai k'arfe takwas,tayi wanka,ta dawo ta zauna bakin gadon ta d'auko wayar,Miscall d'in Laihat da Mufeeda ta k'ara gani,ta kad'a kai ta fara kiran wayar Brister daya Samar mata aikin,Godiya tayi mashi cikin marairaicewar murya,don yanzu duk wata magana da Islam zatayi,K'arshe ta kukane
Sai wajan k'arfe goma lokacin tafara in tanason cin abinci,taje taci abinci tadawo d'akin,lokacin ta tadda ana gyarawa,tad'an jira sannan ta shiga

****Abu kamar wasa Islam ta kwashe kwanaki a Kaduna farko bata fita tana d'aki tayi kuka tayi ibadunta,daga baya tad'an fara fita tana zagaya motel d'in,yanzu tad'an farajin kwanciyar hankali,dan babu abinda take gani yana tuna mata,Amma fa kullun sai taci wannn kukan mai isarta,cikin d'an lokaci Islam tak'ara ramewa,ta canza

****Islam tana zaune bakin room d'inta, wasu hawaye yake zubo mata,har yanzu takasa daurewa zuciyarta,tasa hannu ta danna wayar hannunta tana bud'ewa

35
Haka tafito ta nufi tasha, ta shiga mota, ba b'ata lokaci suka nufi Kano, cikin ikon Allah bata sha wata wahala ba ta gane gidan, sai dai gaba d'aya rayuwarta cikin k'unci take da tunanin mutanen da zata tadda dakuma irin kallon da za'ayi mata
Cikin napep ta zauna, mai Napep d'in ya dubeta yace, "Hajiya dan Allah ki sauka ni tafiya zanyi"Islam ta d'ago ta goge hawayenta, sannan tana mik'a mashi kud'insa ta fito
A Dai-dai lokacin Moh'd yayi parking da Laihat zaune a gaban Motar, dukansu babu Wanda yake magana, sai wata Mota dake bayan ta Moh'd d'in
Laihat ta kalli gabanta kawai sai taga Islam tana maida akwati cikin Napep d'in, tasa gefen mayafinta tana goge kukan da takeyi, Cikin sauri ta zaro ido "Islam! "
Moh'd ji yay kamar ta soka mashi mashi a zuciyarsa, cikin sauri ya rik'e Laihat ganin tana k'ok'arin bud'e k'ofa, dan shi sai a lokacin ya kula da Islam d'in
Islam kuwa jitake sam bazata iya shiga gidansu Mufeeda ba, dan tabbas tasan dole akwai mutanen da sukasan maganar case d'inta, ta koma cikin Napep d'in ta zauna ta fiddo wani littafi ta fara rubutu, Mufeeda takeson yimawa, hakuri ta bata akan cewa tazo saidai bazata iya shigowa ciki ba
Moh'd yaga tana niyar fitowa, yayi saurin yin baya da Mota, yayi reverse, sai dai Islam taga mota amma ba tasan su Moh'd bane saboda ba tasan motar ba, Laihat tace, "Yaya ka barni inje
"
Da sauri Mohd yace, "No, idan ki kaje ba zata bari musan a ina take ba" yana maganar yana Jan glass sama
A hankali Islam ta fito taje wajan Maigadin su Mufeeda da wani kwali rik'e a hannunta, gift ne takawo mata, tayi mashi sallama bayan sun gaisa ta bashi, kan cewar ya bawa Amarya
Tana badawa kuma ta fashe da kuka ta, ta juya ta koma wajan Napep d'in, ta shiga ta duk'a tana mai ci gaba da kuka, Moh'd ya fito daga Motar shi da sauri, Motar yaran shi dake baya ya nufa, take yayi mashi nuni akan ya bita
Islam batasan abinda ke faruwa ba, yaran Mohd ya cigaba da binta a baya, ba tada wajan zuwa a Kano dan ba tason zuwa gidansu Uncle sani, hakan yasa kawai suka d'auki hanyar tasha
Yaran yana binta har tasha, sannn kuma suna communicating da Moh'd, Mohd yana k'ara gaya mashi ko ina zata ya bita
Haka kuwa akayi,an d'auki hanyar Kaduna da Islam, lokacin da suka isa ana kiran sallar magrib, still yaran yana binta, har Motar ya bita, sai dai anan man motarshi ya k'are hakan yasa ya fita daga motar ya bita har ciki
Islam ta kuma ansar keys d'inta ta wuce d'akinta, sai lokacin Moh'd yace mashi ya daina binta, tun da ya gane a inda take
Laihat kam har tafara kuka akan kada su rasa Islam sai da taga Moh'd ya zare mata ido, sannan tayi shiru, yace ta shiga cikin gidan
Tana shiga ta tadda Mufeeda cikin tashin hankalin sak'on Islam data samu, haka aka cigaba da gudanar da hidimar biki, shi kam Moh'd duk ya shiga damuwa babban tashin hankalin shi yadda har zuwa lokacin Islam tana kuka, yasan tabbas tana cikin matsala ne
Anyi Dinner a ranar ta b'angaran Amarya,su Laihat sune sukata hidima, Mohd kuwa dama ba zuwa wani event yake yi ba, shiyasa baije ba, washe gari karfe sha d'aya ya halarci d'aurin Auran Mufeeda da Imam
Ana gama d'aurin Aure ya kira Laihat, ya gaya mata shi zai tafi, sai dai ba tasan INA zaijeba, saboda dama ita a nan zai barta, dan haka ba gardama tace, "To Yaya sai na dawo, goben a turo driver ya d'auke ni"
Mohd ya jinjina mata kai, ya fiddo kud'i masu yawa ya bata, sannan ya bata wasu ta kaima Mufeeda danshi yama rasa miye zai bata a matsayin gift, sai dai yasan inda Islam tana nan itace zata bashi shawarar abinda zai saya
Moh'd kuwa baban burin shi, shine ya kama hanyar zuwa Kaduna daga Kano dan zuwa wajan Islam, yana hawa titi yafara ganin motar Sojoji, da sauri ya ja yayi parking a gefe ya fito
Dai-dai lokacin suka k'araso kusa dashi, dan dama wajanshi zasuje, suma tsayawa sukayi suka dawo
Moh'd ya hard'e hannu yana kallonsu, saluting dinshi suka farayi, sannan Moh'd yaba wani daga cikinsu Hannu suka gaisa yace, "Daga ina haka?"
Cike da girmammawa ya fara fad'in "Canal ne yace muzo wajanka, kana gari"

"Ai cewa yayi dama mu tsaya tare dakai har zuwa gida"
A hankali ya kad'a kai, shikam Sam ba soja bane maisan yawan tsaro, duk inda zaije a naso yaje tare da mutane, shikam tun a Malaysia yadaina buk'atar hakan
Ya kalli yaran yace, "Na gode but no need, bani da buatar hakan"
D'aya daga cikinsu yace, "Sir order ce aka bamu"
Moh'd yasan tunda akasan yana Kano tabbas baza'a barshi yayi yawo shi d'aya ba, cike da jin haushi yace, "Shike nan Kaduna zamuje"
Yana maganar ya mik'a mashi key, yaran suka Sara mashi, d'ayan ya bud'e mashi mota ya shiga
Da haka suka bar Kano, yamma lis suka isa Kaduna, Mohd bai tsaya komai ba ya samu wani Hotel ya sauka tare da yaran, Ya kama masu wajan zama, bayan ya gama masu komai, yayi masu bankwana ya barsu anan ya fice
