Motel din da Islam take ya yiwa tsinke, ya jima cikin mota a bakin room d'in sai dai ya kasa fitowa, dan bai san miye zai faru ba idan ta ganshi a wannan lokacin
K'afin hali kawai ya yi ya fitowa, a hankali ya fara knowkin door d'in, Islam tana zaune taji ana bugawa, sai dai tasan babu Wanda yake mata hakan, wannn Guy d'in ma ya fara buga mata kofa ta doke shi
Islam ta d'auki mayafinta, ta aje ta ture system d'in da take browsing ta nufi k'ofar, a hankali tace, "Waye? Bana buk'atar komai fa" dan ita tasawa ranta ma ko masu aikine
Ji tayi ank'ara bugawa da k'arfi, tayi baya da sauri dan ta ji tsoro, a rud'e tace, "Wai waye ne?"
Moh'd tabbas yasan idan har bai yi magana ba, ba zata bud'e ba, saboda tsaro, jikinshi a mace yace, "Moh'd ne Islam bud'e"
A firgice ta zaro ido waje tayi baya da sauri tare da dafe k'irjinta dake bugawa da k'arfi, tana ci gaba da kallon k'ofar a tsorace, tana mamakin waye ya gaya mashi tana nan, mi yasa zai biyota a wannan lokacin, bayan ta fara samun nutsuwa a rayuwarta, sam ba tason abinda zai jawo mata matsala a nan gaba, idanuwanta har sun fara zubar hawaye
Da k'arfi ya k'ara buga k'ofar
Dakewa tayi cike da fad'uwar gaba tace, "Gaskiya kayi Hakuri kawai ka juya bazan bud'e k'ofar ba" tana maganar ta koma ta zauna kan kujera, ita yanzu gani take duk Wanda zai shiga rayuwarta tsantsar yaudara ce kawai
Moh'd kam kasa magana ya yi, ya jima yana bugawa, Islam tayi karfin halin dawowa bakin k'ofar "Dan Allah kayi hakuri, na san banyi maku ban kwana ba kafin tahowa ta, sannan banyi maku godiya ba akan karamci da mutuncin da kukai man, amma kayi man Afuwa, ka taimaki rayuwata ka barni nayi zamana ni d'aya a nan hakan zaifi man sauk'i, na rok'eka ka tafi dan Allah"
D'an cije lips d'insa ya yi yace, "Nidai ki bud'e please, akwai abin da nake son gaya maki ne"
Islam ta juya ta fad'a kan kujera, dan ita tama rasa miye damuwar ta, a irin wannan lokacin Dad dinta kawai take buk'ata amma bata da damar hakan, tana kewarshi sosai, shi kad'ai ne zata gani ta samu sauk'in abinda ta keji, hakan yasa ta ci gaba da kuka mai tsuma zuciya
Moh'd yana tsaye yakai 2hr yaje yayo sallah ya dawo ya ci gaba da buga k'ofar, amma fir Islam taki bud'e k'ofar d'akin, Hakan yasa Moh'd ya hakura Yaje ya kama room a cikin Motel din, sai dai akwai Yar tazara a tsakaninsu
Islam ta kalli agogo,jin ya daina buga mata k'ofa, taga dare yayi sosai, yanzu tana da tabbacin yabar k'ofar room d'in, hankalinta yadan kwanta takama bacci
Asubar fari ya koma buga k'ofar, amma Islam bata bud'e ba, Moh'd yaje massallci yayi sallah ya koma room d'in shi yayi kwanka ya shirya cikin wani farin kaptan d'inkin Zamani, d'inkin yayi mashi kyau sosai, hannun lens d'in ya saka ya fito lokacin rana tayi
Hanyar d'aki ta ya nufa, yana zuwa cikin sa'a tana fitowa zataje restaurant, sai da ta rufe room d'in Mohd ya nufeta yana saka hannuwanshi a aljihun rigar shi
Juyowar da zatayi ta ganshi, ja baya ta farayi, Moh'd na binta, sai dai daka ganshi kasan zuciyarshi tana cikin bak'in ciki da takaici, tsayawa yayi kusa da ita, Islam ta kauda fuska gefe
Dogon lumfashi yaja, ahankali ya bud'e baki yafara magana "Yanzu abinda kika yi kin kyauta, rayuwar da kike son zaki daukarwa kanki kenan?yanzu kenan bazaki yarda da kaddara ba?"
Islam wannan lokacin babu hawaye fuskarta, "Moh'd hakan shine samun saukina, nafi son rayuwata ni d'aya banason wani ya kara shiga rayuwata, balle yaudara ta shigo, ko gori" tana maganar muryarta tayi rauni ta fashe da kuka
Moh'd yace, "Shikenan amma kinsan zaman ki ke d'aya ba zai fishsheki ba ko?"
Islam tace, "Ni hakan yafi man hakan nake buk'ata" ta fad'a tana niyyar wucewa, shan gabanta yayi ya hana mata hanyar wucewa
"Islam! baki isa ba, baki isa ki zauna ke d'aya ba, baki isa ba wallahi" yana maganar cikin k'araji, Islam ta tsaya, tana k'are mashi kallo,Moh'd ya ci gaba, "Kin san irin halin da su Mom suka shiga akan tafiyar ki, kin san yadda nakeji kuwa,Islam baki jin abinda nakeji a cikin zuciyata, kenan zaki iya nisa dani zaki barni a halin rashin ki, kin manta da soyayyar da muke yiwa juna kenan?"
Hannu Islam ta d'aga mashi "bana son maganar soyayya, banaso bana so, duk maganar soyayya ta riga da ta k'are, maganar Mom da Laihat ne zaka man yanzu, dan haka wata rana da kaina zanje inba Mom hakuri, Amma ka daina min maganar soyayyar nan" tana maganar hawaye na bin kuncinta
Moh'd yace "bangane nufin kiba?"
Lokacin Islam wani tsanar Moh'd takeji, dan bata bashi gaskiya a halin da ake ciki, saboda yadda take jin ana fad'in halin maza, akan duk yadda suke sonka wata rana saika samu matsala dasu, ta kauda kai "Kawai bana son soyayyar bana so!"
Moh'd ya rausayar dakai yasan komai zai iya faruwa dama "Naji amma ki koma gida shine, sannan taya kike tunanin zan daina maganar soyayya? kin san halin dana shiga akan rashin ki kuwa? taya kike so nayi d'awainiya da azabar sonki da k'aunarki a zuciyata?" yana maganar ya rik'o hannunta, Islam ta kalli hannunshi tana kad'a kai, "Mohd natsani soyayya na tsani mai yinta, bana son soyayya kwata-kwata"
Moh'd yayi saurin kallon ta, Islam ta ci gaba "Duk irin halin da nake ciki, soyyya ce ta ja mani, soyayyar Dad, saboda haka duk Wanda zai soni fiye da misali na tsaneshi"
Wani tashin Hankali Moh'd yaji, ya saki hannunta ahankali yana ja baya, "Kenan kin tsaneni?"
Islam ta d'aga kai tana kuka, dan lokacin abunda take ji ya girmi kwakwalwarta, Moh'd ya runtse hannuwan shi saboda yadda maganar Islam ta dakeshi, wani kalar abu yake ji a zuciyarsa, ya juya a hankali ya nufi motarshi, Islam ta juya da sauri ta sige d'akinta, ta durk'ushe a k'asa ta rushe da kuka
Yau itace take jin tsanar Mohd bayan irin tarin soyayyar da suka nunawa juna a baya, kuka sosai takeyi tana Neman sauki akan abinda takeji a zuciyarta
Moh'd kuwa da kyar ya iya zuwa yayi loging out ya bar Hotel d'in, banda yana soja, irin yadda zuciyarshi take bugawa tabbas zai iya shiga matsala, haka ya dake saidai yana son ba Islam lokaci, yasan baza ta tab'a cewa bata son shiba, sai dai dole ya mata uziri
Sojojin shi ya kira, dan baya iya tuk'i, gabanshi harbawa kawai yake, haka ya koma bayan motar ya kishingid'a, maganganun Islam suna yi mashi yawo, yadda yau ta iya fad'in ta tsaneshi a gabansa
Jikinshi yayi sanyi sosai, wata irin kerma kawai zuciyarsa ke yi, lokaci guda yanayin shi ya sauya, da kyar yake iya motsi, yayi k'arfin halin sa hannu yana tab'a wuyanshi, baiyi mamakin jin zafi sosai a jikinsa ba hakan ya sashi k'ara dakewa gudun kada masassara tak'ama shi, yasa hannu ya d'auki bottle d'in ruwa ya bud'e saida yasha sosai kafin ya aje robar, har suka isa Abuja Moh'd baiyi magana ba, waya ma idan aka kirashi baya d'auka
Tunda sukayi parking aka bud'e mashi ya fito, idanuwan shi sunyi jajir sosai, ya nufi falon jiki babu kwari, sai dai yayi sa'a itama Mom d'in bata nan, hakan yasa ya nufi room d'in shi, wanka yayi ya fito ya zauna bakin gadon, wani jiri yakeji, ya saka kaya marasa nauyi ya kwanta saman gadon yana son ya samu relief, ko ya sami sauk'in rad'ad'i da zafin da zuciyarsa ke yi
******
A B'angaren Islam kuwa, tunda ta samu ta mik'e kan gado ta fad'a tana kukan ta, zuwa lokacin tasan ba ta da mai lallashinta, ta mik'e ta goge hawayenta, gaba d'aya rayuwar ta isheta, itakam tafi son mutuwarta a wannan lokacin fiye da rayuwarta a wannan duniyar, tunani kala-kala tai tayi, sannan ta tashi tayi wanka ta d'auro alwala ta dawo ta kabbara sallar Zuhur, ta jima tana kai kukan ta ga Allah, a nan bacci ya d'auketa, bata farka ba sai bayan sallar la'asar, ta mik'e tana rik'e wuyanta saboda rik'ewar da yayi, ta koma toilet tayo Alwala da sauri ta fito tayi Sallah
Tana idarwa kuma ta dasa wani zaman a gurin, dan gaba d'aya kwata-kwata bata jin yunwa, sai kuma takoma tunanin Moh'd, tabbas tasan ba shida laifi duk abinda ya faru laifin Dad dinta ne, saboda tana da tabbacin abubuwan daya aikata, miye dalilinta na tsanar Moh'd, tsaki taja ta mik'e, sai kuma tafara tunanin barin Hotel din, saboda ita kanta tasan abinda Moh'd ya fad'a gaskiya ne, bata dace da zama a Hotel ta maida shi kamar gida ba, amma ita kanta bata san ina za ta fara dosa ba yanzu, hakan yasa ta hakura ta ta zauna
******
Moh'd ya samu yaja bargo ya rufe jikinsa, saboda ya kasa mik'ewa ya rage A
c dake aiki a d'akin, lokacin Masassara ta gama rufe shi ruf, ga kanshi dake sara mashi kamar zai rabe gida biyu, tabbas yasan maganganun Islam sun mashi zafi, karfin hali yayi a hankali ya d'aga lips d'inshi ya fara magana, "Miyasa!? miyasa zaki tsaneni? miyasa zaki mayar dani makiyinki bayan kin san nid'in masoyi ne a gareki na hak'ik'a? miyasa kika bani goyan bayan kama Dad d'inki bayan kin san bazaki iya jurewa ba? Why Islam?" Ya d'aga hannu a hankali yana son jawo wayarshi daga kan loka, don yana son samun amsar, tambayoyin shi
Fitilar saman lokar gadon ta fad'o ta fashe, dai-dai lokacin Laihat ta aje basket a corridor d'in room d'in nasu, dan itama dawowarta kenan daga Kano, da sauri ta razana ta nufi d'akin
Moh'd yana jin k'arar bud'e k'ofar da maganar ta, yayi saurin daidai ta kanshi, Laihat tace"Yaya Ashe kana nan?"
Moh'd ya d'ago jajayan idanuwanshi, ya d'an kalleta ba tare da ya yi mata magana ba, Ta zaro ido da sauri ta nufi bakin gadon a rud'e tana tambayarshi lafiya?
Yace "Nop INA tunanin banda lfy ne"
Laihat ta dafa shi, "Haba Yaya wane tunanin kuma, bayan ga jikinka nan da zafi?"
Tana maganar tana mashi alamar ya tashi, sai lokacin ta kula ma da kyar yake iya dagowa, hankali tashe ta taimaka mashi, ta d'auki wayarshi tana fad'in"bari in kira Haidar" Moh'd yace "A''a kada ki kirashi"
Laihat tace "Miyasa? to tun da ba ka son a kirashi, tashi muje Asibiti"
Moh'd ya ruk'o hannunta, ya mik'e tsaye, Laihat ta rik'e gyalanta dake shirin fad'uwa, danko mayafin bata cire ba, Moh'd yace "Muje mota"
Laihat ta gane jiri yake yi hakan yasa ta rik'e shi, suka fita, motar data kawo ta ita suka shiga driver ya jasu, family Hospital din da suke zuwa suka nufa, Mohd ya daure ya fito suka shiga, anan yaga Likitan, Laihat tana gefe tana mashi sannu, Likitan ya farayi mashi fad'a akan yawan damuwa, Laihat sai lokacin ta mahimce shi, ita kanta taso gane hakan, amma mamaki take yadda ciwo zaima Moh'd akan soyayya, ita bata taba jiba, sai dai ace Mace bata da lafiya sbd Namiji amma ba Namiji yayi ciwo akan mace ba
Moh'd jin likitan yana Neman kureshi, yace, "Please doctor yiman Allurar kawai mu tafi"
Laihat ta kad'a kai, likitan ya ci gaba da duba shi,saidai lallai saida yaba Moh'd gado sbd rashin kwarin jikinshi

"Nop zauna gayann nayi waya akawo,idan sunzo sai ki tafi gida ki huta,yrn zasu zauna dani zuwa safe"

Lokacin Laihat ta zauna jiran ya tashi taga yadda jikin yake kafin ta tafi,lokacin saya farka jikinshi yayi kwari,hakan yasa tayi mashi sannu ta tafi gdan kamar yadda yace mata,shikuma ya zauna da yaran har safe
Washe gari Haidar yakamo hanyar dawowa Abuja,cikin ikon Allah ko 11 bata idaba ha iso Asibiin,Lokacin likitan ya sakawa Mohd k'arin ruwa,Moh'd yatashi zaune yana fad'in "wai tahowa kukayi?"

Moh'd yace "eh nasanma yanzu zasu sallame mu,ina kiran wayar Autah ma naji bana samunta dan yau ba tazo ba"

Moh'd ha kad'a kai"yes dama kuma tagaji"sukabar maganar,Haidar yyi mashi sannu
A b'angaran Islam kuwa,kwata-kwata batayi tunanin Laihat ko wani zaisoba,ganin yadda Mohd Ya tafi,tasan zaiyi wahala yagaya ma wani yazo

Farko da niyar suyi magana taje,amma kuma takasa,ita kuwa Islam ciki ta koma,saidai wannn lokacin zuciyarta tana raya mata miye zaisa tazo tagaya mata Moh'd bashida lafya,dan ita ta Riga ta fiddashi a jerin zuciyarta

Cikam Moh'd dawowar Laihat kawai yasani,saidai baiga alamar walwala tare da itaba,ranshi yayi mashi zafi,dan duk tunaninshi ko Islam tagaya mata wata magana
Bayan An sallammeshi Asibiti lokacin yasawa ranshi juriya dan yana gudun matsala,sai da akayi kwana Ukku su Mom suka dawo lokacin harya fara zuwa Office, hakan yasa duk suka kwantar da hankalinsu
*****Islam kam an d'auki lokaci bayan faruwar wannn abun,tariga tagane sun fita harkarta,hakan ya k'ara tada hankalinta,lokacin fa tunaninta ya fara dawowa,tashi tayi sosai tsaye da Addu'a kullun tanakai kukanta ga Allah,cikin lokaci k'alilan ta fara samun natsuwa da kwanciyar hankali,tasan duk abinda ya faru laifin Dad ne,tasan idan har aka barshi Allah kad'ai yasan abinda zai faru,hakan yasa tafara nazari akan abinda yafaru
Yaukam zaune take,tana danna computer dake gabanta,dan yanzu in tagama ibadunta,zata d'auko computer tana nazari akan abinda ta karanta
Ta ture system d'in tana tunani,yadda tasaka hannu akan aikin data fara akan zata rik'e gskiya,sannn tayi rantsuwa akan kare hakkin Al'umma,hakan yasa tafara tunanin yanzu duk wata sai taji alert amma babu aikin da takeyi,ta cire tagumin da tayi,afili tace"tabbas dole na fidda san rai,nakoma aiki,don gujewa cin Haram sannn kuma na fiddowa Al'umma Hakkin su akan Dad"lokacin natsuwa sosai tazo mata,dan tasan yadda ta d'auki alk'awarin yin gskiya idan ba Babanta bane kenan zata gurfanar dashi,hakan yasa tafara cire sankai azuciyarta

*****K'arfe biyar na marece ta isa,sai kuma take tunanin wajanda zata nufa,ta fara tunanin zuwa Hotel,lokacin maganganun Moh'd suke dawo mata akan bata dace da zaman kanta a hotel ba,ta kad'a kai,kenan ina zata nufa,wata zuciyar tace"gidan su Moh'd "Afili tace"a'a da wace fuska zan kallesu"

Mom ta girgiza kai,tace"tabbas yau Allah ya ansa Addu'a ta"
Islam tayi Hugging Mom"Mom nadawo gareki"

Mom tace"Laihat ki daina kuka"

Hajjo ta harare su"ai zamanin kenan,kanawa yara fad'a, yara suna maka fad'a arasa waye babba"

Moh'd har cikin ranshi yakeji,dakewa kawai yakeyi,haka Islam suka shige d'akin saidai kukanta baiyi tsanani ba,dan batason saka Laihat cikin damuwa,Laihat d'in cema ta dage tana bata hak'uri,akan yawan cin dangin Mom sunada shigar-shigula,Islam ta kad'akai,ta mik'e tana fad'in"kada ki damu,kitashi muje ayi mana Lallan"
Laihat ta kalleta,duk bataji dad'i ba,saidai Islam gaba d'aya damuwar ta ta b'oye, cikin zuciyarta kuwa tasan tabbas wannn kad'an daga cikin k'alubalan da zata shiga kenan

Laihat ta bishi baya,Islam ma ta bishi,A harabar gidan ya nufi motarshi,Islam ta tsaya ganin Laihat ta bishi,Laihat ce tamata magana akan tazo sutafi,tayi mata nuni da Car d'in Moh'd,batayi musuba,ta shiga gaban motar da Laihat ta bud'e mata
Moh'd ya zauna shima,Laihat ta koma gidan baya,haka ya tada mota yabar gidan
A hanya Islam tayi shiru,sai shida Laihat ne suke d'an fira tanayi mashi kwatancan wajan da zasuje,Moh'd ya kalli yadda take wasa da yatsun hannunta,yasa d'ayan hannunshi ya rik'o hannun,Islam tayi saurin d'agowa,dan tajima bata hau matar shi ba,yace"kin b'ata ranki ko?"
Islam ta kad'a kai alamar a'a,Moh'd yace"kinga Hajjo da inna ko?"
Uhm tabashi amsa,yace"duk k'annan kak'ar mu ne,duk yadda kika gansu d'ai-d'ai kune basuda fad'a ga tsegumi,sbd haka dole zakiyi hakuri"

Islam tace"ba damuwa"tana fita motar
Moh'd yana kallonta har ta shiga,yasa hannu yad'an doki sitiyarin motar yana Murmushi, shikam yarasa sadda zaiga Islam cikin farin ciki mai d'orewa,dan yanzu kullun gurinshi kenan
Bayan an d'auki lokaci da zuwansu,Moh'd yakira wayarta,Islam ta zaro ido dan yajima bai kiranta,ta d'aga,saidai takasa magana,Moh'd yayi ajiyar zuciya"idan kun gama,saiki kirani nazo na maidaku gda"
Islam tad'an rausayar da murya tace"insha Allah"
Moh'd yace"Hop bakida matsala?"dan yanason maido kulawar da yake mata kamar da,sbd yasan yanzu dole Islam tana buk'atar kulawar shi
Lokacin da Moh'd yakoma gida kuwa,anan yatadda rigima sosai su Hajjo dasu Inna anayi,sai Mom dake saka masu baki,saidai duk maganar su cikin yaransu na faransanci sukeyi,Moh'd ya fahimci duk kan maganar shida Islam ne,ranshi ya b'aci sosai,dan tuni soja ya had'e girar sama k'asa,ita Hajjo a dole saidai Moh'd ya auri jikarta,Mom dai jinasu take,Haidar ne yake masu magana kan bazai yiwuba
Moh'd yabi ta gabansu ya wuce,yana bin hanyar d'akin shi,Inna tace"ka maishemu saunaku kenan,kanajinmu zaka barmu wajan"
Moh'd baiko kulata ba,dan bayasan yiwa tsofaffin magana dan gudun kada suga kamar rashin kunya yayi masu
Ya jima a d'akin sai da aka fara kiran sallar magrib yafito,ya canza kaya,da alama wanka yayi,ya wuce masallaci daga can ya tafi don d'auko su Islam
Yana zuwa ya tadda angama,bai waniyi jiraba suka fito,sosai yayi mata kyau,har batasan lokacin da take kallonshi ba,ita kanta tasan zama dashi d'in yana sakata nutsuwa,Moh'd ya kula da ita shima d'in smiling yake

Anyi taro an gama,saidai basuyi walimaba,akabar Amarya da ango,yan biki washe gari duk suka fashe,sai yan nesa irin su Hajjo da su Aunty Niniy mutann katsina

v sai sanarwa ake da yad'awa,hakan kuma k'ara ba Islam kwrn guiwa yake

*****Rana bata k'arya,ayaune Islam zata fara kare gwamnati,tare da Al'ummar da aka zalinta,a higher court dake Abuja,daran ranar Islam babu bacci a tare da ita,tun 6 ta fito tana b'uruntu,bayan gama sallar ta,Mom tana jinta,saidai batayi mata maganaba,tana ganin 7 tayi tara tada mutann gidan,Moh'd kam lokacin da tayi mashi knowking dama yagama shirin shi

Abba ya kallesu sosai suka bugesu,k'arfe takwas na safe suka isa kotun,saidai Islam tafiyarta daban take da tasu, dan anan tabarsu takoma cikin y'an uwanta lauyoyi
K'arfe tara saura Alk'alai suka fara shigowa,ga y'an jaridu,duk Wanda yagani sai hankalinshi yatashi,ganin cewar ba k'aramar Shari'a bace
Kowa ya zauna,lokacin su Islam suka shigo rundunarsu guda,saidai su Ukku suka zauna gefen Alk'alan daga k'asan steps d'in lokacin ana jiran zuwan Masu laifin
Islam tulin takardune gabanta,ita kanta tana mamakin yadda sukayi yawan haka,jiniyar motar prison aka faraji,ko minyi 5 ba'ayiba aka fara shigo da masu laifin
Innnalllhi Islam tafara karantawa,ganin su gun run,gasunn gaba d'ayansu,sunkai su 15,cikin wani kayan gidan Yari blue,anata shigowa dasu,Dad ne a k'arshe,Islam hankalinta ya kad'u sosai,duk sunyi bak'i,ga alama suna shan wahala,wani kuka t fashe dashi,zuciyarta tana mata ciwo
Take tafara karanto Addu'o'e,dan neman samun dakewa,saidai duk yadda tayi k'ok'arin hakan taksa kuka kawai take
Ganin ta duk'ar d'akinta kan table din gabanta,yasa su Moh'd tada hankalinsu,Mom da Abba ne suka fara magana kan abin,Laihat tace"Yaya Aunty Kuka take,dama nasan bazata iyaba" tana maganar tna shirin yin kuka
Moh'd yasa hannu yana rik'e laihat,shikanshi yashiga tashin hankalin ganinsu Dad balle Islam, saidai a lokacin basuda mafita akan abin

Wani Babban alk'ali ya fara neman masu laifi,da masu kare su,dakuma Wanda suke kare masu hakkin
Lokacin Islam ta d'ago da saidai hawaye kebin,idanuwanta, ta mik'e tsaye tafara magana"Sunana Aysha kabir Tate,lauya mai wakiltar gwamnati"tana maganar muryarta tana rawa,sbd kukan da takeyi
Tashin hankali Wanda ba'a samashi rana,kowa na wajan kallonta suke,jin sunan Oga data fad'i,anan take aka kama hayaniya wasu suce yarshice,wasu suce a'a

Su Gun kuwa hankali ya tashi,saidai babu damar magana,sai lokacin suke tuna sadda sukewa Oga fad'an daya barta ta karanta Lawyer
Moh'd kam yad'an ji sanyi ganin tayi magana saidai ya damu akan kukanta,Hakane b'angaran su Uncle sani dake kukan zuci
Dad ya kauda kanshi daga kallonta, lokacin sauran suka gabatar da kansu,Alk'ali ya kalli wajan su Dad saidai babu wani lauya da zai wakilcesu,dan babu Wanda zai sa kanshi a maganar,balle gwamnati ce take magana
Alk'ali yafara neman wakillan Al'umma,Islam ta mik'e tana ba Alk'ali girma ta hanyar sunkuyawa,fuskarta tayi ja saboda kuka
Dai-dai lokacin wasu Lawyoyi suka zo dawasu folders suna ajewa gabanta
Islam ta d'auka tafara karanto laifukan wadanda ake k'ara,saidai duka case din sunan Dad ne,babu sunan yaran,hakan ya kara d'aga hankalinta"Malam Kabir ya kasance d'an siyasa mayaudari,mai b'ata tarbiyar dumbun matasa ta hanyar had'a su da muggan makamai tare da koya masu ta'addanci"tana maganar tana bud'e wani file"wannan gwamnati takeson a hukuntashi akan yaudararta da yayi na tsawan lokaci"ta aje takardar gefe"da yawan Mutann da aka kashe yanzu haka y'an uwansu suna neman hakkinsu "haka Islam tacigaba da D'auko takardu tana karantawa tana ajewa gefe,cikin kwarewa take maganar ta,sai dai dakyal maganarta take fita sbd tshin hanki
ta bud'e takardar gaba"tsohon ma'aikacin Costom yana neman hakkin shi na mak'udan kud'ad'e da su Malam kabir sukayi mashi fashi"
Islam tasa hannu ta goge zufar dake zubo mata,ta share hawaye,tayi tattaki tana mik'a takardun,ta dawo tacigaba"ya mai shari'a,bayan wad'an akwai takardar iyalan Chief justice akan kisan da akayiwa mahaifinsu,haka wani d'an majalissa yanason amaido kud'in da akayi mashi fashi,Wanda kud'in Al'umma"ta aje takardun,ta d'auki wasu"Dumbun jami'an tsaran da suka rasa rayukansu,shuwagabaninnasu suna shigar da k'ara"
Haka Islam tana zufa tana karnto d'umbin Laifin dasu Dad suka aikata,ga kuka saboda bak'in ciki,Wanda tsayawa baiyanawa cin lokacine,saidai wad'anda suke biye dani daga farko suna sane da ta'addancin da Oga yayi
Dad ya rud'e ganin yadda yar cikin shi take tozartashi a taron,danshi a ganinshi tozarci ne,wani bak'in ciki yakeji Wanda bai tab'a jin irin shiba,Moh'd kam lokacin hankalinshi ya kwanta,ganin Islam tanada alamar nasara,tunda har ta iya magana
Islam ta tsaya tsakiyar kotun tana bud'e takardar k'arshe"Islam Kabir Tate,tana neman bayani tare da neman hakkin ta kan kisan da akayiwa mahaifiyar ta"
Tauhfa,anan naga yadda ake surutun kotu,dansu kansu su Moh'd basusan zata saka wannn case din ba,Dad ya dafe kai yana hawaye,Alk'ali ya juya yana kallonshi,yana buga table dan samun sauk'in surutun dake faruwa
Alk'ali zaiyi magana Dad ya nuna Islam da yatsa cikin mamaki yafara magana"ke yanzu Islam nizakiyiwa haka,ni zaki wulakanta,nizaki k'ask'anta akan wasu,tabbas nayi Dana sani,nayi danasanin barin ki da nayi araye,da ace nasan haka zakiman,da ban barki kin kawo wannn lokacin ba,da nabari kin mutu kamar yadda mahaifiyarki tatafi,da nasan rayuwarki zata kasance mani matsala dana kashe ki da hannuna,kamar yadda mahaifiyar ki ta mutu

K,saidai abinda nake karanta yanada nasaba da injiniyarin,da kuma siyasa,anan fa ake yinta,zangon farko nafito da sakamako mai kyau,sakamako na kam na zango na biyu student har zuwa suke don ganin mai wannn Point d'in
Haka cikin lokaci students suka dawo san zama dani ko abota dani,saboda banada halin wulakanci,tsakani ga Allah nake koyawa duk Wanda bai gane darasiba,y'ay'an manyan masu kud'i da y'an siyasa duk sun zama abokaina,da yawan yaran masu hannu da shuni har kyauta suke man kud'i ko wani abin amfani,saidai hakan bai tab'a zuciyata ba,wani lokaci students suna Mamaki idan na basu labarin makarantar gwamnati nayi primary da scndry
Lokacin da na cika shekara ishirin da hud'u,lokacin muka gama University, nayi service d'ina,saidai komi na rayuwata inayinshi dai-dai k'arfina,ko shekara bamuyiba,wasu suka fara Masters d'insu,wasu kuma suka fara aiki,saidai yawancin masu aikin y'an masu hannu da maik'one,duk muka rabu nadawo,wani lokaci ina raka Babana kasuwa,wani lokaci kuma sabd rashin sabo saidai inyi zamana cikin unguwa
Nafara neman aiki saboda kyan result d'ina saidai inyita yawo babu alamar zan samu,gaya ban saba da sana'aba,sbd ban iya bama,saidai muyi zaune cikin unguwa muyi fira da wasu abokaina,Wanda su diploma sukayi wasuma daga scndry basu cigaba ba
Haka rayuwa tacigaba da tafiya,wata rana ina had'uwa da abokaina da mukayi makarnta,wasu sunata aikin su,hakan yasa na k'ara d'agawa kan neman aiki,dan yadda nake ganin wasuma nine nake taimakon su akan karatun lokacin da muna Makaranta,amma har sun fara aiki nikuma inanan zaune
Bayan shekaru biyu aikin kenan Neman aiki da zaman majalissa,mutashi daga ta safe muyi ta rana sannan mukoma ta dare,duk sbd rashin aikin yi,Yayana da yake bin Babana kasuwa shima d'in wata ranar baya zuwa,k'anena Sani kuma nayi mashi kwad'ayin cigaba da karatu duk halin da zamu shiga,hakan yasa Nauyi ya K'ara yiwa Babanmu yawa,abincima dakyal mukeci
Wata rana Mahaifiyarmu batada lafiya sosai,mu kaje asibiti,gaya aiki za'ayi mata,saidai bamuda halin hakan ga damuwa tana fama da ita,muka dawo Asibitin gwamnati,anan d'inma bamu samu kulawar kirki ba saboda bamuda Wanda muka sani,k'asarmu ta canza Al'umma suna shan wahala,masu kud'i sune kawai suke yadda sukaga dama,haka mahaifiyata ta kwashi kwanaki saida ta galabaita sannan likitoci suka zo dubata sosai,abin ya b'ata ranmu,ga Mama tanajin jiki,kafin ayi mata aiki Allah yad'auki abin shi,wannn abu ya harzuk'a rayuwata tare da bak'in cikin hakan,munyi kukan rashin ta sosai
Bayan shekara da rasuwata,harba hak'ura da neman aiki,zaman banza dai shi muka sa agaba,inason cigaba da yin karatu ba damar hakan,wata rana na had'u da wani Abokina,dakyal na iya ganeshi saboda yadda ya canza yayi kyau kud'i sun zauna mashi,SBD babnshi ma'aikacin gwamnati ne,lokacin Dana tuno har jarabawa nasha rubuta mashi abin ya k'onan rai,sai gashi harda dubu biyu yabani,wannn abu yak'aran bak'in ciki arayuwata da sauran abokan zama majalissata
Tunda fa mukaga haka,na tashi tsaye a majalisar nai ruwa nai tsaki wajan canza ra'ayinmu akan dole mutashi munemi kud'i kota halin yaya,dan abinda akeyi a k'asar mu abin yayi yawa,indai mutun baisan kowaba duk iliminshi yazama na banza,lokacin muka taru muka fara canza tunanin zuciyar mu
Dad yana zuwa nan wani sabon kuka yazo mashi,tare da yin shiru,dan yasan duk faruwar lamarin kenan,Islam kam dad'in labarin takeji duk da akwai k'unar zuciya,saidai jin maganar Dad ta k'arshe na canza tunanin zuciyarsu hakan yasata wani matsanancin kuka
Moh'd kam rik'e yake da ita,hannunshi ta bayanta yana rik'e da kafad'ar ta,lallashinta kawai yakeyi
Su Uncle sani kuwa kukansu yafi na kowa a yanzu saboda sunsan tabbas halin rayuwar da suka shiga kenan,saidai basuda sauran bayanin
Alk'ali ya lumfasa yana kallon sauran Abokan aikinshi,suma d'in rubutu kawai sukeyi,Alk'alin ya kalli Dad saidai yasan tabbas ya shiga rud'ani,shikanshi yaji tausayinshi,yace"Kotu tanason jin cigaban labarin,dan har yanzu baka yiwa kotu bayanin Rasuwar Mahaifiyar Brister ba"yana maganar ya maida hankali kan takardun gaban shi
Dad fuskarshi kukace sosai,idan ka ganshi bazaka tab'a cewa shine d'angayun Dan siyasar nan ba maiji da kanshi,yama kasa goge kukan,haka yake k'ok'arin cigaba
"Ba'a d'auki lokaci ba,wasu suka amince da shawara ta,bayan nagaya masu mufara d'aukar kayan mutane,sosai suka bani goyan baya,kamar wasa abu yazama gaske,babu Wanda yasani saimu,da muka fara d'auke d'auken kayan mutane a shaguna,shiga kasuwanni daddare,mu bud'e shagunan mutane,kud'in kawai muk'e d'auka bama d'aukar Wani abu dazai zamar mana lalura,dan lokacin Kud'ine matsalar mu
Lokaci k'alilan rayuwarki tafara canzawa,kullun cikin kud'i muke,nine nake bamu logic d'in yadda zamuyi wajan gudanar sa satarmu,kafin a d'auki lokaci,duk wani d'an k'aramin abu munayiwa kanmu,b'angaran sutura,kud'in kashewa,abinci,tare da taimakon mahaifanmu
Babana ya tambayeni saidai nace mashi aiki ne nasamu saidai bamai kud'iba,sosai,ana haka nafara tunanin komawa makaranta dan shine gurina,aikam bansha wahalaba nasamu,saboda wani danaba kud'i yasamoman Admission nafara karatun masters d'ina
Abin mamaki ina karatu muna sana'armu,ko shekara ba'ayiba,muka had'a group d'inmu mai girma,muka fara Fashi gidajan masu kud'i y'an siyasa da kuma ma'aikan gwamnati,saidai har lokacin ba'a gane muba
Munyi wani fashi gidan wani Dan siyasa,anan fa muka fito da mak'udan kud'i,Wanda mukanmu sun tsoratamu,wad'an nan kud'i sune sukayi sanadiyar kasancewar mu manya-manyan y'an ta'adda,Wanda dasune muka sayi kayan aiki makamai da kuma bindigu,lokacin wasu daga cikinmu harda abin hawa suka saya,nikam dama na jima da Mashin d'ina,lokacin ne muka sayi mota
Lokacin dana gama masters d'ina,lokacin munyi nisa,bamuda wani aiki da rana,shiyasa muka fara samun wani gida muna boyewa daga safe zuwa lokacin tashi aiki,hakan yasa aka fara tunanin da gske aikine mukeyi
Yanzu kam tafiya tayi tafiya munzama manya-manyan Y'an ta'adda saboda muna tafiyar da fashin mu tareda Ilimin da muke dashi,komi cikin tsari muke yinshi,da kuma nazari,hakan yasa kullun muke k'ara kwarewa,gaya nazama Oga wanda duk sauran nafisu kwarewa sabda ilimin dana fisu
A yadda muke ta'addanci bamu zuwa gida sai munsamo bayanai akan akwai kud'i inda zamu shiga,hakan yasa muka tara mahaukatan kud'i,nafara ba yarana trainning sosai tareda koya masu salo kala-kala
Mun shekara biyar a wannn barka babu Wanda yasan damu,gaya ina fita k'asashe don sawo makamai,lokacin nafara gudun kada nafara zargin kud'ad'ena saboda yanzu duk frnds d'ina neman abota dani suke,hakan yasa nafara tunanin mafita,hakan yasa na fara siyasa
Ga aure munason muyi,gaya nakawo mana ak'idar gujewa mutane saboda tsaro,wata rana yarana sukaje fashi,su Run anan yan sanda suka had'u dasu,Wanda shine karon farko da aka fara tsakaninsu da jami'an tsaro, saidai basuyi nasarar kamasuba
Lokacin nefa sukai ma FCP,tun lokacin bai zama CP ba,ruhoto akan su,saidai basuda wani cikakken bayani,kasancewarshi kwararran ansanda hakan yasa yatashi tsaye wajan bin cike
Ganin yafara bibiyarmu hakan yasa na ida tsunduma siyasa,a yadda asarmu ta Lalace indai kanada muami ko dukiya tabbas duk abinda kake aikatawa ba wanda xai iya magana
Nafara siyasa lokacin mukaje wani aiki a angaran siyasarmu,mukaje asar Niger,a wani gari mai suna *ZINDER (DAMAGARAN)*,anan nefa na Hau da mahaifiyar Islam,yarinya mai hankali natsuwa ga ladabi,hakan yasa nayi sha'awar Auranta,bansha wahala ba aka bani yarinyar batare da wani dogon bincike ba,sbd kui da nake dasu da gaggawa dana nuna masu
Lokacin bazata wuce shekara Sha shidaba,dan bata gama makarantar scndry ba,saidai nayiwa iyayanta alawarin barinta karatu,sosai nakeson Aysha sbd tsakani ga Allah naganta naji ina sonta,hakanne a angaranta itama,saida nayi sati biyu a garin sannn suka bani matata nataho da ita,lokacin nakoma zama Kaduna
Iyayan Aysha basu taa zuwa wajanda mukeba,saidai ni nake aukarta na kaita,sosai suka yaba da yadda na kular masu da yarinya
Iyayena basusan nayi aureba,sai daga baya nayiwa Baba arya akan iyar wani abokin siyasar mune ya yaba da halina yaaura auran batare da wani jan zanceba,sbd yadda nake yauta tamashi tare da sauran an uwanshi hakan yasa baiji komiba yayi fatan Alkhairi
Zamnmu lafiya da matata duk abinda takeso ina mata,hakan yasa ta yarda dani sosai,saidai nadaina fita gidanmu dake daji,saidai dasafe nake zuwa,hakan yasa bata taa lura da komi ba
Dad ya lumfasa,ya kalli Al'ummar cikin kotun,yana son gano inda yaga Abba,yace"Alhji Mansur tsohon ansan da daya jima yana farautarmu,lokacin ne wazon shi yasa aka ara mashi muk'ami,sannn aka aukoshi daga kano aka maidoshi garin Kaduna,kamar wasa yafara hao da bibiyarmu,saidai bansan yadda akayiba ya fara samun bayanai akan arana,danni kam ba'a ganina"
Kowa yayi shiru,lokacin Mohd da Islam suka ara maida hankalinsu wajanshi,sunason jin miyake son baiyanawa dangane da Abba
Dad yace"Abinda Alhji Mansur bai saniba,munyi kafuwa,munada kayan aikin da gwamnati batada su a lokacin,saidai gwamnati ta nuna mana yawa,saboda ita kanta kwamnatin lokacin sata nake mata,amma fa nafara tsana dakuma neman hanyar dazan kauda FCP dan shine mutumin da na tsana
Sadda mukayi shekara da Aure so Huu inakai Aysha tana gano dangin ta,hakan yasa basu damu akan sanin ina nakeba a Nigeria, saidai har lokacin bata haihuba,nikam a nawa angaran so aya nakaita,wajan dangina,saidai ni inje wani lokaci nakan ce ma su Baba aiki ya kawoni shiyasa banzo da itaba,ko ince taro mukazo
Bayan wasu an watanni Aysha tasamu ciki,kar kuso kuga murna wajena,kulawa sosai nake bata,ita kanta wani abun hanani take,sbd ban aje mata mai aikiba nine nake mata komi,sosai muke kula da cikinta, likita kam yaci kui wajane na dan duba lafiyarta,lokacin cikinta yana wata takwas na kwashe ta taje ta gano gida, ranar kamar kada su rabu da danginta,da kuka har mukazo Nigeria,nayi lallashi nayi amma takiyin shiru,saida aka fi sati kafin takoma dai-dai, da yawan lokaci muyita rigima akan tafison ta haifi Boy nikuma ince Girl
Wata rana yarana sunje fashi,har sun fito,sun nufo dajin da gidanmu yake,kamar wasa ashe FCP Alhji Mansur yana sane sannan kuma ya bibiyesu akan wajan da suke,saidai su yaran basuda masaniyar hakan
Washe gari Aysha ranar ne zata koma asibity wanda har lokacin haihuwarta yayi,cikinta yayi k'oto duk yayo k'asa,tanata shirinta hada saka kaya a basket, nikam ina shirina,ta kalleni saidai duk yanayinta ya canza, ban damuba dan a tunanina ko yanayin jikinta ne
Mun shiga mota, mun tafi asibityn,ina ajeta yaran sukaman waya akan inzo,motar shiga dajin na auka,har zan tafi sai kuma na koma Asibity,Asha ta gama,amma sunce daganan zuwa kwana biyu zata iya haihuwa any time
Aysha sai langwaeman takeyi,gaya dama tun da cikinta ya shiga 9month,likitan ya hanata zama ita aya,gudun kada nauda tazo mata,gata da ananun shekaru,dan shiyasama na yanke shawarar zan auko mata mai aiki
Ganin yadda take nafara yi mata dariya,ina saka kayan data kwasa a boot,sai kawai takama kuka,duk na damu,nafara lallashinta,gasu Zaid dake kirana dan lokacin Danger bai shigo group inaba
Hankalina ya tashi na yanki hanya ina tunanin idan naje nesa da gidan dajin zanyi parking sai in tafi a asa wajan su Zaid in
Haka nayi parking nace mata ta jirani,Na shiga wajansu Run,muna magana na gaya masu yadda zasu tsara abin da kuma yadda zamuyi da FCP Mansur
Tunawa nayi da ita,na fito na nufo motar,saina taddara ta fiddo kayan dake cikin basket in,na tsaya ina dubawa,ta auko wani baby towel tabani,tare da wani set na gyaran jiki,nace ya akayi,zatayi magana natafara jiyo arar harbi ta wajan da gidanmu yake
Hakan yasa na fara neman wayar Zaid lokacin hankali tace yake faiman FCP ne da tawagarshi,suma gasunan suna harbi suna gudu
Na juya cikin tashin hanakli na kalli Aysha ga tsohon ciki,na kama hannunta akan mu ruga,ina gaya mata harbinmu za'ayi,ai sai tasa azama itama,ta fara gudun,saidai gudun kaanne hakan yasa narasa yadda zanyi,na auketa,munyi tafiya mainisa munsha wahala,aysha sai nishi take,tace in sauketa
Sauketa da zanyi tare da dafe cikinta,ga harbi inaji nesa-nesa,na kuma kama hannunta ina mata sannu muka ara gudu,sosai nake janta,gudun ta ya k'ara ragewa Ahankali tafara fad'in ciwo takeji,tana shirin durk'ushewa, nima na tsaya INA dubawa,kawai saina ga jini duk ya wanke mata k'afa,ta dafe mara,ga wasu zafafan hawaye dake binta,sai salati takeyi a wannn lokacin,hakan yasa hankalina yatashi nagane haihuwace kuma akwai matsala
Aysha tafara kuka,lokacin wahala tayi mata yawa nasa towel din hannuna ina goge mata jinin,na rungumeta,saidai jinn yak'i tsayawa,lokacin tafara gayaman likitan yagaya mata akwai matsala idan jini yafara yo gaba,lokacin nafara kai kukanta ga Allah yadda nagaa Yar mutane kamar zata mutu,nasa hannu na kuma d'aukarta gudun kada su cin mana,munyi nisa sosai naji tana nishi da k'ok'arin sauka,gaya har lokacin inajin sautin bindiga
Ajeta da nake kan jaririyar ya fito,Aysha tanajin jiki,ko awajan jinine sosai,harta fara fita haiyacinta,nagigice sosai,nasa hannu na rik'e yarinyar,ga cibiya nabinta,na fidda abinda tabani,nasa wani cutter dake ciki nayanke,Aysha kam saidai ta juyakai gabas ta juya yamma,duk Wanda yaganta a lokacin zai tausayi mata
Yarinya tafara tsallara ihu,nasa towel na nad'eta,hannuna duk jini,na ajeta gefe,takoma takan Aysha jini yanata zubo mata,na rik'e hannunta ina jijjigawa
Ji nayi ana mugun harbi gab da inda muke,dan yadda muke ji kamar ana kusa damu,nafara cemata tatashi mugudu,Aysha bata jina dan batasan ina takeba,jinayi an yo harbi nayi saurin duk'ewa ina neman mafita
Lokacin babu yadda zani iya d'aukar Aysha tare da Jaririyar dake gefe,cikin sauri na yanke shawarar d'aukar yarinyar ina guduwa
Gaba d'aya kotun kuka kawai ake,Islam kam kamar ranta zaifita,Moh'd yaji tausayinta sosai,wannn wace irin rayuwace,Dad kuka yake sosai,Al'umma kan lamarin yayi masu zafi,Alk'alai sai al'ajabi suke

Dad ya aje dogon lumfashin da ya d'auko,tare da share zafafan hawayen dake fuskarshi ya cigaba da magana"Sosai na dage ina gudu saboda tsoron kada 'yan sanda su cin mani,ga jaririya hannuna,ita d'inma kuka takeyi saboda yadda nake gudu da ita,saidai zuwa lokacin nayi nisa dan na daina jiyo sautin k'arar bindiga,lokacin na fuskanci na na kusa zuwa baban titi,hakan yasa na tsaya ina tunanin abinyi,saidai nasha wahala sosai,sai shashsheka nikeyi,lokacin kuwa na fara tunanin matata dana baro cikin hali,wani tashin hankali ya k'ara shiga ta ga tausayin ta,na juya ina kallon wajan dana fito,sai lokacin wasu hawaye suke zubo man na tausayinta,na kalli yarinyar dake hannuna,inajin tausayinta,na k'ank'ame ta a jikina,lokacin naji banida wani k'arfi take na durk'ushe a wajan,ina wani kuka,sai dai tunowa danayi ina cikin had'ari hakan yasa nayi saurin zabura inbar wajan sai kuma na kalli jikina dake da jini,cikin sauri na jawo wayata,na kira wayar Zaid saidai bai d'auka ba,hakan ya tada hankali na dan nafara tunanin ko 'yan sanda sun samu nasarar kama su,na kira wayar Run a kashe,zaro ido nayi ina k'ara rungume jaririyar hannuna,ina kallon ta,ina neman mafita saiga wayar Gun,aikam da sauri na d'auka,ya tambayeni wajan da nake,nagaya mashi,babu wani b'ata lokaci sukazo da mota,don saidai kuma nayi masu nuni akan ina san d'auko matata,anan suka nuna man had'arin aikata hakan,saidai mubari idan k'ura ta lafa
Haka suka kwashe ni,tunda na shiga motar idanuna suke subda hawaye,har muka isa gida,na fara tunanin yadda zanyi da yarinya,su Run ne suke da k'arfin halin bani shawara,cikin sauri nayi wanka,na gyara jikina,nasaka ruwan zafi nayiwa yarinyar wanka,na fiddo kaya cikin Wanda muka aje nafara saka mata,su Zaid suna taimaka man,ina gamawa na d'auki yarinyar nakaita wajan likitan dake duma Mamarta,nayi mashi k'arya akn cewar munsamu sab'ani da mamar shine tana haihuwa iyayan suka tafi da ita suka bar man 'yata,sabada tambayar Mamarta da yayi,ya duba yarinyar tana cikin k'oshi lafiya yabani takarda da rubutun kalar Abincin da za'a fara bawa yarinyar muka dawo gida
Na bata madara bayan tasha ta daina kukan da takeyi, tayi bacci,lokacin nefa hankalina ya k'ara d'ugunzuma wajan yadda za'ayi naga Matata nasan halin da take ciki,na tada hankali sosai,na tura su Gun saidai babu wani bayani sa suka zo man dashi,haka na zauna wajan 'yata ina kula da ita har dare,to amma nafara tunanin dole nasamu wadda zata kula da ita nikuma na tashi tsaye wajan nemo mahaifiyarta
Da safe nasa Run ya je Kano,nace yaje wani k'auye yasamon mai kula da yarinyar kafin in samo Mamanta,haka kuwa aka yi,kafin dare har ya dawo da wata tsohuwa daya smo a k'auyansu,Anan itama muka gaya mata kamar yadda muka gayawa Likitan,tayi fad'a sosai tare da Allah wadai da iyaye akan barin jaririyar da sukayi,Agaba na ta sakeyiwa jaririya wanka Wanda har saida naji tausayin yarinyar ina ganin kamar ruwan sunyi zafi,lokacin take gayaman mahimmancin yin wankan da ruwan zafin,anfi awa sannan ta fiddata na nuna mata yadda zatayi amfani da sauran kayayyakin,muka gyara d'iya tsab na had'a abinci na bata,Matar ta d'auketa ta goya,lokacin nabar mata amanarta akan zan d'an fita
Tun dana fita cikin daran nima na fara neman Matata saidai fa banje dajinba,ganin yadda aka saka jami'an tsaro,haka nadawo na hak'ura
Washe gare kamar yadda muka kula yarinya haka muka k'ara yimata,nida wannan Mata,sosai na yaba da halinta,na tashi na fita Office,a can fa naji labarin abinda yafaru damu,ban nuna komi ba na shige anata magana,saidai abin tashin hankali sun fad'i cewar Yarinyar ta rasu,gawarta tana nan,amma anason gane ko suwaye,hakan yasa ba'a bari an fitar da labarinba,aiko minti Ishirin ban k'ara ba,na fito na shiga mota na nufi wani gidana,aranar nasha kuka kamar raina zai fita,nayi nadamar rayuwa,akan halin dana saka iyalina,nayi kuka sosai,nayi kukan rashin Matata saboda yadda nasaba da ita,amma na cutar da ita,ga yarinya ta da zata tashi cikin maraici,lokacin na kira su Zaid duka muka had'u nagaya masu,suma sun kad'u sosai jikinmu yayi sanyi,suka rink'a bani hak'uri,tabbas nasan duk wanda yatafi baya dawowa,hakan yasa na hak'ura
Mun jima muna jimami,na koma don ganin yarinya ta,d'aki na shiga da ita n rink'a maganganu ina kuka,ina bawa yarinyar hak'uri kamar tana jina,nayi kuka abinda ke kuka,nayi nadama sosai a lokacin,sannan kuma naji tsanar jami'an tsaro
Asali bansan yadda rayuwar Aysha ta kasance ba,abinda nasani nabar ta cikin wahala
Wannan Mata ita ta cigaba da kular man da yarinya,nikuma nayi bincike nagano tabbas Matata ta rasu,bak'in ciki sosai nayi,lokacin fa na d'auki duk wata soyayya na aza akan jaririyar,yariyar da ta d'auko kama da Mahaifiyarta sosai,lokacin na sakawa yarinyar sunan mahaifiyarta ta,ina kiranta da Islam"
Hankalin kowa ya tashi,Islam ta saka kuka jin cewar tabbas itace yarinyar,Moh'd kam wani abu keyi mashi yawo a wuya saboda tashin hankali,jama'a duk aka juyo ana kallon wajan da Islam d'in take
Alk'ali ya kalli Dad,yana sauke tabarin dake idonshi,yace"Malam Kabir,kotu tanason jin yadda akayi bayan kace kayi nadama,kuma aka sameka da cigaba da aikata laifin,munason ka tak'aita"
Dad ya kuma kallon yadda Islam take kuka,yafara magana"duk wata kulawa naba yarinya ta sosai,duk inda nasan zan nemo masu kula da ita inayi ta yadda nasan Asirinmu bazai tonu ba
Mun jima bamu wani aiki kamar mundaina,saidai idan na tuna narasa Matata uwar 'yata abin yana k'ona zuciyata,an d'auki lokacin bansan ta yadda akayi F
C
P yafara zargi na ba,Wannan zafin da naji na abinda jami'an 'yan sanda suka yiman,shine dalilin dayasa muka koma aikin mu akan ramuwar abinda sukayi mana,a lokacin muka fara kisan jami'an tsaro,duk wani case muka yi tsaye,muka cigaba da sawo kayan ta'addanci Wanda ko gwamnati iyakar abinda zata iyayi kenn,farko muna yi kamar d'aukar fansa,har muka koma idan mukaje fashi mutun yayi gardama na basu umarnin kashewa,kamar wasa ko shekara ba'ayiba muka lalata k'asarmu,gaya Muna aiki da Ilmi hakan yasa tunaninmu yasha Babban dana jami'an tsaro, dan ba kowane yake da ilmin yarana ba,ga dabaru da muke dasu
Yarinyata ta fara wayo sosai,bata tare da yunwa ko rashin kulawa ba,dan saina tabbatar da anyi mata wanka da aikna nake bata abinci kafin in fita,Babban abin da yake d'aga man hankali,ta yadda zan fuskanshi Iyayan matata da Maganar,sai daga baya muka yanke shawarar k'alesu tunda basusan inda zasu neme muba,haka kuwa akayi,tunda yarinyar tayi wayo nake yawo da abuna,saidai su Gun sun nunaman k'alubale na yin hakan,tana isa sakawa makaranta nasaka ta,lokacin da zata firamare ne,na fidda ta k'asar waje tare da wata mata,wadda nasan zata iya kula da ita,nine nakai su dakaina,saida nayi sati Ukku a can,ranar dana barota na dawo gida nayi kuka sosai na rabuwa da ita,gudun kada yarinyar ta taso da d'abi'una ko ta taso ta fahimci kalar halin da nake shine dalilina na kaita k'asa she daban-daban dan karatu,tunda na fiddata bata tab'a wata biyu a Najeriya ba,saidai ni nake zuwa wajanta,sai yanzu ne data gama Masters Degree d'inta akan b'angaran Law,wannan shine"
Alk'ali yace"Malam Kabir nasan mutane zasuzo suji sauran bayanai ta b'angaran iyali ko wata mata da kayi bayan rasuwar Matarka"
Dad ya gilzija kai,yace"tun bayan rayuwarta ban k'ara Aure ba,saboda banson yarinya ta ta fuskanci sharrin kishiyar Uwa,sannan ina tsoran matar dazan aura zata iya gane sirrinmu"
Alk'ali yasa hannu yana rubutu ya maida tabaran a idonshi yace"wane k'alu bale ka fuskanta lokacin Siyasar ka saboda rashin Iyali"
Dad yace"Abokan siyasa ta,gwamnati da sauran wad'an da suka sanni babu wanda yasan banda Mata,hakama dangina,wanda bayan faruwar hakan da shekaru Allah yaiwa mahaifina rasuwa shima bai sani ba,nace masu na fidda su waje ne acan suke zaune saboda karatun yarinya ta,duk lokacin da zanje ganin Islam,ina cewa zanje wajan iyalina ne"
"Yaya kayi zama tsawan shekaru batare da iyali ba?A matsayin ka na cikakkan namiji"
Dad ya fashe da kuka,yadda Alk'ali yake mashi irin wannan tambaya mai kunya acikin taro kuma gaban 'Yar shi"Haka nayi zamana,tunda nake ban tab'a aikata zina ba,asali ma yarana ina masu hani akan aikatawa,dan ko miyagun kwayoyi ban basu goyan baya ba,hakan yasa cikin su ko Sigari babu maisha sai yara Ukku da nakawo bada jimawa ba" 
Alk'ali ya jinjina kai,ya juya yana kallon sauran Alk'alan dake gefenshi,lokacin su rubutu suke yi,ya maida hankalin shi kan sauran Al'ummar dake cikin kotun yace"Kotu ta gamsu sannan kuma ta aminta da bayanai da kuma maganganun Alhaji kabir,saidai Kotu tana neman Hukumar 'yan sanda k'ark'ashin jagorancin C
P Alhaji Mansur,da ta shirya domin kawo bayanan yadda suka samu Aysha matar Alhji Kabir, a zama na gaba"
Dad ya d'aga hannu tare da neman umarnin barin shi yayi magana da 'yar shi,ko wani 'dan uwan shi,Alk'ali ya d'anyi nazari kafin yace"Kotu bata bada damar ganinka,ko kayi magana da wani a matsayin ziyara ba,har zuwa wani lokaci,saboda haka wannan kotu ta d'age wannan zama zuwa biyu ga watan Mayun shekarar da muke ciki,tare da bada umarnin komawa da masu laifi gidan Yari har zuwa wannan rana"Alk'ali yana magana yana buga tebur d'in gaban shi,gaba d'aya wajan aka mik'e tare da fad'in"Kooootuuuu"
Sai lokacin Islam ta samu damar sakin wani azabeben kuka mai sauti,Moh'd ya kama hannunta,Uncle Sani Alhji Sama'ila,Abba,Laihat duk sukayo kanta suna bata hak'uri,su d'inma kuka suke sai lokacin nakula da Haidar da Khulsum wanda sai bayan an fara shari'ar ne suka shigo kotun
Mom ta kalli Moh'd, tana goge fuskarta,tasa hannu ta rik'e hannunshi Moh'd ya kalli Mom,Mom tace"bani ita"tana zama kusa da ita,Mohd ya d'an bata waje,Mom tace"Islam kiyi hakuri kitashi muje gida"
"Mom Babana ya cutar dani,ya cutar da Mahaifiyata,tayiwa duniya k'arya kala-kala,ya zalinci Al'umma yanzuina zanga dangin Mamana,taya zan ganesu?Haba Mom miyasa Dad bai tuba ba tun wuri,saima yak'ara akan abinda yake yi"ta mik'e tana goge hawaye, ta matsa gefen Abba dake magana da Haidar,ta rik'e hannunshi" Abba ka yafe man,nayi hauka lokacin da nake tunanin kaine ka kashe mahaifiyata kamar yadda mahaifina yaman k'arya"
Abba ya kalleta,yace"Islam kinyi Alk'awarin zaki cire damuwa aranki,kince kin daina kuka amma miyasa yanzu kikeyi,bayan kinsan tabbas abubuwa zasu faru masu kamar haka"Ispam ta fara ajiyar zuciya,Abba ya cigaba"Yanzu Addu'a zakiyiwa Mahaifiyarki"
Moh'd yafara tafiya,saboda yadda Sojojin shi suke tsaitsaye,sannan kuma bayason sugane tsantsar damuwar da yake ciki,hakan yasa Abba yabasu Umarnin fita daga kotun,dan sai lokacin sukaga babu kowa,har an tafi dasu Dad,sai 'yan tsirarun mutanan dake kallonsu
Sai dai fitar su bakin kotun hakan yaba dayawan 'yan jaridu damar neman bayanai daga wajan Islam,Islam dama ta san tabbas haka zai kasance batayi musuba taja ta tsaya suna mata tambayoyi akan halin data shiga kafin fara shari'ar mahaifinta,Islam tace"Alhamdulillah,kowa yasan dole zan shiga tashin hankali,kafin hakan, saidai gab zamu fara Shari'a nasamu Kwarin guiwa,bayan farawar kuma naji bazan iyaba saidai nayi duba da irin d'unbun Al'ummar da ake nemarwa hakkinsu,shine ya k'aran kwarin guiwa"
"Islam kin kasance 'Yar tsohon d'an fashin da aka jiman ana farauta,har kin shigar da k'ara akan kina san sanin rasuwar mahaifiyarki,wane dad'i kikaji jin cewar na mahaifinki ya kashe Mamaki ba?"
Islam ta share hawayen dake gangaro mata,tabbas tasan sunan d'an fashi bazai gogu ga Babanta ba,tace"wane dad'i kuma,idan bashi ya kashe taba,ai ta dalilin sana'arshi tarasa rayuwarta,bayan nan kenan zanji dad'i sauran Al'ummar da Babana ya kasance sanadiyar rasa rayukansu?kwata-kwata banji dad'i ba"tana maganar tanason tafiya,suna k'ara biyota,Moh'd yana mota yake kallon su,itama d'in tagaji,so take kawai tasamu keb'ewa tayi kukanta,da sauri tayi motar dasu Laihat suke,tana shiga akaja motar sukabar wajan
Jingina tayi da kujerar gabanta,idanuwan ta suna zubarda hawaye,tabbas tasan kuka bazaibar idanuwnta ba,wata hanya suka nufa sab'anin gida,Islam batayi magana ba,sai da suka tsaya bakin wani waje sannn ta kula restaurant ne sukazo
Suna yin parking kowa ya fito,Laihat ta ruk'o hannun Islam,restaurant d'in babu kowa,sai su Moh'd dake magana da ma'aikatan wajan,lokacin duk suka nemi kujeru suna zama,kowane da tables d'in su,Abba dasu Uncle sani,sai Mom itada yaranta mata,Laihat,Islam da Khulsum
Table din gaba dasu anan su Moh'd suka zauna shida Abbakar da Haidar
wasu table nesa kad'an yaran Moh'd ne
Islam dai kallon kowa take,duk yadda takeso idanta ya daina zubar hawaye takasa,sai tuno maganganun Dad d'inta take,ta kad'a kai tana cije leb'o,Mom ta kalleta,Islam saita saka kuka,Mom tace"Haba Islam kizama mai tawakkali mana,ki yadda da k'addara,duk abinda kika ga yafaru,ko ya samu bawan tabbas abin rubutacce ne daga Ubangijin sammai da k'assai,Ubangijin da babu wani sarki saiki"
Islam tasa gefen mayafinta ta goge,ta d'auki kwalbar ruwan gabanta tana sha,ta aje ruwan,Moh'd ya kallonta,aka fara aje masu abincin gaba d'aya batason cin abincin,haka Mom ta dage mata dan dole ta ci,sai dai bada yawa ba,haka suka gama cin abincin abincin Moh'd ya mik'e yana dawowa table d'insu,yasa Tissue yana goge bakin shi,wajan kujerar ta ya d'an tsaya yana kallon yadda idanuwanta sukayi ja ya duk'a wajan kunannta"tashi muje"
Islam ta kalli Mom,Mom tayi saurin kauda fuskarta,Islam ta d'aga ido tana kallon Moh'd, Moh'd ya mik'a mata hannu alamar ta taso,Islam ta mik'e ba tare da ta bashi hannun ba,ja yayi baya yana nuna mata hanya,babu musu tabi bayan shi,sai lokacin Mom ta juyo da fuskarta ta
Wajan motar shi ya nufa,yana ansar key daga wajan drivern shi yayi masu umarnin su tafi a Hilux d'in su,ya juya ya bud'ewa Islam mota,ta shiga ta zauna,shima d'in ya gewaya hana zama,ya tada motar su ka bar Restaurant d'in
*Muna fama da matsalar hasken wutar lantarki,saboda haka chji yana man wahala,kuyi hakuri da wannn*

41
Gudu yake sosai a mota,Islam kuwa kuka kawai take,Moh'd sam baya san kukanta,ya rage gudun ya juyo yana kallonta,Islam kam ba tama san yana kallon ta ba,Moh'd ya rik'e sitiyarin da hannu guda,yasa hannunshi na dama yana ciro hannunta daga fuskarta da take goge hawaye,Islam ta kalleshi sai kuma ta fashe da kuka,Moh'd yace"Islam Islam kiyi hakuri "dan yasan a lokacin hak'uri kawai zai iya bata,dan babu kulawar data wuce hakan,zuciyarshi tana harba mashi,da ace an d'aura auran su,tabbas lokacinne zata samu duk wata kulawa daga wajan shi,Islam idonta zubar kwalla kawai yake,Moh'd ya saka hannu Aljihu ya mik'a mata hankici,ta ansa,ya maida hankalinshi sosai kan tuk'i dai-dai lokacin da suka isa gida tana ajiye mashi hankicin,Moh'd ya shiga da motar,Lokaci guda suka bud'e suna fitowa,cikin gidan suka nufa,a falo Islam ta fad'a kan kujerar tana cire hular dake kanta,Moh'd ya shigo gidan,kwata-kwata bayasan ganin kukanta,ya bud'e firij ya d'auko ruwa, a cup ya zuba mata,yana bata,ya zauna kujerar dake kusa da tata
Islam ta ansa ruwan dan tanada buk'atar su,dan yadda zuciyarta take mata,Moh'd yace" Dan Allah ki daina yawan kukan nan"
Islam ta aje kofi,ta jinjina kanta da kujera,tana sauke lumfashi,tasa hannu ta rik'e hannunshi"Moh'd miyasa ka boye man,asalin labarin mahaifina,miyasa baka gayaman ba,har kasa na fara zargin Abba akan wanda ya kashe Mamana"
Moh'd yaja doguwar Ajiyar zuciya"Yanzu duk wannan ya wuce,ni bansan komi ba akai,sannan duk wannn labarin da Dad ya bada babu Wanda na sani,sai na rasuwar Mamanki"
Islam ta kalleshi"Moh'd shi Dad miyasa zai ma Mama haka bayan d'unbun soyayyar da sukewa juna"
"Islam kiji abinda ga fad'i Wanda ke kanki kin tausaya masu,yana gudun nemanta dan kada asirinsu ya tonu"
Islam ta bud'e baki zata k'ara magana,Moh'd ya dakatar da ita ta hanyar fad'in"idan Har ba'ayi hakan ba kenan Allah bai tsara abin acikin littafin mu ba"
Islam tayi shiru na d'an lokaci sannan ta ce"yanzu INA zan samu dangin Mamana,Dad yayi kuskure ya cutar dasu na rashin zuwa gaya masu,yanzu Allah kad'ai yasan halin da iyayanta suke ciki akan rashin ta"tana maganar tana kuka,Moh'd yace"kibar kukan, insha Allah zan taimaka maki wajan ganosu,sannan indai a Niger suke,kinga kenan Mom tasan ko ina,nemo garin bazai yi mana wahala ba"
Islam tace"Amma inaso ka taimaka man mu nemo su kafin shiga Shari'a ta gaba"Moh'd ya kalleta"bai kamata musaka sauri cikin wannan lamarin ba"
Islam tace"wannan ba sauri bane,asali shine mafita,na fiso anemo dangin Mamana,zuwa lokacin ayi Shari'a a gabansu,wannan shine zai tabbatar da cewa tabbas yarsu ta rasu"
Moh'd ya jinjina kai,yasan hakan shine dai-dai"hakan yi,sai su Abba sun dawo sai in gaya masu"bai ida magana ba,suka jiyo k'arar tsayuwar motar su,bajimawa Suka shigo gaba d'ayansu,Islam ta janye hannunta daga nashi,Moh'd yad'an mik'e,yanayiwa su Uncle sani sannu da dawowa,Abba ya zauna yana kallon Islam da har lokacin kuka takeyi,ya kalli Moh'd yace"ka bata ruwa kuwa?"
Moh'd yace"eh munyi magana da itane akan tanson nemo dangin Mama kafin lokacin shiga Shari'a tagaba"Abba yayi mamaki,Alhji Sama'ila yace"Haba Islam mubi abin ahankali"
Moh'd ya kalleshi,tare da fad'i mashi huggojinta,kowa ya jinjina mata,Mom tace"ki kwantar da hankalin ki,za'a samesu,matsala d'ayace da Alk'ali bai bada izinin wani yaje wajan Dad ba"
Moh'd yace"wannn ba matsala bane,ni zanje inyi magana dashi"
Haka suka cigabada magana,kafin kowa yatashi yayi hanyar d'akin shi don hutawa,saidai ita ba hutawar take buk'ata ba,saboda kuka takeyi,Laihat ta cigaba da Rarrashinta
Moh'd kuwa yana shiga d'akinshi,wanka yayi tare da fitowa ha shirya,tun a falon ya kira wani waya yana fad'i mashi yanason Magana da Alk'ali ne,bajimawa aka had'a su,sun jima suna magana,Moh'd yayi mashi bayanin komi,Alk'alin ha lumfasa"Babu komi GM zaka iya zuwa kuyi magana dashi"
Moh'd kam dama yasan babu Wanda ya isa hanashi ganin Dad saidai yanason bin doka ne,kamar yadda Wanda bashida mulki ko kaki zai iyayi,wanan kuwa shi ne horan da Mahifinsu yayi masu
Moh'd ya fito,Babu kowa falon sai masu aiki,ya shiga wajan Mom yagaya mata zai tafi wajan Dad,Mom tace adawo lfy,Moh'd ya fice
Saidai kafin ya isa wajan a gidan Yarin har sojojin shi sun isa,baiyi mamaki ba,sabda yafad'i Office cewar zaije,Haka suka gyara wajan,aka daina zirga-zirga,Moh'd ya fito daga mota duk suka nufo shi
Kai tsaye aka bud'e mashi gate d'in, suka shiga,anan ma'aikatan suka gaidashi,tare da akai shi wani falo ya zauna,lokacin aka fara kawo mashi drinks saidai baisha ba,Babban ma'aikacin Prison d'in ya iso,Nan suka zauna suna fira da Moh'd d'in kafin ya mik'e yana sara mashi,Moh'd yayi murmushi yace"nidai kasa kawon shi da sauri"
Prison Officer yafita,anan yatafi da wasu yaran,Dad yana zaune shi d'aya a d'akinshi,saidai d'akin k'ara mine sosai,idanuwanshi sun k'ara jemewa saboda kukan dayayi akotu da kuma bayan dawowarsu
Jin ana bud'e k'ofar yazo bakin k'ofar hana tsayawa,ma'aikatan suka fiddo ankwa suka saka mashi, suna nuna mashi hanya,duk masu laifin suka fara lek'owa suna kallonshi,dan wajan da aka ajeshi waje ne na musamman,dan ya share hawaye,wni bak'in ciki yana zo mashi,saidai babu yadda ya iya, Dad yasan cewar ba'a bada izinin ganin shiba,dan dama Islam ce yaso gani,saboda kewarta da yayi,falon da Moh'd yake zaune aka nufa,Dad ya fara ganin Sojoji,hakan yasa hankalinshi yatashi saidai bai kawowa ranshi Moh'd bane
Moh'd yana zaune,lokacin ya jawo wata jarida yana karantawa,aka shigo da Dad,shikan Moh'd saida yaji fad'uwar gaba balle Dad wanda ya zaro ido,yani yaro ya cirewa Dad sark'ar da aka saka mashi a hannu,tare da juyawa
Dad yayi saurin kauda fuskarshi,Moh'd ya mik'e tsaye yazo wajan shi yana kama hannun shi alamar yazo ya zauna,Dad sai Lokacin yaji wani kuka yana k'ara zo mashi,ya zauna,yana rik'e hannun Moh'd, Moh'd yad'an rage tsawan shi yana fad'i "Dad ina yini"
Dad ya kauda fuskar shi,ya juyo ha kalli Moh'd "tabbas kai d'ane Moh'd, nasan ka cika mutumin kirki,Moh'd har rayuwata ta k'are bazan tab'a mantawa da halarcin dakaman kauda mahaifinka ba,tun kafin inkai wannn lokacin kuke neman kamani,Allah bai baku ikon ba,nasan da kun kamani tun farko da shari'a zatazo man da sauk'i dan banyi ta'addanci kamar wanda nayi ba,Halarci na Biyu 'Ya ta Mohd,Moh'd 'Yata"yana maganar yana rushewa da kuka,Moh'd ya had'iye wani k'ulu dake yi mashi yawo,da kyal ya iya bud'e baki" kayi hakuri Dad wannan hukunci ne na Allah"
Dad ya cigaba"inason Yarinya ta,inason Islam fiye da tunanin ka,saidai nasani Shari'a bazata tab'a barina tare da ita ba,Moh'd tunda nazo gidan nan tunanin rayuwarta kawai nake,saidai godiya ga Allah da ta fad'a a halin Alhji Mansur,tabbas nasan Babanka mutumin kirki ne,zaiyi iya k'ok'arin shi wajan ganin farin cikin Islam,duk lokacin dana tuna Islam mace CE,wata rana zatayi aure,ina kuka sosai,dan nasa zata koma hannun mijinta,wanda banida tabbacin kasan cewar ta cikin farin ciki "
Duk dauriya,da cijewa irinta Moh'd saida idanshi ya ciki da kwalla,yace"Dad insha Allah Islam bazata tab'a shan wahalar rayuwa ba"
Gilgiza kai Dad yayi"Na makaro,na makaro,tun lokacin da ka nemi auranta na hanaka,dana baka nasan Islam zata zama cikin zuri'ar mutanan kirki,amma lokacin idona ya rufe gani nake banida mak'iyi kamar mahaifinka,da kai kanka,sai yanzu ne nake ganin tsantsar soyayyar da kuke man Moh'd "
Moh'd yace"Dad ka daina wannan maganar Dan Allah"
"Taya zan daina,nasan Islam zataji dad'n zama da 'yan uwana,saboda ban tab'a muzguna masuba,saidai babban kuskuran da nayi na rashin had'ata da dangin Mamarta"
Moh'd yaja ajiyar zuciya"Dad dama wannn shine Babban dalilina na zuwa nan,inason sanin yadda zamuyi musamu iyayan Mama da kuma Address nasu"
Dad ya saki hannun Moh'd da yake rik'e,ya sa hannu kan fuskarshi,yana kuka tsawan lokaci sannan yad'ago"ban tab'a tunanin zakamn irin wannan halarcin ba,zuciyt tana man k'una ina ma ace kai d'ana ne"Moh'd ya kalli Dad yace"Haba Dad tabbas ni d'ankane,kenan har shakku kakeyi"yana maganar yana rik'o hannun Dad yace"ni d'anka ne kamar yadda Islam take 'yarka"
Dad ya girgiza kai,yasan babu wanda zaiso ace d'an shine,Islam ma da take 'Yar shi yasan tana dana sani,saidai baiyi magana ba,Moh'd yace "zamuje tare da su Uncle sani,kace a Niger ne ko"
"eh a Zinder (damagaran)"Dad yayi maganar yana ida bashi sauran bayanai akan yadda zasu gane gidan
Moh'd yace" shikenan nagde Dad" 
Dad yace"ni ya kamata nayi maka godiya kaida mahaifin ka"
Moh'd ya mik'e zai tafi,Dad yana kuka sosai yana zubawa Moh'd godiya, har sukazo bakin k'ofa,saidai anan suka samu ma'aikatan wajan,hakan yasa Dad ya tsaya,suka maida mashi Ankwa,suka koma ciki dashi,Moh'd kuwa ko juyowa baiyi ba,ya fice suka baro wajan
Gida ya nufa saidai bai shiga ba saida ya tsaya masallaci yayi sallar magrib sannan ya shiga,duk suna zaune falo amma band,Islam dan ko fitowa bata k'ara yi ba
Mom ta kalleshi "kadawo kenan"nadawo Mom,insha Allah gobe zamuje zamu wuce,sai ki gaya ma Abba"
Mom tace"gobe gobe?"
Moh'd ya lumafasa"Mom yanzu Islam yakama duk abida takeso muyi Mata hakan zaisa ta daina tunanin ta gasa gata"
Mom tace"Haka ne k'arfe nawa zaku tafi?"
Moh'd yayi driya yace"Mom ai kece k'afar tafiyar,kinga bamusan hanya ba"
Mom tayi dariya"to kaga kenan saika biyani kud'in aiki"
Moh'd yayi dariya yana mik'ewa,zaiyi magana Abba da su Uncle Samaila suka shigo,Mom tace"yauwa gama su Abban nan"
Abba ya zauna,Moh'd yaga masu yadda akayi,Abba yace "shikenn Allah yakaimu gobe"
Uncle Samaila ya jinjinakai,yace"to Amma koni ko Uncle Sani wani zai tafi gida,sai atafi da d'aya"
Moh'd yace"sabda mi Uncle"
Uncle sani yace"kaga tun jiya mukazo,yakamata wani yakoma gida,kada abar gida ba kowa"
Abba yace"wannn hakane"

Hajjo tace"kai ai dama dashi nasan da yayi farin ciki"

Islam ta mik'e itama,Hajjo Maram ta kalleta,ta zaro ido,tayi saurin rik'e ta,ta kalli Mom tace"wannan ma d'iyar kice"
Gaba d'aya suka kallesu,Hajjo Maram kuwa kama tagani sosai da d'iyar ta Aysha,Mom tace"Hajjo d'iya tace"
Hajjo Maram tace"yo ai wannan ita tayo gida sosai"
Gaba d'aya kallonsu suke,Islam gabanta sai harbawa yake,Hajjo Maram ta juya saidai jikinta duk ya mutu
Sun d'anyi magana kad'an Abba yace"kunga  ikon Allah ko,muna neman  wani gida Allah yakawo mu gida kuma"
Hajjo tace"wallahi kuwa wannan tafiya tayi riba,tunda ita tayi fushi ta gujemu"
Malam Bukar yace"wallahi ita kanta hankalinta ba kwance yake ba,wannan rashin lafiya tawa ita ta hanata zuwa gidan"
Mom tace"to ai tunda munga gida mu mun rink'a tahowa gaida iyayanmu"
Islam ta dawo gefenshi ta zauna,da alamun tambaya tare da ita,Moh'd zaiyi magana,Islam tasa hannu tana mintsilin hannunshi,ya janye hannun yana kallonta,ahankali tayi mashi magana"wai ba nan bane ko"Moh'd yayi smiling dan yasan ta k'agara taga dangin ta,yace"Hajjo wai gidan Malam Bukar muke nema,ance anan ne"
Hajjo Maram tace"to ai ga Malam d'innan,indai anan layin ne ai shi d'aya ne"
Hajjo ta katseta da cewa"kai Mahaifin wata Aysha da tayi aure a Nigeria fa"
Malam dake kwance cikin razana ya juyo,Hajjo ta zaro ido, dan kwata-kwata batasan  Susan da labarin d'iyar su ta b'ata ba,Hajjo tace"Aysha"tana zaro ido,sai kuma ta fashe da kuka
Malam yace"Haba Hajjo miyasa zaki tado mata wannan maganar,miyasa?wanan dalilin yana d'aya daga cikin abinda yasa Maram bata son zuwa garinku,dan bataso kusani kuyi mata gori saboda tasan halin wasu daga cikin dangin ta
"
Gaba d'aya hankalin su yakoma kan hajjo Maram  data tsugunne tana kuka,Hajjo tace"kuyi mana bayani,mu abinda muka fito nema kenan,gidansu Aysha"
Lokacin hawaye sun zubo ma Malam Bukar yace"tabbas nine mahaifin ta,Maram itace mahaifiyar ta,Dan Allah ko kuna da labarin 'Yar mu ne?"
Islam tayi saurin kallon Hajjo Maram da Malam,Moh'd yace"malaam wadda tayi aure Nigeria fa,kuma an dad'e"
Hajjo Maram tace"kai mudai raban mu da tamu  Ayshai anyi shekara ishirin  da Hud'u kenan"
Ai dukansu suka kalli juna,"wallahi Nan ne"duka suka had'a baki
Moh'd ya juyo yana kallon  Islam dake kuka,jin yadda suke bada bayanin   Mahaifiyar ta,hannun shi yasa yana rik'o hannunta
Hajjo Maram tace"ita Aysh ita take bima  Yunus,bayan dawowarmu nan,nahaifeta,Hajjo shekarar ta sha shidda  muka aurar da ita ga wani d'an Nigeria,sunan shi kabiru,mai kud'ine,matashi a lokacin
Islam ta rushe da kuka,Malam Bukar yace"farko yana kawota mu gaisa,hakan yasa hankalin mu  ya kwanta da shi,saidai ko shekara Ukku da aure basuyi ba,bamu k'ara jin labarin 'Yar
"
Hajjo tayi salati tana fad'in"na shiga Ukku Islam Ashe ke 'yata ce,wayyo ni Hajjo kaico na"
Mom tasa Hannunta tan ruk'o hannun Islam dake wajan Moh'd tace"shikenan kuka ya k'are 'yata"
Moh'd ya rik'e ta gam,Abba yace"Alhaji Sama'ila kayi shiru,kaga ikon Allah ko?wanan itace K'anwar  kakarsu Moh'd kuma ga alama itace mahaifiyar Aysha "
Kafin Uncle Sama'ila yayi magana,Malam Bukar yace"wai kunsan Aysha ne?"
Mom ta fidda Hannun Islam daga na Mohd hawaye  nabin idonta,ta kama hannun Hajjo Maram dake kuka,ta had'a dana  Islam tace"wannan itace jikarki d'iya  ce ga Aysha"
Ai Malam dake cikin rashin lafiya,saidai mukaga ya tashi zaune yana fad'in"wai mi kuke fad'i ?"
Abba yace"D'iyar ka Aysha ita ta haifi wannan yarinya da kake gani"
Malam da Hajjo Maram gaba d'aya suka rik'e Islam,Islam ta k'ara wani kukan,Malam ya kama kuka Hajjo Maram tace"wai INA kukasan wannan labarin?ina Aysha?"
Malam yace"tabbas akwai kama mai tsanani tsakanin 'yata da wanann  yarinya,amma ina Aysha"
Islam ta k'ara fashewa da kuka mai tsuma zuciya,Mom da Laihat ma kuka suke,Hajjo kam,salati kawai take,dan tasan ba k'aramin wulakanci tayiwa Islam ba
Islam ta d'ago kanta,tana sharar kuka da majina,tace"Malam 'yarka ta rasu sanadiyar sana'ar mahaifina,Hajjo miyasa bakuyi  bincike ba kafin Ku bada auran 'yarku?"
Ta rik'o hannun malam dake kuka,Hajjo kam wata k'ara ta saki,tana dafe kai,Malam yace"'yara ta rasu?"
Islam kam daurewa kawai take tace"malam miyasa kukayi  saurin Aminta da mahaifina,kuka bashi 'yarku ba tare da bincike ba?"
Malam ya fashe da kuka,mai tsuma zuciya,Hajjo Maram tace"hasbunalllah yanzu Aysha ta rasu?"
Islam ta rushe da kuka,tana fad'awa  saman Hajjo Maram, Malam ya koma ya jingina da bango yana salati,yace"wa zai kira man Yunus gidanshi yaji cewar k'anwarshi ta rasu"
Kowa ya tausayama tsohon,k'annan mom ne yace ayi mashi kwatance,haka suka zauna cikin jima mi,da kuka,musamman Hajjo Maram,ko minti goma ba'ayi ba saiga ya sun dawo tare da Yunus Wanda shine Yayan Aysha,sosai yaji bak'in  cikin rashin jin Yar'uwar shi,saidai lokacin yana Yaro babu yadda za'ayi yace zai fita nemanta,dan shi kanshi lokacin da abin ya faru bai cika shekara Ishirin ba
Ganin mahaifan shi na kuka ya zauna yana tambayar Malam abinda yafaru dan bai jima da fita daga gidanba,Malam yabashi labarin cewar 'Yar Uwar shi ta rasu,shima yayi kuka sosai
Malam ya kalli Abba yace"taya kukasan Aysha da kuna rasuwarta,shi kuma Kabirun yana ina"
Abba ya kalli Moh'd yace"d'anka Moh'd ne zai gaya maka yadda akayi,saidai duka nan cikin mu babu Wanda yasan Aysha,Kabiru bamu tare dashi a yanzu saidai Yayan shi Alhaji Sama'ila gaya nan"
Malam ya maida hankalin shi kan Moh'd"d'ana kabani  labarin yadda kasan Aysha,"Moh'd ya gyara zama tare da fad'in"kamar yadda Abba yace,hakane babu Wanda yasan Aysha a cikinmu,saidai Islam wadda itace d'iyarta" Moh'd yana magana ya sauke ajiyar zuciya lokacin yafara basu labarin had'u shi da Islam a Malaysia tun daga fad'an su har fara soyayarsu,kalar tsoran da take yiwa jami'an tsaro dakuma hanyoyin da yabi wajan fidda mata tsoran
Moh'd ya d'ora da basu labarin yadda mahaifin Islam yakeji da ita,wanda  harda labarin mak'udan kud'in motarshi daya bata saboda bayaso  ayi mata wulak'anci,duk wasu abubuwa da suka faru saida ya fad'a a wajan
Moh'd ya sauke ajiyar zuciya, yasha ruwan dake hannunshi,sannan ya cigaba da fad'i masu abubuwan da suka faru lokacin da suka dawo daga Malaysia har lokacin da yaje yaga mahaifin Islam,lokacin ya  yagaya masu yadda Baban Islam yak'i amince mashi
Moh'd bai mata komiba cikin abubuwan sa suka faru,haka ya gaya masu dalilin hanashi d'iyar da akayi,Moh'd bai tsaya ba,saida ya zo labarin kama Dad da yayi
Hajjo da Malam kuka suke Sosai,jin irin ta'addan cin da Kabiru yayi,Islam kam dama tasaba da kukan,A hankali ta d'ago kanta tace"Malam Yaya ya b'oye maku wani abu,bai baku labarin irin halarci da kulawar da Abba da Mom sukayi Mani ba,bai gaya maku yadda Mom da Abba suka maidani  kamar 'Yar suba,lokacin da kowa ya gujeni,lokacin daya kamata su Kansu su gujeni"tana maganar tana kuka
Malam kuka kawai,yace"yanzu kenan 'Yar mu tarasu  Baku gaya mani yadda akayi rayuwarta ba"
Abba yace"mukan mu babu Wanda yasani,saidai zaman kotu da akayi ne Alhaji kabir ya baiyana mana labarin rayuwar shi har zuwa rasuwar Aysha"Abba ya yi maganar tare da basu duk labarin da Dad yabada a kotu,tare da bai yana Alhaji Sama'ila da matsayin shi ga Dad
Sun sha kukansu sosai,Abba yace"to bayan fitowar  kotune ita Islam ta ta matsawa Moh'd tanason ganin dangin mamarta, wannan dalilin ne yasa muka shirya muka bi kwatancan da yayi mana har muka zo nan"
Hajjo Maram tace"Allah mai iko,Allah yajikan Aysha,yasa Aljannace makomarta,ke kuma Islam Allah yabaki juriya da hakurin  k'addarorin rayuwarki"
Malam yace"kenan sunan Aysha yasaka mata"
Mom tace"eh Amma yana kiranta Islam "
Malam ya kad'akai,yana goge hawaye"dama wannan abin rubutacce ne,Allah ya rubuta sai wannan abu yafaru damu,saidai mu yafaru damune  duk sanadin rashin bincike"
Abba yace"wannan gaskiya ne"
Hajjo tace"oh ni wai Ashe  yarinyar nan Ahalina ce,na d'auki tsana na aza mata,hada gori nike mata,yarinya mai kirki ga ladabi,amma duk bana gani,sai hantara"tasa hannu ta rik'e Islam "dan Allah kiyi hakuri wallahi bansan hakaba"
Hajjo Maram tace"haba Hajjo miye abin ban hakuri"
Hajjo tace"ai ke kanki dole in baki Hakuri, duk rikici da mukayi na dangi,duk nafi muzanta maki,gaya kina bani girma na,saboda baki san  rikici kika matsawa mijinki kuka bar mana garin"
Hajjo Maram ta jinjina kai"abar tada wannan magana komi ya wuce"
Hajjo tace"ai daga yau na bari,yanzu gaya naji kunya gaban yara k'ananu"
Mom tace"Allah ya shige mana gaba"
Islam ta mik'e daga jikin Abba ta koma kusa da Moh'd ta zauna,kowa kallon ta yake,Moh'd ya kalleta Murmushi fal  fuskarshi,sab'anin fuskar  Islam dake d'auke da hawaye,ta kalleshi Moh'd ya mik'a mata hannu,ta kauda fuskarta,Laihat tace"Aunty kinga ikon Allah ko"
Islam tace"Laihat kema na gode da gudunmawar ki"
Hajjo tace"kudai  yaran nan Allah yasa babu Wanda ya d'auko wannan halin,nidai ga inda nawa fad'an yakaini"
Moh'd yace"oho dai,Saidai akwai alamar shi ga Islam"
Islam ta galla mashi harara,Mom tace"kar kayiwa  'yarta k'arya"
Moh'd yace"wallahi ba k'arya bane,keman dan bakiba yadda take masifa daniba a Malaysia"
Kowa yayi dariya,Malam yace"haka Allah yake da ikon shi,yanzu gaya cikin lokacin mun had'u,ita rayuwa haka take,sai muna hakuri da junanmu,sannan muna sakawa kanmu tsoran  Allah da kuma hakuri da abinda Allah ya k'addara mana,mu guji sharrin  zuciya da gugayan shawarwarin da zuciya zata bamu,Allah ya tsare mu da sharrin  zuciya
"Amin" suka ansa,Malam ya koma ya kwanta,sunayi mashi sannu,Moh'd yace"wai Malam wane irin ciwo ne?"
Malam yace"kasan jikin tsufa,tsaitsaye massara ke damuna,sai hawan  jini"
Moh'd yace"kunje Asibiti ne"
K'anan Maman Islam Kawu Yanus yace"eh har asibitin ya kwanta,kwana biyu da aka sallamomu,aida  baya iya komi,yanzu magunguna aka d'ora shi kai"
Haka suka cigaba da fira,malam da Hajjo Maram sun jima suna jimamin rasuwar Aysha,saidai yau sunyi hamdala samun cikakken bayani,sunyi gidiya da Allah yasa ta haifi Islam,koba komi zata rink'a d'ebe masu kewar yarsu,duk da akwai ciwo cikin abubuwan da suka faru
Hajjo tace"kai Yunus ka sa ayi masu abinci mun tasa bak'i gaba sunyo doguwar tafiya,bamu basu ruwa ba"
Kawu  Yunus yace"ai na fad'i masu suna can suna girkawa"
Abba yace"ni sojojin dake waje nake ji ma"
Moh'd yace"ba damuwa,yanzu za'a nemar masu masauki ne kawai"
Hajjo Maram takalli Islam tace"to ke  kika koma man wajan Ango kikayi zaune
"
Islam ta sunnar da kanta jikin Moh'd godiya take ga Allah dayasa ta kasance ahalin su Mom tabbas tasan mutanan kirki ne,yau tanajin tarage kashi arba'in cikin d'ari na damuwar ta
Laihat tayi dariya tace"dama saida suka gama kishin su da Hajiya sannan muka taho "
Hajjo Maram tace"Allah sarki Hajiya,nasan idan taji labarin nan zai tsuma zuciyarta"
Moh'd y fiddo wayar ya nason  kiran,sai lokacin ya tuna da babu netwks,saboda ba'a Niger suke ba,yace"nikam zanso  kiran Haidar in fad'an mashi"
Kawu Yunus yace"kayi amfani da layina"
Moh'd yace"kada mu cinye maka kati kawu"
Ya mik'a mashi waya,Moh'd ya ansa,ya saka number Haidar tajima tana ringing sanan  ya d'auka,yana sallama,Moh'd yace"wai ko tsaran  d'auka kake"
Haidar yace"haba Yaya nida nasan kun tafi Niger ina  ganin kiran nasan kune"
Moh'd yace"finally mun samu abinda mukeso,saboda haka bari in baka wata tsohuwa  Ku gaisa"
Haidar yace"Hajiya CE ko"
Moh'd yace"ko wacece dai kaji"yana maganar ya mik'awa Hajjo Maram waya,ta kanga tana magana,sosai suka gaisa,tana tsokanarshi,saidai ansa mata kawai yake,dan baisan ko wace ce ba,sukayi bankwana,Moh'd ya ansa yace"wayar kawun mu ce,kada acinye mashi kati,ka kira"
Haidar ya kashe saidai kiran yana shigowa,Moh'd ya d'auka, Yace"yaro kasan dawa kayi waya?"
Haidar yace"a'a"
Moh'd yace"Hajjo Maram ce
"kafin ya ida Laihat ta anshe waya,tafara bashi labari,Haidar ya kama murna yana jin dad'i,yace"wai da gske kuke"
Hajjo ta anshe wayar"kaji ja'irin Yaro k'arya za'ayi maka"
Haidar yace"aike hajjo kinji matsalar ki"
Hajjo tace"to duk dai matsala ta ta kare,yau naba 'yar uwata hak'uri"
Haidar yace"to Allah ya tsare ya kara had'e kanmu"
Moh'd ya anshi waya,suka cigaba da magana,lokacin wasu yara suka fara shigowa da Kuloli manya na abinci,anan Laihat ta cig a ma madai-daicin kicin d'in ta d'auko plates da cokulla ta kawo
Haka sukaci suka sha hada lemu kala-kala Kawu  Yunus yasa aka kawo masu,Islam dai babu e bare a'a,sai tsakurar abinci takeyi,Hajjo Maram ta nuna masu 'Yayan Kawunsu Yunus,sannan  kuma Aysha tana da k'annai  mata Ukku suna gidajansu
Islam tace"kawu  amma za'a maimu wajansu"
Kawi yace"sosai ma kuwa"
Mohd yace"ai yau zamu juya"
Islam tayi saurin kallonshi,sarai ta gano shi,Abba yace"to ai saika tashi ka tafi"
Islam tace"Abba ka barshi,gani yake kamar zanji wani abu,ai ni indai tare da Mom ne banjin  komi dan nasan ina  tare da Mamana"
Taba kowa tausayi maganar ta,tasa Hannu ta goge hawaye ta ci gaba"koda ace ban tabbatar ni ahalin Mom bace,nasan ko gaya mani akai dole na samu kwanciyar hankali,amma yanzu na rage dayawan  damuwata,Babana kawai takeji,Babana yayi mani gata sosai,saidai yanzu nasan baya cikin farin cikin da naji a zuciyata,amma nasan ko yayane idan yaji wannan labarin zaiji dad'i shima"tana maganar tana kwantawa jikin kafad'ar Moh'd, Moh'd yasa hannu ya d'agota
Islam ta d'auke kanta,ta kalli Malam da Hajjo Maram tace"Dan Allah Hajjo Da Malam Ku yafewa mahaifina laifin da yayi maku"
Malam ya jinjina kai,saidai hawaye yakeyi yana tunanin soyayyar dake tsakanin Islam da Babanta, Hajjo tace"tabbas kin samu kulawa wajan mahaifin ki"
Islam tace"tabbas duk Wanda yaga kulawar da mahaifina ya yiman dole yaji tausayin halin dana  shiga,saidai bak'in cikina duk kulawar da yabani akwai Haram a cikinta"
Mom tace"wai ban hanaki wannan maganganun ba?"
Abba yace"kada in k'ara ji"
Moh'd ganin ba abincin bane gabanta,dan ya lura bata ma ci abincin ba,ya d'auki chokalin ya d'ebo abincin zai kai mata ga baki,Hajjo Maram tace"to a gaba na kuma"
Islam ta tura cokalin tace"Yaya bata kada kasa kishinta ya motsa,naga tana fara had'e gira"

44
Hajjo Maram tayi dariya,laihat tace"ni fa bacci nikeji"
Abba ya kalleta,saidai hankalinshi yana kan Moh'd da Islam dake magana,Abba ya kad'a kai,gaba d'aya yanzu kamanin su yake d'an gani,Moh'd ya kalli k'anan Maman Islam wato Kawu Yunus yace"kawu Dan Allah muje akai yaran nan,masauki suna waje"
Yana maganar yana mik'ewa,Kawu Yunus ya tashi shima,suka fita tare,Moh'd ya shiga mota,shida Kawu,suka bar Unguwar sojojin na binsu abaya,masauki suka samar masu,hard nasu mayayi booking,saida Moh'd ya tabbatar sunci abinci sannan yabarsu,sukuma suka dawo
K'arfe takwas nadare suka shigo gidan,Laihat da Islam sun tafi gidan Kawu Yunus d'in dayake babu nisa duk cikin unguwar ne,Moh'd ya shigo su Mom suna falo suna fira da su Hajjo,zama yayi yana masu sannu da gida,Hajjo Maram tace"toni mizan girka maka"
Moh'd yace"banacin girkin tsofi"Dariya sukayi,Mom tace"kai bakasan tsoffi sunfi iya girki ba"
Hajjo Maram tace"barshi ai bai saniba,gobe ni zan mashi girki yaji"tana maganar tana jawo kular abincin dare da aka kawo masu,Moh'd yace"Hajjo kibar abincin nan nifa banajin yunwa,Hajjo tace"barshi ai shi yakaji a jikinshi"
Zaiyi magana su Islam suka shigo gidan,Moh'd so yake yaganta,da yanason gane yanayin ta,dan bayason ganin ta cikin damuwa,Islam ta kalleshi,ta kauda kai,Mom tace"kun gaido Aunties d'in naku ko?"
Islam tace"eh sunce agaidaku,dasafe zasu shigo su gaidaku"tana maganar tana Jan trolley bag d'inta da aka shigo masu dashi
Brush ta d'auka,zata fita,Hajjo Maram tace"kije ciki akwai band'aki"
Islam tace"Sai zan kwanta ai"
Laihat tace"Hajjo nuna man wajan kwana na"
Hajjo tayi dariya tace"k'urya zaku kwanta"
Laihat tace"nifa Hajjo bazan kwanta saman gadon k'arfe ba"
Dariya sukayi,Hajjo Maram tace"kedai so kike ki haye mani katifa"
Islam tace"katifar da ta tsufa"
Hajjo tace"ai kin fi katifata tsufa yarinya"
Islam ta kalli Moh'd tana dariya tace"wai Yaya kaga wani abu da aka bamu gidan kawu,wai musha"
Moh'd ya kalleta"miye?"
Islam tace"kamar Kunu,wai d'angwadagwab"
Moh'd yayi wata dariya,dan sunan ma dariya yabashi yace"me?"
Hajjo tace "shine baki sha"
Mom tace"yarinya da kin k'ara kuzari,sai kin kai gobe da rana bakiji yunwa ba"
Laihat tace"amma dana sha naji akwai dad'i"
Mom tace"Ke baki shaba?"
Islam tace"Wallahi Mom daga sunan shima zaki gane ba dad'i "
Hajjo tace"ke tafi can,ai gakinan kamar kara"
Sukayi dariya,Mom tace"a'a d'iyata rama tayi,amma da tana da kumarin ta"
Moh'd ya kalleta,tabbas yasan ta rame, duk da dama ba k'ibarce da ita ba,Moh'd ya mik'e "bari in tashi,inasu Abba suzo mutafi mu kwanta"
Hajjo tace"suna d'akin Malam suna fira"
Moh'd yace"to kada in katse masu firar"
Islam taja trolley d'inta,ta shige bedroom d'in Hajjo,sosai tayi mamakin yadda d'akin yake a gyare,kamar bana tsohuwaba,komi tsaf,an saka mata kaya na zamani,bata cigaba da mamakin ba,tunawa da tayi gidan kawun ta da sukaje,dagani gidan ma'aikaci ne,duk da ba girma gidan yake dashiba saidai ginin Zamani ne
Islamta aje kayan,ta shiga toilet d'in ta watsa ruwa tayi brush,tazo ta kwanta,saidai bata jimaba,bacci ya d'auke ta,saboda gajiyar da sukayi,Laihat ma ta shigo tayi shirin baccin ta,su Mom kuwa sun dad'e suna fira sannu Hajjo takaisu wani d'aki suka kwanta
Washe gari Hajjo ta tashi tanata hidimarta,aikin bak'i kawai take, doya take soya masu da kwai
Islam ta fito,lokacin tayi wanka,dan har tara tayi,ta saka doguwar rigar atamfa ta aza d'an kwalin akai,tasame ta a kitchen d'in,tana zaune kan kujera,Islam ta tsaya bakin k'ofa,daga zaune take aikinta,Islam ta gaidata tana fad'in"sannu Hajjo,shine baki tada mu,mu tayaki aikin ba"
Hajjo tace"haba kuda kuke cikin gajiya"
Islam taja kujera ta zauna,tana jan kujerar tana d'aukar spoon ta juya Omelet d'in,Hajjo ta tsaya tana kallonta,gaba d'aya komi na Islam kalar na mahaifiyar ta ne,Ita kanta Islam d'in tunani kawai take
Islam ta d'ago ta kalli Hajjo tace"Hajjo kibani labarin Mamana"
Kafin Hajjo tayi magana Moh'd ya shigo gidan yana sallama Hajjo ta ansa,Islam kuwa jitayi bataso zuwan shiba,dan taso jin abinda ta tambaya
Moh'd ya nufi wajan Hajjo,har k'asa yana gaidata,Hajjo tace"wai harka tashine,kamar ba tafiya kukayi ba"
Moh'd yace"haba Hajjo,niba raggo bane,da k'uruciyata inta kwanciya"yana maganar ya kalli Islam, Islam d'in ma shi take kallo"ina kwana Yaya "
Bai bata ansaba yace"ina wayarki? "
Islam tace"na barta a d'aki"tana maganar tana mik'ewa,Hajjo tace"wato yazo shine zaki sakarman aiki"
