Wajan k'arfe d'aya na rana ta dawo gidan,saidai Mom batanan sai Abba dake zaune da wasu bak'i a falon,Islam ta gaidasu tana shigewa,Abba yace"Islam wad'an nan sune likitocin da suka duba Mamanki lokacin da muka taho da ita"
Islam ta zauna tana k'ara gaidasu,Abba yace"gobe ne zamu tafi legos d'in,shiyasa na nemesu yadda tafiyar zata kasance"
Itadai Islam tasan cewar Moh'd yace bazata je ba,to amma tana son k'ara ganin mahaifinta,batace komiba tanaji suka gama magana suka fice,anan ta zauna taci kukanta kamar ranta zai fita,sai marece Laihat ta dawo daga skul
Moh'd kuwa ranar bai wuni gidaba sai dare ya dawo,lokacin tana kwashe wa Mom kaya da aka kawo na guga,tsayawa yayi yana kallonta,Sam baya san taje kotun dan bayasan tashin hankalinta,saidai yasan tabbas dole saida ita d'in,wannan dalilin yasa baiso ta saka kanta a shari'ar ba
Zama yayi yana kallonta,ta juyar da kanta,Moh'd ya kalli Mom yace"Mom har dake za'aje legos d'inne?"
Islam ta aje tsagaita abinda take,ta na saka kayan a hankali cikin wadrop d'in,Mom tace"to bandai sani ba,sai Abinda Abban ku yace"
Moh'd ya jinjina kai"jirgin tara na safe zamu ni,dani da Islam da Laihat"
Wata ajiyar zuciya ta sauke,har suna jiyota,Moh'd ya kalleta,Mom tace"ai banda Laihat za'a,dan exms gareta"
Moh'd yace"toafa,ai ban saniba,zan yi waya a cireta,in yaso sai mutafi tare dake,su su Abba da Haidar jirgin 12 zasubi"
Islam ta d'auki wayarta tana fitowa tabar masu ,Mom ta bita da kallo tana Murmushi,tace"wai kaga yarinyar nan tana san zuwa amma saboda ka hana shine bata maganar"Mohd shima Murmushi yayi,suka cigaba da magana
****Tun takwas suka saka kayan su a mota,suka nufi airport,sai Abba ya hana Mom zuwa dan kada abar Laihat ita d'aya a gida,Daga Moh'd sai ita sukayi gaba,sai Yaran shi dake take masu baya
K'arfe tara girginsu ya d'aga,babu jimawa suka isa legos,lokacin suka tsaya jiran Wanda zasuzo tarar su
Moh'd ya kalleta yana mata Murmushi,dan ya hango Mufeeda dake tahowa,Islam tace"wai ya akayi?"
Moh'd yace"kalli gabanki"
Islam ta juya,zaro ido tayi lokacin dataga Mufeeda,nufar ta tayi tana rungumarta a hankali ganin cikinta daya d'an fara fitowa,Islam tace"wai Ashe zakuzo"
Imam yace"wallahi kuwa,bamusan da tafiyar ba,sai jiya Moh'd yake gayaman mushirya"
Islam ta kalli Moh'd dake yiwa wani soja magana,sosai taji dad'i, ta maida hankalinta kan Mufeeda tana fad'in"sannu Frnd"tana d'an kallon cikinta
Mufeeda ta harareta,tace"yarinya zaki sani ne"
Moh'd ya matso yana fad'in kizo muje,wasu Had'add'un motoci aka zo d'aukar su dasu,ga jiniya dake tashi,haka suka nufi Hotel d'in da zasu sauka,lokacin suka fahimci Moh'd yagama masu komi na Booking d'in d'akuta
Su Abba ma sun ido hada Uncle Sama'ila,da Kawu Yunus,Islam ta sha Mamaki,ta je tana tarrarsu,ta na tambayar Kawu Yunus Hajj,yace tana lafiya
Da marece sosai Moh'd ya kirata waya akan ta shirya su fita,Islam tace batajin dad'in jikinta,dan lokacin jikinta yayi mata sanyi,Mufeeda kam ta fahimci hakan,Moh'd bai takurata ba yabarta
****Kotu ta cika mak'il da mutane,Islam ta sha mamakin ganin yadda kotun ta cika dan a tunanin ta tunda ba'a Abuja bane,mutane ba zasuje ba,sai lokacin Islam ta k'ara tabbatar wa kanta gaba d'ayan Nigeria ne case d'in Mahaifinta yaje
Duk wasu Abokan aikinta suna wajan,su Moh'd ma duk sun zaune,Alk'alai ake jira da kuna su Dad,Islam tana gefen Mufeeda a mazaunin su na Lauyoyi,kayan jikinsu su duka na Lawyoyi ne,tayi jigum tana sauraran ikon Allah, wannan lokacin tana jin sauk'in abinda takeji,amma akwai bugawar zuciya,da yawan Al'umma kallonsu suke,kowa so yake yaga Islam wadda ta b'oye San zuciya ta fito da laifin Babanta,ta k'are al'umma
Ji tayi ana mata magana a bayanta,da sauri ta juya tana kallon mai maganar,wannan Guy d'in ne,Wanda tayi zama Hotel bayan barin ta gidansu Moh'd,daya lik'e mata,saidai bata kula shi,dan baisan barin ta Hotel d'in ba
Islam ta d'an saki fuska ta gaidashi,tana tambayarshi aiki,yabata ansa,saidai kafin tayi magana shigowar Alk'alan suka dakatar dasu,hakan yasa ya koma wajan zaman shi
Ko minti Ukku ba'ayi ba,saiga su Dad an shigo dasu,kamar kullun Dad ya k'ara ramewa sosai,yayi duhu,Islam ta kalleshi ta kauda kai,shi kanshi baza ido yake yaga inda zaiga Girl d'inshi,suna had'a ido tayi saurin sauke idonta k'asa
Haka aka sakasu wajan tsayuwar masu laifi,Alk'ali ya fara magana,wani rijistara ya gabatar da k'ara,Alk'ali y Kali mutanan kotun tare da basu bayanin inda shari'a ta kwana
Islam ya nemi lauyoyi,wajan karan ma Islam ce ta mik'e ta gaba tar da kanta,da sauran abokan aikinta
Alk'ali ya kalli su Dad yace"malam kabir ko kuna da wani lauya a wannan zaman da za'ayi?"
Dad ya kad'akai tare da fad'in A'a,Islam taji tausayin mahaifinta sosai,Alk'ali yace"a bisa zaman da mukayi na satittikan da suka wuce,kotu taji bayanai daga bakin Malam kabir,Wanda gwamnati take k'ara da yaranshi,yanzu munason Ganin FCP Alhaji Mansur,da yazo yaba kotu labarin yadda suka tsinci Mahaifiyar Aysha kabir,wato matar Alhji kabir"
Abba ya mik'e yana isa gaban kotu,ya tsaya wajan da aka tanada dan tsayawar shedu yace"kamar yadda Alhaji Kabir yaba kotu bayanin waje da kuma rana,da lokacin da ya tsare yabar Matar cikin ciwo,sakama kon jami'an hukumar 'yan sanda dake binsu,to adai-dai wannan lokacin kuwa nine nake aiki a wanann yanki,lokacin da mukabi sawunsu,anan muka samu Matar tana jinjiki,ga jini yana binta,dan har lokacin bata daina zubar da jini ba
Haka muka d'auketa batasan ina kanta yake ba,wasu suka nufi cikin gari da ita,dan saurin ceton rayuwarta,yayinda nikuma na cigaba da neman masu laifin tare da yaran,saidai tsawan awanni bamu samu kama suba
Haka muka hak'ura muka Bari wajan,Asibiti muka nufa dan ganin wannan marar lafiya,dan aganina idan muka samu ceto rayuwarta,tabbas zamu samu duk wani bayani dangane da Masu laifin
Lokacin da muka isa wajan taimakon gaggawa,dai-dai lokacin wani likita yazo yana mik'awa yarana wasu takardu tare da basu tabbacin rasuwar ta"
Gaba d'aya kotun kowa yayi shiru,sauraran Abba kawai suke,Abba ya cigaba"anan nasaka bincike tare da neman dalilin rayuwarta,Anan likitan ya sheda mani haihuwa ce tazo bata da gardama,sannan kuma ta rasa jinin jikinta,saka makon jinin data zubar dayawa"
Abba ya d'auki wasu takardu ya mik'a wa Alk'ali tare da fad'in"wannan sune takardun da Likitan yabani akan binciken da yayi"
Alk'ali ya karanta,ya mik'awa sauran abokan aikinshi,yayi rubutu tare da kallon Abba yace"Alhaji kabir katu tanson jin yadda gawar Aysha ta kasance"
Abba yace"bayan Likitan ya tabbatar mana da hakan,lokacin ne muka tafi da gawar aka aje wajan aje gawa,wato Matuware,hukumar 'yan sanda ta bada shedun hotunan gawar ta,tare da rubuce rubuce"Abba ya mik'a takardu
Yacigaba"mun jima muna bincike,saidai mun b'oye wannan labari dan ko jarida bamu sanar masuba,saboda munason mukama masu ta'addancin nan
Saida gawar tayi sati biyu a hannun mu,saboda muna son samun koda 'yan uwan tane,ko kuma mijin Matar zai nema amma bamu samu wani bayani ba,sanan aka yanke hukuncin rufeta,kamar yadda addinin musulunci ya tanada,nine na jagoranci yimata sutura da sauran abubuwan da musulmai da suka rasu suke buk'ata,saidai duk da mun rufeta bamu daina bincike a b'oye ba har aka d'auki tsawan lokaci" 
Islam tana hawaye,tanajin soyayyar Abba tana k'ara shigar ta jin shine yayiwa mahaifiyarta gata
Haka Abba yayi bayanin shi,kotu tabashi damar komawa mazaunin shi,Alk'ali ya kalli Islam yace"Aysha Kabir,kinji yadda akayi Mahaifiyarki,ta rasa rayuwarta"
Islam dake tsaye hawaye na binta,ta d'aga kai,ta juya tana kallon Dad Wanda tausayin ta ya mamayeshi
Alk'ali ya juya yana kallon wani ma'aikacin kotu,yayi mashi magana akan yagama tattara duk wata dukiya ta hannun Alhaji Kabir,kotu ta gabatar da duka abubuwan da Alhaji Kabir ya mallaka,da duk wasu kaya da aka gani Wanda kotu ta buk'aci ak fad'i,anan Alk'ali ya rink'a bayanin su
Islam ta ta nemi izinin yin magana,Alk'ali ya bata dama,tace"Ya mai girma mai shari'a bisa ga dukkanin hujjoji da shedu da suka gabata,ina rok'on wannan kotu mai adalci,tayi duba ga mutane da aka yiwa fashi da kuma ta addanci,duk Wanda aka samu kayan shi,ko kud'in shi batare da an tab'a ba,kotu ta yi Adalcin data saba wajan mayar wa masu dukiya dukiyarsu,wadda kuma ba'a samu,ma su itaba,kotu tafimu sanin yadda zatayi da dukiyar"
Islam tana maganar tana kuka,Dad d'inta yana bata tausayi,tasani sarai kotu bazata barshiba,ta zauna kan kujerar tana kuka
Alk'ali yace"wannan kotu ta amince da bayanin Islam,sannan ta bada Umarnin maidawa mutanan da aka tabbatar da dukiyarsu ce Kansu,san kotu tanada izinin cigaba da bincike dan gani masu dukiyar,dukiyarsu da ba'a samu mai itaba kotu ta bada umarnin sakata a Baitil Mali"
Gaba d'aya kotun surutu aka farayi,yadda Akayi adalci kamar yadda Islam ta buk'ata,saida Alkalin ya buga table sannan akayi shiru
Alk'ali ya juya yana kiran sunan Islam,Islam ta mik'e tana bashi girma a hanyar duk'ar da kanta,Alk'ali ya kalli su Dad dasu Gun da Run da sauran yaran oga yace"Malam kabir kafin yanke hukunci kotu tanason cikinku idan akwai Wanda yake da wani k'orafi ko magana akan maganganun da suka biyo baya yayi"
Gaba d'aya sukace babu,Dad yace"mai Shari'a inada magana"
Alk'ali yace"kotu ta baka dama"
Dad yasa Hannu ya goge hawayen shi,yafara magana"bani da bakin magana ga al'ummar k'asa ta,saidai tarin kunya da nake ciki,dan Abin kunya ne mai muk'ami ka mata a ganshi cikin irin wannan kayan,kayan masu laifi,laifin ma Babba kamar nawa,tunda nake ban tab'a tunanin rayuwa zatazo mani hakaba,zuciya ta kaini ta baroni,zuciya tasaka ni akaikata abinda yajefani da Yarinya ta cikin kuka da tashin hankali,ban tab'a sawa raina zanyi nisa da d'iyata kamar yandda nake da ita a yanzu ba
Duk lokacin da nayi nadama na sa wa zanbar aikata abinda nakeyi,wata zuciyar takan k'ara zugani,ina ganin kamar inada sauran lokaci,saidai ashe banida isashshen lokacin,nayi nadama lokacin da batada amfani a wajena
Ina kira ga wanna
Narasa duk wani farin ciki a wannan lokacin,saidai duk lokacin dana tuna da d'iyata Islam ina jin sanye a raina,ina godiya ga Allah data kasance 'ya a waje na,babban farin cikina shine yadda bata d'auko mugayan halaye naba,nasan tabbas halin mahaifiyarta ta d'auko,Alhmdllh ko bayan raina nasan Al'umma zasuji dad'in zama da ita,saboda nasan shari'a bazata barni tare da keba,nasan zaki taimake su,ni kaina nasan tarbiyar Yarinya ta ikone daga Allah shine ya shiryar man da ita,nasan zata kare k'asarta ko bayan raina
Sannan ina godiya ga Alhaji Mansur,na kokarin shi akan ganin bankai wannan lokacin ina ta'addanci ba,saidai Allah bai bashi iko na,saman INA Alfahari da General Moh'd tare da godiya akan kulawar da kuka nunawa 'yata,duk da banida wani farin ciki saidai zanyi farin cikin jin Islam ta kasance matarka,a yanzu na amince maka d'ari bisa d'ari,duk da nasan akwai 'yan uwana da zasu baka auran Islam, Amma na sakawa auran Ku Albarka,kema 'yata Allah yayi yayi maki Albarka,Allah ya dauwamar dake cikin farin ciki 'yata,Allah ya yaye maki duk wata damuwa
Daga k'arshe ina mai Jan hankalin matasanmu,da suji taoran Allah, su guji shirin zuciya,su jajirce wajan neman halal,kada zafin talauci da kwad'ayin abin duniya yasaku aikata kalar sana'ar danayi,Wanda bata tsinanaman komi ba,sai Nadama
Ina mik'a rok'on ga wannan gwamnati data jajirce wajan nemawa matasa aikin yi dan gujewa fad'awa halaka,saboda gwamnati tanada hannu dumu-dumu akan ta'addancin da akeyi,saboda ita take watsi da talaka,komin ilimin ka idan kai bad'an kowa bane,ko bakasan kowaba,to gwamnati bata kula da kai,saidai take jawo masu hannu da shuni a harkokin ta"
Dad yana maganar yana kuka,Islam kanta kuka takeyi,yadda takejin maganganun Dad dinta kamar wata nasiha, Moh'd kam kukanta har ranshi yakeji,duk da yadda tashi zuciyar take mashi suya,yana jin bak'in ciki
Alk'ali ya kalli Al'ummar dake kotu yace"bisa ga jawabai,da kuma shedu da suka gabata,Ankama Alhaji kabir da yaranshi da hannu dumu-dumu akan aikata fashi da mugayan makamai,ta'addanci,sannan ankama Alhaji kabir da cin Amanar k'asar shi kasan cewar shi mai rik'e da muk'ami a k'asar nan,sannan ya maida gwamnati abokiyar wasan shi,bugu da k'ari yadda suka maida jami'an tsaro abokan takon sak'arsu
Sabo da haka Wannan kotu mai adalci ta yanke ma Alhaji kabir da Yaranshi Hukuncin kisa ta hanyar Rataya
"
Innalillahi wa'inna raji'un,Abinda Dad ya iya fad'a kenan kafin ya sulale a k'asa,Islam ta dafe kai tana sakin wata k'ara wadda duka mutanan kotun hankalinsu ya dawo kanta
Saidai ganin ta sukayi ta dad'i a k'asa,a sume,cikin tashin hakanli duk 'yan uwanta sukayo kanta,Moh'd kam ture mutane yake yanason ganinta,ido ya zaro ganin jini na fita a gefen fuskarta wajan Hannunta
*ban kasance mai ilmin zama kotu,ko ilimin Shari'a ba,duk abinda nayi da aka gani kuskure Ayiman Afuwa,Ngde*

Moh'd yasa Hannu yana d'ago hannunta dake fitar da jini,ciwo sosai taji,d'aga ta yayi yana sa hankici,Abba yace"Moh'd d'auketa muje mota "
Cikin tashin Hankali ya d'ago ta,dan shi yama rasa abinyi,Mufeeda ma kuka take,Gaba d'aya suka fita daga kotun,lokacin an fidda su Dad wanda shima baisan halin da yake cikiba,sai su Gun da kuka kawai suke,da 'yan uwan su
Mota ya sakata,Driver ya ja sukabar wajan,lokacin suma su Abba da su Mufeeda suka shiga motocin su suna mara masu baya,wata Asibiti Drivern ya nufa,ganin su Ma'aikata hakan ya sa aka anshe ta cikin gaggawa ana ceton rayuwarta
Moh'd duk suna tsaitsaye sai kai kawo yake yana had'iyar yawu mai d'aci,wasu allurai akaita saka mata a ruwan da suke k'ara mata,Moh'd yaja ya dawo gefen gadon yana kallon malaman jinyar dake mata dressing a hannun da taji ciwo,sosai ya zuba mata ido yana jin tausayinta,yasan dama tabbas dole Islam ta shiga tashin hankali,Abba ya jinjina kai,Mufeeda tasa hannu tana dafa kan Islam, Moh'd ya kalleta yace"Mufeeda kije ki zauna ga kujera"
Mufeeda ta kad'a kai tana sharar hawaye,Abba yace"Mufeeda ki zauna,wannan tsayuwar zata gajiyar dake"Mufeeda batayi musuba,ta zauna kan kujerar dan itama d'in tanajin wahalar ga ciki
Haidar ya kalli doctor dake yi mata allurar ta cikin kanula yace"Doctor har yaushe zata farfad'o mun kai minti ishirin fa"
Likitan ya kalleshi yace"insha Allah zata farfad'o,kawai ta razana ne hakan yana mata wannan ab
?
Moh'd ya cire Hular kanshi,yana linketa,wani Soja dake kusa dashi ya bashi hannun alamar yabashi,Moh'd ya mik'a mashi hular,dai-dai lokacin wayarshi tafara ruri,sai dai sam bata ita yake ba,babban gurin shi yaga Islam ta dawo haiyacin ta
Kusan kira ukku,saidai gaba d'aya ba wayar yake kallo ba,tana yankewa wayar Abba ta fara k'ara,Abba ya fiddo daga Aljihu yana karawa a kunnai ganin Mom ce ke kira,kafin yayi magana Mom tafara tambayarshi lafiya,Abba yaja dogon Lumfashi"mungode Allah dai,gamu Asibiti,Islam ba lafiya,har yanzu bata farfad'o ba"
Hankalin Mom yatashi,hakan yasa tagane dalilin Moh'd nak'in d'aukar wayarta,sun jima Abba yana yi mata bayani,Mom ta tausaya masu sosai,tayi masu Addu'a ta kashe wayarta
Uncle Sama'ila ya kalli Abba yace"amma an d'auki lokaci,kadafa asamu matsala,tun yaushe Ashe har yanzu bata farfad'o ba"
Moh'd ya matso wajan fad'in yana kallon ta,Abba zaiyi magana Likitan yace sud'an yi hakuri su fita saboda surutun su,gaba d'aya suka fita,sai dai Moh'd yana nan ko motsi baiyi ba
Likitan yacigba d aikinshi,Mohd ya hard'e hannu a k'irjin shi,yana kai kawo,Islam ta fara firgita tana sabbabu"Dad d'ina,Dad,a'a Dad,Dan Allah kubar man Babana"
Cikin sauri ya juyo yana nufar gadon yasa hannu yana ruk'o hannunta,Likitan ya farajin dad'in farfad'owar ta,Islam ta bud'e ido tana mai dasu tana rufewa,gaba d'aya bata cikin hankalinta,sai sabbabu da take cigaba dayi,Moh'd ya kalli likitan zaiyi magana,Likitan yace"zata dawo dai-dai da anyi mata allurar bacci ta tashi"
Moh'd ya sauke ajiyar zuciya yasa d'ayan hannunshi yana goge mata siraran hawayen dake zubo mata,shi kanshi daurewa kawai yake,likitan yayi Allurar,Islam kam Sam sabbatu kawai take"Dad d'ina wallahi ya tuba bazai k'ara ba,kada Ku kashe shi"
Moh'd ya fara jijjigata yana kiran sunanta,Islam ta fara bud'e ido tana kallon silin,ta kuma rufewa,Moh'd ya k'ara kiranta,Islam ta bud'e idon ta,likitan yace"bana tunanin Allurar nan zatayi mata aiki bari in kawo wata"
Moh'd ya kalleta yace"Islam "ido ta kuma bud'ewa wannan lokacin shi ta kalla,cikin sauri take son tashi" mafarki,dan Allah kace mafarkin ne Yaya"
Moh'd ganin ta ganeshi,gaya tana son tashi,ya mik'e yana d'ago ta,Islam ta mik'e ta kalleshi kuka ta saka mashi,Moh'd ya matso ya tsaya bakin gadon sosai,Islam ta d'aga kanta tana son saukowa,Moh'd yace"a'a zauna kinga bakida lafiya"
Kuka take sosai,wannan lokacin tagama gane tabbas abinda taji hakane,ta d'aga kanta tana kallonshi"Yaya yanzu shikenan kashe Dad za'ayi?"Moh'd ya gilgiza mata kai,dan baya iya magana,Likitan ya dawo,tare da shigowar su Abba,Moh'd yasa hannu ya kwntar da ita saman jikinshi,su Abba suka farayi mata sannu,Mufeeda ta matsa bakin gadon
Islam ta janye kanta tana kallon likitan dake k'ok'arin rik'e hannunta danyi mata allura,Islam ta kalli Abba tace"Abba dan Allah kace kada yaman Allurar nan k
"
"A'a d'iyata kibari kinga"
"Wallahi Abba banaso,banaso,dan Allah Ku barni in mutu nasan zan huta,da ganin wannn bala'in,wallahi nafison Mutuw
"
Kafin ta ida magana Moh'd yasa hannu yana rufe mata baki,Islam tasa hannu ta cire hannunshi,Mufeeda kuka kawai take,Islam ta kalleta,sai itama ta k'ara saka kuka,Moh'd yace"shikenan Ku daina dan Allah,ki daina kukan nan"
Abba yace"kukan nan babu abinda zai saki,saima k'ara maki wani zafin a zuciya"
"Abba ni nasan zuciyata bazata tab'a daina zafiba,na rasa mahaifiyata,tun bansan wacece ba,na saba da Babana,yanzu kuma yaman nisa,shima na rasashi,rasawa mai muni" tana maganar tana kuka,ta juya tana kallon Kawu Yunus dake sharar kwalla,tace "kawu ka daina kuka dan Allah kayi shiru,ni kad'ai ya kamata inyi kukan nan"
Haidar yace"Haba sis,Haba ki daina wannan maganganun,ki k'ara yarda da k'addara kamar yadda kikayi a baya,kisawa ranki juriya"
Islam ta fara kad'a kai,Abba yace"baza kiyi ba kenan,kenan baki godewa Allah rahamar da yayi maki ba,kin shiga hali sannan 'yan uwanki suna kewaye dake suna baki hak'uri "
Islam ta zabe jiki tana komawa kan gadon ta cire hannunta daga na Moh'd, a hankali bakin ta ya fara magana"narasa duk wani gata nawa,nasan bazan k'ara Samun duk wani farin cikiba,tunda na rasa Dad d'ina"
Moh'd ya rufe idonshi tanajin maganar ta,sam baya iya magana dan baisan taya zai fara nuna mata gatan da yakeson bata ba
Abba ya matso bakin gadon,yace"Allah ne gatanki Islam,ga Yayan Babanki a kusa dake,ki kalli kawunki dake kuka saboda damuwar ki,ga Abban ki,haba Islam kin manta ni Abban kine,yanzu baki jin kunyar fad'in bakida gata agaban mu"
Islam ta rufe idonta,kwata-kwata gani take basu gane abinda take nufi,saboda tana ganin basajin abinda takeji,saidai suma ta fahimci abinda suke nufi,hakan yasa tayi shiru
Abba yaja kujera zauna,Islam ta kalli likitan dake cire ruwan daya k'are zai saka wani,tace"kabarni haka na warke"
Likitan zaiyi magna,Moh'd yace"kabarta ta huta,zuwa anjima sai ka maida mata"
Islam ta kalli Moh'd tasan tabbas yayi mata k'ok'ari sosai,wani murmushin yak'e takeyi, tasa hannu ta ruk'o hnunshi,Moh'd ya kalleta,yasan Murmushi ta na zafin zuciya ne,tace"Nagode Yaya"
Moh'd ya kad'a mata kai,Islam ta tashi zaune,ta kalli Mufeeda tace"Frnd nace kibar kuka"
Wani iri takeji,sam batasan taga suna kuka saboda ita,ta na saukowa kan gadon,Moh'd yace"INA zakije?"
Islam tace"inaso muje gida,nasan yanzu hankilin Mamana a tashe yake"
Abba yace"ki zauna ki kwantar da hankalin ki,munfiso muga kin warke"
Islam tace"nasan Mom zata shiga hali"Tana maganar tana k'ara kuka,Moh'd yace"kin gani ko?"
Ya fididdo wayarshi yana kiran Mom, ya matsa yana zaunar da Islam d'in,ya saka mata waya a kunnai,saidai shi ya rik'e mata,cikin rashin sa'a Mom bata d'auka ba,Islam tace"nagaya maku Mom tana cikin
"
Moh'd yace"amma kinsan muna legos ko?ki zauna kafin zuwa gobe sai mutafi gidan"
Islam ta zauna saiga Haidar yadawo da take away dayawa na abinci,y kawo masu,Ya mik'awa Moh'd wani take away kamar kula yanada girma,Moh'd yasan abncn Islam ne,Su Abba suka fice,suka nemi kafer d'in salla suka shinfida a harabar Asibitin suka zazzauna
Yarage daga Mufeeda sai Moh'd Imam ma fita yayi,Moh'd sai lokacin ya nemi kujera,ya zauna,ya fara bata abinci,saida tayi gardama kafin ta anshi farfesun,tad'an sha tace ta k'oshi,tana kuka
Mufeeda ta k'ara bata hak'uri shikam Moh'd dakewa kawai yake,lokacin da tasha ruwa lokacin ta kwanta,ta jima bata magana,sai hawaye dake kwaranyowa a idonta
Sun jima a haka,Moh'd ya mik'e yana bama Mufeeda abincin,saika cin yaga bacci ya d'auke ta,haka ya fice dan ya samu nutsuwa,saidai lokacin su Abba sun koma masauki,Mufeeda ta kira Imam tagaya mashi abinda takeson kawo mata
Moh'd yaje yayi sallar zuhur yadawo bajimawa saiga su Abba,hakan yasa shima ya tafi Hotel d'in cikin sauri yayi wanka ya canza kaya,dan bayason ta tashi baya kusa
Islam kuwa kamar wasa Allurar baccin nan ce tayi mata aiki,dan har bayan la'asar bata tashiba,Moh'd har likitan yayiwa magana,Mufeeda ma Imam yakaita ta fiddo kayan ta ta d'aukowa Islam kaya,lokacin data dawo duk sun tafi sallar Magrib
Hakan yasa itama batayi Alwala tayi salla,tana gamawa Islam tana tashi,saidai Alhmdllh akwai alamar sauki tare da ita,Mufeeda ta taimaka mata tayo alwala ta fara gabatar da sallolin da aka biyota,tana Sakar suka dawo,Moh'd ya zauna bakin gadon saboda babu wajan zaman,Islam tagama Sallar Addu'oi sosai tayi tana hawaye,taba kowa tausayi,ta mik'e tana gaida su Abba
Abba ya ansa tare da Uncle Sama'ila, suna tambayarta jikinta,bata basu ansaba ta da baki gadon,ta kalli Moh'd dake kallonta,tace"Yaya ku mu tafi gida,nifa gaskiya na wark
"
Kana kawai yayi tayi shiru,ya juya ya fice,saiga shi tadda Likitan sun dawo,tabi tana gani Moh'd yasa aka ida saka mata ruwan dole ta hak'ura,su kuma su Abba ganin taji sauk'i hakan yasa sukayi bankwana suka tafi,saidai Mufeeda kawai da Moh'd
Haka ruwan ya kare Moh'd ya zauna yana tambayarta idan akwai ciwan da take ji, Islam tayi raurau da ido,Moh'd ya kauda kanshi,lokacin ya nemi likitan yabasu sallama tare da takardnsu
Hotel din suka dawo,daran ranar Ispam tayi kuka kamar ranta zai fita,babu mai lallashinta a d'aki,har bacci ya d'auketa,washe gari jirgin safe suka biyo,Moh'd yana kusa da ita,haka mota d'aya suka shiga zuwa gida,saidai Islam tana ganin Mom ta dasa wani Sabon kukan,daga ita Mom babu mai lashin wani,karma laihat taji labari
Islam tan kuka,Mohd ya zauna kan kujera,Abba yace"Haidar katashi katafi gida"
Haidar ya mik'e dan yasan ko yayiwa Mom bangwana bajinshi zatayi ba,Mom Lallashin Islam ta komayi,Laihat ma kuka kawai take,Mom tace"kiyi hakuri d'iyata"
Islam ta kad'a kai "yanzu Mom shikenan nida Babana,duk wata soyayya dake tsakanina dashi bazan k'ara samu ba,shikenan Mom ni nasan ynxu duk wani jin dad'i na bazan k'ara jin shiba,gata na da soyayyata duk narasa"
Moh'd ya mik'e ya dawo kan kujerar da Mom take,yasa hannu ha ruk'o hannunta"nafiso inga kin daina kukan nan,ki daina kukan rasa gaba ko Soyayya,zan zamar maki gata har k'rshn rayuwarki ko karshen tawa rayuwar"
Islam ta dago jajayan idanuwanta da suka kumbura,tana kallonshi,Mom tasa hannu tana ruk'o hannuwansu,ta had'a duka tana matsewa"Moh'd zai zama gatanki Islam,Moh'd shine zai samar maki gatan da kika rasa, zai zame maki miji na gari wanda zakiyi Alfahari dashi d'iyata"
"Taya? Mom taya,taya Abba zai yarda ya auri d'iyar Dad,haba Mom dan Allah kubarni kamar yadda nace,Abba bazai amince ba
"
Abba yayi murmushi"Islam ko lokacin dana hana Moh'd Auran ki,ba ina nufin bazai aureki ba,saidai ina gudun abinda zai biyo bayane"
Ya mike tsaye yana isowa wajansu"Moh'd a baya na hanaka izinin Auran Islam amma a yanzu na baka goyan baya d'ari bisa d'ari"

K'arfe hud'u Moh'd ya shigo gidan yayi wanka yayi shirin shi,ya fito yana tambayar Mom Islam,Mom tace"tana d'aki amma bacci take"
Moh'd yace"bari inje mu gaisa da C
c,naga yaran shi nasan ya iso"wato controller of custom
Mom tace"eh ya iso,yanzu akakai masu abinci"
Moh'd ya wuce yana nufar falon bak'in,tafiya yake cikin tak'ama ga shaddar shi dake shek'i,daka ganshi kasan tabbas Moh'd akwai gayu
Dai-dai corridor falon ya d'an tsaya jin maganganun bak'on Abba"Alhaji dan Allah kayi hak'uri,wallahi inason Auranta da zuciya d'aya bana gurin cutar da ita,Asalima Halin data shi gane yasa nakeson taimakon ta,bazaka sameni da cutar da ita ba
"
Chak Moh'd ya tsaya yana jin zuciyarshi na bugawa tabbas yasan maganar Islam ce,da sauri ya juya yana komawa inda ya fito dan bazai iya shiga ba
Falon Mom ya koma zuciyar shi na harbawa,gaban shi yana dukan Ukku-ukku,Mom idanuwan shi kawai takalla tagane akwai abinda yafaru,zama yayi kan kujera yana cije leb'o
Mom tayi mashi banza,tsawan lokaci kafin ya mik'e yafara kai kawo a falon,Laihat tace"Yaya lafiya kuwa?"
Ko kallonta baiyi ba,Mom tace"Ya akayi Moh'd? "
Moh'd yace"wai mike damun mutane,su suna tunanin za'a basu auran Yarinyane?kawai kowa sai ya kwaso k'afar shi yazo wai auranta yakeso yayi,su basu ji ma Dad d'inta ni yaba ba?
"
Abba ya shigo lokacin yayi bankwana da bak'on shi,Moh'd yace"Abba mi kace mashi"yana maganar yana matsowa
Abba yace"cewa nayi ya aiko"
Moh'd ya zaro ido "haba Abba,baka sona kenan?har zakace ya turo"
Abba yace"amma kasan bazai yiwu yazo da mutuncin shi ba,nayi mashi wulakanci "
Moh'd yayi wani dogon tak'i yana niyar fita"aikam nizan mashi,dan wallahi bai isa ba,ni bari inje in mashi wulakancin dan yasan ba kowa ya isa ya mallak
?"
Islam cikin ta zaro ido tanajin hayaniyar data tadata,ta tashi zaune ta sauko daga kan gadon tana nufowa falon
Abba yayi saurin ruk'o Hannun Moh'd yana hanashi fita

48
Moh'd ya tsaya yana kallon Abba da ya rik'e hannun shi,Abba ya d'an saki fuska"kwantar da hankalin ka Soja,wasa nake maka,na bashi hak'uri na fad'i mashi na bada auranta,sannan kuma ban baro falon ba,saida na kira iyayan ta,akan gobe zamuje Kano nema maka auran ta"
Islam dake tsaye bakin k'ofa ta kasa fitowa,cikin sauri ta juya tana komawa d'akin dan kunya ma taji,Mom dake kallon ta tayi dariya,Moh'd ya sauke ajiyar zuciya, ya kalli Mom yace"Mom yanzu kinga abinda Abba yake man ko?"
Mom tace"to zai baka 'yar shine ba tare da ya tabbatar da Launin son da kake mata ba"
Moh'd ya matsa wajan Laihat dake dariya,ya zauna yasa hannu hana knocking kanta da k'arfi tayi k'ara tana dafe kai saboda zafi,Mom tace"ni bari bugar man d'iya"
Laihat tace"to ni miye nawa,dan nayi dariya ai abin dariyar kayi"
Moh'd ya d'an d'aure fuska alamar baisan ida maganar,Abba ya fita yana d'an dariya,ya kalli Laihat yace"ku tashi mu fita"
Laihat ta mik'e tana jin dad'i, ta shiga d'akin ta samu Islam bakin gado zaune,jikin ta duk yayi mata sanyi,tana tsoran ranar da Moh'd zai canza mata bayan Auran su,Laihat tace"Aunty d'auko mayafin ki mu fita,Yaya yana son ganin ki shi ne yace wai mu fita"
Islam tayi dan murmushi, ta shiga toilet ba jimawa ta fito ta shiya cikin Riga da sket na wani blue material,d'in kin ya anshi jikin ta,ta saka mayafi ko madubi bata kalla ba,ta fito,lokacin har sun fice,Islam ta kalli Mom tana d'an jin kunya tace"Mom mun fita"
"Sai kun dawo Islam" Islam ta fita ta samesu cikin mota,Moh'd yasa hannu ya bud'e mata,ta shiga ta zauna tana rufewa,kallonta yayi yace"sai kin tsaya kwalliya kin tsaidamu?"
"Ni ba kwalliya nayi ba"
Laihat tace"ai shi Yaya bai ganewa kullun gani yake kamar kwalliya kikeyi"
Moh'd ya juya yana kallon Laihat"shikenan Autar ta raina ni "
Islam tayi dariya "abin nakane yayi yawa"
Moh'd ya yiwa mota key,ya na fita,saida ya hau ti-ti sosai,yasa hannu ya kama hannunta"soyayyar da nake maki ce tayi yawa ko mi?"
Islam batace komiba,haka ya cigaba da tuk'i har suka isa wani park,Islam tace"shikenan kawai dan zakazo park sai kasa a hana al'umma zuwa"
Moh'd ya d'anyi dariya"yanzu ke tsakanin ki da Allah kin bada goyan baya na rink'a shiga mutane ana ganina a park da join?"
Dai-dai lokacin suka zauna kan wasu kujeru,Islam tace"Amma miye Park d'in ai dan muga mabanbantan mutane"
Laihat tace"ke dai bari,gayann yanzu saidai muyita kallo mu kad'ai"
Moh'd yace"to naji,nan gaba kema ba ko ina zaki rink'a shiga ba tare da kula ba,dan lokacin matar General kike"
Turo baki tayi tace"ni ba ruwana duk inda nakeso zanje"
Moh'd yayi dariya,dai-dai lokacin aka kawo masu ice cream, Moh'd ya kalli mai kawowar yana fad'in"ka k'aro Vanilla"
Islam tace"abar shi wannn ya isa"
Laihat ta d'auki robar nata,ta mik'e tana bar masu wajan,Moh'd ya bud'ewa Islam shima ya bud'e nashi,Islam ta fara sha,suna d'an tab'a fira,sun jima sosai a zaune kafin suka fara gewaya Park d'in,sosai Islam taji dad'in Outing d'in,sai fara kiran sallar magrib suka koma gidan ya nata sauri dan bayasan ya rasa Sallah,su kuma suka shige d'akin su,suma d'in sallar suka nufa
******Washe gari Islam ta fito k'arfe bakwai zata tafi Office,a harabar gidan yaran Moh'd ne suna jiran fitowarshi,saidai suna ganin Islam suka hau gaidata,dan yawancin su sun santa,taje wajan mota ta shiga tana tadawa,saidai motar tak'i tashi
Islam tayi key,tayi amma data tashi take mutuwa,gajiya tayi tana fitowa,dai-dai lokacin Abba ya fito Islam ta gaidashi,Abba yace"ya akayi ne Islam ?"
"Ba komi Abba,mota na tak'i tashi"

Abba yad'an yi murmuahi,Islam ta nufi hanyar Babban falon,anan suka had'u da Moh'd, yana saka agogon Hannunshi,saidai yau ba kayan sojoji bane jikinshi,yayi mata kyau sosai,ta d'an d'auke kai tare da maidowa"Good morning "

Yana maganar yana nufar motar,sojojin shi suka shiga Hilux d'in su,Moh'd ya bud'e mata ta shiga,ya gewaya lokacin shima wani soja ya bud'e mashi ya shiga ya zauna
Driver ya tad'a mota suka fice,Moh'd ya juyo ya kalleta"kin ba Abba sak'o yakaiwa mutann Kano? "

"Bana iya ganewa"
Moh'd yakalli agogon Hannunshi"zamu dawo mu wuce dake,kiman waya if you are tru"
Islam ta bud'e mota ta fito,suka ja mota sukabar wajan,shima ya nufi wajan aiki
Ranar Abba ya je Kano shida k'annan shi,wanda shi daga Katsina ya wuce,sai Abokan shi da suka tafi tare,sun samu tarba sosai wajan su Uncle sani,sunyi murnar ganinsu sosai,anan su Abba suka nema wa Moh'd auran Islam,saidai Abba bai tahoba saida suka tsaida ranar Auran dan yana ganin yadda Moh'd yake ayi auran duk Kansu su huta,an tsaida ranar Auran wata biyu,danshi Abba baisoma aka kai auran haka ba,saidai yanaso idan ya dawo ya tuntub'i Mai neman Laihat,idan ya shirya ayi gaba d'aya
Su Abba basu dawo ba sai k'arfe takwas na dare,suna zaune falon suka iso,saidai Moh'd bayann ya fita,Mom ta kawo ma Abba Abinci, su Islam sukayi mashi sannu suka mik'e zasu bar wajan,Abba ya kira Laihat,Laihat ta dawo ta zauna,Islam ta shigewarta
Abba yace"ki cewa Usman inasan ganin shi gobe"
Laihat tace"to"ta zauna Abba yace"shikenn tashi kije"Laihat ta mik'e Abba ya juya yana gayawa Mom yadda sukayi da su Uncle Sama'ila dakuma maganar san had'a hidimar harda na Laihat,idan ya shirya
Mom tace"to Allah yasa Alkhairi "
Moh'd ya shigo yayiwa Abba barka da zuwa,Abba ya kalle shi yace"mundawo mun aje ranar biki wata biyu"
Moh'd baice komiba,yaja wayarshi yana d'an dannawa,Mom ta kalleshi tace"wai Abba yanaso a Had'e dana Laihat ne"
Moh'd ya d'ago yace"to ya shirya ne?"
Abba yace"nace tagaya mashi inason magana dashi"
Moh'd yayi shiru,su Abba suka cigaba da magna shidai baice komi ba,Laihat ta koma tana gayawa Islam wata biyu aka saka bikin,Islam wani sanyi takeji,wani gefe na zuciyarta kuma fargaba takeyi tare da tunanin mahaifinta
Laihat tagane ta sosai,saidai bata k'ara magana ba
Sai washe gari suka had'u,yana zaune falo ya sameta,gaida shi tayi,Moh'd yace"plz je kitchen ce ahad'an shayi"
Islam ta mik'e ta shiga kitchen d'in,tajima bata fito ba,sai gata tadawo da shayin,tana aje mashi, Moh'd yace"bani kawai"

v take kallo,yasa hannu ya juyo da fuskarta"kalle ni nan"

Islam tace"a'a"
Moh'd yace"ina kike san Had'o kayan lefen ki?"
Islam ta fara zubarda hawaye,dan tuniwa da Dad d'inta,wai hidimar Auranta za'ayi batare Dad d'in taba
Mohd ya d'auki kofin shi yafara shan shayin,Islam ta mik'e zata bar wajan Moh'd yace"ki zauna"

"Wai tun yanzu ni dai ba yanzu ba"
"Ba wani lokaci garemu ba duk wani shiri yanzu zamuyi shi"

Laihat tace"lallai Aunty,aini wallahi idan aka bani damar da aka baki,za'aga aikin hankali"
Moh'd yace"hauka dai,dan nasan mijin fasawa zaiyi saboda baki tausayin shi zaice"
Mom tafito tana aje plate data fito dashi daga d'akinta,Islam ta d'auka tana kai wa kitchen lokacin data dawo Moh'd yana gayawa Mom abinda tace,Mom tana dariya,tace"ni zaka bawa kud'in kuma Dubai zamu"
Moh'd yace"to Mom nawa zan bada"
Islam zata wuce,Mom tace"zo zauna tunda baki iya magana"
Ta juya tana kallon Moh'd tace"miliyan Ukku zaka bada"
Islam ta zaro ido,Moh'd ya kalleta yana dariya,yace"Kai Mom,kinga ita kanta amaryar saida ta razana"

Islam tayi saurin cewa"a'a Mom"
Mom tace"yi man shiru"
Laihat takama dariya,Mohd yasa hannu yana sosa k'eya"kedai Mom kibarni inyi magana da ita"
Gaba d'aya aka saka dariya,laihat ta d'auko waya tana kiran layin Haidar,ya d'auka tace"Broz kana can gayanan muna shan dariya"
Moh'd yace"ke bani shi"
Laihat ta bashi wayar,Mohd yace"Haidar wai tun alefe Uwar d'iyar tafara neman miliyan Ukku"dariya Mom tayi,Moh'd yacigaba da waya da Haidar
Haka suka zauna sunata magana,har suka aje ranar tafiya lokacin tafiya sayyya,saidai Islam kunya takeji dan haka tasawa ranta bazata bi Mom sayayyar ba
Bayan kwana biyu kamar wasa Islam taga gidan sai shire-shire akeyi,harda bikin Laihat za'a had'a,Laihat kam dama zafi love ce, bata kunyar su,hakan yasa ta zage hidimar ta kawai takeyi
An d'auki tsawan sati Ukku,Mom tanata shirin zuwansu Dubai,Islam kuma lokacin takawo maganar wani aiki da zasuyi,kuma ba gaske take ba,kawai batasan tabi Mom sayayyar ne
Dole Mom ta hak'ura suka tafi Dubai ita da wata k'awarta Aunty Baraka,sai Laihat da Islam da mai aiki kawai a gida,Islam kuwa lokacin tanason zuwa Kano saidai Mom tace tabari saita dawo
Kwanan Mom goma ta dawo,lokacin da kayan su gaba d'aya suka taho,Hankalin Islam ya tashi sosai ganin irin akwatinan da aka kawo
Da Daddare Moh'd ya shigo gidan,kayan suna aje a falo,yayi mata sannu yaba nufar part d'in shi,Mom tace"ga kayan nan ku duba ni bacci zanyi"
Moh'd ya dawo yana zama ya jawo wani pink d'in akwati wanda guda biyu ne saidai manya ne sosai,Mom tace"wannn pink d'in guda biyu na Laihat ne,ga Blue nan shine naka,sauran na Islam ne"
Laihat ta kalli kayan ta fara k'irga akwatinan da akace na Islam ne,guda goma sha biyu ne,Laihat tace"Mom sankai kika yi"
Mom ta tsaya bakin k'ofar tace"dan kin samu nasawo maki,yarinya danma inaso kusa kaya kala d'aya ne da bazan sai maki komi ba"
Laihat ta turo baki,zatayi magana Mom tace"to lefe biyu kikeso ayi maki ne?"
Moh'd yaja akwatin da Mom tace nashi ne,ya fara bud'ewa,tsadaddun kaya ne Yadiddikan maza da manyan shaddoji,voile da swiss Yards na maza,kayan sunkai kala ishirin,Moh'd ya daga yana dubawa,yawanci duk yadi goma-gomane,ya maida ya rufe,yana bud'e d'ayan ya juyo yana kallon Islam
Chak ya tsaya ganin yadda hawaye suke bin idonta,Moh'd yace"miye Haka?"
Islam sai ta saka kuka,Moh'd yace"gaskiya ki daina banaso"
Islam ta mik'e ta dawo kusa dashi ta aza kanta,saman kafad'ar shi"Yaya ban tab'a tunanin hakan ba,bayan samun miji kamarka,irin wannn hidimar da Mom take tayi yawa"
Moh'd yayi ajiyar zuciya,yasa hannu ya d'ago kafad'arta"ki daina damun kan ki,nifa idan har ina ganin ki cikin damuwa a yanzu shine kawai ke b'atan rai,inhar kayan nan sun maki,ki nuna farin cikin ki"
Yana maganar yana cigaba da duba d'ayan akwatin kayan,Wanda yake d'auke da Takalmomi kala-kala,da hula da agoguna masu tsadar gaske,sai lokacin yagane yawan cin set din kayan kowane da kayan had'in shi
Islam ta goge hawaye, ta sauko tana zama gaban akwatinshi tana saka hannu ta d'auko wata hula,Moh'd ya rik'e hannunta,ya anshi kular"ki duba naki,nima na duba nawa"
Laihat ta saka dariya,Islam ta jawo akwatinan da Mom tace natane,ta fara dubawa,tsayawa fad'in yadda kayan suke da kuma irin tsadar su b'ata lokacine,saidai nasan makaranta zaku iya auna girman General Moh'd Ku kwatanta yadda laifan matarshi zai kasance
Islam Mamaki kawai take,tana dubawa harta fara gajiya,Laihat tasa hannu tana tayata bud'e sauran kayan,Moh'd zai d'auko wata Agogo cikin akwatin ta rik'e hannunshi "ka duba naka,na duba nawa ba laifi bane"
Dariya sukayi,Islam ta kalleshi, wani dad'i takeji,ta gyara zamanta tana rufe kayan,dan takasa tantance yadda suke
Sun jima sannn suka mike,Moh'd ya d'auke nashi ya shiga dashi,Islam kuwa tace Laihat ta tayata suka kai d'akin Mom,Laihat kam d'akinta ta wuce da nata
***Yakama washe kari Islam zata Kano,saidai moh'd bazai samu damar zuwa ba,Islam ta kalli Laihat tace"waike bazaki had'a kayan kiba?""Wane kaya kuma"
"Kayan tafiya Kano"Laihat tace" ai bandani""Ban gane ban dake ba""Ke d'aya zakije inji Mom"Islam ta Mik'e tana fita,ta nufi d'akin Mom,Mom tace"ya akayi ne?"
"Wai Mom Laihat tace ni d'aya zani Kano"
Mom tace"eh kinga ita sati yayi yawa,ke kuma sati zakiyi"
Zama tayi gefen Mom tace"Mom saboda mi?"
Mom tace"shikenn kuje,in yaso sai driver ya jira tayi kwana guda ta dawo"
Islam ta kalli Mom"haba Mom kenan dan yana dangin Babana Laihat bazatayi sati acan ba"tana maganar tana goge hawaye, Mom tace"A'a bansan kuka"

Lokacin da suka fito,Moh'd yazo da I
V yana bata na d'aurin aure dana k'awaye yace"kije dashi ki kaiwa su Mufeeda da sauran Wanda kike ganin ya dace"
Islam ta ansa tana dubawa"nifa saida nace maka kada kasa Dinner d'in nan,dan banida wasu k'awayen ma da zasuzo"
Moh'd yayi mata banza,dan sunsha rigima kan tsara events d'in da za'ayi,Haka ya rakosu wajan mota k'arfe goma suka bar Abuja,kuka kama hanyar Kano
Gidan Uncle Sama'ila suka sauka,sosai aka tarbesu,sai murna ake,hakanne a b'angaran Islam dan tanason dangin ta sosai,musamman wannn lokacin,saidai tayi mamakin ganin canji,da gyara da akayi dagani bige gidan akayi aka maidashi ginin zamani,komi ciki,ga kayan gayu da aka maida masu
Sun zauna sosai dasu Inna sunata tsokanarsu 'yan biyun Mom zasuyi Aure,Habiba ma sai murna take,bayan sun Huta Abba yayan Habiba da Habiba sukaje rakasu gidan Baba sani
Abin Mamaki ginin kala d'ayane dana Uncle Samaila, Islam ta kalli Abba tace"wai Ya Abba wannan gyaran fa"
Abba ya zaro ido ya kalleta"wai bakisan baiyi wannn gyaran ba"
Laihat tana ta hidimarta da yan gidan,Islam taji dad'i sosai tace"Yaya yaushe akayi gyaran"
Abba yace"yanzu ai anka wata Ukku da gamawa,mijin kine yayi mana gyaran"
Mamaki sosai Islam tayi,taji dad'i sosai,bayan sun natsu suna waya dashi,take mashi godiya,amma ya nuna baisan mi akayi ba
Mama matar Uncle sani itace tafara basu wasu Magunguna na Mata,kunya ma tabasu sosai,ta tasasu gaba kullun sai sunsha safe da rana da Daddare,Sunje gidan Mufeeda sunsha wunin su,Mufeeda ciki ya tsufa sosai,dakyal take tafiya,ita d'inma kayan Mata ta had'a masu
Islam tace"waiku shikenan sai ku damemu da wad'an nan kayan,ai abin kunya ne Mom taganmu dasu"
Laihat tace"Yaya Mufeeda bani,nizan b'oye mana "
Mufeeda da Islam sukayi dariya,suka sha fira sannn suka koma,lokacin da suka koma suka sami Inna tana daka dabino,Aya,da kayan hakin maye,Islam bata san miye ba,harda tayata daka,inna tace"nidai bari kada Hannun ki yayi kanta"
Islam tayi dariya,bayan su gama sun shiga d'aki,Inna ta mik'a masu Kofi da madara da robar Zuma,ta dama masu ta basu,Islam sai lokacin tagane na miye,cikin zuciyarta kam kamar tace batasha
Haka sukayi kwanakinsu,Mama tayi masu nata had'in Inna ma tayi masu nata,ga Mufeeda data basu wasu,Haka aka saka masu kayan a mota
Nasiha sosai Uncle Sama'ila da Uncle sani sukayi mata,Uncle Sama'ila hada hawaye yana gayawa Islam yadda Abba ya hana su yin wata hidimar sai mata wasu kayan d'aki,itama hada kukanta,saidai tayi alk'awarin basu wani abu dan su saya ko yayane dai za'ace dangin Babanta ne sukayi mata
Har sun shiga mota,Islamta fito tazo tana tambayar Ya Abba Accnt number d'inshi,ya bata,tace"Ya Abba gaya nan zan maka transfer kud'i,kaba su Uncle duk abinda sukaga ya dace su saya sukai,kaga baza'ace dangin Dad basuyi komi ba"
Ya Abba yace"da kinbar kud'inki,wallahi harma sun had'a zasu saya sukai,kuma nima kinga yanzu INA aiki,na k'ara masu"

Fara"

Kowa ya fara tafiya,Islam ta kama kuka ganin sunata yi mata bankwana,k'awayenta ne kawai suka tsaya sai Aunty,matar kawu Yunus Yayan mamarta
Ankai awa guda,ta kasa bud'e fuskarta,saidai ta rage kukan sai k'awayen tab'a suke fira,suna shewa
Aunty tazo tace,Islam ta taso zatayi magana da ita,Islam ta mik'e ta bita baya,wasu kaya ta bata cikin Leda tace"kiyi wanka ki saka"ta mik'a mata wani abu a leda,tace"wannan kisa a ruwa kiyi tsarki da ruwan"
Islam ta turo baki,dan tagaji da magungunan nan,ta saka a jikka takoma cikin k'awayenta,suka cigaba da fira,kafin ta mik'e tayi wanka tasaka lace d'in da Aunty ta bata
hotuna suka kamayi,Islam ta d'an saki jikinta,dan yanzu tagama tabbatarwa kanta tazama Amarya sosai
Aka fara kiran sallah hakan yasa kowa yamike,wasu suka tafi *Ayeeshat bello,salma manner,Deejarh A ciroma* su kad'ai ne suka tsaya saboda Islam tace bazasu barta ita d'aya ba
Sallah sukayi lokacin suka hau gyara gidan,suna had'a mata duk wasu kaya,suka saka turaran wuta,suka dawo falo
Salma Manner tace"yarinya daga nan zamu wuce,dan kinga angama sallar isha'i"
Islam ta kalleta tana harararta,dan yanzu sun saba da abokan aikin nata,saboda yadda taga karar da sukayi mata
"Habawa ai anan zaku kwana"
Dariya Salma tayi tace"haba dai sai kace da"     ***Moh'd ya kalleshi yace"waikai lokacin Auranka na raka ka gidane da zaka matsaman,nifa ban san rakiyar angon nan"
Abbakar yayi dariya"nidai muje"
Moh'd yaja tsaki,yana fad'in "makwakwanci kawai"
Abbakar yace"naji ai yanzu dole kayi man wulakanci tunda nagama maka hidima"
Dariya Moh'd yayi yana jan mota,suka nufi gidan,Abbakar yace"kai wai hannu biyu zaka?"
Moh'd ya kalleshi"miye"
"Muje asayi abinci mana" tsaki yaja ya canza hanya
K'arfe tara da kwata suka isa harabar gidan,suka fito,wani bilan yad'i ne jikinshi mai cizawa,yayi kyau sosai,haka suka fito shida Abbakar suka shigo babban falon gidan inda Islam take da k'awayenta
Jin maganar shi bakin k'ofar tayi saurin jin mayafinta ta rufe fuskarta,Sallama sukayi suka shigo,su Deejarh suka gaidasu,Zama sukayi kan kujera 3stter,Moh'd ya kalli Islam,kamar yayi dariya dan baisan kunyar wa take jiba
Abbakar yafara magana dasu Salma manneer,sukayi addua'a,suna d'an tab'a barkwanci,Abbakar yace "to ku bud'e fuskar amaryar mana"
Deejarh tace"sai an saya"
Moh'd yayi dariya tare da fad'in"Duk sayan da akayi sai an sake"
Abbakar yace"tobarsu muga nawa zasu saida"
Dariya sukayi suka fara ciniki akan fuskar amaryarsu mai tsada ce,Salma tace"200k zaku bada"
Moh'd yace"yo Ashe Babu tsada amaryar"
Abbakar yace"gaskiya kam,to abud'e mana,zanje mota in d'auki kud'in"
Ayeeshat bello ce kusada Islam,hakan yasa ta bud'e fuskar Islam,saidai Islam ta sadda kanta k'asa
Sunyi barkwanci sosai,Islam kam Hmm kawai take cewa,fatan Alkhairi sukayi masu,suka mik'e,Islam kan hawayen idonta take son boyewa saidai takasa
Haka suka rakosu ta tsaya bakin k'ofa Moh'd ne,tana yi masu godiya,suka fice
Haka Islam ta juyo ta wuce room d'in ta,duk jikinta yayi sanyi,lokacin ta zauna bakin gadon,tana sharar hawaye
Moh'd kuwa lokaci daya dawo daga rakiyarsu,da ledojin shi a hannu,kan dinning ha aza yana dufar d'akin ta
Yayi sallama,ta ansa,kallonta yatsaya yanayi,Islam ta kauda kanta,bakin gadon yazo ya zauna,yasa hannu ya rik'o ta"shikenan bar kukan haka nan"
Kan kafad'arshi ta kwanta,Moh'd ya sa hannu yana Shafa kanta,shi kad'ai yasan abinda yakeji duk lokacin da ta aza kanta dakanshi,hannu yasa ga d'ago ta"mutashi muyi sallah mu godewa Allah "
Islam zatayi magana,ya mik'e da ita a hannu,ta kallleshi"inada Alwala"
Moh'd ya shiga toilet d'in Babu jimawa ya fito,anan yasameta tsaye,yace"kisa babban mayafi"
Islam jiki babu kwari ta bud'e kaya ta jawo abaya,lokacin yagama saka masu abin sallah,suka tada sallah,Islam hankalinta kwance,sun gama Moh'd yayi masu Addu'o'in in zaman lafiya,samun Alkhairi dakuma tsari daga dukkan sharri,ya juyo sosai,lokacin yafara yi mata tambayoyi kan Addini,da kuma zaman takewar Aure,tas Islam ta bashi ansa,ya jinjina kai tanajin dad'i,sun jima kafin ya mik'e
Yana d'ago wa ya kalleta,idanu fal hawaye,Moh'd yaji babu dad'i cikin zuciyarshi,yafiso ace zuwa yanzu ta daina wannn kukan
Hannunta ya tuk'o muje muci abinci,Islam zatayi gardama yayi gaba,hakan yasa ta bishi baya,kan dinning suka nufa,dakanshi yayi hidimar had'a masu abincin,saidai naman kaji ne da lemuna
Kan kujerar kusa dashi ta zauna,Moh'd yace"muci"
Batayi musu ba tafaraci,shi d'inma yaci,Islam kam yunwa takeji sosai dan rabanta da abinci tun safe,sosai ta dank'ari namanta,tasha lemun,Moh'd ya aje spoon d'in shima,Islam ta karkatar da fuska"Yadai?"
Cikin sagwab'a tace"Mom d'ita"Yad'anyi dariya"ki daina tunawa,Mom ta badaki kyauta"
"Wane kyauta?"
Moh'd ya matso kusa da ita"kyauta aka bani"
Islam tace"lallai ma,ni d'in aka baka kyauta,ai nasan kasha wahala dan Mom bata bada d'iya kyauta"
Moh'd yayi dariya,shikanshi yasan ba k'ananun kud'i ya kashe ba,Islam ta fara Gamma,Moh'd yace"tashi kije kiyi shirin bacci,bari inje inyi wanka"yana maganar yana nufar hanyar b'angaranshi
Islam kam bataji komi ba ta shige d'akinta,kaya ta rage, ta d'oko towel ta d'aura,ta shiga toilet danyin wanka ta jima kafin ta fito
Hankali kwance ta fara shiryawa,kayan k'amshin ta sakawa jikinta,ta jawo akwatunanta tana neman kayan baccin da zata saka,duk rigar data d'aga sai taga batada wani kauri,asalima bawani kwari ne da suba
Haka tayi ta neman kayan da zata saka,daga k'arshe ta jawo wata orange d'in riga mai haske,ita d'aya ce mai dama-dam,Islam afili tace"Mom ta bata iya sayyaya ba"dan ita tafi son kalar kayan baccin ta na gida
Taje ta saka rigar,iyakar ta cinya,silik ce jikinta,hannun vest gareta,sai wani net dake saman rigar daga gaba,wandon rigar ta d'aga tad'anja tsaki,dan ita bataga amfaninshi ba
Saka wa tayi takoma kan miro tsayawa tayi tana k'arewa kanta kanllo,yadda kayan sukayi mata kyau,turare ta saka ta zauna kan stool tana warware gashin kanta da ya wargaje,gyarawa take tana saka hair band
Moh'd ya turo k'ofar d'akin,cikin sauri ta ja rigar tana rufe cinyarta,sai kuma taga Ashe tana janye rigar ne ta sama,da sauri taja wuyan rigar,yi tayi kamar bata ji shigowar shiba
Ta madubin take kallonshi,kayan bacci ne jikinshi,Cotton ne saidai launin brown ne mai haske,wandon yad'an wuce guiwa,sai rigar da ta saukar mashi gab cinya,dogon hannune gareta,sai ma b'allai dake jere gaban rigar,gaba d'aya kayan basu kamashi ba,Moh'd yayi mata kyau sosai
Kallon k'afar shi yayi ganin tana satar kallon k'afar,fararan bakalmine masu taushi,ganin yaga tana kallonshi tari saurin cigaba da d'aure gashinta
Moh'd ya batsa wajanta,yasa hannu yana rik'e gashin,Islam ta sakar mashi tana kallonshi ta mirrow,saidai gabanta yana d'an bugawa,saboda k'amshin turaran shi
Moh'd gashin yake d'aurewa amma idonshi yana kan doran wuyanta zuwa gadon bayanta, Wanda duk rabi a bud'e yake,ga yadda yaga farar matar take shek'i
Islam ta kalleshi ta madubin,da hanzari ta d'ago hannunta,tana azawa kan wuyanta
Sosai abin ya burgeshi yadda hannun yasha k'unshi gaya ta d'ora kan farin bayanta,Hannu yasa ya rik'e hannunta,tare da komawa gabanta,hakan yasa ta daina ganin madubin
"Kallon mi kike man?"
Islam ta d'aga kai tana kallonshi saboda tsawan ta da yafi"nifa ba kallonta nake ba?"
"Ban yarda ba naganki ai"yana maganar yasa hannu yana azawa a bayanta,Islam tace" kabarni shiri nakeyi
"Ai kin shirya"
Islam ta mik'e tsaye tanason d'aukar abu kan mirror Moh'd ya k'are mata kallo,ganinta yake kamar yarinya,saboda rashin k'ibarta,azuciyar shi yace,Ashe hadda kaya ke k'ara mata kumari
Fuskarta ya kalla,Islam tace"ka daina harara ta"
Moh'd yayi smiling "wato hararki nayi ko?"yana maganar yana sargaho hannuwanshi ya had'e jikinsu,saidai hannuwanshi suna dai-dai k'ugunta
D'aga kai tayi ta bud'e baki zatayi magana,Moh'd ya duk'a kan wuyanta yana sakar mata pic,hakan yasa ta d'an zulle,dariya yayi yana k'ara mata akan kafad'a,murmushi tayi mashi,zata bud'e baki tayi magana,Moh'd ya zura tongue d'inshi cikin bakin ta,lokacin dole tafara magana,ya sa hannu ya zagayeta sosai jikinshi,yana shafa bayanta
Islam tafara zare ido jin yadda yake tsotsar bakin ta,yana k'ok'arin neman harshenta,wani abu tafaraji,lokacin da yake tsotsar harshenta
Cikin sauri tasa hannu tana rik'o shi,Moh'd yakai hannunshi yana Shafa kafad'ar ta,dai-dai siririn hannun rigar
Islam jikinta ya fara kerma,ji take k'afafuwanta basa iya d'aukarta,lokacin da ya maida hannuwanshi kan mazaunan ta tayi saurin sakin shi tana so zullewa
Saidai ya rik'e ta da harshensu dake had'e,ya d'anja baya yana janye bakinshi tare da juyata, yana kai hannunshi kan cikinta,Islam wani abu taji ya ratsata,neman sulalewa ta farayi,Moh'd yayi saurin rik'e ta shid'inma lokacin bayada k'arfin,Hakan yasa yaja jiki suna zama kan gado
Islam ta zaro ido tana kallonshi,Moh'd ya kai mata kiss a goshi,yasa hannu yana maidota kan cinyarshi,Islam tace "Yaya ka
"
Kasa idawa tayi jin ya k'ara rufe mata baki,yasa hannu yana shafa wuyanta,yana k'asa-k'asa,wajan nonuwanta,Islam ta zulle dai-dai lokacin da yakai kan Niples d'inta yana murzawa,wani laushin fatarta yakeji kamar yana tab'a auduga,gaba d'aya rigar jikinta tayi k'asa
Moh'd ya fidda bakinshi,yakoma yana kising d'in wuyanta,ahankali ahankali yake k'ara matsowa kan na shanunta,yana k'ok'arin mirginasu kan gadon,suka kwanta,sosai yake shafar niples d'inta
Islam tafara kiran"Haba Yaya dan Allah ka
"
Kwata-kwata Moh'd ya fara fita hankalinshi,saboda bikin shi da yakai kan Niples d'inta yasa d'ayan hannunshi yana shafa Breasts d'inta
Yanzu kam Moh'd baya cikin hankalinshi,lokacin wani abu yakewa Islam yawo a jiki,sai k'ok'arin kwantar kanta take,amma ta kasa,ga wani salo da yakeyi mata,hakan yasa jikinta ya mutu
Moh'd ya maida hannuwanshi yana shafar mararta,ya d'ago ta yana kallon fuskarta,saidai baya gane hawayen dake fuskarta,sai lokacin Islam taji haushin wand'on data saka dan har Moh'd yakai hannunshi,guda,d'ayan kuma yana mata Susa a cinya
Tuni rigar jikinta ta fice sabida janye jikinta da takeyi,Moh'd kam gaba d'aya ya rikice,sai sarrafata yake yana canza salo,ahankali yasa d'ayan hannunshi yana Jan gaban rigar shi,atare mab'allan suka shire,yayi wurgi da rigar
Yasa hannu yana had'e jikinsu,tare da mannata kan k'irji shi,yakai bakinshi kan kunnanta yana mata wani lumfashi,Wanda ke niyar sakar mata kasala,wanda dama jikinta yayi laushi
Islam ta kauda kunnanta,Moh'd ya maida hannunshi kan mararta yana shafawa har k'asa,a rikice yake,saboda yadda sandar girmanshi take mik'ewa,lokacin fa fidda wandon jikinshi da sauri yana murginasu
Gaba d'aya Islam ta fita haiyacinta,jin ta babu kaya,ga Moh'd ma hakan,sannn yanayin da takejin yana neman shigar ta,Islam hannu tasa tana ture shi,dan tafara kuka sosai,saidai babu sauti
Moh'd kam ina yayi nisa wajan neman hanyar shiga,yana d'aga k'afarta,Islam tanajin yadda yakeyi,ta fara kuka,Moh'd bayajin ta dan idonshi a rufe yake
Wata k'ara take tana zullewa,saboda abu dataji yana niyar shigar ta,Moh'd yasa hannu yana k'ara matseta sosai,lokacin Islam tafara neman taimako"Yaya Yaya Dan Allah kayi hakuri wallahi nabari,bazan k'araba"
Hhhhhh Moh'd yayi nisa sai Islam dake canza salon kukanta da ihu"Mom dan Allah ki ceceni,Abba kazo ka tafi dani,Hajjo saida nace ban zuwa kuka mats
"
Bakin shi yasaka cikin nata,dan yanajin maganar ta saidai baya iya barinta,ganin yadda yake tadda dad'i a tare da ita
Islam tasa hak'oranta tana cije harshen shi,ya janye bakinshi saidai bai daina harkarshi ba,Islam kam lokacin ta k'ara tabbatar da babu sarki sai Allah
Moh'd kuwa yau ya d'and'ani zumarda Abbakar yajima yana mashi gori kanta,Islam tayi laushi,jiki ya mace,takoma rok'anshi cikin sanyin murya"nace ka k'aleni ka k'iya,Mom zan fad'i mawa,Allah sai na gayawa Abba "wani zafi takeji yana tsara ratsata,Moh'd kam baisan duniyar da yakeba,Islam ta fasa ihu tana fad'in " Dad Plzzz help me"tana maganar tayi shiru ta daina motsi
Moh'd jinta kawai yake saida yaji zam-zam kafin ya janye jikinshi,yana kora wani irin lumfashi,dan jiyake kamar Lumfashin shi zai d'auke,sai ajiyar zuciya yakeyi

52
Dakyal ya iya d'aga hannunshi yana kaiwa kan jikinta,ya samu yana matso da ita,yana k'ara mannata jikinshi,cikin k'arfin hali yake bud'e ido lokacin ya fahimci kalar sabbatun da yakeyi,yakai kallon shi kan Islam cikin Hanzari ya d'ago ta yana kiran sunanta
Wani tashin Hankali ya shiga ganin yadda take,dakyal ta ke bud'e ido saidai farin kawai ne a idon,Moh'd a razane ya fara kiran sunanta yana d'an jinjigata
Islam kam yanzu tana jinshi sai dai ko Hannunta bata iya d'agawa,cikin rikici yafara salati,ya juya yana d'aukar rigar shi,sai lokacin ya fahimci yarhi-yarhin jiki dake turmuje kan gadon
Ai ko lumfashi baiyi ba sai tare da d'agata,ya nufi toilet da ita,ya saka cikin bahon wanka,ya ja towel ya d'aura,yana had'a ruwan d'umi,bajimawa yafara mata wanka,ruwan suka fara ratsa Islam
Ta fara bud'e ido, Moh'd ya d'auki,sink ya bud'e ya samu ruwa masu sanyi-sanyi ya zuba mata akai,take Islam ta sauke ajiyar zuciya, wanda yayi sanadiyar kawowar dogon lumfashi shi
Islam ta fara sabbatu"dan Allah kayi Hakuri kabarni"dan jitake wani zafi yana k'ara ratsata,Moh'd ya bud'e ya fitar da ruwan ya k'ara had'a wasu,sai lokacin Islam ta fahimci halin da take ciki,jan jikinta take niyaryi,Moh'd ya buk'ota,tare da durk'usawa k'asan toilet d'in,ya kai bak'inshi saitin kunnan ta"Na daina Babynah na daina,sorry plzzz dear"
Islam ta janye kunnan ta,tana son tashi,cije bak'i tayi tana fad'in"wash"
Ya juya yana zare kettle d'in daya jona dan har ruwan sun tafasa,ya d'auka yana had'awa da ruwan bahon,zafi suka k'ara yi yasa hannu yana gyara mata zaman
Islam ta fashe da kuka,Moh'd ya kalleta,shikan shi yasan ba k'aramin aiki yayi ba,ya fara lallashinta yana mata maganganun saboda yagane yanzu tadawo hankalinta,nan ya cigaba da tsabtace ta,yafara mata wanka da sabulu,kafin yayi mata umarnin yin wankan tsarki,ganin tana gabatarwa yasa shi fitowa ya yaye bedsheets d'in da kayan su da suka b'aci,cikin sauri,ya saka wani zanin gad'on,ya gyara sosai,ya canza rigar fulo d'in
Komawa yayi toilet d'in lokacin ya tadda tana son fitowa saidai takasa,haka ya d'aukota,yanufo room d'in ya d'ora ta kan gado, ya k'ara k'arfin A
c ya fara Neman mata kaya,dakyal yasamu wata riga mara nauyi ya saka mata,saidai duk wannan abin Islam juyata kawai yake dan batada wani k'arfi
Ya kwantar da ita,ya saka bargoyana rufeta,toilet ya koma,wanka ya gabatar,kafin ya saka kayan su,da bedsheets d'in ya jik'asu,da sauri ya fito ya hau kan gadon yana bud'e mata fuska,saidai Islam tayi bacci,ya d'auko turare ya fesa mata
Duk'awa yayi,yayi mata pick,ya sauko daga kan gadon,ya nufi b'angaran shi,wasu kaya yasaka marasa nauyi,cikin hanzari yadawo dan yana gudun kada ga farka
Lokacin daya dawo zama yayi tare da hamdala,ya saka hannu yana matsa k'afafuwanta,saidai akwai gumi,ji yayi tanata sauke ajiyar zuciya
Wani dad'i yake ratsashi,ya k'ara kallonta,lokacin yaji wasu hawaye suna zo mashi,shi kanshi baisan dalilin su ba,hannu yakai yayi saurin goge fuskar shi
Yasa hannu tare da matsawa gefenta"Insha Allah bazaki tab'a samuna da k'unta ta maki ba Matata,zan rik'e ki amana kamar yadda kike gurin samun miji nagari,zan zame maki gata kamar yadda kullun iyayena suke fad'i maki"
Ya kalleta tare da tunanin abinda zai bata dan yasan zataji yunwa,mik'e wa yayi sai lokacin ya tuna da wayarshi daya aje kan mirror tun farkon fara Kissing dinta,agogon ya duba,karfe ukku da 'yan mintoci
Zamewa yayi ya kwanta tare da mirginata tana fuskantar shi,yaja hannunta guda yana azawa kan k'irjin shi,Haka fa ya tsunduba tunani kala-kala,yadda yasamu kyakykyawan farin ciki a wajan Islam,ya jima kafin b'arawon bacci ya d'auke shi shima
Su dukan su babu Wanda yasan lokacin da aka fara kiran sallar Asuba,saida aka fara sallane,Islam ta farka tana bud'e ido,wani yanayi takeji a k'asan ta yayi mata wani kala kamar ba nataba,ga jikinta yayi mata tsami,duk gab'ob'inta ciwo suke
Ta d'ago tareda kallon hannunta da Moh'd ya rungume a k'irjin shi,sai lokacin tafara tuno abubuwan da suka faran mata,kallon fuskar Moh'd takeyi,ji tayi hawaye suna gangaro mata,yau tagama tabbatar wa kanta tazama mace kamar yadda takejin mata suna fad'i idan sunyi daran farkonsu,a hankali ta zame hannunta daga ruk'on da yayi mata
Ta fara tuno maganganun da yake yi mata,murmushi ta fara yi ga hawaye na binta,zaro ido tayi tuno kalar ihun data rink'a yi,tayi saurin mik'e zafi taji sosai,ta daure a hankali-ahankali ta nufi hanyar toilet d'in,tafiyarta duk ta canza ta shige tana turo k'ofa
Sai wajan yin fitsari anan taji mugun zafi,harda dafe wajan,tayi sauri ta had'a ruwan zafi ta sake tafasa ruwa ta saka kanta,harda 'yan kwallanta,taja tsaki,ta fara magana"ba wani dad'i sai zafi,amma mata har wani mak'alewa suke,harda shan magunguna,ai duk Hajjo da hajiya ne suka ja min"gaba d'aya tamanta a toilet take,tayi kusan minti talatin,harda breast d'in ta ta gasa,san zafi suke mata,tana cikin ruwan tana canza wa,sauk'i ta ji sosai,tasa hannunta tana danna cinyarta,ji tayi kamar wadda tayi tsallan kwad'i,dan jikinta duk ya d'ume da zafi,ta kwatsa ruwa ta fito
Har lokacin bai juyaba,ta jima tana kallon dogon hancinshi,ga lips d'inshi kamar mai murmushi,tab'e baki tayi jishi,shi kuma haka yake bacci,ta juya ta shirya jikinta a hankali,dan idan kunga yadda take tafiyar sai kunyi dariya
Sai da ta gyara jikinta ta hanyar saka breezier pant da undy,ta d'auko doguwar Riga ta saka,rigar tana da hula,purple ce,tayi mata kyau sosai,ga gashinta data jik'a duk ya kwanta a gefen fuskarta
Babban mayafi ta saka,taje kan abin sallah tasamu ta kabbara sallah,dakyal tagama tanayi tana matse jikinta,ta jima tana zaune kan abin sallar,Addu'oi tayi sosai tare da godiya ga Allah daya nuna mata wannan rana,lazimi take tayi,har bakwai na safe

Ta kalli gadon Moh'd ko juyawa baiyi ba dan gajiya,gaya baiyi salla ba,tana son tadashi sai dai tana jin kunya,dan batason had'a ido dashi
Mik'ewa tayi ta aje mayafinta,tayi hanyar gadon,ta wajan k'afafunshi ta hau tana wucewa dan komawa kan gadon, tana sane ta sakar mashi nauyi dan tana son tadashi
Moh'd ya juya yana janye k'afarshi,jin motsin ta tana saurin Jan bargon yasa shi bud'e ido,lokacin harta rufe fuskarta,haske yagani sosai ta taga,yayi sauri ya mik'e tunawa baiyi sallah ba,sannan kuma baisan halin da Islam d'in take ba
A tunanin shi juyawa tayi,ta gyara kwanciya,hakan yasa ya matsa yana bud'e fuskar ta,lamo tayi kamar mai bacci,Moh'd yasa hannu ya shafa gashin kanta,ya kai bakinshi yayi kissing kanta,yamaida bargon yana rufa mata,yayi hanyar fita ya nufi Room d'in shi
Sallah ya farayi,kafin yayi wanka,shi kanshi mik'a yake yi yadda jikinshi ke mashi ciwo kamar yayi dako,ko wani aikin k'arfi,lokacin daya zo kan mirrow shadaddun turaruka na gayu ya saka,wasu fararan kaya yasaka sharara suke kana ganin vest d'inshi,cotton yadi ne na maza,ya kawo farin takalmi yasaka,bai tsaya saka agogo ba,ya duba mirror yana saka mab'allin rigar shi,sosai yayi kyau,ya nufi room d'in ta
Bakin gadon ya zauna yana d'aukar waya,saidai lokacin Islam bacci take yi,wani yaranshi yafara kira,yaran ya d'auka Moh'd yace"kana Duty ne yau"
"Yes sir"
"OK na kira layin Dr
Saidai baya shiga,plzz go and tell him ya kirani yanzu" Moh'd yana nufin likitocin sojojin,yana gama wayar ko 5mint ba'ayi ba,saiga kira ya shigo
Dai-dai Lokacin Islam tafarka,zata juya,tajishi yana d'aukar waya,hakan yasa tabar motsi
"Nop inason pain reliever ne,masu kau nawa da nata"
Dariya likitan yayi,dan yasan yau Ogan nasu ya angwance,Moh'd yad'an d'aure fuska,tare da fad'in "are you laughing?"
"No sir zanzo dasu yanzu" Moh'd baice komi ba ya kashe waya,ya mik'e yana nufar toilet d'in,sai lokacin ya tuna kayan daya jik'a nasu,dariya yad'anyi, ya duk'a yana wankewa,saidai bawani dantti bane,sannan kuma jinin ya wanke,ya shanya yana fitowa
Ganin kamar bacci takeyi,ya hau gadon,yasa hannu yana Shafa bayanta,ko motsi batayi ba,Moh'd ya fara hura mata kunnai,sai lokacin ta mak'e kafad'a
Moh'd yace"oya get up"
Islam tasa fuskarta cikin hannunta ta na k'udun-dunewa,lokacin yagane ta tashi,yace"ki tashi mana,bakiyi sallaba"
"Nayi""When?"
Shiru tayi mashi dan kuka ma take niyar yi,yasa hannu ya d'ago ta,sai yaga hawaye sosai a idonta,zaro ido Moh'd yayi yana d'ago ta saman shi"daina kuka plzz,nine ko?"
Islam ta k'ank'ame jikinta,Moh'd yayi-yayi yaga fuskarta amma tak'i"ki tashi ki fad'i man miye matsalar ki,mik'e maki ciwo"
Kamar tace"komi " Amma takasa,Moh'd ya kwantar da ita,yasa hannu saman Hannunta"nasani zakiji kunyar had'a ido dani,miye abin kunyar kuma,bayan kin kawo cikar ki gidan mijinki,inace yanzu murna kawai zakiyi,sannan kuma kiyi farin ciki kamar yadda nake cikin farin ciki yau,tabbas nasan duk Wanda zai ganni zaiyi mamakin yadda nake jina ayau,Islam inason ki sosai,inayi maki fatan Alkhairi,tare da fatan farin ciki har karshen rayuwar mu,Allah yayi maki Albarka,Allah ya baki farin ciki,kamar yadda nake cikin shi a yanzu"
Islam kuka take,zuciyarta tana amince mata da maganganun shi,saidai wata zuciyar tana tsoratar da ita halin wasu mazan bayan sun kammala aikinsu,sun samu abinda suke so a wajan mace,yadda suke komawa su wulak'an ta ta,wata zuciyar tace"Moh'd d'inki ba haka yake ba" Yana maganar ya k'ara d'ago ta,yakai kanshi saman goshinta,har Lokacin bata d'ago ba,bai fasa magana ba,lokacin k'amshin strawberry ke fitowa bakinshi"nasan ko a yanzu Allah ya d'auki rayuwata na rasu cikin
"
Cikin sauri Islam tasaka hannu tana rufe mashi baki,cikin zafin nama tare da fashewa da kuka"dan Allah ka daina,ka daina cewa zaka rasu ka barni"
Moh'd ya fara smiling ya rungumeta jikin shi,ya matseta sosai suna jiyo saukar lumfashin juna,yasa lips d'inshi yana wasa da nata lips d'in,cikin tsoro ta janye jikinta

Sai lokacin ta bari suka had'a ido"a'a nidai zan iya"Moh'd ya kama hannunta"saboda mi?"
Turo baki tayi"nidai zan iya"

Islam tace"Mom Fruits d'in Abba ne"tana maganar tana shigewa,Moh'd kalli Mom ganin tana kallonshi yace"wai nace tazo muje,shikenan ta bud'e firij ta kwaso fruits wai Abba yana San kankana"
Mom tayi dariya,ya bud'e mota ya zauna,Islam ta fito ta tsaya wajan mota,Moh'd zaiyi magana Islam tace"idan ka dawo zakazo ka d'auke ni?"
Moh'd ya kalleta"duk'o kiji"
Islam ta duk'a wajan glass d'in "wai haka mukayi dake" dan yasan idan Mom taji zatace yabarta"
Islam tace"eh mana ba kace wuni zamuyi ba?"
Moh'd ya bud'e mota ya fito"Mom wai yaushe Yarinyar nan ta koyi k'arya?"
Mom ta kauda kanta,gannin yana matsar Islam,Islam ta saka k'ara"Wallahi wasa nike yi?"
Moh'd yace"nikuma saikin gayaman"
Mom tace "kai wai miyasa?"
"Mom k'arya zata man"
Islam ta janye hannunta, tana sharar idonta guda daya kawo kwallan wahala,dan wani irin abu yayi mata,Moh'd yayi dariya yace"to da kika ce ni nace"
Islam ta turo baki,Mom tace"kaidai ko?kada in k'araji,nasan halin ka sarai,idan kana kusa da mutun zakayi ta k'etar shi"
Dariya yayi ya kamo hannunta"in barki nan ko?"
Islam ta kad'a kai alamar a'a,Mom tace"mugunta kawai,dama taya zata ce eh"
Islam tace"barshi Mom,yatashi ya matsen Hannu"
Hajjo Maram tace"kai wai mu anan zaku bar mune shanye"
Islam tayi dariya "waike Hajjo kina Nigeria amma sai son tafiya Niger kike"
Moh'd ya shiga mota,Islam ta ce"Mom mun tafi"
"To Islam sai kun dawo"
Tana zama Moh'd ya fita da mota,yana fita ya fara dariya,Islam ta turo baki,tana bud'e hannun rigar After dress d'in,ta zaro ido"dan Allah ji saura kad'an ka fasan hannu"
Moh'd yace"wayyo baiwar Allah,ki k'ara man k'arya,ko kice abinda ban ceba"
"Ai dan kaga Mom ta kyale"
Moh'd ya fiddo harshen yana mata kwalo,tace"ai saina rama"
Zaiyi magana tace"koda yake dai ai Kwanyar da Mom tayi makace kakeson ramawa"tana maganar tana dariya,Moh'd yace"na daiji"
Zaiyi magana wayar Islam tafara ringing ta d'auka"Hello frnd"
"Frnd ga d'anku nan yana man kuka" Islam ta zaro ido,"wai dagske kin haihu"
Mufeeda tayi dariya"wallahi kuwa da Asba"
Islam takama murna,tana mata barka,tace"ga Yaya ma"tana maganar tana bashi waya,suka gaisa da Mufeeda,kafin y bata,Islam ta hau murna
"Frnd bani shi mugaisa"
Mufeeda tace"gayann sai tsalaa ihu yake"
Islam tace"kangaman inji"
Mufeeda ta kanga mata,Islam tace"wallahi kuwa dagske"
Moh'd ya ka mayi mata dariya,Islam ta harareshi, suka isa Airport,gaba d'aya An shirya komi,su Hajjo suka kama hanya
Moh'd kuwa k'in komawa yayi da ita gida,sai ya wuce da ita parks suna shak'atawa

Ranar kwana shidda da Auransu,Alhamdullah yanzu hankalin su ya kwanta basuda wata damuwa,ko yaushe suna manne da juna,shi kanshi Moh'd d'in ba ko yaushe yake fita ba saita kama,sosai yake nuna kulawar shi kanta,tare da tsantsar soyayya mai tsafta
Yau islam tana zaune cikin falon,sanye da wando jeans sai k'aramar riga fara mara nauyi,saidai bata da hannu,wata sark'a ta saka tazo har wajan cibiyarta,kasancewar rigar iyakar ta cibi,ita d'aya abinta,kallo takeyi,ga wani lemun Farm da take kurb'awa
Moh'd ya fito daga b'angaranshi,hannunshi rik'e da wayoyin shi yana dannawa,shi d'inma k'ananun kaya ya saka,saidai takalmin real Gucci ne k'afar shi,sai wasu abubuwa dake hannunshi kamar robali,abin robane irin wadda sojoji suke sakawa,kamar d'an hannu
D'an tsayawa yayi yana kallonta,batasan yazoba,Moh'd ya koma ya zauna,Islam tayi saurin juyowa jin motsin shi,da sauri tayi murmushi tana komawa wajan da yake,ta zauna,Moh'd yace"yanzu ni shikenan idan ina bacci ba'a tashi na?"
Islam tayi rau da ido,zatayi magana,Moh'd ya zuro hannunshi ta baya yana rik'o ta,yana mannata jikinshi"naga baka jima da kwantawa ba"
Hmmm yace,ya juya yana kallon falon"yaran nan bai kawo kayan ba?"
Islam tace"harna saka a firij,na kai sauran store"
Moh'd ya jinjina kai"bari in kirashi,shi yace in fito mashi da abin hannun nan"
Islam tasa hannu ta anshi robar hannun,tana sakawa a hannunta,Moh'd ya rik'e hannun"tayi maki kyau amma tayi maki yawa"
Islam tace"kabar man shi zan rink'a sakawa,sai mu rink'a anko nidakai?"
Moh'd yayi dariya"tunda kike kin tab'a gani na da abin hannu"
Islam tayi dariya"amma naga sojoji suna sakawa"
Moh'd yayi ajiyar zuciya"a'a banasa abin mata,ki bari zan nemo size d'inki"
"OK yauwa wai mizan dafa ma su Abbakar d'in gobe?"
Moh'd yad'an yamutsa fuska"ni ma ban sani ba,duk abinda yayi maki"
Islam tace"to shikenan da sun tafi sai in fara shirin tafiya Kano ko?"
Moh'd ya zaro ido"wai dole sai kinje?kibari kawai idan munje godiya zan biya gidan Mufeeda "
Islam ta turo baki tafara sagwab'a "nidai gaskiya ina san zuwa sunan nan Yaya"
Moh'd yafara kwaikwayonta,Islam tasa hannu tana bugar mashi cinya"ka daina kwaikwayona"tana maganar tana gyara salon maganar ta,sosai ta burge shi,yasa hannu yana Shafa kanta"shikenan Babu damuwa zaki je"
Tsalle tayi tana murna,tasa hannu ta mak'alk'ale shi,Moh'd ya kama mata dariya,shikam yasan tabbas yanajin dad'in zama da isalm,yasa bakinshi saitin kunnan ta"daina wannn tsallan"
Islam ta mik'e tsaye"dan mi"
"Dan Babynah kada ya wahala"
Dariya tayi ta juyo"wai tun yanzu kake kiran Baby ni tada man hankali ma kake"
Moh'd ya mik'e shima"nafiso wata tara ki aje man Ku
"
"Haba k'ara in sha miya"
"Miyar mi zakisha?"
Dariya Islam tayi,tana nufa kitchen dan d'auko mashi fruit,Moh'd yace"fita zanyi amma ba jimawa zanyi ba"
Islam ta juyo tana komowa kusa dashi"shikenan saika dawo"
Moh'd yace"tsarabar mi zan maki?"
Islam tace"komi ma,ina so"
Moh'd ya duk'o gefen fuskarta yayi mata pic yana nufa k'ofa,Islam ta jima tsaye a wajan,kafin ta wuce tana tunanin yadda Moh'd yake gurin faranta mata rai indai tana san abu,zai mata
Tunda Moh'd ya fita wani Office yace,dan yana son mallakawa Islam wani estate nashi mai d'auke da gidaje hud'u manya,hakan yasa yakeson amaida takardun mata da komi-da komi,shine bai dawo gidan ba sai dare,saida ya biya yayo mata tsarabar chocolate,Islam ta zauna ta shirya jiranshi kawai take,yana shigowa da Mota tana kiran shi
Moh'd yanayin Parking ya d'auki wayar yana saurin fitowa,ya d'auki kwalin Chocolate d'in da takar dun,ya nufi ciki
Islam tana zaune,yayi sallama yana shiga,Islam tayi saurin nufar shi tana mashi sannu tare dayin hugging d'in shi,Moh'd ya rik'e ta"na barki gida ko?"
Islam tayi murmushi "harna fara tunanin lafiya"
Moh'd ya janyeta suka ida shiga ciki,yana bata ledar,saidai takardun suna hannunshi,zai zauna Islam tace"kazo kaci abinci nasan kana jin yunwa"
Moh'd yasa hannu yana tab'a cikin shi"hakane amma muje inyi wanka"
"A'a kafara cin abincin"
Tana maganar tana janshi,Moh'd ya zauna yana kallon yadda duk ta damu baici abinci ba,sosai take bashi abincin,saida ta tabbatar ya k'oshi,ta aje spoon d'in tana,jawo ledar chocolate d'in,Moh'd yace"nidai ki aje muje ki tainakaman inyi wanka "
Islam ta mik'e,Moh'd ya kama hannunta suna nufar b'angaranshi,kayanshi ta taimaka mashi ya rage sannan suka shige toilet sun jima sannn suka fito,ita kanta ta sake wani wanka,zama sukayi suna shirin bacci,Moh'd ya kalleta"kizo kisamn mab'alin nan"
Islam mamakin Moh'd take yanzu komi baya iyawa saidai yace tazo tayi,matsowa tayi tasa hannu tana saka mashi mab'allin,Moh'd yasa hannu yana janye mata gashinta dake sauko mata gefen ido,Islam ta kalleshi,Moh'd yace"ina reband d'in"
Islam ta kalli kan mirror,Moh'd yaje yana d'aukowa ya jata kan gadon yana d'aure mata gashin,Islam ta kwanta saman kirjinshi,Moh'd yace"mik'on takardun can"
Islam ta je ta kawo mashi,tana hayewa gadon,ta mirgino kusa dashi,tana aza hannunta saman lips d'inshi, Moh'd ya kalleta,yana d'an cizon yatsan,da sauri ta janye"cizo ko?"tana maganar tana zaro ido
Moh'd ya zaro takardai,ya mirgina suna fuskantar juna,tashi ga kyautar ki,Islam ta kalleshi,tana turo baki"nida ka ciza"
Moh'd yace"sorry"yana maganar ya kama hannunta yana bata takardai,ya juya,Islam ta rik'e tana karantawa,takardar farko tsarin ginin gidajan ne,da Unguwar da suke,ta bud'e shafin gaba,dan bata fahimta ba,tace"Yaya wannn gidajan fa,gskiya ginin yayi kyau "
Shiru yayi,hakan yasa ta maida hankalinta kan shafin data bud'e,zaro ido tayi lokacin dataga sunanta a matsayin wacce aka mallakawa gidajan duka
Cikin razana ta mik'e daga kwancen da take"Yaya"
Moh'd ya rufe idonshi, Islam ta lek'a fuskarshi taga ya juya mata baya,tayi saurin komawa gabanshi"wai da gske?"
Moh'd bai bud'e idonshi ba,yace"na baki,duka yazama naki,kece zaki fara kula da dukiyar ki"
Wasu hawaye Islam ta farajin,tasa hannu tana jijjigashi"dan Allah ka bud'e ido ka gayaman gani nake kamar ba
"
Moh'd ya bud'e ido"duka estate d'in yanzu takice,nabaki"
Islam ta fara murmushi,tana sa hannu ta rungumoshi tana kwantawa samnshi,tabbas tasan dagaske yake"Nagode sosai nagod
"
"Banason godiya" yana maganar yana aza hannunshi kan wuyanta,Islam ta d'ago"Yaya wallahi bansan da wace kalma
"
Moh'd ya hanata ida maganar ta hanyar had'e bakinsu,Islam tayi shiru,ta cigaba da jin yadda ake mata,kafin ta dage tana maida mashi,Mohd kam yau shikanshi yasan Islam taji dad'i ganin yadda take mashi,dama babban gurinshi bai wuce ace yaganta cikin farin ciki ba
***Ta rigashi tashi,lokacin ana kiran sallar Asba,komawa tayi kan mirrow tana k'ara karanta takardai,tana murmushi,Moh'd ya bud'e idon shi,yaga bata kan gadon,saidai yana juyowa yaganta,shi kanshi dad'i yaji,yana murmushi yace"zoki tadani"
Da sauri ta juyo,Moh'd yace"kin tashi kenan"
Islam tace"ai banyi bacci ba dan dad'i "tana maganar tana mik'e mashi hannu suka mik'e,Moh'd yace"bawani,abinda naganki dana farka,kinyi bacci mana"
Islam tayi dariya suka je sukayo alwala,yazo yatafi masallaci ita kuma ta kabbara salla,lokacin data gama,Moh'd yasha Addu'oi,dan ita duk rayuwarta bata tunanin zata k'ara mallakar wani abu a duniya
Tana gamawa,ta mik'e ta gyara d'akin da gidan,ta saka turaran wuta,sannan taje tayi wanka,tana toilet ya shigo,ganin bata nan,yasa ya juya,lokacin data fito,tayi saurin shiryawa,ta na nufa kitchen dan yau tasan itace zata had'a masu kalaci
K'osan doya,da soyayyan dan kali,sai wainar kwai,tayi masu kunun gyad'a
Tana cikin aikin tafara tunanin ko bai dawo gidan ba,sauri ta kama yi,ta gama tayi,ta zuba a kuloli,takai kan dinng ta jera,sauri taje ta canza shiri
Ta d'auki wayarta,tana kiranshi,wayar tayi k'ara d'akinta,dariya tad'anyi ganin har tara ta wuce,ta nufi b'angaran shi,dan ta gyra
Abin mamaki kwance ta sameshi yanata bacci,Islam ta shiga tana kallonshi,ta kalli agogo,ta duk'a wajan wuyan shi,tayi mashi kiss ta saka kanta kan kunnan shi,tana mashi wani salon
Moh'd yayi saurin motsawa yana son bud'e ido,Islam tace"kata shi,rana tayi"
Bai bud'e idonba,ya jawota ta fad'o kanshi,ya mirginata"shine zaki tadani ina bacci"
Islam tace"Au ka manta mikace jiya"
Mohd yakalleta"Kinyi kyau sosai"
Islam tace"tanz muje ka shirya"
Basu fito ba,sai goma,kalaci suka zauna yi,Moh'd yaci Abincin sosai dan yayi mashi dad'i,haka ma yasha kunun,ya aje kofin"so kike dai inyi tunbi"
Islam ta saka dariya"ni duk manyan sojojin dana sani sai inga sunada tunbi amma banda nawa sojan"
Moh'd yayi dariya"wato so kike inyi tunbin ko?"
Dariya tayi"a'a bani so"
Haka suka jima suna fira,rana ta yi,Islam ta mik'e zata shiga ta fara girki dan abokan Moh'd zasuzo cin girkin Amarya
Moh'd ya bita kitchen d'in yana nad'e hannun riga,Islam tace"ya dai?"
Moh'd yace"mizan maki?"
Islam tace"a'a kaje ka zauna zan iya"
"Kawai sai inta zama kina aiki?"
Yana maganar yana kama naman da take k'ok'arin yankawa,dolenta ta barshi,atare sukayi girkin,farfesun 'yan ciki,dambun kuskus sai jalop d'in tajiya da nama,tayi masu Alala da miyar Hanta,Sannan tayi masu lemun citta da cucumber
Moh'd ya zauna yanacin Alala da miya,Islam ta dawo ta zauna gefen shi"wai bazaka jira suzo na"
Moh'd yayi dariya"bana jira,wai waye ya koya maki girki"
Murmushi kawai tayi,itadai tasan haka suke ita da Mufeeda a gidansu,suna yawan abinci kala-kala,hakanne yasa suka iya girki
Islam tace"zan sa maka waigi fa"
Dariya yayi yana ture plate,ya ja wayarshi yana kiransu Abbakar d'in,ko minti goma ba'a k'ara ba sai gasu sunzo,su hud'u,Islam tayi masu tarba sosai,ta kawo ruwa da da lemu,sunyi fira Sannn ta ce su koma dinning suci abinci
Aikam sosai sukaci abincin,Moh'd ya kalli Abbakar yace"kai yau sai Yusrah ta koroka"
Abbakar yace"ai dama na gaya mata,indai nazo to sai inda mai yak'are dan zabincina zanci"
Dariya Moh'd yayi,Islam saida ta tabbatar sun gama cin abincin,sannn tadawo ta samesu sunata santi,ita dai murmushi kawai take,tana k'ara tambayar Abbakar Yusra,Abbakar yace"tana lafiya,da ta matsa muzo tare"
Islam tace"dama kunzo"
Sunyi fira sosai,suka mik'e tare da yi mata kyaututtukan kud'i,k'in ansa tayi,saidai suka aje,suka fice,tunda suka fita tare da Moh'd yawo suka wuce ya jima kafin ya dawo
Washe gari suka shirya,suka nufi Kano hadda Islam,sai murna takeyi,tana bayan mota,saidai Abbakar yake tuk'i,Mohd yana d'ayan b'angaran,dan zasuje yiwa su Uncle Sama'ila godiya
Har suka isa Kano suna fira,jefi-jefi take saka masu baki,gidan Mufeeda suka ajeta,su kuma suka wuce,sosai Mufeeda taji dad'in ganinta,sunsha fira yau Frnd d'inta tazo,Mufeeda har mamaki take yadda Islam ta saki jikinta sosai
Tace"gaskiya Frnd naji dad'in ganin ki,yadda kika kwantar da hankalin ki"
Islam ta jinjina kai tana dariya "dole na saki jiki frnd kullun Yaya cikin faranta man rai yake,Addu'a nake Allah yasa ya d'ore"
Mufeeda taja dogon lumfashi "hakane,amma nasan Moh'd bazai tab'a yin abinda zai b'ata maki ba"
Islam ta mik'a mata yaran dake shirin fara kuka,Mufeeda tace"ban ansar shi,ke kiji dashi mana"
Dariya Islam tayi"au haka zaki ce ko,dan Allah kinga kuka yakeyi"
Mufeeda ta harareta"kema ai Momyn shi ce"
Dariya Islam tayi,kafin Mufeeda ta anshi yaran,Moh'd ya kirata waya,sukayi magana akan Dole su kwana dan dare zai masu a hanya,murna ta kamayi,zatayi suna dan dama daran suna ne,Moh'd yace"murna kike ko?ai gani nan zan zo d'aukar ki"
Zaro ido tayi,"a'a nidai kabari sai goben"
Mohd yace"Me?
Islam tayi dariya"wallahi kima shiya,a tunanin ki a ina zaki kwana"
"Wajan Frnd"
Dariya Moh'd yayi"ni kuma fa?"
"Ai naga Abbakar yana nan"
Moh'd yayi dariya,dole ya hakura ammafa da Daddre saida yazo suka sha fira,lokacin yaga jariri,yayi mashi kyauta,Mufee taji dad'i sosai,hakama Imam
Washe gari yaro yaci sunan Baban Imam ana kiranshi da Shaheed,Islam ma kud'i ta ajewa Mufeeda lokacin da zasu taho,saida tayi da gske sannn Mufeeda ta ansa kamar suyi kokowa,sai marece suka dawo
Moh'd ya kalli Abbakar yace"ka kaimu gida saika wuce da motar"
Islam tace"Nop Yaya akaimu gidan Mom"
Banza yayi mata,Abbakar yace"yanzu ina zan kaiku"
"Gidan Mom"
Moh'd yace"gida"
Abbakar ya juya yana nufar gidansu,Islam tace"yanzu bazaka kaimu gidan Mom ba"
Abbakar yace"kina ganin yadda yake man wani kallo,kada ya maud'eni,k'ara inbi doka"
Islam tace"nidai nafiso muje can"
Moh'd ya kalli Abbakar"kaita can, ni saika kaini gida"
Dariya tayi tace"tare zamu dai"
Moh'd yace"muje gidan Mom d'in,San yawo kawai"
Abbakar ya juya yakaisu gidan Mom,zai fito Moh'd yace"kaje kawai kada kuma ka k'ara jimawa,nasan Yusra nacan tana jiranka"
Islam tayi mashi bankwana da godiya ta shige
"Mom Mom Mom"take kwala kira,Mom tayi saurin fitowa tana nufar Islam,Islam ta zauna kan kujera,tana mik'e k'afarta,Mom tace" sannunku da dawowa kunsha hanya"
Moh'd ya shigo yana kallonta"keni zanbi ta saman k'afar nan"
Mom ta harereshi"kace karyata kake son yi"
Murmushi yayi ya zauna atare suke gaidata da Islam,Moh'd yace"Mom ke d'aya"
"Wallahi kuwa,gidan ba dad'i"
Islam tace"wayyo Mom"
Mom tace"Ku tashi kuje kuci abinci"
Mik'ewa sukayi,suka fara cin abincin dan dama sun kwaso yunwa, suna gawawa Moh'd yace"tashi muje"
Islam tace"muyi salla dai,sai kace dai abinci mukazo ci"
Mom tace"kuyi zamnku zuwa anjima"
"Wallahi Mom zan tafiya ta"
Islam tayi saurin mik'ewa,Mom ta kalleshi yana kaiwa k'ofa,Islam tabi bayanshi tana fad'in"Mom sai anjima,zan shiryo inzo in wuni"
Saida suka fito Moh'd ya ce"je samo mana makullin Mota wajan Mom"ba jimawa isalm ta dawo ta b'oye key d'in tace"Mom tace babu makulli hannunta,saidai mujira"
Moh'd ya kalleta tana guntse dariya,yace "kedai nan kikesan zama,sai in tafi a k'afa"
Dariya tayi tana bashi key d'in, sai lokacin yayi dariya, ya shiga motar ya tada,ta shiga suka kama hanaya,suna tafiya Moh'd ya juyo ya kalleta"wai bakisan yadda nayi kewar ki ba ko?" Yana maganar yana had'e hannuwansu yana tuk'i da hannu guda
