Moh'd ya zaro ido"wai dole sai kinje?kibari kawai idan munje godiya zan biya gidan Mufeeda "
Islam ta turo baki tafara sagwab'a "nidai gaskiya ina san zuwa sunan nan Yaya"
Moh'd yafara kwaikwayonta,Islam tasa hannu tana bugar mashi cinya"ka daina kwaikwayona"tana maganar tana gyara salon maganar ta,sosai ta burge shi,yasa hannu yana Shafa kanta"shikenan Babu damuwa zaki je"
Tsalle tayi tana murna,tasa hannu ta mak'alk'ale shi,Moh'd ya kama mata dariya,shikam yasan tabbas yanajin dad'in zama da isalm,yasa bakinshi saitin kunnan ta"daina wannn tsallan"
Islam ta mik'e tsaye"dan mi"
"Dan Babynah kada ya wahala"
Dariya tayi ta juyo"wai tun yanzu kake kiran Baby ni tada man hankali ma kake"
Moh'd ya mik'e shima"nafiso wata tara ki aje man Ku
"
"Haba k'ara in sha miya"
"Miyar mi zakisha?"
Dariya Islam tayi,tana nufa kitchen dan d'auko mashi fruit,Moh'd yace"fita zanyi amma ba jimawa zanyi ba"
Islam ta juyo tana komowa kusa dashi"shikenan saika dawo"
Moh'd yace"tsarabar mi zan maki?"
Islam tace"komi ma,ina so"
Moh'd ya duk'o gefen fuskarta yayi mata pic yana nufa k'ofa,Islam ta jima tsaye a wajan,kafin ta wuce tana tunanin yadda Moh'd yake gurin faranta mata rai indai tana san abu,zai mata
Tunda Moh'd ya fita wani Office yace,dan yana son mallakawa Islam wani estate nashi mai d'auke da gidaje hud'u manya,hakan yasa yakeson amaida takardun mata da komi-da komi,shine bai dawo gidan ba sai dare,saida ya biya yayo mata tsarabar chocolate,Islam ta zauna ta shirya jiranshi kawai take,yana shigowa da Mota tana kiran shi
Moh'd yanayin Parking ya d'auki wayar yana saurin fitowa,ya d'auki kwalin Chocolate d'in da takar dun,ya nufi ciki
Islam tana zaune,yayi sallama yana shiga,Islam tayi saurin nufar shi tana mashi sannu tare dayin hugging d'in shi,Moh'd ya rik'e ta"na barki gida ko?"
Islam tayi murmushi "harna fara tunanin lafiya"
Moh'd ya janyeta suka ida shiga ciki,yana bata ledar,saidai takardun suna hannunshi,zai zauna Islam tace"kazo kaci abinci nasan kana jin yunwa"
Moh'd yasa hannu yana tab'a cikin shi"hakane amma muje inyi wanka"
"A'a kafara cin abincin"
Tana maganar tana janshi,Moh'd ya zauna yana kallon yadda duk ta damu baici abinci ba,sosai take bashi abincin,saida ta tabbatar ya k'oshi,ta aje spoon d'in tana,jawo ledar chocolate d'in,Moh'd yace"nidai ki aje muje ki tainakaman inyi wanka "
Islam ta mik'e,Moh'd ya kama hannunta suna nufar b'angaranshi,kayanshi ta taimaka mashi ya rage sannan suka shige toilet sun jima sannn suka fito,ita kanta ta sake wani wanka,zama sukayi suna shirin bacci,Moh'd ya kalleta"kizo kisamn mab'alin nan"
Islam mamakin Moh'd take yanzu komi baya iyawa saidai yace tazo tayi,matsowa tayi tasa hannu tana saka mashi mab'allin,Moh'd yasa hannu yana janye mata gashinta dake sauko mata gefen ido,Islam ta kalleshi,Moh'd yace"ina reband d'in"
Islam ta kalli kan mirror,Moh'd yaje yana d'aukowa ya jata kan gadon yana d'aure mata gashin,Islam ta kwanta saman kirjinshi,Moh'd yace"mik'on takardun can"
Islam ta je ta kawo mashi,tana hayewa gadon,ta mirgino kusa dashi,tana aza hannunta saman lips d'inshi, Moh'd ya kalleta,yana d'an cizon yatsan,da sauri ta janye"cizo ko?"tana maganar tana zaro ido
Moh'd ya zaro takardai,ya mirgina suna fuskantar juna,tashi ga kyautar ki,Islam ta kalleshi,tana turo baki"nida ka ciza"
Moh'd yace"sorry"yana maganar ya kama hannunta yana bata takardai,ya juya,Islam ta rik'e tana karantawa,takardar farko tsarin ginin gidajan ne,da Unguwar da suke,ta bud'e shafin gaba,dan bata fahimta ba,tace"Yaya wannn gidajan fa,gskiya ginin yayi kyau "
Shiru yayi,hakan yasa ta maida hankalinta kan shafin data bud'e,zaro ido tayi lokacin dataga sunanta a matsayin wacce aka mallakawa gidajan duka
Cikin razana ta mik'e daga kwancen da take"Yaya"
Moh'd ya rufe idonshi, Islam ta lek'a fuskarshi taga ya juya mata baya,tayi saurin komawa gabanshi"wai da gske?"
Moh'd bai bud'e idonshi ba,yace"na baki,duka yazama naki,kece zaki fara kula da dukiyar ki"
Wasu hawaye Islam ta farajin,tasa hannu tana jijjigashi"dan Allah ka bud'e ido ka gayaman gani nake kamar ba
"
Moh'd ya bud'e ido"duka estate d'in yanzu takice,nabaki"
Islam ta fara murmushi,tana sa hannu ta rungumoshi tana kwantawa samnshi,tabbas tasan dagaske yake"Nagode sosai nagod
"
"Banason godiya" yana maganar yana aza hannunshi kan wuyanta,Islam ta d'ago"Yaya wallahi bansan da wace kalma
"
Moh'd ya hanata ida maganar ta hanyar had'e bakinsu,Islam tayi shiru,ta cigaba da jin yadda ake mata,kafin ta dage tana maida mashi,Mohd kam yau shikanshi yasan Islam taji dad'i ganin yadda take mashi,dama babban gurinshi bai wuce ace yaganta cikin farin ciki ba
***Ta rigashi tashi,lokacin ana kiran sallar Asba,komawa tayi kan mirrow tana k'ara karanta takardai,tana murmushi,Moh'd ya bud'e idon shi,yaga bata kan gadon,saidai yana juyowa yaganta,shi kanshi dad'i yaji,yana murmushi yace"zoki tadani"
Da sauri ta juyo,Moh'd yace"kin tashi kenan"
Islam tace"ai banyi bacci ba dan dad'i "tana maganar tana mik'e mashi hannu suka mik'e,Moh'd yace"bawani,abinda naganki dana farka,kinyi bacci mana"
Islam tayi dariya suka je sukayo alwala,yazo yatafi masallaci ita kuma ta kabbara salla,lokacin data gama,Moh'd yasha Addu'oi,dan ita duk rayuwarta bata tunanin zata k'ara mallakar wani abu a duniya
Tana gamawa,ta mik'e ta gyara d'akin da gidan,ta saka turaran wuta,sannan taje tayi wanka,tana toilet ya shigo,ganin bata nan,yasa ya juya,lokacin data fito,tayi saurin shiryawa,ta na nufa kitchen dan yau tasan itace zata had'a masu kalaci
K'osan doya,da soyayyan dan kali,sai wainar kwai,tayi masu kunun gyad'a
Tana cikin aikin tafara tunanin ko bai dawo gidan ba,sauri ta kama yi,ta gama tayi,ta zuba a kuloli,takai kan dinng ta jera,sauri taje ta canza shiri
Ta d'auki wayarta,tana kiranshi,wayar tayi k'ara d'akinta,dariya tad'anyi ganin har tara ta wuce,ta nufi b'angaran shi,dan ta gyra
Abin mamaki kwance ta sameshi yanata bacci,Islam ta shiga tana kallonshi,ta kalli agogo,ta duk'a wajan wuyan shi,tayi mashi kiss ta saka kanta kan kunnan shi,tana mashi wani salon
Moh'd yayi saurin motsawa yana son bud'e ido,Islam tace"kata shi,rana tayi"
Bai bud'e idonba,ya jawota ta fad'o kanshi,ya mirginata"shine zaki tadani ina bacci"
Islam tace"Au ka manta mikace jiya"
Mohd yakalleta"Kinyi kyau sosai"
Islam tace"tanz muje ka shirya"
Basu fito ba,sai goma,kalaci suka zauna yi,Moh'd yaci Abincin sosai dan yayi mashi dad'i,haka ma yasha kunun,ya aje kofin"so kike dai inyi tunbi"
Islam ta saka dariya"ni duk manyan sojojin dana sani sai inga sunada tunbi amma banda nawa sojan"
Moh'd yayi dariya"wato so kike inyi tunbin ko?"
Dariya tayi"a'a bani so"
Haka suka jima suna fira,rana ta yi,Islam ta mik'e zata shiga ta fara girki dan abokan Moh'd zasuzo cin girkin Amarya
Moh'd ya bita kitchen d'in yana nad'e hannun riga,Islam tace"ya dai?"
Moh'd yace"mizan maki?"
Islam tace"a'a kaje ka zauna zan iya"
"Kawai sai inta zama kina aiki?"
Yana maganar yana kama naman da take k'ok'arin yankawa,dolenta ta barshi,atare sukayi girkin,farfesun 'yan ciki,dambun kuskus sai jalop d'in tajiya da nama,tayi masu Alala da miyar Hanta,Sannan tayi masu lemun citta da cucumber
Moh'd ya zauna yanacin Alala da miya,Islam ta dawo ta zauna gefen shi"wai bazaka jira suzo na"
Moh'd yayi dariya"bana jira,wai waye ya koya maki girki"
Murmushi kawai tayi,itadai tasan haka suke ita da Mufeeda a gidansu,suna yawan abinci kala-kala,hakanne yasa suka iya girki
Islam tace"zan sa maka waigi fa"
Dariya yayi yana ture plate,ya ja wayarshi yana kiransu Abbakar d'in,ko minti goma ba'a k'ara ba sai gasu sunzo,su hud'u,Islam tayi masu tarba sosai,ta kawo ruwa da da lemu,sunyi fira Sannn ta ce su koma dinning suci abinci
Aikam sosai sukaci abincin,Moh'd ya kalli Abbakar yace"kai yau sai Yusrah ta koroka"
Abbakar yace"ai dama na gaya mata,indai nazo to sai inda mai yak'are dan zabincina zanci"
Dariya Moh'd yayi,Islam saida ta tabbatar sun gama cin abincin,sannn tadawo ta samesu sunata santi,ita dai murmushi kawai take,tana k'ara tambayar Abbakar Yusra,Abbakar yace"tana lafiya,da ta matsa muzo tare"
Islam tace"dama kunzo"
Sunyi fira sosai,suka mik'e tare da yi mata kyaututtukan kud'i,k'in ansa tayi,saidai suka aje,suka fice,tunda suka fita tare da Moh'd yawo suka wuce ya jima kafin ya dawo
Washe gari suka shirya,suka nufi Kano hadda Islam,sai murna takeyi,tana bayan mota,saidai Abbakar yake tuk'i,Mohd yana d'ayan b'angaran,dan zasuje yiwa su Uncle Sama'ila godiya
Har suka isa Kano suna fira,jefi-jefi take saka masu baki,gidan Mufeeda suka ajeta,su kuma suka wuce,sosai Mufeeda taji dad'in ganinta,sunsha fira yau Frnd d'inta tazo,Mufeeda har mamaki take yadda Islam ta saki jikinta sosai
Tace"gaskiya Frnd naji dad'in ganin ki,yadda kika kwantar da hankalin ki"
Islam ta jinjina kai tana dariya "dole na saki jiki frnd kullun Yaya cikin faranta man rai yake,Addu'a nake Allah yasa ya d'ore"
Mufeeda taja dogon lumfashi "hakane,amma nasan Moh'd bazai tab'a yin abinda zai b'ata maki ba"
Islam ta mik'a mata yaran dake shirin fara kuka,Mufeeda tace"ban ansar shi,ke kiji dashi mana"
Dariya Islam tayi"au haka zaki ce ko,dan Allah kinga kuka yakeyi"
Mufeeda ta harareta"kema ai Momyn shi ce"
Dariya Islam tayi,kafin Mufeeda ta anshi yaran,Moh'd ya kirata waya,sukayi magana akan Dole su kwana dan dare zai masu a hanya,murna ta kamayi,zatayi suna dan dama daran suna ne,Moh'd yace"murna kike ko?ai gani nan zan zo d'aukar ki"
Zaro ido tayi,"a'a nidai kabari sai goben"
Mohd yace"Me?
Islam tayi dariya"wallahi kima shiya,a tunanin ki a ina zaki kwana"
"Wajan Frnd"
Dariya Moh'd yayi"ni kuma fa?"
"Ai naga Abbakar yana nan"
Moh'd yayi dariya,dole ya hakura ammafa da Daddre saida yazo suka sha fira,lokacin yaga jariri,yayi mashi kyauta,Mufee taji dad'i sosai,hakama Imam
Washe gari yaro yaci sunan Baban Imam ana kiranshi da Shaheed,Islam ma kud'i ta ajewa Mufeeda lokacin da zasu taho,saida tayi da gske sannn Mufeeda ta ansa kamar suyi kokowa,sai marece suka dawo
Moh'd ya kalli Abbakar yace"ka kaimu gida saika wuce da motar"
Islam tace"Nop Yaya akaimu gidan Mom"
Banza yayi mata,Abbakar yace"yanzu ina zan kaiku"
"Gidan Mom"
Moh'd yace"gida"
Abbakar ya juya yana nufar gidansu,Islam tace"yanzu bazaka kaimu gidan Mom ba"
Abbakar yace"kina ganin yadda yake man wani kallo,kada ya maud'eni,k'ara inbi doka"
Islam tace"nidai nafiso muje can"
Moh'd ya kalli Abbakar"kaita can, ni saika kaini gida"
Dariya tayi tace"tare zamu dai"
Moh'd yace"muje gidan Mom d'in,San yawo kawai"
Abbakar ya juya yakaisu gidan Mom,zai fito Moh'd yace"kaje kawai kada kuma ka k'ara jimawa,nasan Yusra nacan tana jiranka"
Islam tayi mashi bankwana da godiya ta shige
"Mom Mom Mom"take kwala kira,Mom tayi saurin fitowa tana nufar Islam,Islam ta zauna kan kujera,tana mik'e k'afarta,Mom tace" sannunku da dawowa kunsha hanya"
Moh'd ya shigo yana kallonta"keni zanbi ta saman k'afar nan"
Mom ta harereshi"kace karyata kake son yi"
Murmushi yayi ya zauna atare suke gaidata da Islam,Moh'd yace"Mom ke d'aya"
"Wallahi kuwa,gidan ba dad'i"
Islam tace"wayyo Mom"
Mom tace"Ku tashi kuje kuci abinci"
Mik'ewa sukayi,suka fara cin abincin dan dama sun kwaso yunwa, suna gawawa Moh'd yace"tashi muje"
Islam tace"muyi salla dai,sai kace dai abinci mukazo ci"
Mom tace"kuyi zamnku zuwa anjima"
"Wallahi Mom zan tafiya ta"
Islam tayi saurin mik'ewa,Mom ta kalleshi yana kaiwa k'ofa,Islam tabi bayanshi tana fad'in"Mom sai anjima,zan shiryo inzo in wuni"
Saida suka fito Moh'd ya ce"je samo mana makullin Mota wajan Mom"ba jimawa isalm ta dawo ta b'oye key d'in tace"Mom tace babu makulli hannunta,saidai mujira"
Moh'd ya kalleta tana guntse dariya,yace "kedai nan kikesan zama,sai in tafi a k'afa"
Dariya tayi tana bashi key d'in, sai lokacin yayi dariya, ya shiga motar ya tada,ta shiga suka kama hanaya,suna tafiya Moh'd ya juyo ya kalleta"wai bakisan yadda nayi kewar ki ba ko?" Yana maganar yana had'e hannuwansu yana tuk'i da hannu guda

56
Haka Islam da Moh'd suke rayuwarsu cikin jin dad'i da k'aunar juna,yau ya kama ranar da Moh'd yake san komawa Office, dan kwata-kwata gani yake bashida hutu ganin ko yaushe yana samun waya,ba'a barin shi hutawa,sai dai kuma bai gayawa Islam d'in ba
Tsaye yake bak'in madubin d'akin,yana gyara zaman tag d'in kayan shi,yana gamawa ya zauna bak'in gadon yana jawo wasu manyan takalmin sojoji,ya juya yana d'an kallon yadda take bacci,bata ma san abin da yake yi ba
Moh'd ya gama d'aurawa,ya d'auki hularshi,bai saka ba,saidai yasa hular yana d'an buga kanta a hankali,Islam tayi mik'a tare da yin salati,Moh'd yace"Baby zan tafi"yana maganar yana kamota ya d'ago da ita
Saurin bud'e ido tayi,tana kallon shi,tare da zabura ganin ya saka Kaki,tare da fad'in" mike nan?badai Office ba?"
Moh'd yace"Office mana"yana maganar ya d'agota suna mik'ewa tare,Islam ta langwab'e kai"Haba Haba Darling yanzu har zaka Office bazaka gayan ba,hutun yakare kenan?"
Moh'd yad'an tab'e baki,yasa hannu yana dafa kafad'arta"yanzu ana matsaman da yawan waya,k'ara in koma aikin in huta,nasan ana buk'atata"
Islam tayi ajiyar zuciya"amma bakaci komi ba"
"Kada ki damu kanki"
Islam ta marairaice"shi ne kayiman wayo nakoma bacci"tana maganar tana ansar hular hannun shi,ta aza mashi akai,Moh'd yace"bari in fiddo wasu abubuwa a b'angare na" atare suka fito yana rik'e da hannunta,sunyi kyau sosai,rigarta iya guiwa,sai wata hula data aza akanta
Suna zuwa falon ta zame hannunta,tana fad'in"bari inyi abu kafin ka fito"
Moh'd ya wuce bangaranshi,Islam tayi saurin nufa wajan wani table dake gefen Dinning table wanda ke d'auke da abin gasa biredi,ta d'auki biredi mai yanka,ta saka Bota,ta kunna tana sakawa a ciki dan gasawa
Ta juya tana had'a tea a cup,Moh'd ya fito da wasu takardu,Islam tayi saurin cewa"harka fito?"
Moh'd yace"eh naga bakwai ta na san wucewa"
Islam ta nufe shi tana ansar takardun,ta ruk'o hannun shi"Yaya kazo kayi kalaci before going out"tana maganar tana mik'o mashi kofin shayin data gama had'awa
Murmushi yayi,Islam tana neman mayar dashi sarkin cin abinci, yace"shine saida kika wahalar da kanki"
Kujera taja mashi"bai kamata kak'i cin abinci ba"tana maganar takai mashi cup abaki,Moh'd yayi Murmushi,yasha a hankali,yana ansar Cup d'in,yana kurb'a ahankali
Islam ta mik'e tana fiddo biredin datasan ya gasu Moh'd ya kalleta,sosai yaji dad'i,ya ansa tare da fad'in"Nagode Baby"
Yad'anci kafin ya fara shirin bata,Islam ta d'anci,Moh'd ya mik'e,Islam tayi dariya a hankali,ganin yadda yake tafiya,sai ta tsaya kallon shi, Moh'd ya juyo zaiyi magana sai yaganta tsaye,hakan yasa ya tsaya tare dafad'in"Baby ba rakiya ko?"
Islam wani kishinshi takeji,tasan a yadda yake da kyau mulki tare da dukiya,ga aji,kayan sojoji suna k'ara mashi kwarjini,tayi saurin dawowa hankalinta tana murza yatsun hannunta,ta nufoshi ta rik'e hannunshi,takai tafin hannunshi a bakinta,ta sumbata,tare da d'agowa tana nemo kwayar idonshi,"Allah yabada sa'a,ya tsare man kai
ka kular min da kanka"
Hannunta ya rik'e sosai cikin nashi,yace"kinason dani komi,yau nasan zanyi kewarki,na gode da Adu'arki Matata"yayi maganar tare da yin Hugging d'inta,yayi mata bankwana yatafi
Tunda yaje wajan aikin yake aiki,sai dai da kanshi yake k'ok'arin fiddawa kanshi lokacin yin tunaninta,Islam kam gidan yayi mata shiru,ganin 11 tayi tasan zai iya dawowa da wuri,hakan yasa ta shiga kitchen tana d'ora mashi girki,Basmati rice sai Miyar vegetables da flour,tayi salad tare da yi mashi fruit salad,da yawa tayi sosai ta zuba wani a kula tana son akaiwa Mom d'inta
K'arfe D'aya tagama,taje ta sake yin wanka,ta saka wani d'anyan leshi,Launin bila mai cizawa sosai,yayi mata kyau saboda hasken fatar da take dashi,siket d'in yakamata sosai,batayi kwalliyaba ta saka mayafinta,tana fitowa lokacin k'arfe biyu
Waje ta fito harabar gidan,tana ma wani soja maganar akan tana son Wanda zata aika wajan Mom,yaran ya kira mata direba,yazo,Islam ta koma tana jido kulolin abincin,tana basu
Moh'd ya shigo gidan,shike tuk'i dakanshi,amma motar yaranshi tana bayan shi,sannn kuma babu jiniya
Ganinta yasa bai tsaya jiran a bud'e mashi k'ofa ba,ya fito yana nufarta,Islam ta maido hankalinta kanshi tana Murmushi,Moh'd baiyi Mirmushin ba,ganin yaran shi,Islam ta ganin yadda fuskar shi take yasata saurin fad'in"welcome nafito ne inason akaiwa Mom abinci"
Moh'd yad'an d'aga kafad'a,yama yaran magana,tare da fad'in yagaida Mom,ya kama Hannun Islam suka shiga ciki tareda turo k'ofa
Sai lokacin ya fara fara'a,yana son dariya,ya fad'a kan kujera yana jawota samanshi,Islam ta zauna tana mashi sannu,Moh'd yace"yauwa ya kika wuni?"
"Lafya lau,sannu"
"Nace yauwa sai sannu kike man"
Dariya tayi tasa hannu tana shafa sajan fuskar shi tare da mik'ewa,ta d'auko ruwa a firij tana bashi,ya ansa yasha
Kan Capet ta zauna tana kwance mashi mashi takalma,ta aje gefe tana cire safar,Moh'd ya kalleta yana dariya "aka cemaki soja takalmi yake fara cirewa?"
Islam ta zaro ido"au fidda kayan ma har wata k'a'ida gareshi"
Gira ya d'aga mata,Islam tayi dariya,tare da fad'in"nikam ba wani k'a'ida da zanbi"
Dariya yayi ya aje cup d'in hannunshi,Islam ta d'auki takalmin tana fad'in"tashi muje kayi wanka abinci yana jiranka"
Moh'd ya langwab'e kai"nagaji saidai ki d'auke ni"
Sosai Islam ta kama dariya,ganin yadda yayi,batasan lokacin data koma jikinshi ta na mashi abubuwa ba,tare da fad'in"baka gaji ba shiyasa"
Mik'ewa yayi da ita, suka nufi b'angaranshi,cikin lokacin kad'an ya shirya tare da taimakon Islam,sannan suka fito tare da zaman cin abinci
Haka suke zaune abinsu,kullun Mohd yaje aiki yadawo yana samun kulawa wajan Islam,idan tayi sallar Asba bata komawa saita had'a mashi kalaci taga yatafi,sosai take kula da mijinta,kamar yadda shima yake kulada ita ko yaushe
Ranar da Islam ta cika wata guda ranar fa su duka suka mik'e dan shiryawa tafiya aiki,sauri take tana shirya shi,Moh'd ya kalleta d'aure take da towel, amma shi tagama shirya shi,yace"baki gudun ki makara?"
Islam ta saka mashi agogo tare da fad'in "nafiso inga ka shirya,kaga idan na makara neman lada na tsaya yi"
Dariya yayi yace"to saidai mu makara tare,kuma ban yadda da hakan ba"
Ajiyar zuciya tayi lokacin Moh'd ya jawo mata nata kayan data aje zata saka,da taimakonshi ta shirya,Moh'd ya d'auki powder zai Shafa mata,Islam tayi dariya "Darling bana buk'atar hoda"
Sosan hodar ya aje shima yana dariya,nayi tunanin zaki shafa powder idan zaki Office"
Islam tad'an tab'e baki" ban Shafa ba da,balle yanzu"
Shima nashi bakin ya tab'e"nafiso ki shafa,dan Ina ganin kamar kinfi kyau babu Hoda
"
Tagano shi sarai kishine,tace"to bari in shafa hada janbaki"tana maganar tana d'auka tana fara shafawa,Mohd ya rik'e hannunta,yana d'aukar mayafinta yayi hanyar waje dasu,tsayawa sukayi sukayi kalaci,kafin suka mik'e suka fito
Moh'd da Islam yanzu hankalinsu ya kwanta,aikin su suke sosai musanman Moh'd da yanzu al'umma ke k'ara sanshi saboda yadda yadage kan tsaran k'asarshi tare da kauda yawan ta'addanci,dan har yanzu baiyi k'asa a guiwa ba
Islam kam likafa tayi gaba,cikin lauyoyin da suke tare harda wanda suka rigata fara aiki,suna gani za'a bata aiki,saboda tabbacin zata kare mai gaskiya
***Suna wata hud'u da aure,zaune take tana yanke akaifar k'afarta,lokacin k'arfe ukku na rana,Moh'd ya shigo gidan,Islam ta tsaya tana kallonshi,harararta yayi,Islam tace"kaida kace sai magrib zaka dawo"
Moh'd ya zauna"ai banma je wajan da zanjeba"yana maganar yana ansar abin yanke akaifar"kawo in maki"
Islam tace"bari in kawo maka lemu"
"A'a zauna bari ingama"
Islam batayi musuba tabashi yacigaba da gyara mata akaifar,suna d'an fira
Ta mik'e"bari in d'ora maka girki nayi tunanin zakakai zuwa anjima shiyasa ban d'oraba"
Moh'd ya mik'e muje in tayaki"Islam tayi gaba suka shiga kitchen d'in,tace"mi kake so?"
"Ai kinsan bana zab'ar abincii,indai kece zaki girka mana"
Islam ta kalleshi"zakaci tuwo"
Moh'd yace"eh mana zanci"
Islam tace"to shi zamuci yau"
Moh'd yace"to miyar Kub'ewa fa zakiyi"
Kallonshi tayi"Kaine ma zaka zab'a?"
Mohd yayi"amma ai farko tambayata kikayi abinda nakeso za'ayi"
"Wani Wanda nakeso dai"
Kamota yayi yana matse mata baki,Islam tayi 'Yar k'ara tana kwacewa,Moh'd yace"to saidai kowa yayi nashi muga nawa zaifi d'ad'i
Dariya yabata tayi hanyar store tare da cewa"aidai nina kiya maka,jira in kwaso kayan"
Shiga tayi tana duba store d'in,tana son had'a kayan da zasuyi amfani dasu,yanayin abubuwan dake ciki na girki,hakan yasa store d'in yake bada wani kalar k'amshi
Islam ta d'an yamutsa fuska,tanajin batasan k'amshin store d'in, ji tayi zuciyarta na tashi,tad'an dafe k'irji tana saurin had'o kayan
Tashin zuciya takeji sosai,da sauri ta fito store d'in tana dad'e bakinta,Moh'd yace"lafiya minene"
Islam ta bud'e baki zatayi magana,ta dafe cikinta tana jin Amai,Moh'd yayi saurin rik'eta,Islam ta karkata kanta gefe tana yunk'urin Amai,hankalin Moh'd yatashi yafara tambayarta,sai lokacin tasamu tafara aman,Moh'd ya zaunar da ita,sosai take aman,gaya yana mak'ale mata
Moh'd yace"subhanallah mikikaci?"
Islam ta fara kad'a bashikai alamar babu komi,yayi saurin d'aukar cup ya bud'e fanfo yana zuba ruwa,yazo yana shafa mata akai da kuma fuskarta,ajiyar zuciya tafarayi tana dafe kanta,Moh'd ya d'agota yana fad'in "kin gama?"
Islam tace"eh amma juwa nake gani"
D'aukarta yayi yana nufar falo da ita,had zai ajeta sai ya wuce bedroom, toilet ya kaita,yagyra mata jikinta
Lokacin daya ajeta kan gado jikinta yayi zafi sosai,Moh'd ya zauna yana mata addu'a,Islam ta dafe kanta tana hawaye,Moh'd yace"wai miyasa sameki?"
"Nifa kawai naji abu yatsayaman ina shiga store d'in" tana maganar tana cire leb'o,
Moh'd ya aza hannunshi,yana mata addu'a akai,sai kuka tafarayi,dan yadda takejin zucitarta na bugawa,ga kanta na Sara mata
Moh'd ya gyara zama,shidai yasan lafiya klau suke amma lokaci guda abu ya rikice
Moh'd yace"bari muje asibity"Islam takama kuka tana rik'eshi,hankalin shi yatashi,ya fiddo wayarshi aljihu,yana kiran likita
Hawaye ke zuba idonta dan ciwankan datake ji,Moh'd ya aza hannu samn kanta yana mata kamun ciwankai,Islam tafara sauke ajiyar zuciya,Moh'd ya fara zaro ido yafara tsoron kaddai Aljannu ne
Islam ta rufe ido shiru,Moh'd ya d'auki waya yana dannawa yakira Mom,Mom ta d'auka tana fad'in"D'iyata ya gidan"dan lokaci dayawa Islam ce take fara magana idan suka kirata
Moh'd yakalli Islam dake kwance hawaye nabin idonta,yace"Mom gata nan batada lafiya"
Mom tace"subhanallah,miya sameta"
"Ciwan kaine,muna kitchen ta shiga store shine jikin yayi tsanni,harda juwa,Mom nidai inajin tsoro kamar ciwan aljanu"
Mom ta zaro ido "wane irin Aljanu?bari inzo inganta"
Moh'd zaiyi magana Mom ta datse waya,ta kalli Abba tace"Abba wai Islam ce ba Lafiya,Aljannu suka sameta"
Abba ya zaro ido"kamarya?"
"Nima abinda yake gayaman kenan"
Abba ya mik'e yana d'aukar makullin mota suka fita,suka nufi gidan
Hannun shi cikin nata Addu'a kawai yake mata,Islam ta lura baya cikin natsuwar shi,duk sai taji tausayin shi tace"Yaya ka kwanta kaima"
Moh'd ya kaleta,cikin zuciyarshi kuma ya k'ara tsorata,yasan sare idan mutun bashida lafiya taya za'ace mai jiya ya kwanta
Waya ya k'ara kiran Mom,saidai bata d'auka ba,ba'ajimaba suka fara sallama gidan,Moh'd yafara ansawa yana fad'in su shigo
Abba ya zauna falo,Mom ta wuce cikin tashin hankalin,Moh'd yad'an matsa kad'an yana nunawa Mom Islam
Mom ta matso tana ma Islam sannu,Islam ta fashe da kuka,Mom tace"haba Islam yi hak'uri,daina kuka"
"mom kaina,kaina ciwo yake"

"A'a Mom nakira likita,kuma yanzu-yanzu ne ciwan,Mom ta kad'akai,Moh'd ya cije leb'on shi na sama
Mom tace" bari in dawo"
Wajan Abba tadawo lokacin ta taddasuna gaisawa da likitan,Mom tace"ka shiga muje ka dubata"
Atare sukaje,Moh'd ya saka mata hula,Mom ta ba likitan kujera,yace"a'a bari in dubata"
Matsawa yayi yanama Islam sannu,tare da bammayar yadda takeji tayi mashi bayani ahankali
Likitan ya kalli Moh'd yace"tana Amai ne"
Moh'd yace"lfyarta laufa,amma dama Amai ta farayi lokacin da zata fara ciwankai"
Likitan ya kalli Mom yace"Mama bari ayi mata test na fitsari mugani,idan bamuga komiba sai muyi na jini da sauran su mugani"
Mom tace babu damuwa,Moh'd ya taimaka suka ba likita fitsarin Islam,ya bud'e jikkkarshi yana fiddo kayan aiki ya fara aunawa
Ko minti hud'u ba'ayiba,likitan yagane cewar tana da ciki,saidai yanason gane idan sunsan dashi,ya kalli Mom yace"tanada juna biyu ne?"
Mom ta kalli Moh'd,da sauri Moh'd ya kauda kanshi,likitan yace"Oga"
Da sauri Mohd yace"a'a"
Likitan yayi dariya ganin yadda Moh'd yakeyi alamar baisan maganar,ya juya yakalli Mom yace"Mama yarinyarki tana d'auke da juna biyu"
Mom ta kalli Moh'd da yayi saurin juyowa yana kallon likitan,Islam tayi saurin rufe idonta,duk da maganar batazo mata a bazata ba,ganin cewar wata biyu kenan rabanta da ganin Jinin al'adarta
Moh'd yana had'a ido da Mom tayi saurin kauda kai,Mom ta kalli likitan tana murmushi"Alhdulillah"
Mohd kan lokacin yakasa b'oye farin cikin shi,saboda yadda fuskar shi ke nuna murmushin shi,ya kalli Islam yayi tunanin bacci takeyi
Ya mik'e tsaye,yana aza hannuwa a k'irji,Mom tace"to amma ai yakama abata magani wannan ciwan kan"
Likita"a'a akwai buk'atar ayi mata aune-aune dan tabbatar da lafiyar cikin,amma zan bata magani kafin ayi awan musan magungunan da za'a bata"
Mom ta kallli Moh'd tace"wai Aljannu,kaman bayani batada lafiya amma bakace tana Amai ba"ita kanta Mom lokacin data kalli Islam tad'an gane canji at are da ita
Moh'd yaji kunya,ya na niyar duk'ar dakai,Mom tace"Congratulations "
Moh'd kamar yayi farin ciki amma baya iya nunawa,dukda yadan Mom d'inshi batada matsala,amma bai san wannan lokacin abinda yasa yakejin kunyar ba
Likitan yace"bari inje,zan aiko da maganin,kafin gobe sai kuje Office kusameni"
Likitan ya yi hanyar fita,hakama Mom,Moh'd yace"Nagode"
Yana biyosu,afalo yatadda Abba,Abba yayi saurin tabbayarshi jikinta,Moh'd yace"da sauk'i Abba"
Mom tace"Abban sai a kira malamin Ruk'iyya ko?"
Abba yace"subhanallah,wai dagske Aljannun ne"
Mom tafara dariya "rabu da wannn yaran kasan d'an fari yadda yake"
Moh'd yayi 'Yar dariya"kai Mom"
Abba yace"to da sauk'i kenan?"
Mom tace"eh da sauk'i tunda ka kusa zama Kaka"
Abba yayi dariya manya yana mik'ewa"to Allah yabada lafiya,muje"
Moh'd ak'ofa yabarsu,yayi saurin komawa ciki,yadda yabarta haka take,wani farin ciki yafaraji,ya tsaya yana kallonta,ya d'aga hannu yana godiya ga Allah sannan ya koma yana durk'usawa bakin gadon
Yasa hannu yana d'an rungumeta a hankali,Islam tasan su Mom sun tafi,ta bud'e ido dakyal,Moh'd sai murmushi yakeyi,yakai bakin shi yafara aza mata kiss ako ina
Islam kam dukda ciwan da takeji tasan Moh'd yana cikin jin dad'i,hannu yasa yana d'aga mata riga,yana kallon cikin,ya kai hannu yana Shafa jikin a hankali

57
Islam ta maida idonta ta rufe,Moh'd yace"ki bud'e ido ki kalleni"yana maganar yana d'agota,y kwantar da ita kan kafad'ar shi,Islam ta bud'e ido,Moh'd kam baya iya misalta irin farin cikin da yake tare dashi,ganin cewar yau shi ne matar shi take d'auke da ciki
Hannu yasa yana goge mata fuska"har yanzu kan yana ciwo?"
Islam ta d'aga mashi kai alamar eh,hannu yasa yana dafa kan,ya jingina ta da filo,yaje yana d'auko ruwa ya zuba a cup,yana bata,Islam ta ansa tasha,yakoma ya zauna "mi zakici?"
Islam tace"babu komi"ya d'auki waya yana dannawa,wani yaranshi yakira yana bashi umarnin kawo masu wani abu
D'an lokacin da tayi taji kan ya rage ciwo tadaina ganin juwa,ta mik'e,Mohd yace"ki zauna mi kikeso zan maki" 
Islam tayi d'an murmushi ta aza kanta samanshi,Moh'd ya k'ara aza hannunshi kan cikinta,ya d'aga fuskarta"naso ace lafiyarki lau ki gane kalar farin cikin da nakeji,yau nine nake shirin zama father"
Islam tayi rau-rau da ido,Moh'd zaiyi magana wayarshi tayi k'ara babu jimawa ya fito ya anshi maganin ya koma
Zaune yasameta,ya zauna yana b'alle maganin,yana bata,Islam ta ansa tace"naji sauk'i fa"
Murmushi yayi yayi mata pik a kumatu,Islam itama murmuahin tayi tace"ana kiran salla fa"
Moh'd ya kalli agogon hannun shi,yace"to zan barki ke d'aya ne?kingafa baki lafiya"
Islam ta rik'e hannunshi"nima sallar zanyi"tana k'ok'arin mik'ewa,Moh'd ya kamata suka nufi toilet,tayi alwala yana zuba mata ruwa,ta gyara zamanta kan kwamin wankan tace"kawo in zuba maka"
Moh'd ya kad'a kai"a'a banaso ki wahala,bari inyi"Islam ta zauna tana kallon shi,yayi alwala yagama,yana d'agowa yaga tana kallon shi,yayi murmushi"kinajin da sauki ko?"
Islam tace"eh Na dainaji,saidai banjin kwarin jikina"
Moh'd ya mik'a ta hannu suka fito ya shinfid'a mata abin sallah ya d'auki mata abaya,saida yaga ta kabbara salla kafin ya yayi saurin fita dan yanason samun jam'e
Islam kam koda tagama sallah Addu'a tafarayi,tana kuka saidai batasan dalilin kukanta ba,tasa hannu tana tab'a cikinta,itadai tasan tayi farin cikin akan cikin dake jikinta,to amma wani b'angare na zuciyta,tana tsoro tare da gudun yaran da zata Haifa ya d'auko halin mahaifinta,kuka take sosai mai tsuma zuciya,yanzu ne take jin kewar mahaifinta tasan yadda yake nuna soyayyarta gareta,amma yanzu bazatayi rayuwa dashi ba yadda zai bata kulawa da jikanshiba
Moh'd ya turo k'ofar d'akin yana shigowa,Islam tayi saurin goge fuskarta,wajan da take ya tsugunna,ganin tana kuka yayi saurin rik'eta"jikin ne komi?"
Islam ta kad'a kai tana fad'awa jikinshi,hannu yasa yana shafa bayanta"indai kinji sauk'i ki daina kuka,miya sameki?"
Bata iya magana sai kuka,Moh'd yaji babu dad'i,ya d'agata suka koma bakin gado"ki fad'iman ko aman kikeji"yana maganar yana cire mata Hijab ya aza hannu a cikin,Islam saita saka kuka,Moh'd yace"ko kicin ke ciwo"duk ya damu sai tambayoyi yake mata,lokacin ta k'ara tabbatar da shi kanshi Moh'd zaiyi san yara,ta sa hannu ta rik'e hannunshi da yake Shafa cikinta,ta d'ago tana kallon shi
"Nasan kana murna da cikin dake jikina,kasancewar yaune kasan ina d'auke da ciki Yaya,Yaya najima da sanin inada ciki saidai bana iya fad'in hakan,na jima ina farin ciki,wani b'angare na zuciyata kuma ina fargaba da kuma bak'in ciki sb
"
Da sauri Moh'd ya d'agota"haba Haba mike damunki?kinsan abinda kike fad'i kuwa Islam?bak'in ciki kuma,wace irin magana ce wannn?"
Islam ta fad'a kafad'arshi,Moh'd ya janyeta"miye dalilinki na bak'in ciki,bakisan yara ne?ko naki shirya hai
"
Islam tasa hannu ta goge fuskarta "har kullun ina tareda damuwa da kuma tunanin halin da yaranmu zasu shiga,bana bak'in jikin gorin da za'ayi masu kan Babana saboda ya kasance d'anfashi,saidai ina gudun wani cikin yaranmu su d'auki halin Babana" 
Moh'd yayi saurin rik'e hannunta,yasa hak'oranshi yana cije leb'onshi saboda wani abu da yakeji"wannan shine dalilinki na b'oyeman?miyasa Islam?wai haryanzu baki ida yadda da k'addara ba?taya zaki fara tunani irin wannan,duk abinda kike tunani daga Allah"
Islam ta d'aga baki zatayi magana Moh'd ya d'aga mata hannu tare da cigaba da magana"idan kina tsoran yaranki ya d'auko wani,ke miyasa baki d'aukoba,kinga kenan Allah shine maiyin komi,shima Dad ai ba gada yayi ba,Allah ne ya kaddara zaiyi hakan"
Islam ta sa tafin hannu tana rufe fuskarta dan tanajin yadda hawaye ke gangaro mata,ta janye hannunta"kenan su yaranmu Kakansu yayi Fashi,zasu iya gada?"
Tsaye Moh'd ya mik'e tare da daka mata wata tsawa,ya hard'e hannuwan shi kan k'irji"kada in k'araji,wallahi idannna k'ara jin wannnan maganar saina b'ata maki rai"yana maganar yana yin hanyar fita
Ko minti ukku baiyi ba yadawo hannunshi d'auke da abinci,ahankali ya saki fuskarshi,ya zauna kusa da ita,yaja table d'in ya aza,ya kalleta,yace"zo kici abinci"yana maganar yana fara bata,saida yadafe mata sannn taci,shima d'in yaci abincin
Ya d'auke kayan yadawo yana zama,Islam taja fulo ta kwanta, Moh'd yace"kin dainajin ciwan ko?"
Islam ta d'aga mashi kai tare da fad'in "na daina"
Moh'd yace"OK tashi in rage maki kayan sai kiji dad'in baccin"
Islam ta d'aga tana zame rigar jikinta,Moh'd ya anshi rigar,ya d'auko mata rigar bacci ya saka mata,Moh'd ya kwantar da ita,ya zauna bakin gadon,Islam ta rufe idonta
Moh'd ya mik'e ya cire kayan shi,yayi shirin baccin shima,dan bashida abokin fira
Ya koma gefenta ya kwanat,Islam ta mirgina ahankali ta koma jikinshi,tasa hannu tana azawa saman k'irjinshi,Moh'd ya kalleta yana mata murmushi,Islam ta maida mashi"Yaya ban tab'a ganin namiji kamarka ba,kaid'in na dabanne a cikin maza,ina alfahari da kai nagode da
"
Moh'd yakalleta"Ni daina wahalar min da Baby,kina wani surutu"
Dariya Islam tace"Au harka canza Baby ko"
Hannu yana yana Shafa leb'onta"eh na canza"
Islam ta had'a fuskarsu,tana aza bakinta kan leb'on shi,Moh'd ya tsaya yana rufe idonshi,jin bata magana yasashi bud'ewa,yace"ya akayi"
Islam tace"kayi shiru,Baby yana haka yake so in kwana"
Moh'd ya kalli yadda lips d'insu yake had'e,yasa harshenshi yana lashe lip d'inta,a hankali ta rufe idonta,yasa hannu ya k'ara janta jikin shi
Washe gari kam ta bakin Moh'd kamar ciwan aljannu,Islam ta tashi kamar ba itace mara lafiyar jiyaba,ta warware tas,Moh'd yayita mamaki,ya kalleta tana zaune kan kujerar falon,sanye da riga iyakarta rabin cinyarta,rigar batada hannu haka kuma batada nauyi sosai,lokacin basu jima da dawowa daga ganin likita ba
Islam ta harare shi"kake kallo na"
Itama harararta yayi"wai kici wata biyu da kwanaki Amma baki gayaman ba"
Islam tace"ni barni,nida nace kakaini wajan Mom amma ka k'i"
Hannu ya d'aga tare da dunk'ulewa,yana nufarta"zan nushe ki"
Islam tayi dariya,ta d'aga rigarta"nushe nan mugani"tana maganar tana nuna mashi cikinta
Moh'd yayi dariya,yana zaro ido,ya sa hannu ya nuna hancinta"saidai in nushe hancin,wato Babyna zakice in nushe ko"
Dariya tayi tanad'aukar lemun mai fata tana sha,Mohd ya d'auki wani yana b'anb'are mata
***Haka su Islam suke gudanar da zamansu,Moh'd yana kula da ita,saidai cikinta ba mai laulayi bane,kawai dai wani lokaci batasan k'amshin wasu abubuwan
Mufeeda tazo dubata,sosai taji dad'i ganin Islam da ciki,Laihat ma cikine da ita,saidai tana shan wahala sosai
Yau su Laihat sunzo mata wuni,kasancewar ranar Weekend ne,duk suna gida ba aiki,Islam sai tararta take,har da girki,Moh'd yace"ki zauna ki huta,kada ki wahalar da kanki"
Islam tace"a'a Yaya barni nayiwa autar Mom girki"
Laihat tace"to Yaya ina ruwanka?kaida tun yaushe nake fushi dakai"
Moh'd ya tab'e baki yana kallon yadda take cin Yalo,ita kuma kalar nata laulayin kenan,yace"ai saikiyi ta fushin yarinya"
Islam ta zauna tana mik'e mata gwaba data saka mata cikin firij,dan sai mai sanyi take so
Laihat tace"wai Aunty ke mi kike ci?"
Islam ta kalli cikinta daya fara fitowa tace"keni ba abinda nakeci"
Laihat tace"tab,ni yanzu ma karas nake son ci"
Moh'd ya zaro ido "kewai lafiyarki" yana maganar yana jawo waya, ya kira Usman mijinta,Islam tana gani Moh'd yafara magana"Lafiya lau yakk?"
"A'a gamunan,cewa zanyi kazo ka d'auke ta,fita zamuyi yanzu"
Islam ta zaro ido,Laihat ta rik'e baki,Moh'd yagama waya"yanzu Dai Yaya korata kakeyi?"
Moh'd yace"cinki yayi yawa haba,kin zama Chop-chop"
Islam ta harareshi"Haba Yaya kawai saikasa ya d'auketa?'
Moh'd yace"gidan Abbakar zamuje"
Haka suka k'ara fira saigaya anzo d'aukar Laihat,Moh'd yabata kud'i suka ta shiga mota,ta lek'o tace"wallahi Yaya saina rama,kuma kuma itama Auntyn sai tayi wani ciki mai laulayi"
Dariya ya saka,ya koma wajan mijinta yace"sannu da k'ok'ari"
Dariya yayi ya kalleta,yana tada mota,suka tafi,su kuma suka koma gidan
Islam tace"to muje gidan Abbakar d'in"
"To sarauniyar yawo,babu inda zamu"
Islam ta rik'eshi"gskiya kada ka k'aramin haka,muna zaune saika ce tatafi?"
Moh'd ya jawota jikinshi"nafisan zama tare dake,ita kuma aiki taketa saki,sai ta wahalar dake"
Dariya tayi tare da fad'in "tashi muje"
Haka suka mik'e suka nufi gidan Abbakar

58
Cikin Islam ya kai wata biyar,dan ya fito sosai,hakan yasa yanzu komi a hankali takeyi,ta rage kazarniya,shi kanshi Moh'd d'in hanata yakeyi,duk da ba takurata cikin yake yi ba
Yau Islam Mom ta gaiyata a gidan,da kyal ta samu Mom d'in ta yarda zata zo,Moh'd ne da ita suke ta girki,ya juyo ya kalleta,doguwar rigace jikinta,saidai yanzu ya gane Islam ta d'anyi k'iba,saboda cikin
Cefanan da take gyarawa ya amsa"kawo in ida,kije falo ki zauna"
Islam ta kad'a kai,duk aikin da zata d'auko baya barinta,ta kalleshi tana turo baki,ya kauda fuska,cigaba tayi da aikinta,Moh'd ya jawo kujerar kitchen d'in,ya kama kafad'arta"zauna kiyi aikin daga zaune, tunda ba zaki aje ba"
Islam tace"Yaya zan iya fa"
Moh'd yayi mata banza ya cigaba da abinda yakeyi,kallonshi ta komayi,tabbas tasan dole ta samu mai aiki kodan yawan aikin da Moh'd yake mata,shima zai fi samun sauki,haka sukayi aikin suka gama,kafin sukaje sukayi wanka
Suna fitowa Mom tana zuwa,Islam sai tsallan Murna take,Mom ta zaro ido"bari tsalle Islam"ta juya tan kallon Moh'd "haka kake barinta tsalle ko,baka mata fad'a"
Moh'd yace"Mom ganin ki ne,bana barinta "
Mom ta kalli Islam tace"adaina"Islam ta juyar dakai tana gaida Mom,dan ita gani take kamar cikinta bai fito ba

Ranar Islam harda d'an ihunta,yaji tausayinta ma dan cikin jikinta,toilet ya wuce dasu,sukayi wanka,ya dawo ya ajeta kan gado yana shirya ta,Islam tasa hannu ta anshi Man da yake Shafa mata"ni bani bani so ma"

"Zanje legos ne wajan Dad"
Zaro ido tayi"wai da gaske?"

*****Cikin Islam yana wata tara,duk wasu kayan Babies sun had'a sosai,tsufan da cikinta yayi hakan yasa take yawan tinanin mahaifiyarta,tasan a irin wannan lokacin ne tarasa rayuwarta,ta d'auki hutun haihuwa,sai zama gida,idan tagaji su fita filin wasan gidan ta Motsa jiki ita da Moh'd

Wajan k'arfe Ukku saiga Laihat da Khulsum Yaya Haidar ya kawo su,Khulsum sai d'aukar yaron take,dan ita ikon Allah ko ciki batada shi,hakan yasa take san yara

Sai dare suka bar gidan Mom ita da yaran ta washe gari kuma tana tashi ta fara neman yadda zata fara gyaran gidan ganin cewar Moh'd ya kusa dawowa daga aikin daya tafi na tsawan watanni,Haidar ta kira tana son ya samo mata masu fenti da sauran gyare-gyare,haka aka kama aikin gidan, cikin sati guda aka gama,tasa an canza komi na gidan sabo aka saka kamar gidan amare harda angaran Moh'd in
Ranar da Moh'd zai dawo kuwa gidan sojoji cike,ga ma'aikata da suke ta aikin abinci,Islam da yaranta sunyi gayu,ta saka wani anyan leshe mai tsadar gaske inkin riga da siket,hada su unshi tasha,arfe Ukku su Laihat da Ummu khulsum suka iso gidan kowane da yaran shi domin tarar Moh'd,Haidar da Abbakar ne suka tafi auko Moh'd in a filin jirgi

"Nagode, ya mutanan gida?" yana maganar yana janye jikin shi tare da maida hankalin shi kan yaran shi dake nuna ma shi motar shiga,kallon Haidar yayi tare da an cije leo"Mu hau gida,ji wancan sai kallona yake yai magana"

"Sojan kenan, muje gidan, Kaga idan bamu zoba sai yace bamuzo tarbar shi ba gaya munzo sojoji zasu kai shi gidan"
Haka suka kama hanya saida kuka kusa awa guda da komawa sannan Moh'd ya iso
Moh'd kam murna kawai yake ya dawo cikin iyalanshi, yana waje su Little Dad suka fito wajan shi,Sadiq ya auka yana mashi Kiss a kumatu,da al ya samu aka bar shi shige wa ciki

Sai ware ido ya ke ya ga Islam amma bai ganta ba,ya juya ya na kallon Laihat Islam ta fito daga uyan da ta yi ta bayan shi tasa hannu tana hare shi sai lokacin yake sauke ajiyar zuciya

"Thank you i missed you wife"
Islam tayi murmushi tana nufa dashi kan kujera, ya juya yana kallon yadda gidan ya sha gyara sosai yaji dai ya san tabbas aikin tane wannan,tambayar su bayan tafiyar shi ya fara yi Islam ta dawo da kofin ruwa ta bashi ya ansa ya sha
Yara sun matsa mashi gidan ya cika da yara sai wasa yake masu,Islam ta rie hannun shi tana fain"Muje ka shirya"
Haka ya mie suka shiga ciki ya tsaya yana kallon yadda aka canza kayan angaran na shi,tana cire ma shi takalmin yasa hannu yana rie hannunta"Waye ya saki wannan aikin? "
Islam ta ware ido tana kallon shi"Wa ne aiki ne? "
"Gyaran gida"
ar dariya ta yi ta je ta aje takalmin ma'ajiyar su ta dawo tana amsar riga da hular da ya cire,taimaka mashi tayi yayi wanka ya shirya cikin wani farin yadi mara nauyi tana jawo mashi takalmi ya zauna bakin gado yana rio hannun ta"zo muyi bacci"
Ido ta zaro"Haba wane bacci bakaci abinci ba, kuma kana da mutane a waje"
Banza yayi mata ya jata jikin shi yana saka hannu shi kan ugunta "Ina kewar ki" ita inma ta san tana kewar mijinta lokacin ta kai bakinta kan nashi Moh'd ya ara rieta yana canza wani salon,sun jima a akin kafin ta samu ta janye jikin ta suka fito
Yinin ranar bai suka rina ansa sai da marece yayi sannan ya samu ya je don hutawa, Islam ta kwanta gefen mijinta yasa hannu yana hare ta kallon shi tayi"bana so kayi baccin marece,ka tashi muje gidan Mom ka gaida su sai mu dawo da daddare"
Moh'd kamar bai ji taba yasa hannu yana zuge zip in rigar ta tasan mi yake nufi dan haka dole ta bar shi
********Dawowar da Moh'd yayi daga wannan aiki da kuma nasara daya samo, hakan ya ara bashi wata dama a tashi asar kyaututtuka sosai ya samu da kuma arin girma,ya kasance jajirtaccan soja da ba'ayi kamar shi ba a Najeriya, wajan kare al'umma,da kuma tsaro da yake oarin bawa asar shi
Haka kuma yayi shiri suka je asar Malaysia ya ara basu gudun muwar horar da sojojin shi kamar yadda yayi masu alawari a baya,tafiyar harda islam hakan yasa suka rina tuno rayuwarsu a asar kafin auran su, saida suka yi wata Ukku sannan su ka dawo
Bayan wasu an shekaru har lokacin Islam bata kuma haihuwa ba,Mufeeda kam zumincin su ya ara arfi da Islam musamman yanzu da suka zama lauyoyi da Najeriya take alfahari da su
Yanzu idan kaga Laihat da Zuriyarta zakayi mamaki musamman idan suka kwashi yaran su dan kaiwa Mom ziyara itada Islam
Islam yanzu Niger ta zame mata garin zuwa dan duk hidimar da za'aji a angaran Hajjo maram da Hajjo ko kuma angaran Hajiya mahaifiyar Mom sune gaba-gaba,kawu Yunus ya auradda yaran shi biyu Moh'd yayi hidima sosai wajan bashi gudunmawa
Uncle Sani da Uncle Samaila yanzu Islam ta maye masu gurbin Mahaifinta komi ita take masu da sauran dangin Babanta
***Wannan lokacin hankalin Dad ya tashi ganin cewar an fidda ranar da za'a yanke masu hukunci kamar yadda kotu ta bada umarni wato kisa ta hanyar rataya
Sam Moh'd bai san Islam tasan da maganar amma ya san dole ne ta sani saboda komi za'ayi yasan sai an gaya mata
Ranar da labarin yaro mata tashin hankali data shiga baya misaltuwa kuka sosai take a Office in
Fuskar ta ta kumbura sosai,duk cikin ranakun data yi a baya da bain ciki da tayi ta san wannan lokacin yafi mata aci za'a hukunta mahaifinta ta hanyar Rataya
Ranar data dawo gida duk yadda taso oye damuwarta hakan bai yiwu ba,Moh'd yana dawowa hankalin shi ya tashi sosai, ya zauna yana tambayar ta abin da ya same ta, Islam lokacin taarajin wani sabon kuka yana zo mata,dakyal ta samu tana gaya ma shi
Moh'd ya fara lallashi ta yana bata hauri, Islam ta zare hawayen tana" jima ina tsoro tare da shakkun zuwan wannan lokacin,lokacin da za'a hukunta mahaifina hukunci mai muni,ina bain cikin wannan lokacin,Dad shine mutumin da nafi so arayuwata,rabuwar da nayi dashi a baya ina jin ciwo"
Tasa hannu tana zawo hannun Moh'd ta ora saman injinta"Yaya taa irjina kaji yadda zuciyar ta take bugawa in
"
Tabbas Moh'd ya san dole islam ta shiga wani hali, musamman irin shauwa da soyayya dake tsakanin ta da mahaifinta, yasa hannu yana goge mata hawaye" kiyi hauri Islam, wannan itace addarar mu, Addu'a zamuyi wa Dad kamar yadda mukeyi kullun itace kawai Dad yake buata"
Kamar wasa Islam hadda rashin lafiya kwana biyu saboda damuwa da tasawa kanta, Moh'd ya san hakan dan dole ya ke tattalin ta
Ranar da Mom da ABBA su kazo ganinta ranar ma tasha kuka,lokacin ta kwanta kan cinyar Mom tana kuka,Mom ta rina yi mata nasiha akan juriya , Islam ta koma gaban ABBA tana kuka,Abba ya lallasheta sosai
Ana saura kwana Ukku a yanke masu Dad hukunci,lokacin Islam da Moh'd suka je wajan Dad in dan Islam tayi mashi bankwana
Tun kafin a fiddo masu shi Islam take kuka Moh'd kam sai haiyar yawu yake mai ciwo,dan baya san kukan Islam gaya yana tausayinta sosai,shi kan shi a irin ziyarar da suke kaiwa Dad in yanajin shi jikin shi sosai
Tunda aka fito da Dad yake kuka dan ya san babu wanda yake kai mashi ziyara sai anuwan shi da yarinyar shi
Dad ya shigo falon da suke zaune da kayan shi na gidan yari kamar kullun, idanuwanshi zuba kawai su ke, ganin kukan da Islam take yi yasa shi nufarta yana nashi kukan wannan lokacin kukan nashi mai sauti ne
Shi kan shi Moh'd idan shi ya canza ganin hawaye nazo mashi ya yi aurin saka hannu yana gogewa
Islam ta ago tana rie hannun,tana kuka"Dad yanzu wannan shi ne zai zama ganina da kai na arshe?shi ne maganar da zanyi da kai batare
"
Kasa ida maganar tayi, ta faa saman jikin shi ta na kuka,Dad ya ora hanshi saman nata" zanzo Ace na daina ganin ki ba tare da nayi maki bankwana ba,kenan rasuwa nayi ba hukunci ne yahau kaina banasan zaki rina kukan rashin a ne, batare da bain cikin komi a ata,amma a yanzu na san abubuwa sun maki yawa,bamuni da wani lokaci kullun Addu'a Allah ya yafe man kurakuraina,Addu'a ta biyu kuma kece da zuri'arki,Aysha na san duk soyayya dana nuna maki bata kai bain cikin dana saka kiba saboda haka
"
Moh'd ya taso daga wajan da yake zaune, ya tsugunna gaban Dad, yasa hannu yana rie shi Dad ya maido hankalin shi kan Moh'd"Nagode sosai yaron kirki,shekarun da kayi tare da Islam na san ko bayan raina zaka rieta amana,Allah ya albarkaci rayuwarka da iyalinka, Allah ya raba ku sha Sharrin zuciya"
Ya ago kan Islam"ki rie mijin ki Islam, ki kyautatawa dangin ki, kibawa yaran ki tarbiya mai kyau,ki saka Allah adukkanin lamurranki,ki taimakawa al'umma da suke asanki da baki aya al'umma, ki taimakawa na asa dake,wannan sune kawai nake da lokacin gaya maki,nasan tawa tazo arshe "
Cikin murya kuka itama ta fara magana"nagode sosai Dad insha Allah zaka samu rabauta,Allah zai yafe maka laifukanka kamar yadda yake tare da masu tuba Dad"
Dad ya maida hankali shi kan Moh'd yana san nemo nutsuwa,sai dai baya tare da ita, hakazukayi wannan zama cikin kuka,haka suka rabu kowa yana kuka, wanda dayal Moh'd ya fidda Islam daga jikin Dad inta
Bayan zuwan su da kwana aka yanke wa Dad Hukunci kamar yadda kotu ta bada umarni
*Innalillahiwainna ilaihi raji'un wannan shine arshen Dad,Allah ka raba mu da Sharrin zuciya,ya kare mu daga aikata laifuka Ameen*
Ranar Islam ta shiga tsantsar tashin hankali,wanda ya tada duka hankalin su, hatta yaran kuka kawai suke, duk da ba wani hankali ne dasu ba,sai dai ganin yadda mahaifiyarsu take kuka ga Moh'd sai lallashinta yake
Tsawan lokaci Islam ta kasa samun daidaita,daidai ta dage sosai wajan yi wa mahaifina Addu'a acikin sallolinta,ganin ranar da tayi hakan yasa su Abba da Mom suke lallashinta,har kullun tana kukan rashin mahaifiyarka, musamman yanzu data ara rasa wani angare na rayuwarta
Lokacin yaran suna makaranta,Moh'd ya shigo falon, Islam kam Yinin ranar jikin ta yayi mata sanyi,haka take duk lokacin data tuno iyayanta da suka rasu, janta yayi ya na tambayar ta miya sameta Islam ta ara narkewa jikin shi tana sharar hawaye
Tabbas ya gane damuwarta dan ya san Dad ne kawai da mahaifiyarta take tunawa tayi kuka,hannu yasa yana goge mata fuska"shikenan daina kuka kinga yara sun kusa dawowa Skul kada ki saka su kuka"
Cikin muryar kuka take magana"nasan Dad yabar baya da URA,duk yadda muke tunanin URA zata lafa,hakan ba zai yiwuba koba komi wata rana za'a kalli babbar lauya Ace Mahaifinta ya kasance tsohon an fashi"
Hannu Moh'd yasa yana shafar gashin kanta yana lallashi ta, yanzu iyakar lallashin da yake mata kenan
*****Bayan wani lokaci suka ara fuskantar wata sabuwar rayuwa mai dai a zuri'arsu,sai dai Islam har zuwa lokacin tana tuna Mahaifanta, musamman Dad inta
Abba da Mom an tsufa
Islam da Moh'd sun zama manya,idan ka gansu ba zaka taa tunanin sune masoyan da suka taa fuskantar *URA a Baya* ba
Yau Little Dad ya dawo daga Ball bayan layinsu,a wani filin wasa,lokacin naga yadda yaran ya zama saurayi dan ya gama secondry School,safa da takalmin afarshi ya wurga kan kujerun falon,yasa hannu yana dafe kai, Islam ta ago tana kallon shi tare da fain"kai miye haka? Bazaka iya kaiwa angaran ku ba? "
Cikin sauri ya isa gaban Islam ya zauna kusa da ita"Mimi Mimi na gaji idan Abi yadawo sai yaman shari'a da yaran nan"
Islam gabata ya fai,tasa hannu ta ruoshi,yanzu ta riga ta gane an fara goran tawa yara ta idan ya fita"mi kuma ya faru"
"yanzu sun gama cemin sun san komi, yau suna fain man wai kakana an fashi ne, Hukuncin kisa akaima shi,kan naci kwallo,Mimi kinga yaman da gaske ne?"
Islam ta zaro ido tana dafe irji tare da karanto Innalillahi,har zuwa arshe,sai kuma hawaye suka gangaro mata,wannan shine abin da take gudu,Little Dad ya zaro ido yana kallon ta"Mimi Kuka? "
Kanta ta aza saman cinyar shi,Little ya ago da kanta, zaiyi magana sai ga Moh'd ya shigo,ya kallesu,sai yaga hawaye idan Little Dad
Da sauri ya nufesu yana fain"Dady miya faru"
Yana maganar yana rie Islam"Abi Mimi kuka take saboda ance Kakana an fashi ne,kullun haka suke cemin
"
Cikin razana tare da kauwa ya fara yi wa Little faa, kamar zai doke shi, Islam ta zaunar da Moh'd" kayi hauri,kai kanka kasan dole hakan zai faru"
Ta juya tana kallon yaranta"little yanzu nasan kayi hankalin tabbas abin da suk
"
Moh'd yayi saurin matsawa wajan ta" wai mie damuki kada ki sake in
"
Yaran ya kasa gane miye gaskiya lamarin, sai dai Moh'd yana ganin kamar yaran bai isa Ace ya san wannan maganar ba, dan haka ya hana ta fain maganar ta hanyar canza zance
Islam tayi takaici sosai a wannan rana taga abin da ya faru tun kafin haihuwa yaran gaya yau abin yazo mashi
****Bayan shekarun biyu, Islam sanye da kayan Lauyoyi da manya-manyan Lauyoyi a cikin akin taro
taron hada shugaban asar Najeriya, kowa murna yake taya Islam ganin duk unbin manyan mutannan da suka taru saboda ita ne
Moh'd murna sosai a tare dashi ganin cewar matarshi ce yau shugaban asa yake karramawa tare da bata muamin Babbar Lauya wadda zata rina kare Najeriya idan muatar hakan ta taso,yayin shari'a tsakanin Najeriya da sauran asashe,sannan kuma itace Lauya mace ta farko da ta fara samun wannan matsayi
Bayan tashin taron Islam ta koma tana neman Moh'd lokacin har ya kai wajan mota tare da sojojin shi, da sauri ta ta bi shi,ya juyo yana kallon ta tare da mia mata hannu yana dariya,itama hannun ta bashi kamar suna gaisa wa "Congratulation"
"Thank you Abi,shi ne ba za ka jira ni ba?"
Murmushi yayi tare da fain"naga kamar lunch aka shirya maki,nayi tunanin can zaki wuce"
"A'a mutane na sunyi gaba tare dasu Mufeeda nikuma zan tafi tare da soja na"
Murmushi sosai a fuskar shi,yasa hannu yana bue mata mota, gida suka fara zuwa suka ara shiryawa, sai dai wannan lokacin Moh'd kayan gida ya saka, ita kuma ta ora kayan lauyoyi zaman kayan ta,wannan lokacin taso ace babanta yana raye yaga yadda asa take alfahari da ita kamar yadda yayi guri tare da yi mata addu'a,hakan yasa tayi kuka, Moh'd ne kawai ya gane matsalar ta, yayin da wasu suke ganin kukan murna ne
Sune basu dawoba sai arfe biyar na marece,sannan kuma akwai Dinner da Gungiyar lauyoyi ta shirya mata
Fitowa suka yi daga mota,Islam ta fara jin kia na tashi a babban falon gidan,ta juya tana kallon Moh'd, shima ya kalle ta,suka shiga
Yan mata da samarin Family in sune cike da falon aan Mufeeda,Haidar,Laihat da Abbakar,da yaran Islam in su duka,sai lokacin na kula da yadda suka zama samari,matan kuma suka zama Cikakkun an mata
Islam ta fara dariya tana nuna su da yatsa, ihu suka hau yi mata, suna tai, ta juya tana kallon Moh'd,gira ya aga mata tare da gyara babbar rigarshi"murna suke taya ki"
Ta kalli Jennert mai aikin ta wadda itama girma ya kamata tace"Aunty haka kika bar su suna haya niya?"
Dariya tayi tare da fain"little Dad ne ya shirya"
Ta juya tana kallon farin yaron dogo dashi kamar baban shi"kai ko? "
"muna murna ne Miminmu"
Islam ta rie hannun Moh'd akan su wuce, yaran suka taso suna zagaye su suna hotuna, Islam tayi dariya itada Moh'd
Dakyal yaran suka yalesu suka shige ciki
*Alhamdulillah, anan nazo arshen littafi na sai fatan Allah ya arawa su Moh'd farin ciki*
